item.description: I have a cold. Worked in Bloomington, never made it to SAIC. Officially on Spring Break, kids excited to go to Kentucky. Report cards: Ashley and Bruce As; Dwyane As and Bs; Dillan As, Bs, and Cs. Ashley passed iRead, has High Ability opportunity. Awesome! We’re so proud of them!

item.title: Status Update – March 21, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Worked in Bloomington until noon, then SAIC, repeating tomorrow. Ashley packed lunch. Picked kids up, dropped Ashley at Amanda’s, Brownies went to Build A Bear, built Brownie bears, she had fun. Lesa handled kids AND homework, I crashed on couch. I’m catching cold?

item.title: Status Update – March 20, 2019
item.description: First day of Spring! Barely made bus, Ashley thinks she did well on iLearn. Kids okay, we’re not: SAIC noise pollution stressing me, feel like puking, go back tomorrow; Lesa sciatic nerve issue with left leg, stressed out. Left work at reasonable time, picked up kids. Watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 19, 2019
item.description: Bruce forgot school backpack. Ashley took iRead-3, thinks she did well, was really nervous prior, iLearn testing tomorrow. Worked all day at SAIC, off late, barely got kids on time, Lesa had dinner waiting. Took Ashley to her piano lesson. Bedtime, Dillan played around per usual.

item.title: Status Update – March 18, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus! Problems at work, off late, barely got kids on time. Lesa had supper waiting, kids gobbled up ham, seconds all around. All went to Scout Pack meeting, Dillan got a pin, kids chowed on snacks. Ashley turned in early, iRead-3 testing tomorrow: rest, breakfast, focus.

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2019
item.description: Church, backup serving deacon, kids learned story of Shepard and the Lost Sheep, told Kurtis Moffitt we’d attend his Bible Study. Dillan more talkative about SuperStart, I helped him make shelf for Scouts, went to Gabe’s. Kids explored woods with Lesa. Tablets, play, board games.

item.title: Status Update – March 16, 2019
item.description: Slept until 8:30, no riled up boys! Lazy morning. Lesa took kids to get mail, ran into Gabe, so bored he invited other kids over, they played awhile. Planned on Asian Pearl, texted, Dillan getting home too late, settled on KFC. Dillan said he had good time, would go again, a win?

item.title: Status Update – March 15, 2019
item.description: Bruce low-grade fever, felt yucky. School called about Ashley’s rash, worried it’s contagious, Lesa took her to doctor, abrasive dermatitis (dry skin), back to school. Dwyane read to Ashley’s class. C3 picked up Dillan for SuperStart in Cincinnati. Homemade pizza, 101 Dalmatians.

item.title: Status Update – March 14, 2019
item.description: Very warm. Drove kids to school again. Worked morning in Bloomington, afternoon at SAIC, tornado touchdowns in Orleans and Heltonville, lots of down branches/trees, lost power until 10:30p. Ashley made pico de gallo at Scouts, tasty. Ashley has rash on her right cheek, worrisome.

item.title: Status Update – March 13, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school. Warm day. Leprechaun footprints around Bruce’s trap, left a hat, no Leprechaun. Thought it was Thursday, was going to take Ashley to Scouts. Left earlier than usual to pick up kids and go home. Lesa went to CVS, got Mrs Dillman’s photos, kids played outside.

item.title: Status Update – March 12, 2019
item.description: Walked Bruce into school, talked with Mr Hudson. Worked at SAIC, one minute to spare picking up kids, almost took bad mood and headache out on kids but didn’t. Took Ashley to piano lesson, she took test in her music book, Loretta scored it, gave her a B. Dwyane clipped his nails.

item.title: Status Update – March 11, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school, Bruce had leprechaun trap. Lesa took PTO, call from Mr Hudson, Bruce pushed girl down on playground, 3 days no recess. Left ½ hour early, got kids, dropped them off except Bruce, we drove to school, had long talk. Ashley practiced piano. Took boys to Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – March 10, 2019
item.description: Church, fill-in minister. Boys played outside, good muddy fun. Ashley on tablet in afternoon (boys got theirs yesterday when she was selling cookies). Dwyane felt sick early evening, seemed okay at bedtime. Helped Bruce make leprechaun trap, he liked; Ashley, Dwyane made one too.

item.title: Status Update – March 9, 2019
item.description: Ashley and me made Lesa breakfast in bed. Registered kids for baseball; CVS for Mrs Dillman’s photos, not ready; Dollar General for art supplies. IGA for last day of cookie sales, Ashley met her goal. Becky babysat kids, brought Maelee, date night at Outback, played Yahtzee, fun.

item.title: Status Update – March 8, 2019
item.description: Pajama day, missed bus, dropped kids off, got call Dwyane forgot backpack, went back, took it to him. Off at 3:30. Lesa off early too, grocery shopping, Rural King. Lesa picked up boys, McDonald’s, Nerf Gun Wars! Boys had great time! I got Ashley, Taco Bell, watched DVD, popcorn.

item.title: Status Update – March 7, 2019
item.description: Early getting ready! Day even slower than yesterday. Still cold, been snowing since mid-afternoon, ground covered. Picked up kids. Marriage Oneness Class over, last one canceled. No Scouts. Ashley a pill, boys super worked up about tomorrow. Homework. Lesa played games with kids.

item.title: Status Update – March 6, 2019
item.description: Cold, sub-zero wind chills, kids stayed in truck until bus. Day dragged by. Lesa picked up Ashley, took her to Amanda’s, Scout trip, Space Lab in Bloomington. I picked up boys, was watching TV, didn’t notice Lesa picked up Ashley! Quiet evening. Took Dillan with me to get Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – March 5, 2019
item.description: Everyone healthy! Dillan forgot lunch bag, went back, drove kids to school. Dillan field trip to State Capital in Indy, he had fun. Got kids. Took Ashley to piano lesson, stopped at Ken Osterbrook’s, dropped off Dillan’s SuperStart form/money. Lesa showed boys Friday’s Nerf gear!

item.title: Status Update – March 4, 2019
item.description: Lesa sick, Ashley not 100%, rest of us okay? Work went fast. Picked up kids. Bruce’s Scout leader sick, Dwyane didn’t want to go, only Dillan went to Scouts, almost didn’t go due to homework, asked to bring hammer, he made a bank. Lesa wrangled other three: popcorn, lemonade, TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 3, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday in sanctuary, Tony let go, church in shock. Snow came, not near amount forecast, thankful. I took Ashley to Kroger on S. Walnut to sell cookies, at 434, only 16 away from next goal. Boys sledded. Ashley not 100% but did okay. Dillan had issues getting homework done.

item.title: Status Update – March 2, 2019
item.description: Ashley sick off/on. Pinewood Derby, boys were ecstatic, guessing they took 2nd place for respective dens, Dillan prizes for Best Paint, Most Realistic, didn’t see that coming. Boys had awesome time! Lesa sold cookies with Ashley at IGA, I took boys to Steak ‘n’ Shake. Wii and TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 1, 2019
item.description: Friday, Ashley moving slow, drove kids to school, 2 hours later get call, Ashley sick, has fever, come get her, Lesa picked her up, took her home. Worked full day, picked up boys. Pizza! Ashley still sick, Ibuprofen breaks fever, wears off, back to fever. Boys painted derby cars.

item.title: Status Update – February 28, 2019
item.description: Quarters day, dimes yesterday, Ashley’s class leading with $60. East Gate half-a-day. Lowe’s, bought Mitre saw, picked up kids. Cut derby cars, Dillan wedge car, boys excited to have a car, their first time. Church for Marriage Oneness Class, almost finished, next week last week.

item.title: Status Update – February 27, 2019
item.description: Lesa and I took kids to bus stop. Went to Dwyane’s Speech Conference at 9, talked about Dillan too, doing great! Lesa worked from home, I spent day at SAIC. Bruce wet himself in daycare van, bought him change of clothes from Dollar General. Kids played outside some. Homework. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 26, 2019
item.description: Donated nickels to fight leukemia. Work okay, left at 4, picked up kids. Loretta called to cancel Ashley’s piano lesson, had to work. Kids wound up, acting crazy; made them play outside, clean their rooms. Lesa helped kids with homework, she’s a saint, especially with Dillan! TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 25, 2019
item.description: Pajama day at school, donated pennies to fight leukemia. My cubicle got moved, afternoon meeting, time to step up. Off at 4, stopped at Dollar General, washed truck, picked up kids. We went to Pack Meeting, Lesa too, watched boys receive awards, Dillan brought Rice Crispy treats.

item.title: Status Update – February 24, 2019
item.description: Church, lead in back, Lesa stayed home. Ashley had World Day at Scouts, manipulated Amanda into buying her chicken nuggets. Bruce peed/pooped his pants, peed them yesterday and his bed Friday, not sure what’s going on with him. Kids played outside. Played Yahtzee with Ashley. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 23, 2019
item.description: Up early, drove to Indianapolis for Foster Care Awareness Event at Chapel Rock Christian Church, Lesa and I were panelists, hope we help foster kids in some way, kids didn’t seem to mind. At home, sent kids outside to play until it started raining. Dinner, baths, TV. We’re tired.

item.title: Status Update – February 22, 2019
item.description: Friday, long week! About 70%, upper lip split while sleeping, nose bleeds off and on. Slow getting ready, took kids to school. Work seems like big hole. Left work on time, stopped at Stinson’s for Marriage Oneness DVD then picked up kids. Pizza, watched Hotel Transylvania 2, bed.

item.title: Status Update – February 21, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Still sick, simply miserable. Picked up kids a bit late. Took Ashley to Fayetteville to drop off World Day Scout project for Sunday. Skipped Marriage Oneness class, went to Springville Elem.’s STEAM night instead, Ashley had project on display. Kids had great time.

item.title: Status Update – February 20, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school, Ashley had Science Fair project. I’m sick, was a really long day, and worked late too! Lesa bought craft items for Ashley’s World Day on Sunday, then picked kids up for me. Late supper, they waited until I got home, Ashley super-excited to see me. FDD photo.

item.title: Status Update – February 19, 2019
item.description: Sick, running fever, flu? Called in, went back to sleep, Mr. Hudson called, Bruce expelled for hitting a kid in mouth, wanted me to get him. Spanking, no playing, made him work, in afternoon let him watch TV. Got other kids while Lesa made supper, she took Ashley to piano lesson.

item.title: Status Update – February 18, 2019
item.description: President’s Day, off work. Angel Jackson asked if we could take Lexi and Kash to school, Wes in hospital. I’m sick, couldn’t sleep, bad headache. Took Lesa to Taste of India for lunch, good time. Got kids from school. Took everyone except Bruce to Scouts, Bruce didn’t want to go.

item.title: Status Update – February 17, 2019
item.description: Church, I helped in Junior Church. Cold, misting and icy; cookie sells canceled, Ashley sad, we’re glad. Lesa went to Walmart, got clothes for kids, other items. Kids played on tablets, watched TV. Homework after dinner: Ashley spelling, Dwyane and Bruce reading, Dillan math. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 16, 2019
item.description: Slept in, Dillan made me breakfast. Everyone, even Lesa, climbed into bed with me and got silly. Dillan has sore throat, feels sick. Low 30s, kids went out for short time. Took Ashley to Walmart, sold ton of cookies, we froze. Dwyane scared by Hookman story I told earlier in day.

item.title: Status Update – February 15, 2019
item.description: No problems at bus stop. Warmer with sunshine, ground still saturated and muddy. Picked up kids earlier than usual. Lesa grocery shopped. Pizza! Boys watched Ice Age; Lesa, Dillan, Ashley, myself played Monopoly, had good game and great time. Kids got to stay up later than usual.

item.title: Status Update – February 14, 2019
item.description: Kid told Bruce to shut up at bus stop, bullying him since November, called transportation on him. Quiet workday. I’ve got a cold, felt miserable most of the day. Valentines Day, I got Lesa and kids candy, got same in return. Took Ashley to Scouts, canceled. Went to Oneness class.

item.title: Status Update – February 13, 2019
item.description: Boys rode bus but wanted me to drop them at school. Lesa worked from home, took Ashley to dentist for her new spacer; it’s rubbing, making her tongue sore. Disastrous workday! Sun poked it’s head out. Picked kids up ½ hour late. Scout Online Safety video. Helped Dillan with Math.

item.title: Status Update – February 12, 2019
item.description: I’m exhausted. Kids rode bus. Second try to deliver cookies to Kathy, success! Talked with her awhile. Late getting kids again, supper was ready. Ashley could remember her piano homework so totally unprepared for tonight’s lesson, discussed dropping piano lessons with her. Windy!

item.title: Status Update – February 11, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Started out warm, got cold and rainy as day went on. Tried to deliver Kathy Mitchell’s cookies, no one home. Picked kids up later than usual because of, Lesa had dinner on table waiting. Boys had Cub Scouts. Ashley stayed home, did science project. Big kid showers.

item.title: Status Update – February 10, 2019
item.description: Church, Serving Deacon. Icy roads AM, okay PM. Arby’s. Great Clips, boys got buzzed, #4 on top, #2 on sides, they look good! Michaels Art store. Kids played outside. Took Ashley to Rural King to sell cookies, McDonald’s, church. Lesa stayed home with boys, watched Ant Man & Wasp.

item.title: Status Update – February 9, 2019
item.description: We slept in until 8:30! Lazy morning, almost late going to Lowe’s where Ashley was selling cookies, she was hyped up all day. Gabe and Gracie here when we got home, all the kids went to their house to play on trampoline. Played Yahtzee with Dillan, Ashley and Dwyane. Showers, TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 8, 2019
item.description: Friday! Dropped kids at daycare. Sun came out but cold, water from last few days frozen. Kids had school Valentine’s parties. Picked up kids. Lesa watched boys. I took Ashley to dinner at Casa Brava. At Father-Daughter Dance, she danced with me 5 times! Steak ‘n’ Shake afterward.

item.title: Status Update – February 7, 2019
item.description: Rained hard, Springville under water, worst flood in remembered history. Cold front, storms, tornado sirens. School asked parents to get kids, buses unable, 2-hour delay tomorrow, We all got home safe. Oneness class canceled. Ashley, Scouts learned First-Aid; took ambulance ride.

item.title: Status Update – February 6, 2019
item.description: Rained hard all day, ground totally saturated. Kids rode bus. Valentines delivered to classmates and teachers, kids ready for party on Friday. Work okay, appears I’m still in map business. Picked up kids. Stayed home, went nowhere. Ashley spent evening making BD gifts for Brilee.

item.title: Status Update – February 5, 2019
item.description: Woke up tired! Kids wanted me to drive them to school, except Dillan, he rode bus, drove rest to school. Spent half day at East Gate (SAIC) in software and map meetings, guess that’s good, new work on top of old. Picked up kids. Took Ashley to piano lessons. Watched SOTU address.

item.title: Status Update – February 4, 2019
item.description: What a long day! Packed 4 boxes of cookies around, 1 for daycare, 1 for school, 2 for my work. Dropped kids at school because of Ashley’s cookies and Bruce’s snacks and drinks. Took cookies to Sonja at HTO, felt a bit surreal. Picked up kids and took boys to Scouts. I’m wore out!

item.title: Status Update – February 3, 2019
item.description: Intentional Parenting class, Family Sunday. Lesa and I had big fight, frightened kids, all’s well. Dillan at Gabe’s, video games, trampoline. I took Ashley to Rural King, sold cookies. Lesa took boys to see animals, wound up trampolining too. Late supper, bedtime. Superbowl LIII.

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2019
item.description: Slept until 8! Helped Dillan do homework. Ashley piano. Took her to IGA to sell cookies, CVS for Dwyane and Lesa’s scripts, Wendy’s. Lesa took boys, dogs for walk to mailbox. Kids played inside/outside, Dillan went to Gabe’s, rest played with slime, bugged me about Wii, Monopoly.

item.title: Status Update – February 1, 2019
item.description: Full day of school. Took chili to work for Fourth Friday Lunch. Forced off road by truck and trailer that lost control on ice, managed to save it without wrecking or damage to truck. Lesa took Dwyane to doctor for earache. I picked up other kids and Ashley’s cookies. Papa John’s!

item.title: Status Update – January 31, 2019
item.description: 2-hour delay became school closure, took kids to daycare, can’t afford another day off, I hate that. Feel like job is slipping away, trying not to panic. Worked over, late getting kids, rushed supper. Ashley had Scouts, we had Oneness class. Lesa made chili for my lunch pitch-in.

item.title: Status Update – January 30, 2019
item.description: Subzero temps, -30⁄40 wind chills, kids stayed home, Lesa and I worked from home, actually got some work done. Kids did lots of homework, Dillan did catch-up work as well. Bedroom blanket forts, tablets. Took Lesa and kids to Golden Corral, used Bruce and Dwyane’s discounts. Wii.

item.title: Status Update – January 29, 2019
item.description: Cold, wind chill, sub-zero temps here. Kids rode bus, picked them up from daycare later than usual, they didn’t notice. School closed on Wednesday already. Loretta cancelled Ashley’s piano lesson. Went to get gas with Ashley, Lesa called, toilet flooded, Dillan watched me repair.

item.title: Status Update – January 28, 2019
item.description: Fairly normal morning/day. Mrs Harp sent Dillan’s report card home early, and a note: seven Fs, one B in Art, several failed assignments, plus 19 missing! I was livid, grounded him from playing! Scout Pack meeting, many awards, Ashley went too. Record-breaking deep freeze on way.

item.title: Status Update – January 27, 2019
item.description: Icy roads on way to church, first parenting class. Boys acted like brothers, sledded together all day. Ashley made Valentines for Veterans with Scouts, prize for most creative. Blanket fort up/down multiple times. Oneness homework. Lesa helped Bruce read, I helped Dillan do math.

item.title: Status Update – January 26, 2019
item.description: Up early, kids noisy, made blanket fort in Ashley’s room, planned on sleeping in it, abandoned idea like last week. Took kids to Worthington: picked up beef, elk, bison summer sausages. Stopped at Dairy Queen, kids got Blizzards. Kids played outside, supper, TV, showers, snowing!

item.title: Status Update – January 25, 2019
item.description: Took kids to school, 2-hr delay. Dwyane so excited about field trip to Celebrations, worried he’d miss it, had great time! 100th school day, kids dressed like old people, Ashley blue-grey highlights, cane, costume jewelry. Pizza, Open Season 2 & 3. Everyone sick except Bruce, me.

item.title: Status Update – January 24, 2019
item.description: Normal school start, kids rode bus. Ashley looks, feels, better. Day dragged on, left ½ hour early. Ashley turned in GS Cookie order forms, girls made sandwiches for homeless shelter. Marriage Oneness class, Amanda babysat again. Cold, sub-zero wind chills, 2-hour delay tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – January 23, 2019
item.description: Two hour delay, took kids to daycare, picked them up after work, work was kind of intense. Rained hard all day, snow mostly gone, sloppy. Ashley still sick, bad cough, Dwyane doing good. No plans for evening. Started working out on elliptical again, ran for ½ hour, I can feel it!

item.title: Status Update – January 22, 2019
item.description: Woke up, toilet had leaked on floor. Snow day #2, daycare for kids, took Coco movie, seemed like they had fun. Lesa and I worked, roads not too bad. Picked up kids, ate supper. I took Ashley to piano lesson, we went to Menards to buy plumbing supplies. I spent the night plumbing.

item.title: Status Update – January 21, 2019
item.description: Off for MLK Day. Kids stayed home, school snow day, slick roads, cold, stayed inside. Ashley and Dwyane sick, took them to doctor, earaches both. Lesa and I didn’t get lunch together, finished Oneness homework. Buffalo Wild Wings, supporting Springville PTO. Icy hill? No problem!

item.title: Status Update – January 20, 2019
item.description: Church canceled, 8″, emergency travel only, drifting, I got out, roads bad. Sledded, but too cold. Cleaned out roll-top desk, want to put piano in Ashley’s room. Lexi, Kash came up, sledded, came in, played with slime. Monopoly and Yahtzee. Ashley, Dwyane have fevers. Blood moon.

item.title: Status Update – January 19, 2019
item.description: Larry and Sarah Waggle gave us a swing set, Mark Adams helped deliver it, kids like. While Lesa grocery shopped, I hauled huge load of trash with kids, hauled another load of recyclables, then took kids to lunch at Wendy’s. Ashley and boys made blanket fort. Yahtzee. Snowing out.

item.title: Status Update – January 18, 2019
item.description: Friday! Dillan, Bruce rode bus. Lesa took Dwyane, Ashley to dentist; Dwyane had 4 baby teeth pulled making room for adult teeth, Ashley sized for spacer, Dwyane stayed home, Ashley went to school. Sarah’s last day at daycare. Pizza! My fitness tracker came, Dillan walked with me.

item.title: Status Update – January 17, 2019
item.description: Kids ready for second day in a row! Rained hard, stayed in truck until bus came. Busy workday, left ½-hr early to pick up kids. Helped Dillan do simple fractions. Marriage Oneness class at Cincinnati Christian, kids went up to Kid City room. Home late, rushed everyone off to bed.

item.title: Status Update – January 16, 2019
item.description: Kids dressed/ready for school on time! Rode bus, Kim Thompson texted, Dwyane forgot backpack. Worked over. Got kids, sledded before supper; snow is melting, only ice left. Mrs Dillman needs photo of Bruce for newspaper weather. Mrs Harp let us know Dillan missing a lot of papers.

item.title: Status Update – January 15, 2019
item.description: Dillan and Ashley rode bus, took Dwyane and Bruce to school, didn’t want Bruce to carry Pablo. Long, but productive workday; tired. Kids sledded on ice, all got hurt pretty much immediately. Dillan brought home stack of papers with good grades, proud! Took Ashley to piano lesson.

item.title: Status Update – January 14, 2019
item.description: Caught bus to school, kids didn’t want to go, can’t blame them, I didn’t want to work. Ashley getting sick, sore throat, runny nose. Got kids from daycare, Pablo came home with Bruce, he knows it’s a stuffed bear, had fun with it anyway. Skipped Scouts. Marriage Oneness homework.

item.title: Status Update – January 13, 2019
item.description: Skipped church, slept until 9:30! Dillan made me breakfast in bed. Kids wanted to sled in morning, didn’t let them. Walmart, everyone needed shoes except Lesa. Sledded all afternoon, Lexi and Kash came up again, kids almost hurt themselves with frostbite. Dillan disrupted prayer.

item.title: Status Update – January 12, 2019
item.description: Snow! Lots of snow! Kids went sledding right after breakfast. Hot chocolate. Lunch. Sledding again, Lesa and I included, built snow fort, snowball fight, Lexi and Kash came up, kids had a blast. More hot chocolate, kids played games, Lexi and Kash too, lots of laughter. Good day.

item.title: Status Update – January 11, 2019
item.description: Friday! Work, school, daycare. Bruce punched Dwyane in throat and eye on daycare van, looks like black eye. Springville pizza. Took Ashley to Girl Scout Cookie Rally, Lesa wanted to stay home with boys. Forecast says 5-7″ of snow tonight, sleeting already, I’m too tired for snow!

item.title: Status Update – January 10, 2019
item.description: Boys messed around, not ready, missed bus, took them to school. Tired all day. Got kids, rushed dinner. Dropped Ashley at Fayetteville Elementary for Scouts. Cincinnati Christian for Oneness Marriage Class. Nancy Clensy watched boys. Picked up Ashley at Amanda Goen’s after class.

item.title: Status Update – January 9, 2019
item.description: Normal day, worked hour over, picked up kids. Report cards! Dillan got 3 Cs, 1 B, 3 As. Ashley in accelerated class, all A+s except 1 A-, teacher wrote WOW! Dwyane also had all A+s except 1 A-. Bruce all As, pluses. We’re happy and proud of them! Dwyane’s first phone call to Jax!

item.title: Status Update – January 8, 2019
item.description: School, work, daycare. Dwyane forgot backpack, threw royal fit at bus stop. Bruce wore new Scout belt, took it off at daycare, was swinging/hitting kids with it, was taken away. Worked an hour over, picked up kids, dinner drama. Took Ashley to piano lessons, boys frustrated Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – January 7, 2019
item.description: Worked from home, Dillan threw up getting ready, other kids made it to school. Dillan slept all morning, laid around, watched TV. Took him to pick up Father/Daughter Dance tickets, rest of kids from daycare, and Cub Scout shirts. Took all the boys to Scouts. Snuggled with Dwyane.

item.title: Status Update – January 6, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday, Security Deacon, going to stop teaching so we can attend parenting class until May. Went to see Mary Poppins Returns at theater, Dwyane and Bruce found it magical, Dillan and Ashley enjoyed too. Concert at church, had to lock up, Ashley went, Lesa stayed with boys.

item.title: Status Update – January 5, 2019
item.description: Ashley went to Disney on Ice with Girl Scouts, Lesa dropped her off early, saw coyote on way home. Took boys to Scout store, lunch at Wendy’s. Took down Christmas decorations, lights, tree. Dillan manipulated and lied to Lesa to go to Gabe’s, grounded him. Lesa took boys on walk.

item.title: Status Update – January 4, 2019
item.description: Work, school, daycare; 3-day work week, still glad for weekend! We both left early. I got kids; Lesa grocery shopped, picked up Papa John’s. Sonja, son Brayden, friend Jose joined us for dinner. Boys watched movie, we played Yahtzee; everyone seemed to have fun, hope to do again.

item.title: Status Update – January 3, 2019
item.description: We worked, kids went to school, we barely made bus which was early. Got off late again, picked kids up late, daycare cool about it. Kids tattled on themselves. They seemed to enjoy being back in school based on table talk. Didn’t enjoy school work though. I crashed hard on couch.

item.title: Status Update – January 2, 2019
item.description: Lesa and I worked. Hated dropping kids off at daycare but no where else to take them. Didn’t get off work until 5:15pm, called Lesa, she picked up kids. All kids took baths. After Dwyane and Bruce went to bed, Dillan and Ashley played scrabble with us. Everyone had long hard day.

item.title: Status Update – January 1, 2019
item.description: Lazy morning, packed, McDonald’s on way home. Puppies glad we’re home, us too. Kids still wild, hard to control. Dillan and Ashley went to Gabe and Gracie’s. Traditional New Year’s food: cabbage and sausage, no black-eyed peas, we settled for black beans and rice. Girls fighting.

item.title: Status Update – December 31, 2018
item.description: Rained all day! Log in fireplace, Smurfs in DVD player. Subway lunch. Lazer Tag, everyone played, we had a blast, kids played indoor golf. DQ for hot fudge sundaes! Swimming! More logs. Papa John’s delivered. Sauna. Sing DVD. Celebrated New Year with Lesa. God blessed us in 2018!

item.title: Status Update – December 30, 2018
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home to pack for trip. Got home, ate lunch, loaded truck, and headed to French Lick Springs Villas courtesy of the Cook’s. Sonja watching dogs for us. Okay place, kids excited. Ate Mexican, stopped by Jay Cs, Jet tub and log in the fireplace. Big day tomorrow!

item.title: Status Update – December 29, 2018
item.description: Seems like kids fought all day. Lesa did eggs for “Devil” eggs, I took out three bags trash. Christmas at my mom and dad’s in Indy, kids had lots of fun playing with cousins. Yahtzee with kids, then by ourselves after kids’ bedtime. Marcy Cook texted about a villa in French Lick.

item.title: Status Update – December 28, 2018
item.description: I worked, kids went to daycare, Lesa stayed home/went grocery shopping. I picked them up, heard all the stories: Dillan was hitting Bruce, Bruce was biting, etc. Kids have obviously lost their minds. Got home, more of same. Pizza, Dillan almost got sick eating whole pepperoncini.

item.title: Status Update – December 27, 2018
item.description: I worked, Lesa stayed home with kids. Long day for everyone! Lesa done with the kids, they’re going to daycare tomorrow. She described it as all hell broke loose: fighting, disrespecting, disobeying, general lawlessness. Ashley had Scout Christmas party. I played cars with Bruce.

item.title: Status Update – December 26, 2018
item.description: Bruce woke us at 3a, Dillan threw up off top bunk onto floor, enough said. Work for me, holiday for Lesa and kids, sort of. Boys played with bow and arrows, built LEGOs, took walk to mailbox, etc. Sounds like Lesa kept them busy, she said they did okay. Worked over. TV. worn out.

item.title: Status Update – December 25, 2018
item.description: Christmas! Santa came, left candy coal for Dillan but we added a few more gifts. Indy to Grandpa Avery and Grandma Bonnie’s house after our Christmas morning. Kids got to played with lots of their cousins, had a great time! Memories. I felt sick going, during, on way back, still.

item.title: Status Update – December 24, 2018
item.description: Woke to yelling, kids excited. Took them to Walmart for cards, last minute gift for Lesa, saw several people we knew, a-hole nearly ran us over. Made kids nap. Ate their gingerbread houses for dessert. Christmas Eve, we opened gifts, we have some happy kids! Santa coming tonight.

item.title: Status Update – December 23, 2018
item.description: Church, kids sang in Christmas program. Went to grocery store with Ashley and Bruce. Kids played outside. Paul and Andrea came over, had gifts for kids, ate dinner with us. Watched couple of movies. Lesa play Monopoly with Dillan; Ashley and I played Crazy 8s, Old Maids, and Uno.

item.title: Status Update – December 22, 2018
item.description: Kids woke us screaming 3 days ’til Christmas. Busted butt cleaning house for Paul and Andrea visit, made kids clean their rooms, wrong day! Tablets. Outside time too. Lesa made big gingerbread house with kids. Watched Christmas shows, popcorn, lemonade. Worked on kids’ genealogy.

item.title: Status Update – December 21, 2018
item.description: Friday! Lesa took kids to dentist: Ashley needs spacer adjusted, Dwyane needs two baby teeth extracted, rest okay except brush better. Lesa took Dillan to get glasses adjusted, then dropped kids at daycare and grocery shopped. I picked up kids. Pizza! Little House on the Prairie.

item.title: Status Update – December 20, 2018
item.description: Dillan mailed letter to Grandpa Ave on way to school, pajama day, watched movies, Christmas Break. Mailed PAVA photos to Nicolle and Rebecca, cheaper than anticipated, will arrive tomorrow. Stalled truck on Hwy 37 delayed picking up kids. Lesa helped kids make gingerbread houses.

item.title: Status Update – December 19, 2018
item.description: Ashley sick all night, threw up in bedroom, hallway, bathroom; spent an hour cleaning up. Lesa on vacation, wrapped gifts. Kids had school Christmas parties and gift exchanges, no complaints, must have been good. Hard keeping them calm, TV to rescue. Finished Rebecca PAVA letter.

item.title: Status Update – December 18, 2018
item.description: Dropped Dillan at bus; Ashley, boys at school; said they’re bullied on bus. Christmas Program at school, all four in it this year, they did great! Drove separately, Lesa took boys home, I took Ashley to Loretta’s for piano lesson, Ashley got sick in driveway, too much excitement.

item.title: Status Update – December 17, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids at school. Lesa’s gifts ordered, done shopping. Work okay, left ½-hr early, picked up kids. Cub Scout Party at Celebrations in Bedford for selling over $15k in popcorn, took Ashley too, pizza slow in coming, kids didn’t mind, had great time and were totally worn out!

item.title: Status Update – December 16, 2018
item.description: Church. Goose Pond, hoped to see Snow Geese, saw Canadian Geese and lots of Sandhill Cranes. Several hundred cranes flew above us honking, captured wow on video, mission accomplished! Flooded roads, drove through deep water, bad dad! Ate at Bloomfield Dairy Queen. Wreck It Ralph.

item.title: Status Update – December 15, 2018
item.description: Slept until 8am, Lesa dealing with rowdy boys. Dillan made me breakfast. Lesa grocery shopped. Took Ashley to Michael’s (for craft supplies, she’s making gifts). Got Frosties, stopped by work. Girl Scout Aerial Dance event, Ashley had awesome time. Got home, boys still rowdy. TV.

item.title: Status Update – December 14, 2018
item.description: Friday. Bruce threw up all night, into morning, Lesa stayed home with him; he watched movies, rested. We need healthy kids again, no more sickness! Work okay, first one in, left a little late, made up time from yesterday. Picked up kids from daycare. Pizza. Enjoyed slow TV night.

item.title: Status Update – December 13, 2018
item.description: Kids rode bus. Text from Jessica, Dwyane can’t go to daycare because he left school sick yesterday. Left work early, picked up kids from school, went to daycare anyway to buy homemade cinnamon candy from Sarah McCluskey, beat Lesa home. Kept evening low key, gave kids rest break.

item.title: Status Update – December 12, 2018
item.description: Dwyane threw up at 2:30am, seemed okay after that. Kids rode bus. School called, Dwyane not well, Lesa took him home. Mrs Harp texted me, Mr Hudson called Lesa, Dillan got in fight with 5th grader, has black eye. Picked up kids at daycare. Elf came, tree decorated. Bruce behaved.

item.title: Status Update – December 11, 2018
item.description: Took ½ day PTO. Gingerbread house with Bruce at school, watched cartoons/TV at home, lunch at Wendy’s. Had to work, dropped Bruce at daycare, thinks I hate him so he acted up. Picked kids up. Took Ashley to piano lesson, Lesa told Loretta I’d fix her computer, had malware, fixed?

item.title: Status Update – December 10, 2018
item.description: Ashley threw up last night, she’s better. Took kids to school, walked Dillan and Ashley in, we talked to Mr Hudson about bullying and they gave him their notes to RJ and parents. Bruce threw up in lunchroom, then Grady, then another kid. Lesa got him, he’s better. Skipped Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – December 9, 2018
item.description: Took kids to church, Lesa stayed home. Walmart. Christmas tree shopping, Woodcrest Farm closed permanently, Ratkovich Farm had nothing worth buying, Greene County Trees had a great tree. Put lights on it, will decorate it tomorrow. Kids excited as hell, Christmas is finally here!

item.title: Status Update – December 8, 2018
item.description: Rudely awakened, kids fought constantly entire day. Found out Dillan and Ashley sent to principal’s office for being bullies to kid on bus! Spring Mill Village to see Father Christmas, not what we expected. Ate at Casa Brava then saw Santa at Otis Park, much better, kids enjoyed!

item.title: Status Update – December 7, 2018
item.description: Friday! Worked late all week, off at noon. Got Bruce from school, he behaved; doctor office, strep throat; tires for Suburban, CVS, Wendy’s; picked up other kids. Lesa off at noon also, went grocery shopping. Scientia Christmas Party, we had good time, thinking good job decision.

item.title: Status Update – December 6, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids at bus but took Bruce to daycare, missed his first field trip, sounds like he behaved at daycare, will try school again tomorrow. Stayed late at work, left to get Ashley from Hornet’s Nest, last home game. Lesa picked up boys. Took Ashley to Scouts after game. Pizza.

item.title: Status Update – December 5, 2018
item.description: Third day of bad behavior by Bruce, can’t go to WonderLab, going to suck being Bruce unless he straightens up. Worked over again, they gave me a $1000 Christmas bonus! Picked up kids and Lesa, we ate at Golden Corral. Bought Dwyane a new coat from Walmart, plus a few other items.

item.title: Status Update – December 4, 2018
item.description: Kids didn’t want to ride bus, dropped them at school. Work was busy, another map order, off late again. Managed to get kids with 10 minutes to spare. Lesa had supper waiting. Ashley had piano lesson. All kids seem to be feeling better, Lesa and I not feeling sick – knock on wood!

item.title: Status Update – December 3, 2018
item.description: Bruce and Ashley had fevers, patched them up with Ibuprofen, sent them to school. Lesa off, ran errands. Mrs. Dillman sent Lesa note concerning Bruce’s behavior, not so good. Got off work late, Lesa had to get kids. Dillan helped me put caliper on Suburban. Dwyane feels sick now.

item.title: Status Update – December 2, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday. Lesa left after Sunday School, went to Nashville with Andrea and Bobbi. The kids and me went to Bloomington, got brake pads, McDonald’s, haircuts, remaining PAVA pics. Bruce and Ashley sick, Bruce running fever, movie time. Fixed Lesa’s brakes, mine needs calipers.

item.title: Status Update – December 1, 2018
item.description: Dillan berated Dwyane for believing in Santa, lost my temper. Santa Train rained out. Lesa took Ashley to Nutcracker ballet in Bloomington – their new tradition. All kids in Bedford Christmas Parade, Ashley with Girl Scouts, boys with Boy Scouts, Steak ‘n’ Shake shakes afterward.

item.title: Status Update – November 30, 2018
item.description: Friday, long week! Kids still crazy. Left work early. Brakes grinding. Picked up kids, took them to Ken and Kathryn Osterbrook’s. First date night in over 2 years! Went to Outback Steakhouse first, waited ½ hour for service, left for Red Lobster, got stuffed. Had a great evening!

item.title: Status Update – November 29, 2018
item.description: Almost missed bus, driver waited. Started Texas border maps, New Mexico missing, that’s next, started building at 5:00p, rushed to get kids. Lesa took Ashley to Daisies, super-excited to get prizes from candy sales. Boys wound up, turned on TV, Polar Express. Water just went out!

item.title: Status Update – November 28, 2018
item.description: Got kids to bus on time today. Feels like Monday and the day went slow. Cold morning but afternoon was warmer, kids played outside for a little while, still rambunctious but not as bad as yesterday. Lesa was a little short, seemed peeved about something, probably the kids and me.

item.title: Status Update – November 27, 2018
item.description: Everyone got ready on time today. Long day at work that dragged by. Picked up kids from daycare, hard time tearing boys away from LEGOs. Boys are wound up still. Took Ashley to piano practice, learning Joy to the World. Dillan hid remote, forgot where, in trouble. Snowed all day.

item.title: Status Update – November 26, 2018
item.description: Thanksgiving Break over, kids back in school, Dillan wore boots, went home for gym shoes, missed bus. Delivered maps, left work early, picked kids up early. Kids been wound up, Lesa says they’re overly tired. It snowed. Pack Meeting, took Ashley, boys color guard, Dillan cleanup.

item.title: Status Update – November 25, 2018
item.description: Went to church, Bruce rotten, got spanked. Nice day, kids played outside. Dillan building fort, took him and Bruce to Lowe’s for nails. Dillan hid pull-ups in pajamas, clogged washer. Ashley made fruit punch for Scouts. We watched Bringing Up Baby with kids, had popcorn and soda.

item.title: Status Update – November 24, 2018
item.description: Went deer hunting, rain, wind, came in early. Called about SUV for Lesa, already sold. Lesa went grocery shopping. Put together generator, 15 minutes later, power went out, no lie! Went shopping for dressers and mattresses. Ate at Pizza Hut, used kids’ reading vouchers. Zootopia.

item.title: Status Update – November 23, 2018
item.description: Worked 4 hours, maps done. Ashley went with, played with/babysat Addie. Back home set up tables, hung a couple pictures, replaced kid’s faucet. Williams Thanksgiving successful thanks to Lesa! Becky’s kids getting bigger like ours! They played well together. Watched Wizard of Oz.

item.title: Status Update – November 22, 2018
item.description: Thanksgiving Day! Indy to Ave and Emily’s for dinner, I stopped at work for 20 minutes on way. Made record time since Hwy 69 is mostly open. Kids had great time, loved playing with cousins, they like having family. Lesa and I enjoyed ourselves as well. So much to be thankful for!

item.title: Status Update – November 21, 2018
item.description: No school, dropped kids at daycare, I worked. Lesa deep cleaned, hung some pictures, house looks great. Map contract with Marines, looks like I have funding AND job security. Picked up kids, kind of hyped up for Thanksgiving and school being out. Set kids to cleaning their rooms.

item.title: Status Update – November 20, 2018
item.description: Kids last day before break. Work still messed up, building maps with Mac. Bruce peed pants at school, Lesa picked him up. Lesa tried fixing shower head, broke it. Took Ashley to piano lessons, Aldi’s for Dwyane’s milk, Menard’s for shower head, work for a few, home. Fixed shower.

item.title: Status Update – November 19, 2018
item.description: Missed bus, Dwyane forgot snacks for class Friendship Meal, dropped kids at school. Hell at work, disk drives corrupted, everything down, maps too, painful. Picked up kids, Ashley at Hornet’s Nest, watched game, brought her home. Dillan cooked spaghetti dinner, Scout requirement.

item.title: Status Update – November 18, 2018
item.description: Took kids to church, Lesa stayed home. Passed out most of Ashley’s Girl Scout goodies. Decent day, kids played outside almost all day. Took a little nap. Dillan went to Gabe’s. Deer hunted in the afternoon, Bruce and Dillan want to go with me so bad, it’s all they can talk about.

item.title: Status Update – November 17, 2018
item.description: Deer hunted, big 7-pointer, boys helped drag it out, went to processor with Dillan and Bruce. Took Ashley to Scout leader’s house, the troop went to WonderLab. Put brakes on Lesa’s Jeep. Took Dillan hunting in afternoon, let him shoot shotgun, he was stoked! Watched Harry Potter.

item.title: Status Update – November 16, 2018
item.description: Better morning in every way. Pajama day at school. Bought three juicers from Mrs. Dillman for Ashley to give to Loretta for Christmas. Lesa got groceries and kids. Building maps at work, California-Mexico border for Marines, rush order, worked until 8:30pm, very long, tiring day!

item.title: Status Update – November 15, 2018
item.description: Everything coated in ice, school cancelled, we all stayed home, beautiful. Kids played outside. Power out after lunch, not on by dinner, picked up Ashley’s Girl Scout candies, ate at Golden Corral, then Lowe’s, bought a generator, power on when we got home, ready for next outage.

item.title: Status Update – November 14, 2018
item.description: Ashley and me fought this morning, she got on bus without saying goodbye or a kiss, I shrugged her off all day after that. Productive workday. Picked up kids and Lesa, went to C3 Thanksgiving Dinner, Lesa sang in opening program. Freezing rain, forecast 2-3″, probable 2-hr delay.

item.title: Status Update – November 13, 2018
item.description: Got to bus stop, Dillan forgot glasses, Ashley forgot Hornet’s Nest shirt, up the hill we went, missed bus, dropped them at school. Late to work of course. Worked over, rushed to pick up kids and Lesa, went to school. Ashley at game, took boys to Book Fair, all kids bought books.

item.title: Status Update – November 12, 2018
item.description: Veteran’s Day off, Lesa worked. Springville Elementary had program to honor vets, all kids participated, they did absolutely great, everyone sang. I like our community/school. Picked up kids and Dillan’s glasses. At Scouts Jerry Hill told me I was doing good job raising the boys.

item.title: Status Update – November 11, 2018
item.description: No one even said “Hi” when I got up, missed Ashley’s greeting. Church. Ashley home, had fun at Eleanor’s. Lesa and Ashley went shopping. Boys watched Incredibles 2 again. Ashley cooked a meatloaf supper (Lesa helped). I teased Ashley, her feelings were hurt, it ruined my evening.

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2018
item.description: Snowed. Slept in. YouTube videos. Hauled trash with boys. Lesa went to Rural King, boys played outside, I played Monopoly with Ashley. Tablets. Marcy Cook texted, 6 tickets to Stampede at Greene Co. Fairgrounds: dinner with Cooks, dancing, fun. Ashley spending night at Eleanor’s.

item.title: Status Update – November 9, 2018
item.description: We’re all glad it’s Friday! Lesa forgot to give Dwyane snacks for class, texted me, went back home, took them to school, late to work by ½ hour. Stitched together map, 32GB! Lesa went grocery shopping. I worked over, picked kids up. Pizza on TV tables as we watched Incredibles 2.

item.title: Status Update – November 8, 2018
item.description: Normal day in all aspects. Dropped kids at bus. School, work, daycare. I picked up kids. Lesa took Ashley to Girl Scouts, she received four awards/patches, she finally seems happy with Scouts. I watched boys, Dillan and Dwyane spelling, Bruce read to me, popcorn and lemonade, TV.

item.title: Status Update – November 7, 2018
item.description: Beautiful fall day, bit nippy, trees gorgeous. Kids back in school. Worked over an hour to make up for yesterday, Lesa picked up kids. Took Open Arms materials back, made it from Bloomington, to Switz City, to Springville in an hour! Kids ran to greet me, I’m blessed! Supper, TV.

item.title: Status Update – November 6, 2018
item.description: School closed for voting, took kids to daycare, school packed, opted to vote later in afternoon. Left work at 3pm, picked up kids, took them voting with me, they behaved awesome. Ate supper, rushed to Loretta’s for Ashley’s piano recital, she did great, made us very proud of her!

item.title: Status Update – November 5, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids off at bus. Work okay, dragged by. Rained all day. Picked up kids, had to play indoors, lots of fighting. Scouts cancelled, school setting up for election. Boys took regularly scheduled baths, big kids showered because recital is tomorrow. Watched Little House on TV.

item.title: Status Update – November 4, 2018
item.description: Kids missed out on breakfast, too busy playing to come eat when told. Family Sunday, kids sort of behaved. Dillan went to Gabe’s. Lexi and Cash visited. Ashley and boys went to Lexi’s to see pig and rabbits. Dillan joined them on way home. Boys read to Lesa. Watched Men in Black.

item.title: Status Update – November 3, 2018
item.description: Took Dillan and Ashley to Hope Harvest this AM, helped pack 60,000 meals for Haiti, Lesa watched boys. Lesa took Ashley to Triple Threat: Dance, Cheer, Tumble class; then Walmart, Taco Bell, and Girl Scout Carnival. I took boys to GloGolf and Steak ‘n’ Shake. Kids had a good day!

item.title: Status Update – November 2, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids off at school, picked up Bruce’s car. Work okay but glad it’s Friday. Bruce had trouble listening at school, Humpty Dumpty moved into red. Picked up kids, Lesa grocery shopped. Relatively dry, kids played outside in leaves. Pizza. Watched Little House on the Prairie.

item.title: Status Update – November 1, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids off at school, delivered Bruce’s car, was 2nd place, lost to tall girl with long legs, he’s totally happy, drive-in movie afterward. Work decided I’m their next map guy, lots to learn. Lesa went to store. Picked up kids, relaxed at home. Stuck inside, rained all day.

item.title: Status Update – October 31, 2018
item.description: Got kids on bus, took Hwy 54⁄45, buses made me 15 minutes late. Beat up at work, left early. RR tire damn near flat, saw air bubbles when I filled it. Bruce talked about car and Grady non-stop. Took kids to Cornerstone Worship Center’s Fall Carnival, my butt in photo booth photo.

item.title: Status Update – October 30, 2018
item.description: Same old work/school day. Slept, still tired. Lesa took Ashley to piano lessons, got to sit in on practice. I stayed with boys, Dwyane/Bruce baths, spent evening on Bruce’s race car for school. Fell asleep on couch after kids went to bed, woke up, writing this, going to bed ASAP.

item.title: Status Update – October 29, 2018
item.description: Back to work, school. Kids still excited, hard time getting them ready for bus. We did okay though. Took all kids to Scouts, guess Lesa needed break. Worked on Bruce’s cardboard car, my fourth and last one, not going to miss it. Kids didn’t want to go to bed but fell fast asleep.

item.title: Status Update – October 28, 2018
item.description: Church. Dillan went to Gabe’s. Lexi and Cash came over, played with kids, watched them while grandparents went to get a coop in Hobbieville. Kids were jumping in leaf piles. Power off at 4, on at 5, off again at 6. Hillcrest Trunk or Treat, saw some old friends. Power on at 8:30.

item.title: Status Update – October 27, 2018
item.description: Dillan woke everyone up, fighting with boys. Bruce getting into everything, aggravating everyone. Spent half the day yelling. Went to Pumpkin Chunking in Bloomington, had fun. Walmart. KFC takeout. C3 Trunk or Treat, followed by Scout Trunk or Treat in Springville: bags of candy!

item.title: Status Update – October 26, 2018
item.description: TGIF! Kids had Fall Partys at Springville school, seems like they had fun. Got off work half hour early, picked up Ashley and boys. Lesa took Dillan to get eyes measured for bifocals and took him grocery shopping with her. ate Pizza. Watched Haunted Mansion and Hocus Pocus on TV.

item.title: Status Update – October 25, 2018
item.description: Bruce has been sneaking Dillan’s pull-ups. WTF? Normal day, left work half-hour early, Bruce peed himself in daycare van on way home. Lesa took Ashley to Scouts, came right back home, no meeting until November. I gave boys bath, sort of; Dillan took shower. Called it a night, TV.

item.title: Status Update – October 24, 2018
item.description: Pretty normal day. Workday dragged by, making progress, balancing five projects, learning GIS, toying with idea of going back to college. Left work at 5:00p, picked kids up at 5:25p, was doing 80 mph down Hwy. 37. Lesa got new glasses, fixed up Ashley’s Scout vest. No activities!

item.title: Status Update – October 23, 2018
item.description: Normal morning, all kids at bus stop, dark out. Normal workday, felt like forever, map stuff, brain hurts. Bruce stole $20 from Dwyane’s bank for à la carte lunches – school called and let us know. Got kids from daycare. Ashley/Lesa fighting, Lesa kept cool. Ashley piano lessons.

item.title: Status Update – October 22, 2018
item.description: Fall Break over, wish I could’ve taken family somewhere but still earning time on new job. Only people at bus stop. Warmed up, won’t last. Boys basketball, Hornet’s Nest, Lesa picked up Ashley, Springville beat Heltonville 54-7. I picked up boys, took them to Scouts after dinner.

item.title: Status Update – October 21, 2018
item.description: Church, Serving Deacon. Lesa, Dwyane, Bruce to Walmart, Wendy’s. Jolee Rogers’ birthday party at Thornton Park. Dillan, Ashley, myself served inbound (kids enjoyed), Wendy’s, Lowe’s. Outside most of day. Dillan, Ashley to evening service with me; boys watched All God’s Creatures.

item.title: Status Update – October 20, 2018
item.description: Rained all night, dry in tent, played cards, bedtime. Bruce came in at 6:30am, followed by Dwyane and Dillan, made Ashley come in too. Breakfast, back to sleep in their beds. Carved pumpkins. Bruce hopped on Dwyane’s bike, rode without training wheels! Monster Univ. They had fun!

item.title: Status Update – October 19, 2018
item.description: Lesa stayed home with kids, I went in hour early, got off at noon. Ran IRA rollover check to Schwab, picked up PAVA prints from CVS. Cut grass, set up tent for backyard camping. Dillan and Lesa ordered his glasses, went grocery shopping. Campfire, S’mores, raining, cards in tent.

item.title: Status Update – October 18, 2018
item.description: Same old morning/workday/afternoon. Finished antibiotics, feel much better than a month ago, wish Lesa would get better too. Kids watched TV. Jordan finished PAVA pics, they’re awesome! Backgrounds and Facebook immediately! Spent evening ordering for Nicolle, Daniel, and Rebecca.

item.title: Status Update – October 17, 2018
item.description: Morning routine same as yesterday. After work I went to Nashville to pick up trains from Carl Austin (Avery’s brother-in-law). Paid $150 for $2000 worth of trains, has cancer, moving to Florida, wants kids to have. Lesa picked up kids, frazzled when I got home. Watched Ice Age 3.

item.title: Status Update – October 16, 2018
item.description: Took kids to daycare, went to work, worked 9 hours. Annetta took boys to Springville Park. Lesa off early for eye exam, picked up kids after. Boys played at Gabe’s, I passed them on way home. Salisbury steak, mashed potatoes, veggies for dinner, kids gobbled it up. Scary TV show.

item.title: Status Update – October 15, 2018
item.description: A bit worried about job, just a feeling, funding weak? Worked 10 hours. Fall Break, Lesa off, took Ashley and Dwyane to eye doctor, all well. All kids went to daycare, afraid it’ll be that way all week. Lesa transported all. Weather went from 90 to 30 like it saw a state trooper.

item.title: Status Update – October 14, 2018
item.description: Skipped church. Southeastway Park in Indy for 3rd PAVA photo session, Jordan Hamilton took pics again, played a few minutes at park. Kids total pills, I yelled lots. Tried to eat Greek in Greenwood, closed forever. Wound up eating at King Gyro in Bloomington, a poor substitution.

item.title: Status Update – October 13, 2018
item.description: Tried sleeping in, denied! Lesa not up for zoo. Fowler’s Pumpkin Patch instead: hayride, corn maze, pumpkins, animals. Bought fire pit. Lesa tired: Bob Evan’s. Planned on yard camping, yard still wet, home too late, dark out, built fire anyway, roasted marshmallows, made S’mores.

item.title: Status Update – October 12, 2018
item.description: None of Dillan’s friends going to Webelos Challenge, we won’t either. Thought about camping in yard, rained all day. Ashley done selling Girl Scout candy, sold $500 worth, her troop sold most. Ashley made pizza, Lesa turned in orders/money, boys acted crazy. Everyone is so tired.

item.title: Status Update – October 11, 2018
item.description: Barely made bus, Bruce no shoes, Dwyane playing with LEGOs in underwear come time to leave. Parent/teacher conferences, no big surprises except Ashley in Accelerated Program and didn’t tell us. Annetta/Jessica watched kids, took to Pizza Hut with us, whose behaved kids are these?

item.title: Status Update – October 10, 2018
item.description: Ashley up at 5 am, why? I’m doing better with my meds. Bruce’s ear doing better. Stormed in afternoon, fallout from Hurricane Michael? Opted against registering for Webelos Challenge, Dillan would have been alone. Glad it’s Wednesday. Temps are dropping, going to be a cool night.

item.title: Status Update – October 9, 2018
item.description: Horse pill antibiotics made me medicine sick. Bruce better, slept all night. Picked up kids, Lesa had supper ready. Took Ashley to piano lesson. Left early, took long country route, Ashley worried about parent/teacher conference. Loretta said she’s doing great, recital on Nov. 6.

item.title: Status Update – October 8, 2018
item.description: Columbus Day, I got off! Took kids to bus, slept 2 more hours. Took Lesa to lunch at Taste of India, so good! Went to Bedford Walk-In, antibiotic script, hope I’m well soon! Took Bruce and kids to doctor, new meds, and some ear drops. Took boys to Scouts, Ashley stayed with Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – October 7, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday, kids gobbled down donuts, ran out of chocolate milk, they behaved fairly well, people behind us were probably amused. Ashley made grilled cheese sandwiches for lunch. A nice fall day, Dillan went to Gabe’s, boys and Ashley played closer to home. Read instead of TV!

item.title: Status Update – October 6, 2018
item.description: Slept in ’til 10! Very nice day, kids played outside a lot. Tablets. Lesa took kids on walk to get mail, kids rode bikes, Dillan through mud puddles. Cash and Lexi came down, left, came back. Took everyone to Asian Pearl. Watched Hocus Pocus, let big kids stay up late to see end.

item.title: Status Update – October 5, 2018
item.description: Intense workday. Rained hard this afternoon, much needed. Off at 5:00 pm, barely got kids in time. Pizza! Bruce’s ear bothers him. Lesa still sick. Ashley limping, fell in shower, scraped ankle. Set up kids’ Indiana 529 college funds last night. Kids freaked by Goonies. So tired!

item.title: Status Update – October 4, 2018
item.description: Normal morning/day. Lesa picked Dillan up, he was cut from team. Mrs. Harp has been sending extra math homework home with Dillan, claims he got C- in Math, we haven’t confirmed. I got other kids. Lesa took Ashley to new Girl Scouts in Fayetteville, had good time. Boys took baths.

item.title: Status Update – October 3, 2018
item.description: My birthday, I’m 57, praying for 13 more. Went to Charles Schwab after work, rolled over Schurz 401K, discussed college investment strategy, my “won’t be able to take” retirement, etc. Lesa picked up Dillan, kids. House decorated, threw a party, cheesecake: I’m loved and blessed!

item.title: Status Update – October 2, 2018
item.description: Work, school, daycare, warm sunny day. Dillan had basketball tryouts after school, Lesa picked him up. I picked up the kids at daycare. Bean soup, so tasty, kids hated it. Biscuits and gravy last night, not a hit either. I took Ashley to her piano lesson. All the boys took baths.

item.title: Status Update – October 1, 2018
item.description: Lesa left for work early so she could pick Dillan up after basketball tryouts, 40-some boys trying out. I picked up other kids from daycare. Ashley selling lots of Girl Scout treats. Took all four kids to Scouts, not to stressful. Getting kids to bed much more stressful! Surfing.

item.title: Status Update – September 30, 2018
item.description: Church/Jr. Church. Shane Schroyer followed us home, fixed furnace, only charged $25. Dillan went to Gabe’s. Kids played inside and out, tablet time. Napped twice! Ashley playing dolls lately. I read to Dwyane, Dillan/Bruce practice work, Ashley piano. Dwyane pushed Bruce off bed.

item.title: Status Update – September 29, 2018
item.description: Slept in a little. Nice day, kids played outside most of day. Lesa and Dillan went to Walmart, got him basketball shoes for Monday, I stayed home with other kids. Lexi and Cash came over, stayed all afternoon. Went to Bedford, ate at Casa Brava. Baths for all. Finding Nemo on TV.

item.title: Status Update – September 28, 2018
item.description: Lesa PTO, we’re still sick. School called again, Dillan in Mr. Hudson’s office twice, flipped kid off, threw pencil at another, they forgot about him, missed daycare van, Lesa got him. Lesa grocery shopped, got other kids. I worked late, made up yesterday’s time. Pizza, TV trays.

item.title: Status Update – September 27, 2018
item.description: First change to OS build complete, successful. Lesa sick, took PTO, got some rest. School called, Bruce not doing good, went to get him, made doctor appointment, end of school day so got all kids, took Bruce to doctor: ruptured ear drum, pink eye, low-grade fever. CVS, home, bed.

item.title: Status Update – September 26, 2018
item.description: Decent workday, no rain, felt decent, Lesa still sick. Bruce scratched bug bite on ear, looks infected, probably staff again. Ashley brought $35 Hornet’s Nest (Cheer Club) enrollment form home. Dwyane said he was only good kid in class. Popcorn, lemonade, Little House on Prairie.

item.title: Status Update – September 25, 2018
item.description: Semi-unconscious controlled fall in shower this AM, a bit scary. Rained morning/evening, storming now. We’re still sick. Ashley piano lesson, boys went with, sat in truck with tablets. Lesa went to Girl Scout parent meeting in Fayetteville, new troop starting up, seems promising.

item.title: Status Update – September 24, 2018
item.description: Rained off-and-on today. Worked late, picked up kids late. Gas and snacks for Pack Meeting. Lesa had supper waiting. Took boys to Scouts, signed Bruce up for Lions, he and Dwyane got Bobcat patches. Lesa held down the fort, Ashley piano practice. Home, boys bedtime, Planet Earth.

item.title: Status Update – September 23, 2018
item.description: Church, Fall Festival, roasted pig, tons of food, hay ride, old-fashioned games, kids had great time! Dwyane got rope burn during tug-of-war. Everyone napped, even Lesa! All kids played in garden, dug big hole, enjoyed hosing mud off them. Slow evening, watched X Games BMX Bikes.

item.title: Status Update – September 22, 2018
item.description: Slept in until Gabe and Gracie visited, kids went to their house, returned to ours soon after. Dillan and Gabe shooting BB gun on deck, I yelled at both. Took Dillan and Dwyane to sell popcorn at Bedford IGA, met our quota, done! Lesa, Ashley, Bruce showed up. Planet Earth on TV.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2018
item.description: TGIF! Coughed all day, Lesa not doing good. Bruce park field trip. Dillan read to kindergarten class. Ashley wore new boots. Dwyane had good day, has monkey bar blister. Kids played outside. Dillan fell, scrapped knee. Lesa grocery shopped. Pizza. Cool out, windows open, A/C off.

item.title: Status Update – September 20, 2018
item.description: Both of us still sick, Lesa is worse, sat through meeting, was miserable. Police officer visited Bruce’s class. Bought pancake mix on way home, made pancakes, not as good as usual. Kids played with Lexi and Cash from down the street. Boys had baths. Hard time getting kids to bed.

item.title: Status Update – September 19, 2018
item.description: Lesa worn out, I’m worn out, it’s only Wednesday! Bruce field trip to Springville Fire Station, learned about equipment, etc. At daycare, Bruce took big bag of M&Ms; him, Dillan, Dwyane ate entire bag; Annetta asked me to replace. Stay-at-home evening, big kid bath/shower. No TV.

item.title: Status Update – September 18, 2018
item.description: Maintaining health, not better or worse. Lesa getting sicker though. Bruce got into a verbal fight on bus with Middle-schooler because Bruce wouldn’t quit singing Keke. Ashley had piano lesson, Loretta said she’s ready for a small audition at her house, will plan and let us know.

item.title: Status Update – September 17, 2018
item.description: Lesa coughed all night, we didn’t sleep well. I picked up boys, went home, made pizzas. Lesa picked up Ashley, headed to Stalker in Bedford; Girl Scouts was a bust, leader was no-show. Dillan beat up on Dwyane on purpose, kept him home from Scouts, took other three kids. Bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – September 16, 2018
item.description: At church we were interviewed about our foster/adoption experience. Tried to take a nap, no way. Dillan went to Gabe’s. Ashley and boys played on tablets; caught toads, made them a house. Fixed truck brakes, boys helped, only Dillan saw it through. Lesa fixed salmon. Watched MiB.

item.title: Status Update – September 15, 2018
item.description: Up early at camp, ate breakfast, Shoot-O-Ree, boys had awesome time! Brakes on truck grinding bad but got home. Sounds like Lesa and Ashley had wonderful time together, shopped, made pizzas – mostly they got along! Boys tired but they had fun, played all afternoon. Baths for all!

item.title: Status Update – September 14, 2018
item.description: Lesa took off, went grocery shopping, I worked half day. Went to Grandparents’ Day at school, I visited Ashley and Bruce, Lesa visited Dillan and Dwyane. Afterward, Lesa took Bruce to get fillings, I packed for camping and Shoot-O-Ree. Girls stayed home, boys having a great time!

item.title: Status Update – September 13, 2018
item.description: Still sick, still doing better. Lesa picked up kids. I went to Open Arms after work, picked up brochures for Sunday – and our adoption video from January 30th! Got home just in time for dinner. We watched the video and it hit home and reminded us why we do what we do. Praise God.

item.title: Status Update – September 12, 2018
item.description: Feeling better, hoping I’m on mend. PTO approved for Grandparents’ Day Friday afternoon, kids happy. Bruce’s egg survived drop from roof. Lesa shopped for camp supplies. Dwyane, Bruce took showers. Dillan, Ashley watched two episodes of Little House on the Prairie about adoption.

item.title: Status Update – September 11, 2018
item.description: Still sick, hacked all day/night. Picked up kids, they seemed to have a nice day. Bruce got a Hudson High Five, he was stoked! Ashley didn’t have piano lessons. Helped Bruce make his egg toss box, Lesa helped him decorate. Dillan went to Gabe’s. I finally got grass cut. Bed time.

item.title: Status Update – September 10, 2018
item.description: Still sick, week four! Rain quit, kids had recess but not allowed in grass. Stacy took Webelos to Bedford FD on H St. to learn about First Aid, Opioid Crisis, he asked me questions on way home. Took Dwyane to Scout meeting, games and snacks. Bad fight with Lesa over Ashley again.

item.title: Status Update – September 9, 2018
item.description: Church, Security Deacon, Lesa stayed home. Sold $202 of Boy Scout popcorn at Big Lots with Dillan, Dwyane. Lesa, Ashley, Bruce went to Walmart; was approached by Michelle Haggard, daughter Nikki, they chatted, came to Big Lots, saw Dillan, chatted, wow! Closed church with Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – September 8, 2018
item.description: Rained all night/day. Slept in, still not getting over being sick, lungs filled with mucus, can’t breathe. Lesa handled kids all day long, play games, thought up activities, kept them occupied. My mom called, wanted to check if kids still alive, said she knows how rainy days are.

item.title: Status Update – September 7, 2018
item.description: Made it through short work week. Rain from Hurricane Gordon ruined weekend plans. Bruce hit two daycare workers, called one stupid ass, trashed place because he was asked to pick up toys. Report cards: Dillan As, Bs, Cs; Ashley As; Dwyane and Bruce satisfactory. We’re still sick.

item.title: Status Update – September 6, 2018
item.description: Lesa and I both poor night’s rest, dragged all day, Lesa home early, thankfully she doesn’t seem as sick as me – at least not yet. Yesterday, I messaged Andy and Michelle Haggard, former foster parents first removal; I got reply back and lots of pictures, speechless. God is good.

item.title: Status Update – September 5, 2018
item.description: Long work day. Left an hour early to pick up kids and go to church; my Sunday School class paired with another for tonight’s Wednesday night meal – pizza and salad (and hot dogs of course); kids did a nice job of behaving and helping us out! Lesa is getting sick. Long work night.

item.title: Status Update – September 4, 2018
item.description: Work and school, we’re all tired, Lesa took PTO, I’m not doing good. Bruce good in class. Ashley used coupon, took furry friend (big pink rabbit). Boys locked Dwyane outside, he peed on deck. Dillan hiding pull-ups in room, found bugs in mattress, had to throw away. Ashley piano.

item.title: Status Update – September 3, 2018
item.description: Slept until noon! Mitchell Pool closed, went to John Lowrey Pool, had a blast. Dillan chatted up by 12-year-old who thought he was cute, she followed him up the slide, we’re in trouble with such cute kids! Went to Orange Leaf. Grilled salmon. Bruce got a big splinter in his heel.

item.title: Status Update – September 2, 2018
item.description: Family Church, served communion. Kids played at Gabe’s all afternoon, Ashley came home early; then Bruce, covered in mud; followed by Dwyane, muddy; finally Dillan, caked in mud. Dillan also scraped up and cut foot. Took everyone to see IU Men’s Soccer game. Little Caesars Pizza.

item.title: Status Update – September 1, 2018
item.description: Slept in just a bit. Kids played on tablets after doing chores. After lunch took family to Scientia LLC to tour my workplace. Then we walked three miles of Karst Trail, slight sprinkle, never heard kids complain so much! Lesa wanted a much needed break, she opted for Asian Pearl.

item.title: Status Update – August 31, 2018
item.description: Can’t believe I made it the entire week! Hopefully I can recover some over the 3-day weekend. Was going to go to zoo tomorrow but that’s not happening! Won family-pak of tickets to IU Men’s Soccer on Sunday, maybe can do that. Bruce good today, Lesa totally frazzled, others okay.

item.title: Status Update – August 30, 2018
item.description: Coughed all day, can’t breathe, today sucked, wondering about work and what I should be doing, I’m learning but not sure I’m learning what I need. Picked up kids, boys were outside, Ashley was inside helping clean up. Sounded like Bruce did okay. Slept a little, now it’s bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – August 29, 2018
item.description: 24 hours no medication, almost healthy but not yet. Day dragged by. Bruce proud of himself, didn’t get in trouble, ran to tell me, had me check messages, good kid! Two loaves of zucchini bread from Sarah McCluskey, not as good as Lesa’s, very dry. Passed out on couch. Off to bed!

item.title: Status Update – August 28, 2018
item.description: Another sick day, got 8 hours in, better then Monday. Bruce fought with 5th grader on bus, Bruce choked him out. Got kids from daycare. Took Ashley to piano lessons, she changed her mind about quitting again, actually her music teacher did. Fell asleep on couch, going to bed now!

item.title: Status Update – August 27, 2018
item.description: Downright miserable workday, left two hours early, went to Bedford walk-in clinic, no strep or mono or flu, some other viral-type infection. Picked up kids. Took Dillan and Dwyane to Scouts, popcorn sales kickoff party. Spoke with JOINT Services about Dillan’s IEP, not too happy.

item.title: Status Update – August 26, 2018
item.description: Finally woke at 2am. Trouble keeping food and water in me, fever, dehydrated. Kids so sweet, sneaking kisses on my cheek and forehead, wishing I’d get better, Ashley made get well card. Made it through church, unable to sleep more, finally able to eat and get water. Bedtime, now!

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2018
item.description: Passed out all day. Missed McVay Family Reunion in Fortville, I would’ve died, plus no need to get Bonnie and Ave sick. Lesa took kids to get mail, came back with Dillan’s friend Gabe and sister Gracie. Lesa is a saint, watched kids entire day by herself, not easy for her. Slept!

item.title: Status Update – August 24, 2018
item.description: Sick as can be! Wanted to leave work early, no time built up. Fourth Friday Feast at work – they provided lunch. Bruce in trouble again at school, this time Mrs. Dillman sent home a letter detailing issues. I passed out on couch, pretty much stayed there until 2am Sunday morning.

item.title: Status Update – August 23, 2018
item.description: I’m officially sick, long work day but I made it. Mr. Hudson talked to Bruce about yesterday, he cried and told Maddy he was sorry. Small stray terrier chased chickens, they scattered into woods, took us over an hour to round them up. Dillan hasn’t been bringing school work home.

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2018
item.description: Rained this morning, kids stayed in truck until bus. Mrs. Dillman texted, Maddy Davis subbed for her, Bruce acted up: got verbal, physical, won’t go to office, disrupted class – I whipped him when we got home. I’m getting sick, laid on couch all night, Dillan and Ashley coughing.

item.title: Status Update – August 21, 2018
item.description: Normal morning, unexceptional day. Boys tearing up toys, crashing them, had to go outside; Ashley spent an hour helping Jessica pick up toys; Jessica wants paid on Mondays, still no license. Ashley piano lessons, still doing okay. Lesa in bad mood, guessing she had rough at work.

item.title: Status Update – August 20, 2018
item.description: Ashley’s tooth seems better, Dillan and Ashley both have coughs, Dillan worse, Ashley’s tongue a green color. Springville Elementary called, Bruce peed pants on playground. Ashley wants to join Student Council, Dillan wants to join Robotics Club. Took Dillan and Dwyane to Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – August 19, 2018
item.description: Old Union CC in Fayetteville (actually Williams) for Open Arms foster presentation, knew people! Lesa didn’t sleep all night fretting, no idea it bothered her so. Arby’s lunch, saw Charlie Scott, Gary and Brenda McDonald. Naps! Kids played at Gabe and Gracie’s. Cleaned toy boxes.

item.title: Status Update – August 18, 2018
item.description: Holiday World! Couldn’t find Sonja’s free tickets, expensive getting in! Kids complained all day about everything but definitely had a great time! Mostly rides and wave pool. Ate at Fleig’s Cafe in Ferinand (picked a place with lots of vehicles). Too much sun. Got home late, bed!

item.title: Status Update – August 17, 2018
item.description: Friday! Stormed all night, rained all day. Ashley better, not sure if tooth exposed or just sensitive. Dillan sick now? Picture day, they got to school looking okay at least. Off by 3:00p. Picked up kids. Lesa grocery shopped. Pizza! Dillan played at Gabes, the rest Bambi II DVD.

item.title: Status Update – August 16, 2018
item.description: Ashley slept the night through, praise God! She went to dentist with Lesa, had cavity filled, crown not necessary. Bruce had Humpty Dumpty lowered, wouldn’t say why. Lesa and Ashley went shopping, got along all day without fighting, praise God! Picked up kids, rained, watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – August 15, 2018
item.description: Ashley is ill, patched her through the day, daycare suggested she may have roseola: rash, mild fever, and another child had it. She’s sleeping soundly now which is great! Dentist for her tooth in the morning. Pitch, roll, yaw at work. Worked out after. Picked up kids. Bath night.

item.title: Status Update – August 14, 2018
item.description: Waited for bus with kids. School, daycare, work. Work was intense. Picked up kids. Bruce fighting with kid over LEGOs. Ashley coughing a lot, has sore throat, ragweed? Hoping not strep! Dillan decided to bring home his homework. Ashley had piano lessons, could tell she practiced.

item.title: Status Update – August 13, 2018
item.description: Lesa took Ashley to dentist, broken tooth. Taxes amended. Lesa got kids. Note from Mrs. Dillman, Bruce won’t listen. Dillan decided he didn’t need to bring homework home, we decided he didn’t need to go to Scouts, took Dwyane, signed him up, Ashley went too, played on playground.

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2018
item.description: Church, Jr. Church with kids. Bloomfield Pool, free lunch and swimming courtesy Marcy Cook, Ashley hung with Eleanor until she left, too much sun for all, lots of fun. Watched movie to calm down before supper. Dillan at Gabe’s after supper. Yelled at Lesa and Ashley for fighting.

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2018
item.description: Kids woke us with breakfast in bed! Ashley made eggs-over-easy and jelly toast for me; Dillan made egg-in-basket for Lesa; total surprise! Cut grass. Dillan rode dirt bike, burned leg, we match. Cleaned pool, swam. Casa Brava, Jiffy Treat. Two raccoons after chickens, dogs on it.

item.title: Status Update – August 10, 2018
item.description: Friday! First week at new job, doing advanced tech. Kids rode school bus and daycare van. I picked up kids so Lesa could grocery shop. Kids seem glad it’s Friday. Bruce first full school day: tired and cranky. Pizza! Dillan Gabe’s and dirt bike; Moana, popcorn, Kool-Aid for rest.

item.title: Status Update – August 9, 2018
item.description: Kids’ first day of school! Dropped off big kids. Lesa took PTO, went with Bruce to first day of kindergarten, had lunch at Steak ‘n’ Shake, shakes of course. Kids had good day! I worked late, Lesa picked up other kids from daycare. Dillan at Gabe’s house when I got home. TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 8, 2018
item.description: Kids said this about daycare: Last day of torture! Long day at work, going slow as I learn. Lesa ran errands, I picked up kids. Everyone laid out their clothes and took baths. Book bags ready, kids are too. I won’t be able to go with Bruce to kindergarten tomorrow, Lesa is going.

item.title: Status Update – August 7, 2018
item.description: Kids ready early! Didn’t do much at work until afternoon, Linux OS builds, and maps; two things I’m interested in. Kids stuck inside at daycare, it rained. Canceled Ashley’s piano lesson, teacher meet and greet instead: Mrs Dillman, Mrs. Wronowicz, Ms. Page, Mrs. Harp. Pizza Hut.

item.title: Status Update – August 6, 2018
item.description: Tough getting ready for daycare. Started job, overwhelmed, excited, apprehensive, better than last job, only first day. Work at 9am, off at 5pm, Lesa picked up kids. Took taxes to H&R Block, ADP mistake, Schurz under-withheld on paycheck. Lowe’s for thermostat. Tough bedtime too.

item.title: Status Update – August 5, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday in the big room, different, kids a handful. Home, tried to relax, unable. Gabe and Gracie visited, mom and dad went to Aldi’s for groceries. Kids played on swing set and in bedrooms. Dillan went to Gabe’s too, Joe Eberle there. Showers, popcorn, lemonade, Monster U.

item.title: Status Update – August 4, 2018
item.description: Ashley piano lesson, struggling, ready to quit, encouraged to continue. Walmart, lunch bag for me, couldn’t pass on $3 shirts for boys, let Ashley get outfit too. Jiffy Treat. Put training wheels on Bruce’s bike. Scout Pool Party at John Lowery Pool, entire family went, fun time!

item.title: Status Update – August 3, 2018
