item.description: New chapter begins Monday, six years over, bittersweet. Dillan and Bruce to daycare. Ashley and Dwyane to doctor, asked Ashley if she had hair down there, OMG, apparently she’s old enough, OMG! Kids swam at Jessica’s. Taste of India for lunch with Lesa. Errands galore. Pizza, TV.

item.title: Status Update – August 2, 2018
item.description: Calling it my last work day, turned in keys/access card, wiped email/files on PC, removed traces of work from phone! Feels good, apprehensive for Monday. Kids went to Jessica’s to swim, Dillan in trouble for popping blow-up duck float. Last night of swim lessons, everyone passed!

item.title: Status Update – August 1, 2018
item.description: Work sucked! Spent time prepping to leave. Ashley and Lakin going at each other in daycare, Ashley interrupting adults, Ashley playing adults against each other, typical kid stuff. Good chicken dinner! Last night of swim lessons, skills tested, diving board. Stopped for Frosties.

item.title: Status Update July 31, 2018
item.description: Work at 9, today reminded me why I’m quitting Schurz, Michelle has lost her mind! Another cold, rainy day. Kids did okay at daycare, I think they’d be happier at school. Realized I have to work on Bruce’s first day of kindergarten, so disappointed! Lesa took kids to swim lessons.

item.title: Status Update July 30, 2018
item.description: Slow start. Rained, no swimming trip. Busy workday. Kids did good at daycare. Ashley had first phone call with Lilly McCluskey, she was so proud of herself, yesterday it was Justin Bieber’s Baby song, growing up too fast! Swim lessons, boys doing great, Ashley in deep end diving.

item.title: Status Update July 29, 2018
item.description: Church, Dillan and Bruce acted up. Bruce kicked out back screen door, Lowe’s for new door, $248 – no thank you, fixed myself. Dillan rode dirt bike, stirred up yellow jackets, got stung twice, I’m going to have to burn them out. Hasn’t been greatest day, upset with Lesa and kids.

item.title: Status Update July 28, 2018
item.description: Took Ashley to piano lessons, said harder than she thought. Hauled trash, all kids helped/went. Crossroads Church for free backpacks/supplies. Great Clips for school haircuts, Ashley got her long hair cut short, so sad! Walmart for school shoes, Lesa and me too. Cut grass, stung.

item.title: Status Update July 27, 2018
item.description: Took Bruce to dentist for crown. Worked morning at Herald Times, said goodbye to friends, last time there I’m guess, worked remainder of day from home. Kids went to Mitchell Pool. Dwyane punched holes in two new chairs. Lesa took kids to swim lessons, no lessons on Friday! Pizza!

item.title: Status Update July 26, 2018
item.description: Slept in, slow morning, didn’t go to work until 9:00a, had trouble getting motivated but finally did. Daycare took kids to Mitchell Pool. Worked until 5:00p then picked up kids. Ate dinner. Stormy weather, First Aid in changing room instead of swim lesson. TV, popcorn, root beer.

item.title: Status Update July 25, 2018
item.description: Hotel breakfast, work by 7:30a, trained on my job until noon, exit interview, said goodbye to people, finally left at 2:30p; made Indy by 4p, Bloomington by 6p. Surprised Lesa and kids, met them at John Lowery Pool where they had swim lessons, they were overjoyed to see me, XOXO!

item.title: Status Update July 24, 2018
item.description: Hotel breakfast, work by 7:30a, worked until 6:30p, headed to hotel, two Bloomington people in town for financial meetings, talked for awhile. FaceTime with Lesa and kids. Ate Portillo’s Italian Beef sandwich at 9:30p. After hours call at 10:30p, server down, resolved by 1a. Bed!

item.title: Status Update July 23, 2018
item.description: Up at 3a, left for Mishawaka at 3:30a, arrived 8:30a, worked until 5p, dinner, hotel about 8:30p; long awkward day since I gave notice last Friday, much talk about that. Kids packed lots of notes in my computer bag! I’m loved and blessed! I left them notes too. FaceTime with all.

item.title: Status Update July 22, 2018
item.description: Church, serving deacon. Rained all day, cleaned gutters. Kids made a ton of notes and hearts; Dillan and Ashley made videos, took photos; for my trip in AM. I’m blessed to be loved so much. Ashley is anxious again, having bad dreams, worried I won’t come back, Dillan worried too.

item.title: Status Update July 21, 2018
item.description: Up early with plans for Indianapolis Zoo, 95%+ rain/thunderstorms forecast for entire day, we stayed home. Matinee showing of Incredibles 2 cost $46, Bruce free, refreshments $48, $100 for a movie we can buy on DVD in 6 months for $5, will be a while before we return to theater!

item.title: Status Update July 20, 2018
item.description: Accepted job with Scientia. Skipped zoo, we’re too tired. Ashley piano lessons, Loretta says she’s doing well. C3 CWF Rummage Sale, friends bought Ashley everything, returned with Lesa and boys, same, we have great friends! Apple Acres’ goodies. F&M Bank, bought CDs with savings.

item.title: Status Update July 19, 2018
item.description: Slept in. Kids played outside. Dillan wouldn’t get dirt bike out of shed because of spider, Ashley killed it. Phone interview with Cook Medical went well, hiring mid-Sept. Lesa took kids to park. Returned rental. Steak ‘n’ Shake. Lawrence County Fair, mostly animals, food, drink.

item.title: Status Update July 18, 2018
item.description: Ate breakfast at 6a, packed, headed home by 7a, construction slowed us down. Kids collected road maps. LaSalle Subway for lunch instead of El Paso. Kids out of control, fighting constantly. Took Hwy 231, supper at Elliottsville McDonald’s. Rebecca Moffett letter. Glad we’re home!

item.title: Status Update July 17, 2018
item.description: Sue made us blueberry pancakes for breakfast. Cassandra took Lesa to see their parents’ grave site, we’re going to buy a stone. Took kids to Walmart for birthday cards, Dwyane 6, Lesa 36. Took Cameron and Keaton to Council Grounds with us, hiked, swam on beach. Dwyane’s BD party.

item.title: Status Update July 16, 2018
item.description: Boys up early, rest of us slept late. Breakfast, chilled, lunch. Bierman Aquatic Family Center water park: slides, rock wall, diving boards, floating logs, splash pad, pool. Swam couple more hours at Darrell and Sue’s. Treated them and Sarah to dinner at Ballyhoos. Despicable Me.

item.title: Status Update July 15, 2018
item.description: Kids woke everyone! Journey Church, Ashley afraid, cried? Hiked River Bend Trail in Merrill, found 10 Merrill Rocks, kids enjoyed. Culver’s ice cream. Walmart for supplies, restocked Sue’s pantry. Kids swam. I took nap. Family dinner, Darrell grilled. Swam more. Paddington movie.

item.title: Status Update July 14, 2018
item.description: Left for Wisconsin early, thunderstorms and lunch in Illinois, rained off and on until Stevens Point, road construction entire way but we made good time, kids did good traveling but got bored last couple of hours. Merrill, family! Kids rode riding cars/bikes, swam. Rough bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – July 13, 2018
item.description: Work, daycare. Dillan sick last night, okay now. He didn’t get to swim again, acting up. Rental showed hour late. Lesa packed all evening, I’ll load truck in morning. Having reaction to sting. Kids excited to go on vacation but won’t be that exciting – we’re just visiting family.

item.title: Status Update – July 12, 2018
item.description: Work, daycare. Mitchell Pool sans Dillan, acting up, fighting, being mean. Lesa got kids. I returned rental, drove no-brakes Jeep home, hit brakes just 17 times. Mowed again, hit hornet’s nest, stung in face; hit another nest, Dillan stung 4 times; called it quits, took him home.

item.title: Status Update – July 11, 2018
item.description: Daycare, work, a normal day. Times-Mail, not the last person. Round two mowing property, too much land, good problem to have! Need zero-turn mower or tractor and bush hog. Lesa and kids came up, kids ran around path I cut yesterday, Lesa walked, she seems happy with our purchase.

item.title: Status Update – July 10, 2018
item.description: Daycare, work, last person to leave, dark. Found activities for Merrill, awaiting Lesa’s approval. After supper loaded lawn mower onto trailer, spent next 2 hours cutting grass on new property, it’s overgrown, lots of raspberry bushes, oaks and locust trees, going again tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – July 9, 2018
item.description: Back to work and daycare. Took Dillan and Bruce to doctor for Wellness Checkups and immunizations, talked about Dillan’s enuresis, took him for a x-ray at IU Health Hospital. Late getting into work. Kids went to Mitchell Pool, they are tan! Took Ashley to piano lessons at church.

item.title: Status Update – July 8, 2018
item.description: Up 10 minutes before breakfast bell – hurried to get dressed, rushed 1⁄2 mile up hill to eat! Drove car down, packed, checked out. Was going to swim, opted out, too cold, everyone tired, just wanted to go home. Dogs happy to see us! We all napped! Cut grass. Golden Corral dinner.

item.title: Status Update – July 7, 2018
item.description: Up at 7am for breakfast. Art and crafts: made tie-dye shirts, painted Tic-tac-toe board, Ashley made yarn doll. Canoeing, even Lesa! Lunch. Lesa napped, kids and me went swimming. Archery. Trip into Poland for Slushies. Dinner. Swam more. Campfire. Raccoons. What a day! Worn out!

item.title: Status Update – July 6, 2018
item.description: Lesa PTO again, I worked from home again. Lesa spent day prepping for camp. I packed truck, got a bunch of tickets, finished them, and off we went to Camp Na Wa Kwa for weekend: checked in, unpacked truck, settled into Yurt, ate dinner, went swimming, built campfire, ate S’mores!

item.title: Status Update – July 5, 2018
item.description: Lesa PTO, said kids could stay with her, no daycare, thought she’d need help, worked from home. Kids played inside/outside, went swimming, Dillan rode dirt bike, etc. Lesa went grocery shopping. Tried to get kids to nap, should’ve known better. Traded rental car for rental truck.

item.title: Status Update – July 4, 2018
item.description: Bruce nightmares about curtains. Fairfax Beach, picnic lunch, swam all afternoon, Lesa and I burnt, kids fine. Got Suburban back! Bob Evans cooked so Lesa didn’t have to, everyone hungry, we chowed! Watched Coco movie until dusk. Set off lots of fireworks, it was totally awesome!

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2018
item.description: Daycare, left work early to get Ashley at camp, Lesa picked up boys. Talked to Marcy Cook and Steve Johnson at Hilltop. Took Ashley to Casa Brava in Bedford for dinner. Talked about camp: she likes camp, had fun, wants to go back next year for full week. Enjoyed talking with her!

item.title: Status Update – July 2, 2018
item.description: Just me and boys. Thunderstorm in AM, power went off at work. Boys went swimming at Mitchell pool. Lesa renewed rental. Sent Scientia paperwork. Photos/videos of Ashley at camp, rope swing, rock wall, Eleanor. Indian-style supper, yummy! Lesa played new Monopoly game with Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – July 1, 2018
item.description: Church with kids, Lesa stayed home again. Dillan’s birthday party, 9 years old, happy with gifts! Nicolle wrote Happy 10th on Facebook, doesn’t know his age. Swimming, even Lesa. Drove Ashley to Hilltop Camp, signed her in, said goodbyes, nervous but Marcy and Eleanor were there.

item.title: Status Update – June 30, 2018
item.description: Dillan and Ashley lost their first tournament game, team did unusually bad, season over. Steak ‘n’ Shake lunch. I took kids home while Lesa did last-minute birthday gift shopping for Dillan. Limestone Heritage Parade in Bedford, Dillan on Cub Scout float. Hot! Glad kids survived!

item.title: Status Update – June 29, 2018
item.description: Offered Scientia job, need to negotiate salary etc. before giving notice, Lesa’s happy. Picked up Bruce again and took to pool. Lesa went shopping for Ashley’s camp stuff. I got pizzas and kids. Bruce and Dwyane had last game, got trophies. Dillan and Ashley had makeup game, won!

item.title: Status Update – June 28, 2018
item.description: Picked up Bruce to take to Mitchell Pool, Ms. Page told me Bruce’s finger hurting and swollen; has an infection, called doctor right away, after work took him to doctor, CVS for antibiotics, and Wendy’s for Frosty. Dillan had Webelos meeting at park. Dropped truck off for repair.

item.title: Status Update – June 27, 2018
item.description: Overslept, drove Bruce to school. Normal day until 9:30pm, just finished working a ticket. Bruce probably has urinary tract infection. Dillan and I picked up transfer case, loaded it in Jeep, leaked fluid, smells bad, now in Suburban ready to drop off at Aaron’s. Kids read to us.

item.title: Status Update – June 26, 2018
item.description: Drove Jeep with no brakes to Bedford and Bloomington; yeah, I’m that ballsy. Rained. Found transfer case, settled on $200 pulled. Aaron Baker going to install at $30 an hour. Interviewed at Scientia, intense place, all career military, DOD types. Rental car. Ashley piano lessons.

item.title: Status Update – June 25, 2018
item.description: Drove old Jeep, brakes felt mushy, left-rear brake line rotted/leaking. Made it to work, busy day, got more tickets as soon as I picked up kids, worked through supper, my job sucks. Lesa took all kids to Dwyane and Bruce’s last ballgame, I didn’t get to watch them play. Bed time.

item.title: Status Update – June 24, 2018
item.description: Took kids to church in Lesa’s Jeep, she stayed home. Dillan and I took Suburban to Aaron Baker’s house, William at grandma’s, suspect transfer case, talked. Dillan “helped” me take battery out of old Jeep. Ashley and me went to Rural King, got new battery, installed, ready to go.

item.title: Status Update – June 23, 2018
item.description: Kids were quiet, slept until 8a! Went to Splash-O-Ree: swimming, bouncy house on the lake, row boats, paddle boats, kayaks, and fishing. Everyone had a great time! On the way home, my truck blew either the front diff or transfer case, will investigate more tomorrow. Slow evening.

item.title: Status Update – June 22, 2018
item.description: Same morning routine. Mitchell Pool field trip rained out. Dillan and Ashley’s ballgame rained out as well. Got Dillan’s iRead results back this afternoon and he passed! Proud of him for buckling down and working, celebrated by eating out, let Dillan chose, he picked Asian Pearl.

item.title: Status Update – June 21, 2018
item.description: Exact same morning as yesterday. Rained, so no swimming at Mitchell Pool. Scientifica emailed me, job interview on Tuesday! Last night of VBS: pizza, cookies, cotton candy, slime, face painting, music, kids had a great time this year! Power out in Bloomington, working all night.

item.title: Status Update – June 20, 2018
item.description: Normal morning, waited with Bruce for bus. Worked at Times-Mail, I hate my job, submitted resume to Scientifica and Cook Medical, would like the Cook Medical job. Picked up kids and headed home. Water was nasty, water main broke, Springville on water boil order. Took kids to VBS.

item.title: Status Update – June 19, 2018
item.description: Slept last night, feel better! Big kids daycare, Bruce Kindergarten Countdown. Worked at Times-Mail, still putting out fires but better. Rachelle Brown fired. Classic Title, bought the land off Jerry and Michelle Davis – finally ours! VBS night 3, kids had a great time per usual.

item.title: Status Update – June 18, 2018
item.description: Up until 3:30a moving files again, super tired. Dropped kids at daycare, saw Bruce to bus, headed to Times-Mail, worked full day, lots of residual fires to put out. Picked up Bruce from Parkview, drove him to Mitchell Pool. Did I say I’m tired? Second night of VBS, kids loved it!

item.title: Status Update – June 17, 2018
item.description: Up until 3:30a moving files, spent Father’s Day working. Family gave me lots of gifts, feel blessed. Church. Lesa went to Dollar General, I swam in pool with kids all afternoon, Lesa joined us. Venison dinner, Lesa went all-out. First night of C3 VBS, Dwyane and Bruce first time.

item.title: Status Update – June 16, 2018
item.description: Call at 4:30a, e-editions down all properties, worked to solve problem all day, yelled at kids a lot! Thinking not worth it. Dillan marched in Springville Heritage Parade; Honor Guard, carried Boy Scout flag; boys lots of candy, Ashley with McCluskeys. Dillan and Ashley ballgame.

item.title: Status Update – June 15, 2018
item.description: Friday! Took Dillan and Ashley to daycare, Dwyane and Bruce to dentist. Bruce has 3 cavities, needs 2 crowns, 1 filling; he’s been sneaking candy, finding wrappers around bed. Worked at Times-Mail. Lesa finished class, went grocery shopping, got pizzas! Dwyane and Bruce ballgame.

item.title: Status Update – June 14, 2018
item.description: Waited with Bruce, walked him to bus, took Dillan to class. Went to work. Lesa at home. Picked Dillan up at 11, went to Kay’s to get my resized ring, McDonald’s. Picked up Bruce at noon, drove them both to Mitchell Pool. Lesa took care of boys so I took big kids to baseball game.

item.title: Status Update – June 13, 2018
item.description: Kids daycare, Lesa home, Times-Mail me. Dillan took practice iRead test, thinks he’s prepared, I’m not convinced. Worked late, picked kids up last minute. No evening plans, probably good thing, everyone is tired. Ashley smarted/squared off against Lesa, got whopped. Nice day out.

item.title: Status Update – June 12, 2018
item.description: Rained third day straight! Daycare open. Worked from Times-Mail, Lesa still taking online class at home. Dillan and Bruce went to school, Dillan close to done, hope he does well on the iRead! Dillan and Ashley baseball game was canceled. Ashley piano lessons. Kids better behaved.

item.title: Status Update – June 11, 2018
item.description: Power out overnight, on by morning. Daycare closed, no power. Took Dillan, Bruce to school; Ashley, Dwyane stayed home. Lesa home taking online class. McDonald’s lunch with Dillan, Wendy’s Frosties. Kids buttholes all day. Dog after chickens. Rural King, Walmart. Raccoon by coop.

item.title: Status Update – June 10, 2018
item.description: Jump started truck. Church, Bruce’s first day of Junior Church, I was his teacher. Went to Camp Na Wa Kwa Open House, checked out Yurt we’ll be sleeping in, Ashley excited. On way home visited Martina Dale, fed donkeys. Truck alternator not charging. Dirt bike, swimming. tablets.

item.title: Status Update – June 9, 2018
item.description: Bruce woke us up, said he had sunburn. Dwyane and Bruce baseball practice at 9a, Dillan and Ashley at 10a. Ate lunch, made kids take a nap. Drove toward Fairfax Beach, saw storm on horizon, turned around, went to Mitchell Pool instead, had a lot of fun. Tacos! Watched NHRA on TV.

item.title: Status Update – June 8, 2018
item.description: Exact repeat of yesterday minus Bruce nearly drowning. I bought Springville Store pizzas, Lesa missed my call, made pizzas at home. Dwyane and Bruce makeup game, we all went. Found Dwyane’s missing glove in lost-and-found, two hats still missing. Kids tired, sent straight to bed!

item.title: Status Update – June 7, 2018
item.description: Same morning as yesterday. At noon, picked up Dillan and Bruce from Parkview, drove them to Mitchell Pool, they joined daycare field trip, left them with Jessica. Heard later Bruce ignored teacher, ran and jumped in pool over his head and sunk, Dillan got him out. Kids are tired!

item.title: Status Update – June 6, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids at daycare. Bruce wanted me to walk him to bus, I wanted him to go on his own. Stacie got Dillan okay. Worked at Times-Mail. Text from Jerry Davis, set appointment with Classic Title to buy land on 6⁄19. Dillan played at Gabe’s all evening. Ashley, boys swam in pool.

item.title: Status Update – June 5, 2018
item.description: Took kids to daycare, Bruce asked me to walk him to bus, so I did, Stacie Kidd picked up Dillan. Worked at Times-Mail. Picked up kids, ate pizza. Lesa took Dillan to his ballgame with Dwyane and Bruce. Ashley skipped game, I took her to first piano lesson with Loretta Harrington.

item.title: Status Update – June 4, 2018
item.description: Kids to daycare, worked at Times-Mail. Bruce’s first day of Kindergarten Countdown, walked him to bus, he’s getting big, I feel lucky and loved. Took Dillan to iRead Remediation, picked up, told me he paid attention entire time. Dwyane and Bruce had ballgame. Ashley doing better.

item.title: Status Update – June 3, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday, Serving Deacon, Ashley still sick, Lesa stayed home with her, Dwyane and Kindergarten Graduation. Bloomington Walmart with boys, got pool. Wendy’s for lunch by popular vote. Cash and Alexis Howard, neighbors came over. Filled pool. Back to church, Ashley went with.

item.title: Status Update – June 2, 2018
item.description: Cut grass before heat. Called doctor, Ashley strep throat, called in script. Lesa and Dillan Mom-Son day, Bloomington to play Laser Tag. I took kids to CVS, Kay Jewelers to get band resized, Walmart so Ashley could spend BD money, Orange Leaf. Grilled salmon. Kids played outside.

item.title: Status Update – June 1, 2018
item.description: Power outages from Louisville to Indy. Lesa worked. Dillan, Ashley dentist. Had kids all day; they got bored, wild and crazy. Generator trashed, won’t run, wires chewed by mice. Took kids to Times-Mail, tried to work some. Power back at 3:30p, off about 26 hours, off again at 9p.

item.title: Status Update – May 31, 2018
item.description: Took kids to daycare. Working when storm came in, power out, 2 trees down in Ashley Price’s yard blocking road. Daycare texted power out, pick up kids. Dragged trees off road with chains and truck, got kids, trees down all over! Dinner at Golden Corral, Walmart. Power stayed off.

item.title: Status Update – May 30, 2018
item.description: Took Dwyane and Bruce to daycare, Bruce rotten as usual. Dillan and Ashley rode bus to school, they played Human Scrabble, last day of school, brought home a lot of stuff. Worked until Lesa got home, productive work day. Kids excited to be done for year. Let them stay up until 9.

item.title: Status Update – May 29, 2018
item.description: School and work – in theory. Bruce strep throat and fever, kept home. Mrs. Dillman texted, Dwyane only student, picked up. Bruce to doctor, CVS for medicine. Signed kids up for swim lessons. Wendy’s lunch. Picked up Dillan and Ashley from school. Davises picked up land paperwork.

item.title: Status Update – May 28, 2018
item.description: Memorial Day. Did nothing special, just laid around. Kids played outside morning/evening because it was cooler, played on tablets midday when it was hot. Lesa took them on several walks, by third one they lost interest. Very rambunctious and excitable. Refilled pool, cooled down.

item.title: Status Update – May 27, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday, donuts, honored high school grads. Rushed home, another light lunch. Off to Jay and Denise Dillmans’s for grandson Jay’s birthday: bouncy house, lots of food, nice pool, kids had fun time, us too. Jiffy Treat on way home, saw Beth Walker. Supper, TV, Indy 500, bed.

item.title: Status Update – May 26, 2018
item.description: Hauled recyclables, Ashley and Bruce went, bought them suckers at Dollar General afterward. Hauled a ton of trash next, all kids went. Ate light lunch. Paul and Andrea’s for annual Memorial Day cookout: swimming, water balloons, bikes, etc. Skipped the invite to Forest’s wedding.

item.title: Status Update – May 25, 2018
item.description: Ashley honors: Perfect Attendance, Honor Roll All Periods, Highest AR Points and Percentage, Academic Achievement Award, she did great! Dillan honors: Honor Roll 1 Period, Academic Improvement Award. We took all school kids home, Steak ‘n’ Shake lunch. Kids played outside. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – May 24, 2018
item.description: Not that much going on today. Bruce sneaked some of his birthday toys into daycare, he almost lost them because daycare thought they belonged to them, lesson learned. Dillan and Ashley had a baseball game, we all went, both played fairly well, Ashley hit a single, their team won.

item.title: Status Update – May 23, 2018
item.description: Dropped off kids, Bruce. We went to Dwyane’s Kindergarten graduation. Citizenship Award! We must be doing something right! Signed him out, Pizza Hut buffet, Jiffy Treat ice cream. After school, picked up other three, Asian Pearl and Williams Bridge to celebrate one year adoption.

item.title: Status Update – May 22, 2018
item.description: Long workday. Dwyane had class picnic, Lesa went, ate with him, brought him home afterward, he played all afternoon. Ashley’s birthday, she’s 8 years old, time is flying! Strawberry shortcake, gifts, she’s happy. Our one year adoption anniversary, we didn’t visit Williams Bridge.

item.title: Status Update – May 21, 2018
item.description: I’m exhausted and the week is just starting! Working all weekend didn’t help any. Lesa on PTO all week. Darrell not doing well from sound of it, going to rehab, trouble on right side, doesn’t know who everyone is, just a week younger than me! Dillan and Ashley Game Day at school.

item.title: Status Update – May 20, 2018
item.description: Church, took Ella Carter her flowers, Paul and Andrea gave Bruce and Ashley birthday presents. Scout Crossover event at Springville Park, pitch-in lunch, awards ceremony, Dillan advanced to Webelos. Lesa went to Dollar General. Filled green pool, cold! Watched Oliver Twist on TV.

item.title: Status Update – May 19, 2018
item.description: Worked half the night from hotel room. Breakfast. Big Splash, water slides all morning, kids didn’t object when time to leave. Subway, CVS, JayC. Kids played on tablets or outside all afternoon. Lesa’s brother Darrell had a stroke, in hospital, probably okay. Working tonight too.

item.title: Status Update – May 18, 2018
item.description: Friday! Got yard mowed before work. Dillan had school picnic. Lesa off early, packed for Big Splash Adventure in French Lick, Ashley staying with Girl Scouts, got our own room, Pirate’s Cove. Arby’s, water park, pizza, lemonade, popcorn, all kids have injuries, having great time!

item.title: Status Update – May 17, 2018
item.description: Everyone tired! Ashley school picnic, great weather for it! Met soil scientist at property, he dug 5 pits, pretty interesting. Michelle Davis stopped by too. Land was good down to 42″ then turned to clay, good enough for septic, gonna buying. We all played with Bruce’s Nerf guns!

item.title: Status Update – May 16, 2018
item.description: Bruce is 5! Took cookies to daycare. Work day sucked again. Lesa on phone: “I think I’m having a heart attack or something. Gotta go. Bye.” and hung up! Called her boss, indigestion. BD party, got most everything asked for, favorite gift: a $1 whoopee cushion from Dollar General.

item.title: Status Update – May 15, 2018
item.description: It’s our 36th anniversary, didn’t do a thing, not even cards! Rushed to get kids, dropped Ashley off for last Girl Scout meeting of season. Went home, grabbed Dillan and Ashley’s baseball shirts and gear for game and photos, Lesa left Scouts early so Ashley in picture, they lost.

item.title: Status Update – May 14, 2018
item.description: Springville School had their Run for Riley 2K. Dillan second in his class, ran entire way; Ashley first girl in her class to finish; Dwyane second in his class also. They had fun! We’re proud of them! Dwyane and Bruce had a ballgame, picture night. Dillan had Scouts, Ashley went.

item.title: Status Update – May 13, 2018
item.description: Warm night, no one slept well except me, I slept fine, Bruce climbed in with Lesa, Ashley with me. After breakfast, we broke camp, cleaned up, headed home. Showers and baths! Mother’s Day, Lesa got our cards, I took her for Mexican to eat. Kids played outside. Hot, turned on A/C.

item.title: Status Update – May 12, 2018
item.description: Up early, skipped baseball practice, went camping at Camp Maumee. Kids ran, ate, played, ate, fished, ate, then we ate. Ashley got sick. Dillan didn’t pee himself. Stacie went home after we arrived, Jason showed up shortly after that. Had ticket, no signal, found out hours later.

item.title: Status Update – May 11, 2018
item.description: Lesa PTO. Dillan field trip to Marengo Cave, bought us souvenirs. Soil test good, buying land. Bruce stabbed girl in back with fork, got whopped! Walmart with kids for Mother’s Day, camping stuff. Lesa and Dwyane Muffins with Mom. All four kids ballgame, delayed camping until AM.

item.title: Status Update – May 10, 2018
item.description: Hot day! Game Day at school. Dwyane did good, won Big Wheel race, lapped other riders! We also won the sack race championship. I got tickets, missed conference call while there. Lesa picked up PTO flowers and delivered to Linda Wilson. Kids played outside, watched TV, took baths.

item.title: Status Update – May 9, 2018
item.description: School, daycare, work, home, sums it up. Permission to take soil sample, ordered it, scheduled for Friday. Rough work day. Warm, lower 80s. Bruce doesn’t like daycare; Dillan and Ashley said daycare okay but don’t like sharing space with babies. Kids played outside, ramps, swing.

item.title: Status Update – May 8, 2018
item.description: No school, Election Day, kids slept over an hour, daycare for all. Worked all day, missed a meeting, didn’t feel like quitting job. Picked up kids; tickets started! Took Scott to look at land, guess we’ll try to buy. Dillan and Ashley lost their first ballgame, neither had a hit.

item.title: Status Update – May 7, 2018
item.description: I’m still employed, ADP screwed up taxes, have to file amended return. New daycare open, Bruce had hard time. I’m tired, it’s only Monday. Talked to IUCU, we’re good to buy. Dillan Scouts, made first aid kit. Dwyane and Bruce first ballgame, The Milch Guy, purple shirts and hats.

item.title: Status Update – May 6, 2018
item.description: Church, security deacon, Family Sunday! Talked to Brian Price about buying home, land. Scott Schroyer will look at land Tuesday. Kids played outside all day! I cut grass, Lesa went shopping. Grilled brats, veggies. Dillan dirt bike. Boys ramped Big Wheels. Ashley played on swing.

item.title: Status Update – May 5, 2018
item.description: Dropped Ashley off for Girl Scout trip to Newport Aquarium at 7am. Rest of us spent morning looking at land. Talked to Home Center about modular home. McDonald’s. We want property on Steve Earl Rd! Printed zombie targets, Dillan BB gun. Ashley back at 9pm, gone 14 hours, worried!

item.title: Status Update – May 4, 2018
item.description: Friday, didn’t send resignation letter, sums up workday. Squirrel getting into coop stealing chicken food. Dwyane field trip to Sieboldt Quarry, had lots of fun! Imagination Station last day, all boys were in timeout! Lesa went grocery shopping. Shot BB gun, even Lesa and Ashley!

item.title: Status Update – May 3, 2018
item.description: Stormed this morning, rained all day. Duke replaced meter with digital one, bet electric bill goes up! Daycare about moved out. Dillan brought home two months of school papers, been hiding them in his desk. Lesa helped Dillan with spelling, Ashley read to us. I’m tired, Lesa too.

item.title: Status Update – May 2, 2018
item.description: Kept busy all day, lots of work to do. Nice day, didn’t get to enjoy any of it, upper 80s, seems really hot! Went to get kids when Lesa got home. They played and I worked some more. After supper kids played outside again, I adjusted swing chains to make them higher. TV and baths.

item.title: Status Update – May 1, 2018
item.description: No tickets today! Felt like I played hooky but I worked, closed auction last night, some problems today. Shorts and tee shirt day, in the eighties. Picked kids up early again. Boys played outside, Lesa took Ashley to Scouts. I took Dillan and Ashley to ball practice. Late to bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 30, 2018
item.description: Slow but busy day, not so much pressure. Really nice outside, picked up kids a little earlier so they could enjoy. Dwyane and Bruce had baseball practice, Lesa took them. Dillan had Scout Pack meeting, earned Polar Bear patch for camping in sub-freezing weather, Ashley went with.

item.title: Status Update – April 29, 2018
item.description: Church, Cooks attending again, talked to Carl about cars. Kids played outside. I napped, Lesa took Bruce for long walk, Dillan rode dirt bike, Dwyane and Ashley tablets. Man in van asked Ashley where she lived, was our neighbor’s son, scared us! Water bottle rockets in afternoon.

item.title: Status Update – April 28, 2018
item.description: Dwyane and Bruce baseball practice at 9a, Dillan and Ashley practice at 10a. Ate lunch, did recyclables, cleaned yard; kids helped, worked hard. At 4p we went to Rally for Riley at Springville, placed winning bids on Dillan’s artwork and Ashley’s photo, missed Dwyane’s vase, fun.

item.title: Status Update – April 27, 2018
item.description: I worked from Times-Mail until noon. Talked with Principle Hudson before Donuts with Dad with Dwyane, he made me a key chain, home with me after. Lesa grocery shopped. Viewed two houses, we liked one. Springville Store for pizza. Nicolle emailed, asked for advice in writing kids.

item.title: Status Update – April 26, 2018
item.description: Work trudging along. Realtor said majority of houses we like are gone, looking at two tomorrow. So far no repercussions from Dillan’s behavior yesterday. Man walking toward school with shotgun caused school lock down. Ate at Asian Pearl. Nicolle emailed, she received PAVA letter.

item.title: Status Update – April 25, 2018
item.description: Long, long day; finally finished working at 10:15pm. Emails from Nicolle asking about PAVA letter. Dillan in trouble at school, during art he got mad and in his notebook he had drawn 18 stick figures and wrote “Everyone’s dead in school but Dillan.” WTF‽ Talked with him, no clue.

item.title: Status Update – April 24, 2018
item.description: Slower day, yet busy. Rain, rain, go away! Last day for PTO Flower money. Bruce did okay at daycare. They acted crazy at home. Checked out a house after supper, two others not available, will call realtor tomorrow. Bought four more .net domain names for the kids, cost me $1 each!

item.title: Status Update – April 23, 2018
item.description: Work, work, work, all work and no play. Rained all day until evening when sun peeked out. Kids rambunctious. Dillan didn’t return report card or turn in PTO Flower Sale money. Took Dillan to Scouts, watched Cyber-Bulling video, pics taken donating $500 to rebuild Springville gym.

item.title: Status Update – April 22, 2018
item.description: Church, Serving Deacon, Arby’s, Great Clips haircuts, kids look good! Looked at some houses. Dillan rode dirt bike, learned to shift. Ashley, Dwyane, Bruce played on swings, Dillan joined them. Grilled salmon. Evening church, Ashley went. Dillan happy I got home, ran to greet me.

item.title: Status Update – April 21, 2018
item.description: Up early, frozen, fire, coffee, breakfast for boys, lake, play, lunch, broke camp, home. Girls lazy morning, Dollar General, Ashley Scout Badge Day at Cornerstone. Picked her up – surprised her. Neighbor/classmate Gage came over, all kids played outside, tired, slept like babies.

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2018
item.description: Typical work/school/daycare day. Lesa off early, grocery shopped. Knocked off early too, loaded camping gear. Girls: homemade pizzas and movies. Boys: Maumee Scout Camp, no water, first ones there, set up tent, playing, chicken soup, campfire, S’mores, campfire stories, too cold!

item.title: Status Update – April 19, 2018
item.description: Bus, daycare, work from home, work sucks, new norm. Busy entire day until hour after Lesa got home. Left to get kids, stopped at BP to get cash from ATM to pay daycare. Supper. All kids went outside to play with Aiden and Logan; bike races, swing set, didn’t want to come back in.

item.title: Status Update – April 18, 2018
item.description: Kids rode bus, Bruce daycare, worked from home, horrible day, hanging tough, wore out tired. Got kids, they played outside, nice day. After dinner, kids played outside, then baths for boys, big kids out until 8 pm – played two hours with neighbor kids – swing set, bikes, running.

item.title: Status Update – April 17, 2018
item.description: Kids rode bus, thrilled, waited forever to ride. Bruce went to daycare. Worked from home, monitors came via FedEx, lots of work issues. Replaced Suburban rear brakes, LR caliper pin frozen, need carrier. Bruce’s chest hurt bad after dinner, at hospital 4 hours, x-rays, he’s okay.

item.title: Status Update – April 16, 2018
item.description: Took kids to daycare. Times-Mail no network, worked at home. Mailed Amended Tax Returns. Spent rest of day/evening working, bad workday, made it through. Picked up kids, drove to Bloomington with them for work. Mrs. Scott called, Dillan failed iRead test, we’re upset! Cub Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – April 15, 2018
item.description: Sunday, Church/Junior Church. Nice day, helped Dillan wash dirt bike. Grilled out salmon. Kids played outside. After supper Bruce started complaining of chest pain, blew it off at first, but he was in obvious pain, I took him to ER, he has muscle bruising. Worried us! Jr. Frosty.

item.title: Status Update – April 14, 2018
item.description: Raining, no baseball practice. Lesa girls day out shopping with Andrea. Waited for FedEx to deliver monitors for work, got tired of waiting, went into town. missed. Picked up Adjusted Tax Returns for 2014-16, getting $20,721 back! Showed kids new office. Took them to Jiffy Treat.

item.title: Status Update – April 13, 2018
item.description: Friday the 13th. School closed, FiberTech fire. Took kids to daycare, last day open, sad. Set up new office in Bedford, firewall misconfigured. Worked from home, busy-ass day, helped interview my potential new boss. Kids played with Dillan’s classmate Gabe down the street. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – April 12, 2018
item.description: Another bad day, worked 11 hours in office, worked at home too, just finished. Lesa had to pick up kids, barely made it. Got office cleaned out, I move to Times-Mail in morning. Beautiful day, 78° when I left work, kids played outside. I forgot boys baseball practice due to work!

item.title: Status Update – April 11, 2018
item.description: Didn’t think work could get worse, it did. Picked up kids, Forest’s last day, gave gift to Bruce, was nice of her. Came home and ate right away. Went to H&R Block, signed taxes, $13,227 refund! Worked on PAVA 2018 letter last night and tonight. Lesa less grouchy from not smoking.

item.title: Status Update – April 10, 2018
item.description: Work simply sucked, I hate my job! Off too late to get kids, Lesa got Ashley, took her to Scouts. I got boys before closing and fixed supper, we ate as soon as Lesa and Ashley got home. I took Dillan and Ashley to their first baseball practice of the year – cold! Boys took baths.

item.title: Status Update – April 9, 2018
item.description: Daycare called work, Bruce has red eye, picked him up, went to doctor, no problem, ate lunch at Steak ‘n’ Shake. Crossroads keeping our deposit. Worked from home with Bruce. Took Dwyane and Bruce to baseball practice, Ashley went with. Lesa took Dillan to Scouts, I picked him up.

item.title: Status Update – April 8, 2018
item.description: Shoals Christian Church, helped Open Arms with fostering outreach. Drove by Williams Dam on way home, flood stage, scary, highway closed, drove country roads home. Open Arms Celebration showed video testimony of us and kids, magic show. Dinner at Cinco de Mayo in Lyons. Long day!

item.title: Status Update – April 7, 2018
item.description: Dillan, Ashley baseball practice canceled, too cold. Loaded, hauled trash, Dillan helped, Dwyane rode with. Lesa took Dwyane to Western Skateland, classmate birthday party. Dunham’s Sports for Bruce’s baseball glove, Walmart for misc. stuff, Frostys. Kids played outside nice day!

item.title: Status Update – April 6, 2018
item.description: Friday! Worked from home. Lesa took Bruce to kindergarten screening, did well on math, average on rest, going to school this fall, last of the kids to start school, growing fast, awesome and sad both. Lesa went to work, grocery shopping. Picked up kids, ate pizza, Bambi II movie.

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2018
item.description: Lots of meetings. No rain! Picked up kids and Lesa, went to Dwyane and Bruce’s first baseball practice of season, Bruce’s first ever. BNL HS for NLCS Art Fair. Saw Dillan and Ashley’s artwork. UPS Store, renewed PO Box. Asian Pearl to eat dinner; saw Presley, Sarah, and Chandler.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2018
item.description: Decent day, worked 9.5 hours, the new norm. Lesa trying to quit smoking, on Chantix; totally stressed, grouchy, irritable; understandable. We’re going to stick with Imagination Station in Oolitic, Jessica and Annetta bought it. Went to H&R Block to file taxes, left our paperwork.

item.title: Status Update – April 3, 2018
item.description: Stormed bad last night, kept everyone awake. Workday was decent. Left early, Dillan and Ashley’s IEP meeting; Dillan’s ADHD needs addressed, affecting performance, Lesa and teachers agree; Ashley stops speech at end of year. Stormed all day, tornado watches. Girl Scouts canceled.

item.title: Status Update – April 2, 2018
item.description: Started to work, got halfway there, turned around, worked from home. Less stress, no kids, no office. Jessica said her and Annetta starting new daycare in Oolitic, will watch all our kids, transport to Springville! Ticket came in at dinner. Took Dillan to Scouts. Finished ticket.

item.title: Status Update – April 1, 2018
item.description: Worked ticket from 5:00-10:30a, missed Deacon breakfast and Bruce’s Easter performance, pissed off, worked 12:00-3:00p, screw this job! Bruce better, Lesa wore out. Nice day, Dillan rode dirt bike, Ashley played with Dwyane. Lesa grocery shopped. Golden Corral to give Lesa break.

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2018
item.description: Bruce’s throat swollen/red, doctor visit, has strep throat. Late start for Easter 2018 in Fortville, ate dinner, had Easter egg hunt, kids had good time! Avery and Bonnie Dellinger’s 50th anniversary. Left early, Easter dinner at parents; Jim, Sarah and Kaleigh, Becky and family.

item.title: Status Update – March 30, 2018
item.description: Good Friday! School open, daycare closed, kids car riders today. Stayed home with Bruce, worked from home. Semi-productive day, closed another auction. fifty hour week easy. Met Lesa at Budget, returned rental, back in Jeep. Looked at car on way home, didn’t like. Pizza! No rain!

item.title: Status Update – March 29, 2018
item.description: Today was better, 6 hours of meetings, still managed to get some work done. Lesa able to drop off Crossroads paperwork, pick up kids, feed them before I got home. As soon as I got home we left for school Literacy Fair, kids bought books, had fun with friends. Ate when I got home.

item.title: Status Update – March 28, 2018
item.description: Another hard work day, I’m not keeping up with workload, moving me to Times-Mail in Bedford, I’m okay with that. Lesa tried to turn in Crossroads Daycare paperwork but missed the woman by a few minutes. Picked up kids at 5:29pm, 1 minutes to spare. Lesa getting better, kids well.

item.title: Status Update – March 27, 2018
item.description: Rained hard all morning. Auction woes at work, Michelle rubbing me wrong way, reconsidering my position in company. Everyone seems healthier today! Left work late once again, barely got kids. Daycare winding down, wanting to know our last day. Work followed me home. Baths and TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 26, 2018
item.description: Everybody went to work, school, or daycare. Sick people doing better too. Picked up Lesa’s Jeep, parked it at work. Had last minute high-priority ticket as I was leaving, drove down highway with laptop and hotspot. Picked kids up late. Pizza. Bear Carnival a hit, kids enjoyed it!

item.title: Status Update – March 25, 2018
item.description: I took Dillan, Dwyane to church; Lesa, Bruce, Ashley sick, stayed home, watched movies. Made Toilet Toss game for Bear’s Carnival. Lesa grocery shopped; Dillan, Dwyane played outside and on tablets; Ashley, Bruce, myself napped. Dollar General for dog food. We grilled out salmon.

item.title: Status Update – March 24, 2018
item.description: Lesa still sick. Took Pleasant to vet, it was time to put her down, kids took it well. I took kids to the Pinewook Derby races, Dillan placed 1st, 3rd, 2nd, and 1st again, he was very pleased with car. Spent afternoon burying Pleasant in the sleet and snow. Bruce is getting sick.

item.title: Status Update – March 23, 2018
item.description: Friday, long week, for kids too! Lesa sick with flu, stayed home, in bad shape. Got air card, activated Jetpack hotspot. Bought some groceries before getting kids. Pizza! Lesa managed to take Dwyane and Bruce to Mother/Son Movie night, I took Dillan and Ashley to Steak ‘n’ Shake.

item.title: Status Update – March 22, 2018
item.description: Roads clear. Really hard day for me, worked 7a-5p non-stop. Missed Crossroads Daycare tour, Lesa able to go, she likes the place. She rented car for another week, Jeep needs engine wiring harness, going aftermarket. Picked up kids, forgot Bruce’s eye drops again. Lesa sick – flu?

item.title: Status Update – March 21, 2018
item.description: Lots of snow, 2-hr delay, let kids sleep extra hour. Horrible workday, would get another job if it wasn’t for the money – working for family. Lesa took online class from home. Kroger for Dwyane’s milk, picked up kids at 5:25p, just made it! Dillan struggling with math. I’m tired.

item.title: Status Update – March 20, 2018
item.description: First day of Spring, daycare took Bruce, very busy workday. Lesa picked up Ashley, took her to Girl Scouts. I worked over, picked up boys, got home, went back, forgot Bruce’s eye drops. Snowed hard all afternoon and night. Lesa barely got home! Several inches, kids went sledding!

item.title: Status Update – March 19, 2018
item.description: Bruce had pinkeye, came back from daycare with him. Tried working from home, Internet too slow. Doctor called in script to CVS, picked up. Verizon wants $130 month for hot spot, no way! Steak ‘n’ Shake with Bruce. Watched movies. Lesa picked up school kids. Took Dillan to Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – March 18, 2018
item.description: Church with kids, Lesa stayed home. Kids played outside: Dillan, Dwyane rode bikes; Ashley, Bruce played with slime. Lesa took kids for another walk in woods, visited sink hole again, boys asked to see giant sink holes on Internet. Ashley organized her photo album. Laid back day.

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2018
item.description: Up early, drove 1½ hours to Owensville, helped present Open Arms foster workshop, different, not sure we’ll do it again, on way drove by Nicolle and grandparents’ houses. Late lunch at Pizza Hut in Princeton, used Ashley and Dwyane’s reading vouchers. At home kids played outside.

item.title: Status Update – March 16, 2018
item.description: Snoozed alarm ½ hour, let kids sleep in. Took kids to Bedford Parks Dept. office to get Father-Daughter Dance pics, Mother-Son Movie tickets; daycare after. Lesa PTO, took paperwork to JC’s Playhouse daycare, bought groceries. Dollar General for candy; got gas. Pizza! Watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – March 15, 2018
item.description: Drove together. Finally have network access; busy, busy, busy at work! Lesa picked up car, I got my truck back! Lesa taking tomorrow off. Warm day, in the 60s, kids played outside at daycare and home. New laptop backpack arrived. Looked at new pay stub, $500 extra per pay period!

item.title: Status Update – March 14, 2018
item.description: Drove in together, Lesa reserved a car, pick up tomorrow. Had stressful, productive day. Warmer day, kids played outside, Dwyane got angry, broke Dillan’s Laser Tag game, kids did nothing but argue and bicker. Lesa bought Ashley first Little House on the Prairie book – she loves!

item.title: Status Update – March 13, 2018
item.description: We drove in together. Couldn’t connect to servers from work, unresolved when Lesa picked me up after work. We tried to get a rental, nothing available until Friday due to Spring Break. Got kids, went to Thornton Park, creepy guy was there. Went to JC’s Playhouse for daycare tour.

item.title: Status Update – March 12, 2018
item.description: Kids on Spring Break, stayed at daycare, sucks! Lesa stayed home. Worked. Got kids: talked to Annetta, Jenny, and Chandler about daycare closing; we’re going to be in trouble! Salmon for supper. Rusty Nut can’t work on Jeep for four weeks! Picked it up, took it to Tire ‘n’ Wheel.

item.title: Status Update – March 11, 2018
item.description: Spring Break, Family Sunday again, lead in back, Ella Carter donated nice clothes for boys, we donated outgrown clothes for rummage sale. Cold day, kids stayed inside, bored, nothing to burn energy, very long day. Casa Brava for dinner, Walmart for milk. Heaven Is for Real movie.

item.title: Status Update – March 10, 2018
item.description: Kids woke us per usual. They played outside all day, together! Took Lesa’s Jeep to Rusty Nut for repair, closed, will call Monday. Practiced baseball with Bruce and Ashley, she lost her mitt. Dillan rode dirt bike. Lesa took kids to see sink holes; went to mailbox. Fresh air day!

item.title: Status Update – March 9, 2018
item.description: No breakfast, wrapped up work, got to leave at 10:30a. Drove to HTO, turned in car, picked up kids at 4:00p! Daycare closing first of April, not sure what we’re going to do yet. All the kids went outside and rode bikes. Pizza! Watched Zootopia. Good to be home, but I’m exhausted.

item.title: Status Update – March 8, 2018
item.description: Hotel didn’t offer breakfast so skipped. Work by 8a. Meetings almost all day. Off at 5:30p. Facetime with kids and Lesa. Went to dinner with colleague. Got back, worked in hotel room, more Facetime with Lesa. I can tell kids really miss me, even the boys! Get to go home tomorrow!

item.title: Status Update – March 7, 2018
item.description: Left at 4:30a, snowed entire way, 4.5 hours later arrived in Mishawaka, worked until 5p. Lesa’s Jeep running bad, made it to daycare and work, swapped it for my Suburban, her and kids safer now. Dinner with colleagues. Facetime with Lesa and kids, they miss me and me them! Tired!

item.title: Status Update – March 6, 2018
item.description: Day went by okay, kept busy. Picked up rental car, then kids. Met Lesa at Needmore, Ashley had Scouts, sold 164 boxes of cookies, more than any other Daisy, got a “Patch Bracelet” and certificate. I’m packed, leaving at 4:30a. Said goodbye to the kids, I’m going to miss everyone!

item.title: Status Update – March 5, 2018
item.description: Forced myself to leave at reasonable time even though lots to do. Reserved car for Mishawaka. Picked up kids. Bruce behaved. Lesa already frazzled by time we got home, going to be long week for all. Dillan had Pack Meeting, belt loop and 3 patches, Ashley went and hung with Abby.

item.title: Status Update – March 4, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday, Ashley submitted blue prayer request for me to get better, love that girl so much. I really love Family Sundays. Kids played outside all day: bikes, laser tag, swing set – lots of fresh air! Helped Dwyane build his leprechaun trap, Ashley and Bruce made theirs too.

item.title: Status Update – March 3, 2018
item.description: Kids really loud running and screaming, woke us early. Made kids go outside today. Lesa played hide-and-seek with boys. I took Dillan and Ashley to Walmart, Lowe’s Rural King, Dollar Tree, 3 Dollar Generals – couldn’t find gold coins for Dwyane’s leprechaun trap. Kids rode bikes.

item.title: Status Update – March 2, 2018
item.description: Friday. Long day, Todd came in around 3:00 pm, talked awhile, left on time. Got kids, fell asleep on couch while they watched TV, Lesa got home with groceries, helped her carry in. Pizza and a movie – watched Coco, Bruce and Dwyane a little scared by it and sat with me. Bed late.

item.title: Status Update – March 1, 2018
item.description: Long days are new norm. Spent hectic morning trying to close auction, getting reports ready for meetings, answering support tickets. Spent afternoon from 1-4:30 on phone for 3 remote meetings. Got kids. Lesa followed me to Gary Lentz’s house, scanned the Jeep, crank sensor codes.

item.title: Status Update – February 28, 2018
item.description: Another early-to-arrive and late-to-leave day, exhausted! Lesa too, asked me to take her to dinner at Asian Pearl, kids liked that too, ate at their favorite place, all they wanted, dessert too! Dillan ISTEP testing all week: math on Monday, reading Tuesday, not sure about today.

item.title: Status Update – February 27, 2018
item.description: Had hard time sleeping, mind going mile-a-minute. Up early, kids to daycare early, into work early. Busy workday! Left late, got kids, went home. Got Lesa’s old Jeep running, her new Jeep bogging down and stalling. Kids rode bikes, Bruce rode new one. Paid off Girl Scout cookies.

item.title: Status Update – February 26, 2018
item.description: First day on new job, lots of HTO fires, bit overwhelmed, handled most situations okay. Talked half-an-hour with Michelle, that went fairly smooth. Got off late, picked up kids. Took Dillan to Bedford Police Dept., toured facility with pack, part of Scout requirement, he had fun.

item.title: Status Update – February 25, 2018
item.description: Church, Serving Deacon, didn’t dare take home bound communion, found sub. Stephanie Helton came to pay for Girl Scout cookies, visited kids and played games with them for 2 hours, Dillan was apprehensive but other kids were fine. had venison casserole for dinner, watched TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – February 24, 2018
item.description: Lesa and Ashley Taco Bell lunch, sold 15 more boxes of Girl Scout cookies at Rural King, Bath and Beyond for girl stuff. Boys and I RC car demolition derby at Morgan County Fairgrounds 4-H building, boys had awesome time. Rained all day, cleaned house. Dollar General with Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – February 23, 2018
item.description: Last day at HTO, after 6 years no one even said goodbye or good luck. New job starts Monday, still have reservations. Ashley slightly better, sleeping at least. Olympics winding down too. Rained all week, ground saturated. Lesa went grocery shopping. Hoping to sleep good tonight!

item.title: Status Update – February 22, 2018
item.description: Made it through Thursday! Worked my butt off, issues but didn’t freak, emails about new laptop, Michelle wants me in South Bend on March 7-9. Not sure what happens tomorrow. Ashley not coughing as bad, me either. Hope to be able to recoup some this weekend! Boys acted okay today.

item.title: Status Update – February 21, 2018
item.description: Another long day, made it a whole 8 hours, ate supper, slept awhile on couch. Bruce kept getting up last night, was tired today, his behavior at daycare showed it. Ashley is coughing again, she’s still not over her illness. Dillan and Dwyane are fine. Lesa still strong but tired.

item.title: Status Update – February 20, 2018
item.description: Busy 8 hr workday! Dropped Ashley off with Lesa at Needmore for Scouts, she built a time capsule. Fixed potato soup, garlic bread dinner. Let boys play with PS, wouldn’t quit fighting, warned them, turned it off, HUGE back-sass, sat them on couch, smashed into pieces with hammer!

item.title: Status Update – February 19, 2018
item.description: Got kids to daycare, coughed hard, soiled myself, went home, cleaned up. Exhausted, laid down, slept until 10a. Packed bag of jeans, undies, and Dillan’s Underoos. I went to work. wearing my kids’ Underoos – how bad can it get‽ Made it half a day. Wrote previous 5 status updates.

item.title: Status Update – February 18, 2018
item.description: Slept! Fitfully. Lesa took kids to church, I slept until they got home. Ate chicken noodle soup for lunch, it stayed down! Slept more. Ate white rice mixed with a little chicken, banana and apple sauce for dinner, it stayed down! Diarrhea immediately after. Lesa a super mom/wife!

item.title: Status Update – February 17, 2018
item.description: Couldn’t sleep all night last night, up 35 hours now, coughing so bad can’t sleep! Diarrhea and dry heaves. Went to Walk-in Clinic, have flu, knew that, prescribed cough medicine, pharmacy closed until 8a on Sunday morning. Will try over-the-counter flu medicine to help me sleep.

item.title: Status Update – February 16, 2018
item.description: Lesa got kids ready and to daycare. I woke at 9:00a – out for 40 hours – an entire work week! Called in again. Slept until 3:00p. Finally had a little energy. Made deal with Ashley, skip dinner and I’d take her to Father-Daughter Dance, I felt sick, she had fun, she got a Frosty!

item.title: Status Update – February 15, 2018
item.description: Sicker than a dog! Lesa begged me to stay home. I took kids to daycare, Got halfway to work, shirt soaked through, headache, heater at 90°, shivering; turned around, went home. I called in sick when needed most! Passed out all day/night on sofa. Lesa got kids, handled everything!

item.title: Status Update – February 14, 2018
item.description: Ran fever all day. Ron still in town, Todd treated lunch at Wagon Wheel; talked about transitioning; afternoon meeting with Lauren Bavis, the Digital Projects and Social Media Editor, she left crying; Bob Zaltsberg the Editor reamed us. Crashed hard at home! Happy Valentines Day!

item.title: Status Update – February 13, 2018
item.description: Decent morning, heavy frost, still on time. Dillan seems better, good appetite. Ron Jasper at work today, on Town News / Cert Pro call, spent almost entire day discussing what next, learned about the scary job things coming my way. Miley, Presley, puppy Rivers came to visit kids.

item.title: Status Update – February 12, 2018
item.description: Cold morning, warm afternoon, Ashley better, Dillan sick now. Weird workday, meeting with Cory and Todd, call with new boss Michelle, Todd’s last day Friday, mine Feb 23, some tasks following me to SCI. Off late but able to pick up kids. Dillan opted to skip Scouts. Homework. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 11, 2018
item.description: Icy roads, church canceled, let kids sleep in. Kids just plain rotten all day long: argued, bickered, fought, talked back, pressed every button; surprised any of them are still alive! Spent evening creating spreadsheet to map investments for kids, going to move some money around.

item.title: Status Update – February 10, 2018
item.description: Lesa took Ashley to sell cookies, no one showed, wrong day! I signed up all kids for baseball. Payed bills and ran errands. Monster Jam day! Ate at Steak ‘n’ Shake on way to Indy, got to Lucas Oil Stadium with time to spare, kids had awesome time, got out quick, home by midnight!

item.title: Status Update – February 9, 2018
item.description: School/daycare for kids, Lesa finished class at noon, I worked until noon too. Gave notice/acceptance to old/new employers. Lesa went grocery shopping, I napped. Got Ashley’s inhaler from school, picked up kids, went to Pizza Hut, used free pan pizza coupons. Ashley doing better.

item.title: Status Update – February 8, 2018
item.description: Lesa got kids up, to daycare/school, picked up, and fed while I was in Mishawaka. I interviewed until 2:15, got home about 7. Lesa, Ashley and Dwyane rushed to greet me; Dillan and Bruce couldn’t be pulled from TV. I was offered the job, talked it over with Lesa, going to accept.

item.title: Status Update – February 7, 2018
item.description: Eighth inch ice, snow on top, school canceled, daycare open, dropped kids off. Ashley better already! Lesa still taking class. Left for South Bend at 1, arrived about 5, snowed along way. Lesa and kids’ routine upset. I ate at Golden Corral, got settled into Hyatt. FaceTimed fam!

item.title: Status Update – February 6, 2018
item.description: Ashley really sick, surprised she made it through the day! While I was at doctor with Ashley, Lesa picked up boys, turned in Girl Scout cookie money, and picked up more. Ashley has pneumonia, went to CVS for two scripts and an inhaler. I’m packed and ready for trip to South Bend.

item.title: Status Update – February 5, 2018
item.description: Ashley coughing. Reservation confirmation for South Bend, too tired for Monday! Lesa taking a class at home for work. Bruce good at daycare, two suckers! Buffalo Wild Wings, 5% goes to Springville PTO, kids thought it fun seeing some of their schoolmates and principle Mr. Hudson.

item.title: Status Update – February 4, 2018
item.description: Lesa stayed home with Ashley, us boys went to church, Family Sunday. Went to Walmart after lunch, bought Dillan and myself new shoes, Lesa a new bar stool, Bruce Valentine cards, and misc stuff. Laid around watching TV most of afternoon and evening. Kids were total pills all day!

item.title: Status Update – February 3, 2018
item.description: Boys up at 6:30, told them keep quiet, I slept until 10! Ashley coughing, not feeling good. Kids played inside. Dillan and Dwyane tablet time, Bruce wouldn’t nap, Ashley tried to nap, I slept another hour! Games, slime making, LEGOs. I took Ashley to Family Video to sell cookies.

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2018
item.description: Friday! Normal morning. Work stressful, told HR I’d apply for SCI System Software Analyst job. Talked a lot with Todd and Mike Hert. Picked up kids, Dillan played outside, kept other three indoors, Ashley pretty sick, Bruce still recovering, not chancing Dwyane. Groceries. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – February 1, 2018
item.description: Tired, nerves frayed! HR talked to me, suggested I take SCI position, pay bump, work-at-home potential, corporate admin-type duties, Schurz secure. GM next, said basically same thing. Overnight South Bend trip Wednesday. Stress! Picked up kids, it was nice, missed them yesterday.

item.title: Status Update – January 31, 2018
item.description: Sarah called, mom showing signs of dementia. I called her family doctor and her, talked her into going, Becky drove, blood work to start. Todd gave me info for numerous processes. Skipped job fair to go to Indy. Spent time with Sarah, Becky, Jim, mom and dad. Got home at 10:30pm!

item.title: Status Update – January 30, 2018
item.description: Decent morning. Todd got job, giving three weeks notice, not sure where that will leave me, he thinks maybe I’ll go to SCI instead of staying at HTO. Picked up kids and Lesa and we headed to Smithville Christian Church to do video for Open Arms, felt strange. Mother Bear’s Pizza.

item.title: Status Update – January 29, 2018
item.description: Got to daycare a minute early, first time in long time! Cold temps! Kids seem healthy again, Lesa good, I’m almost. Kids rowdy, loud all night, were farting on each other! Took Dillan to Scout pack meeting, bought two $5 pack t-shirts. Boys in bed when I got home, tucked them in.

item.title: Status Update – January 28, 2018
item.description: Skipped church, I felt sick, Lesa tired from foster training, Bruce vomited last night. Lesa, kids got haircuts at Great Clips. Stopped and let kids play on school playground. Kids acted crazy all day! Ashley back-talking Lesa, boys being mean to each other, Lesa took away LEGOs.

item.title: Status Update – January 27, 2018
item.description: Up early, foster training in Bloomfield, kids went to Linton to see Ferdinand, watched it over Christmas Break but still enjoyed it. Got home, I crashed, felt sick all afternoon/evening. Tacos, couldn’t finish mine. Baths. Kids watched Little House on the Prairie rest of evening.

item.title: Status Update – January 26, 2018
item.description: Friday! Bruce begged me not to leave him at daycare, then buried his head and cried, so hard to go to work! Stressful workday, basically my boss getting transferred, I’m taking over his and part of another manager’s duties, holy crap! Dillan rode dirt bike, we shot BB gun! Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – January 25, 2018
item.description: Bruce running fever, Lesa stayed home with him, took him to doctor. I had a rough day at work, getting tired of not knowing about tomorrow, I can’t plan and it sucks. Got kids, they helped pump gas and wash windows and lights, Dollar General, then home. Lesa said Bruce missed me.

item.title: Status Update – January 24, 2018
item.description: Bruce, Dwyane vomited middle of night. NLCS 2-hr delay. I called into work. Let kids sleep as long as possible. Took Dillan, Ashley to school. Stayed with Dwyane and Bruce, played games, watched Trolls, took naps, tried to get well. Took Dillan to Ross Johnson’s to cut derby car.

item.title: Status Update – January 23, 2018
item.description: Nicolle baby boy Jan. 22? Bruce sick, threw up in truck going to daycare. Changed clothes, late to everything. Fidelity workshop at work, stayed to discuss saving for kids. Lesa took Ashley to Scouts, scheduled cookie sale booths. Bruce and Dwyane can’t sleep, coughing, vomiting.

item.title: Status Update – January 22, 2018
item.description: Dillan couldn’t find shoes so we ran late this AM. Long workday. Took Dwyane to doctor, ear infection, cough, antibiotic. Lesa picked up other kids. Dillan had trouble with math homework, late to Scouts, rule is homework first. Lesa and I played Old Maid with big kids before bed.

item.title: Status Update – January 21, 2018
item.description: Church, security, Jim and Ella Carter huge donation of boy clothing! Kids wanted to go out, sloppy and slick, kept them in, bored. Lesa got chicken feed, pine shavings at Rural King. Dwyane vomited overnight, rash on chest/back this evening, complained of sore stomach, worrisome!

item.title: Status Update – January 20, 2018
item.description: Ashley left at 8:00 for Indy with Girl Scouts to see Disney on Ice, got home at 4:30, she had a magical time! Dillan helped me haul trash! Lesa and boys played outside for a couple of hours, sledded, tried to build a snowman; I napped! Spent afternoon and evening watching movies.

item.title: Status Update – January 19, 2018
item.description: Friday! Made it through work week, still employed, amazed! Bruce repeatedly in trouble at daycare, he’s bored. Washed truck. Temps hit 50s, snow melting and really slick, perfect for sledding really fast which is exactly what us boys did. Pizza! Watched Flintstones until bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – January 18, 2018
item.description: School finally started again, 2-hr delay, that’s okay. Heat wave, reached 30°F! Todd had job interview, told me about upcoming changes, will be tricky navigating job, I’m in good position if job goes away. Kids played outside after doing homework; sledding mostly. Back to normal!

item.title: Status Update – January 17, 2018
item.description: Tooth fairy came for Dillan. No school again! We worked, kids at daycare. Kids were so bored: watched movies and played Wii, games, toys – boring! At home acted like crazy kids, full of energy. Dwyane still coughing. Put kids to bed early. I spent night doing Pablo diary entries.

item.title: Status Update – January 16, 2018
item.description: Stayed home, no school, daycare open but kept kids home. Too cold to go out, -0°F temps. Lesa tried to keep kids busy with games, activities, tents, etc. Ashley and I went to Bedford: Walgreens for Dwyane’s class prints, Father-Daughter tickets, Starbucks hot chocolate. Lazy day.

item.title: Status Update – January 15, 2018
item.description: Lesa, kids off for MLK Jr. Day. Dropped kids at daycare. Snowed all day, we have 9″ total. Daycare texted, closing early, Lesa got kids. School called, closed tomorrow. I worked full day. FedEx couldn’t get up hill, dropped package at Springville store, I picked up. Kids sledded.

item.title: Status Update – January 14, 2018
item.description: Church, Jr. Church, -8°F going, 20°F returning. Kids sledded on our hill and drive, I went out and pushed them for added speed. Hot chocolate! All kids played Super Mario on Wii, meltdowns when time to quit. Kids took new supper dish in stride! Ratatouille movie. Another fun day!

item.title: Status Update – January 13, 2018
item.description: Kids woke us up by running and yelling, they wanted to go outside all morning, too cold! After lunch we took them sledding on daycare’s hill, kids had great time, we had fun too but both of us sore. Kids played Dance Party, Super Mario on Wii. Baths. Kids will sleep good tonight!

item.title: Status Update – January 12, 2018
item.description: School closed, daycare delayed, ¼” ice, snowed a lot! Dropped kids, drove Lesa, in ½-hr late. Left at 2:30 still employed. Kids played in snow at daycare. Got Lesa, Kroger, got kids. At home dressed kids warm, let them go sledding. Hot chocolate and marshmallows! Movie and pizza!

item.title: Status Update – January 11, 2018
item.description: Better workday. Raining, 50’s, ice storm/snow forecast tonight/tomorrow. School closed already, daycare delayed, kids excited, hoping for snow to go sledding. Dillan and Ashley both met AR Reading goals, awarded with AR party, ice cream sundaes, prizes. Dwyane brought home Pablo.

item.title: Status Update – January 10, 2018
item.description: Couldn’t get motivated at work, prepped to be riffed: backed up everything, dumped personal stuff from PC, brought stuff home from desk. Warm day, rain ruined it. Email asking us to do adoption testimony video. Mr. Hudson’s 40th, school dressed in black. Lesa and I sick like flu.

item.title: Status Update – January 9, 2018
item.description: Foggy icy morning. Todd’s job going to corporate, doesn’t know about mine, guessing I’ll be unemployed by February 1 or sooner, trying not to worry but don’t want to job hunt at 56! Bruce did better. Ashley cookie sales Scout meeting with Lesa, those two still fighting. Homework.

item.title: Status Update – January 8, 2018
item.description: Icy roads, 2-hr delay. Halfway to Bloomington, Dillan called, forgot backpack, went back, on table at daycare! Bruce hit Courtney, moved to another room. Dillan Scouts: derby car kit, last popcorn reward – a Tumblebee. Lesa and kids fighting, sat them down, made them talk it out.

item.title: Status Update – January 7, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday. Much warmer day, kids played outside for awhile. Ashley and Lesa made 3 tubes of her lip balm, she’s really happy. Dillan and I shot his BB gun, he let Dwyane and Ashley take a few shots too. Kids had a lot of energy to burn. Tablets. Laid back evening watching TV.

item.title: Status Update – January 6, 2018
item.description: Slept in until 10, thank you Lesa! Kids super pump up all day long. We tried calming them down by playing games with them: Perfection, Operation, Ker‑Plunk. I spent 3 hours helping Dillan put together his LEGO City Police Station, now the other kids want one. Tacos! Tarzan movie.

item.title: Status Update – January 5, 2018
item.description: Friday! Repeat of Tues thru Thurs. Off at 1:30. Took Dwyane’s class camera to Walgreens to get developed. Picked up kids, they missed snacks, threw fits. I cooked pizza while Lesa went grocery shopping. Lesa took Ashley to Girl Scout cookie kickoff event in Avoca. Popcorn and TV.

item.title: Status Update – January 4, 2018
item.description: School on 2-hr delay all week, exact same start as yesterday. Another long workday! Picked up kids late, supper ready when we got home. Dillan’s homework was perimeters/simple algebra/solve for missing side. Lesa, myself ready to collapse. Kids watched Adventures of Donkey Ollie.

item.title: Status Update – January 3, 2018
item.description: Dropped kids at daycare 15 minutes late, school delay. Hectic workday, sprinkler head blew off downstairs, created huge mess! Lots of people with busted/frozen pipes, ours good. Snow, filled tank, Dollar General with kids for candy. I crashed on couch, kids watched Pokémon movie.

item.title: Status Update – January 2, 2018
item.description: Smooth transition back to reality. Daycare attendance light. Water frozen at work, worked hour over. Dillan wouldn’t listen at daycare, Bruce antagonized 4th grader, Ashley and Dwyane were helpers. School on 2-hour delay tomorrow due to extreme temps. Kids are still rambunctious!

item.title: Status Update – December 31, 2017
item.description: Church, emergency board meeting, furnace out. Thank God our furnace is okay, we stayed inside, it’s cold out! Kids played with toys/games. Lesa and I took down lights, decorations, tree. Kids asked to stay up late, we didn’t let them, Lesa and I rang in 2018, Happy New Year kids!

item.title: Status Update – December 30, 2017
item.description: Lazy morning. Left for Indy at 11:00, enjoyed going to mom and dads for Williams Christmas, kids had good time playing with other cousins, Ashley enjoyed Maelee, more gifts, the kids enjoyed. Bonnie and Avery’s afterward, picked up Dillan’s belated gift and photo album. Good day!

item.title: Status Update – December 29, 2017
item.description: Lesa took Ashley to Build-a-Bear, used gift card Sonja Stotler from work gave me, built Twinkle a baby reindeer. I took kids to license branch to renew truck, trailer plates; Lesa went grocery shopping. We shot Dillan’s BB gun. Pizza Hut, used Ashley and Dwyane’s reading rewards.

item.title: Status Update – December 28, 2017
item.description: Ashley made me eggs and toast all by herself! Lunch at Fazoli’s, used gift card. Frank Southern ice skating: Bruce needed help, Dwyane skated by himself after a little help, Dillan and Ashley no problems. Stopped at work to say hi. Kids played outside some. Watched Smurf’s movie.

item.title: Status Update – December 27, 2017
item.description: Kids up early, woke us too. Dillan, Dwyane, myself sick. Doctor’s office, picked up kids’ medical forms for foster renewal license. Watched Ferdinand movie in Bedford. Walmart, let kids buy toys, used Darrell’s gift cards. Late, so Asian Pearl dinner. Long, tiring, expensive day!

item.title: Status Update – December 26, 2017
item.description: Kids up early. Stayed home in our pajamas all day! Kids played with toys and Wii, Lesa and I facilitated. Dillan’s cough not any better, I’m getting sick now. Still have snow on ground, Dillan and Bruce went out for short while. Kids mean to each other. Indian cuisine for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – December 25, 2017
item.description: Christmas! Heard feet scurrying at 7a so we got up. Kids got everything asked for, and then some. Forgot stockings! Went to Grandpa Avery’s/Grandma Bonnie’s house, kids played with cousins, had great time, kids felt like part of family. Got home, Santa’s elf had filled stockings!

item.title: Status Update – December 24, 2017
item.description: Church Christmas program, kids did awesome! Memory Tree Committee gave us $250 check, Ella Carter gave boys clothes, IDO Food Delivery, blessings! Demolished venison stew dinner! Went to our old church Hillcrest CC for candlelight service, very nice. Opened gifts, shrieks of joy!

item.title: Status Update – December 23, 2017
item.description: Slept in. Lazy day all day. Light snow shower made kids want to go out, it stopped, melted by noon, they played indoors and drove us nuts instead. Tried keeping them occupied: Jenga, Play-Doh, Smurf movie, etc. Naps. Baths; into bed early! They are really excited about Christmas!

item.title: Status Update – December 22, 2017
item.description: Friday! Overslept ’til 6:34a, just 10 minutes late! Off at 12:30p, return Jan 2! Dollar General, bought lots of batteries. Anonymous person at daycare gave us new boy’s bicycle! Cleaned/vacuumed house. Raining, kids stuck inside. Paul and Andrea came over for pizza, gifts, movie.

item.title: Status Update – December 21, 2017
item.description: Long day, tired, Christmas pitch-in at work, good food. Bruce had Christmas party at daycare, he had fun! Nicolle’s photos delivered. School kids last day, officially on Christmas Break. Got all of Lesa’s gifts! Lesa PTO, wrapped gifts, tree is awesome! Warm, kids played outside.

item.title: Status Update – December 20, 2017
item.description: Finally a slow paced day! School kids had class Christmas parties, came home excited. Bruce had good day. Daycare charging $300 for next week, they’re closed, what a racket! Mailed Nicolle’s PAVA photographs, cost $23 and some change. One of Lesa’s gifts arrived, another delayed.

item.title: Status Update – December 19, 2017
item.description: Decent morning, long day, but it’s all good. Ordered PAVA pictures from CVS and picked up. Ordered Lesa’s Christmas gifts. Picked up kids. Ate supper. Hurried to get Dillan, Ashley, and Dwyane to Springville Elementary Christmas Program, they did awesome, great fun watching them!

item.title: Status Update – December 18, 2017
item.description: Overslept, on time, kids did good! Shelf elf has all but Dillan captivated, Bruce immediately started looking when he woke. Kids well behaved, a welcome relief! Took Dillan to Scouts, pizza party, got his Fellowship and God belt loop, acknowledged for selling $1K, got his BB gun!

item.title: Status Update – December 17, 2017
item.description: Skipped church, went to Franklin for Ross Family Christmas Get-Together. Kids had good time, rambunctious, hard to handle, no controlling them. Great meal, gifts on Christmas Day. Wet roads, car in front of us lost control, flipped. I helped a mother and child get out, both okay.

item.title: Status Update – December 16, 2017
item.description: Bruce a pill. Dillan and I went to Star Wars: The Last Jedi premier in Bloomington, spoils for selling $1K of popcorn. Lesa dropped boys at Fries; watching The Flight Before Christmas, snacking on popcorn when I got them. Lesa took Ashley to GS Polar Express PJ Party. A good day.

item.title: Status Update – December 15, 2017
item.description: Better morning. Left at 1:30, picked up Dillan’s Cub Scout vest, bought gift too. Stopped at doctor’s for completed fostering medical forms. Game Stop, got two Wii games for gifts. Forrest babysat, dinner out with Lesa! Kids ate pizza, watched Toy Story, had popcorn and lemonade.

item.title: Status Update – December 14, 2017
item.description: Up on time, didn’t leave until 7:00, Dillan and Bruce wrestled naked, Bruce lost his shoes, all kids played around. Forgot to move Candy Cane, our shelf elf! Dillan bought Ashley and Dwyane Candy-grams from school with his à la carte money, very nice of him! Kids crazy all night.

item.title: Status Update – December 13, 2017
item.description: Long day! All of us on normal schedule/routine. Kids took long time to find shelf elf. Kids so excited for Christmas – even Dillan. No plans for evening. Picked up kids, watched them go crazy insane as soon as they got in the door. Dillan and Ashley did homework, boys took baths.

item.title: Status Update – December 12, 2017
