item.description: Lesa woke with me, joined Dwyane at school, they made a gingerbread house. Afterward Lesa took him to daycare, went to work. Ashley Hornet’s Nest cheer, last game of season. Lesa took her to Girl Scout Christmas Party, she likes latch hook kit gift. I watched boys. Lesa was busy!

item.title: Status Update – December 11, 2017
item.description: Hate my job, it’s so insecure! Cut off à la carte for school kids, Dillan was buying entire breakfasts just to get orange juice, school tipped us off, Lesa bought him orange juice for home. Ashley awarded Student of the Week for great work in the classroom. Took Dillan to Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – December 10, 2017
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home. Lazy afternoon, catnapped on couch, Ashley fell asleep in my arms. Lesa took Ashley, Miley, Presley to Girl Scout Add-A-Girl at Bedford Celebrations, they’re not joining, had fun anyway. Us boys watched Monster Jam, Motocross on TV. Venison roast dinner.

item.title: Status Update – December 9, 2017
item.description: I slept until 10a! Kids played outside, snowed, no accumulation. Dollar General for $5 school gift exchange gifts, Scout treat bags. Shopped for coat for Lesa at Kohl’s. Drove to Martinsville. Dinner at Los Tres Caminos. Bethlehem Walk, Dillan bored, rest liked it, something new.

item.title: Status Update – December 8, 2017
item.description: Friday! Dropped Dillan, Ashley at school. Took Dwyane, Bruce to dentist; need to brush better in back, no cavities, all good. Took Dwyane to school, Bruce to daycare, work until 3:30p. Ashley got hurt on bike so played cards with her. Miley, Presley visited. Pizza. Rudolph on TV.

item.title: Status Update – December 7, 2017
item.description: Dramatically colder today. Got everywhere on time, worked hour over. Filled tank. Bruce behaving well. Mrs. Dillman messaged Dwyane a little “overbearing” in class. Kids are still pumped up because, well, because it’s December I suppose. Arraigned Williams Christmas for the 30th.

item.title: Status Update – December 6, 2017
item.description: Lesa stayed home, picked up meat/cheese trays, made soup. Took kids to daycare per usual. Active shooter training, got off at 4, picked up kids and Lesa, went to church. My class hosted Wed. night meal, good turnout, success! Kids did tremendous job helping! So proud of our kids!

item.title: Status Update – December 5, 2017
item.description: Kids out of control! Won’t listen to us! Other than that they’re adorable. Bruce good. Dwyane likes Little Madison, kissed her on school van, saved her from a bug, extra kissed her at daycare. Dillan blushing over mere mention of Jordyn, a girl he likes at daycare. Ashley Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – December 4, 2017
item.description: Morning okay, workday okay, it’s Monday, what can I say? Bruce good again! Dwyane went to post office with class, mailed letter to Santa. Kids pretty pumped up, no specific reason other than Christmas. Dillan had Scouts, left at 7:00, brought him back home, went to Board Meeting.

item.title: Status Update – December 3, 2017
item.description: This has been one of the best weekends in my opinion, Lesa seems a little stressed though. Started with Family Church, then Deacon meeting. Fayetteville to cut a live Christmas tree. Kids played outside. I put lights on tree and deck/house. Lesa cooked venison steaks, kids liked!

item.title: Status Update – December 2, 2017
item.description: Solsberry Santa Train, perfect weather, Dillan not believing but not taking chance either, watched train cross The Tulip Trestle, kids loved it! Kids played outside. Ashley and Dillan both in Bedford Christmas Parade with Scouts, boys watched, all had a good time. Great memories!

item.title: Status Update – December 1, 2017
item.description: Good day. Bruce went entire week without issue, daycare noticed and mentioned it to me. Nice day, but kids didn’t want to go out for very long. Pizza! Watched It’s A Wonderful Life with kids, talked about the lessons taught. Got an email from Nicolle with name and address change.

item.title: Status Update – November 30, 2017
item.description: Work late, left late, work late, late. Picked up boys, Ashley Hornet’s Nest cheer team. Played cars with Bruce. Dillan issues with math homework. Boys wanted to go to game, told them no hot dogs, went alone. Came home with Ashley at halftime, Visitors 28, Home 0. Ashley homework.

item.title: Status Update – November 29, 2017
item.description: Decent workday even though problems, worked hour over. Bruce good day. Guessing Lesa’s Jeep is okay, she didn’t say anything. Dwyane twisted Switzie’s ears, she yelped. Dillan not wanting to do math homework, cried because he had to do it. Ashley read her book, did spelling list.

item.title: Status Update – November 20, 2017
item.description: Bruce called teacher dumb ass bitch, called other kids stupid. Threatened to wash his mouth with soap, but didn’t. Hands, arms sore from dragging buck. Dwyane ear infection, affecting equilibrium, Lesa took to doctor. Ashley helped me make supper. At Scouts Dillan made tool tote.

item.title: Status Update – November 16, 2017
item.description: Overslept again, sleep deprived! Got kids to school on time. Work dragged. Bruce hit teacher when asked to clean up, was disruptive, wouldn’t listen. Ashley went with Lesa to pick up Scout candies she sold, got her stuffed bunny prize. Homework, Dillan did dishes for Lesa. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – November 15, 2017
item.description: Normal morning/day/afternoon, nothing unusual. Left work early, got gas, picked up kids, Bruce good. Thanksgiving dinner at church, Lesa made two giant bowls of mashed potatoes, so much food it didn’t even get touched, everyone stuffed! Ashley trying 1st night without nightlight.

item.title: Status Update – November 14, 2017
item.description: Overslept until 6:20a, yikes! Still managed to get kids ready—not sure how. Workday dragged, worked hour over. Stopped by store on way home. Bruce behaved today, praise God! Dwyane took field trip to WonderLab in Bloomington, then went to Karst Farm Park. Read, big kid baths, TV.

item.title: Status Update – November 13, 2017
item.description: Everyone healthy, except me? Lesa went to kid’s Veteran’s Day program at school, nice program, then to work. Bruce cut little girl’s finger with scissors at daycare this morning, we’re both upset, appalled at him! Took Dillan to Scouts, got our popcorn orders filled, put up tent.

item.title: Status Update – November 12, 2017
item.description: Church, serving deacon, took Gladys communion. Taco Bell lunch, been long time, tasty. Served Ralph and Steve; done. Great Clips in Whitehall bumped us, got mad, left, S. Walnut instead, boys got cuts, look good, always do. IDO food pantry. Evening service with Dillan and Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – November 11, 2017
item.description: Dillan and Ashley helped cleanup tornado damage with other Scouts, they worked hard, I’m super proud of job they did! I worked hard too, napped after lunch. Paul and Andrea’s house for wiener roast, Johnson’s there, Dwyane rode bike without training wheels, pit fire, Smurf movie.

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2017
item.description: Everyone went to work/school, first time this week? Lesa sickish, wish sickness was over. Dillan and Ashley over 100% (extra credit) on spelling tests! Lesa’s Jeep acting up, need to get it in for repair. Ate pizza, watched Independence Day movie with kids. Sent all to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – November 9, 2017
item.description: Dillan stayed home with Lesa, they went shopping, he felt better after Ibuprofen. CVS, got kids near closing time. Bruce good. Gas then home. Dillan’s teacher sent homework with Ashley. Spent evening doing math with him. Opossum tried to get in coop, had to kill it. Early to bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 8, 2017
item.description: Wish I could’ve slept in! On time, no issues, work even went okay, have bad feeling about budget cuts. Picked up kids, Bruce did better than yesterday at daycare, Dillan sick now! Other kids getting even, bothering him like he did them, he slept most of the evening. TV and baths.

item.title: Status Update – November 7, 2017
item.description: Got kids to daycare, we saw lots of trees down, flipped trailer, demolished garage. Picked up kids, took Ashley to Needmore Elementary School for Scouts, she had snacks, met Lesa there. Returned library books. Big kid baths. Read lots of books, trying to get our free pizzas. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – November 6, 2017
item.description: Stayed home. Watched Ashley, sick; Bruce, daycare closed, no electricity. Took Dillan and Dwyane to school. Lesa worked. Ashley seemed better, fever kept returning, hoping better by morning. Basketball game, Hornets Nest cheering, Scouts cancelled; Red Cross using school and gym.

item.title: Status Update – November 5, 2017
item.description: DST fall back. Family Sunday church, first time for Dwyane, he did good. Ashley sick now, Bruce better, serving deacon but found sub, came straight home, 102.8° fever, a little scary. Stormed all day/night, tornado touchdown in Springville, daycare closed, school is command post.

item.title: Status Update – November 4, 2017
item.description: Up early, Bruce sick, stayed in bed. I took Dillan and Ashley to Hope Harvest, helped pack 50k meals for Haiti children, they did awesome, four hours work, I’m proud of them! Took them to Steak ‘n’ Shake. Dillan rode dirt bike couple of hours. Stormed, electricity went out twice.

item.title: Status Update – November 3, 2017
item.description: Friday! Worked full day. Miley and Presley came over, played with Ashley, she wasn’t a good friend. Dillan rode dirt bike in woods for first time. Pizza! Lesa took Ashley to Girl Scout Founder’s birthday party. Watched 101 Dalmatians and Trolls movies. Bruce sick running a fever.

item.title: Status Update – November 2, 2017
item.description: More rain still cold. Took Dwyane’s car to school after dropping kids off, made me late to work, Dwyane took second place, picked up kids and car, kids like crazy people fighting over cardboard car. Lesa and I not feeling the best, hope we don’t get what Dwyane had! Early to bed!

item.title: Status Update – November 1, 2017
item.description: Dwyane was sick, had fever, stayed home with Lesa, seems to be doing better. Rainy cold day. Bruce starting to act up at daycare again. Dillan lost his new winter coat. Made Dwyane’s car for school, he decorated. Daniel Moffett arrested in Daviess County, two counts dealing meth.

item.title: Status Update – October 31, 2017
item.description: Didn’t leave until 7:00 am! Work busy, sucked. Cold and rainy. Dwyane sick, running mild fever, crashed when we got home. Pizza! Took remaining three to Cornerstone Church, played games, hot chocolate, nachos, hay ride, candy! Dwyane woke up feeling better. Put kids to bed early!

item.title: Status Update – October 30, 2017
item.description: Cold, near freezing! On time! Courtney said Bruce like different kid after Fall Break, behaving, being nice, helping, some issues but not bad, yes! Took Dillan to Pack Meeting, squirrel per usual, filled in for Scout leader, Bears in charge of snacks, Bear Essentials award. Read.

item.title: Status Update – October 29, 2017
item.description: Church with kids, Lesa stayed home. Bruce won red 20″ bicycle from Trunk or Treat raffle, he loves it! Dillan rode dirt bike all afternoon. James Skomp visited, had motorcycle stickers for Dillan, he put on toolbox. Kids rode bikes, played at neighbors, got home late, in trouble.

item.title: Status Update – October 28, 2017
item.description: Bloomfield, foster training 9-3, kids enjoyed, watched movies, played. Dillan rode dirt bike. Ate, Halloween costumes, headed to Eastern Greene Elementary for church Trunk or Treat. Deer everywhere, almost hit one. Springville Park for Scout Trunk or Treat. Kids got ton of candy!

item.title: Status Update – October 27, 2017
item.description: Friday! Late again! I think kids believe they’re still on break. Dwyane had Fall Harvest party at school. Got colder as day went on. Bruce said ‘F’ word couple of times, had trouble listening at daycare. We watched Hocus Pocus and Men in Black movies as we ate pizza on TV tables.

item.title: Status Update – October 26, 2017
item.description: Okay morning, not great. Frost, cold, ended up nice day. Work productive, Innovation meeting. Bruce licked Forest, freaked her out, taught new kids about middle finger with Ethan. I carved all the kids’ pumpkins: Dillan vampire, Ashley witch, Dwyane ghost, Bruce Jack Skellington.

item.title: Status Update – October 25, 2017
item.description: Tired! Dwyane had issues getting dressed, didn’t like his underwear and pants, didn’t get dressed until 6:55a making us late. Dillan wanted to ride dirt bike which is great! Gutted pumpkins but didn’t carve, saving that for tomorrow, kids trashed deck, seeds everywhere. Homework.

item.title: Status Update – October 24, 2017
item.description: Another rainy day. Everyone tired! Work semi-productive, hard time staying focused. Picked up boys only. Ashley stayed at school for Hornets’ Nest and basketball game. Lesa watched Dwyane and Bruce while I took Dillan to watch game and to get Ashley. Late supper, homework, baths.

item.title: Status Update – October 23, 2017
item.description: Fall Break over, back to work, school, daycare; kids not very happy; rough morning getting ready. Rained all day. Ashley accepted into Hornets’ Nest, a cheer group, starts tomorrow. Homework. Took Dillan to Scouts, popcorn sales over; Dillan gets Star Wars tickets, BB gun, prize.

item.title: Status Update – October 22, 2017
item.description: Church, Jr. Church, Lesa stayed home. Befriended Carter Davis, he’s sad, his dad is in jail. Took him, Dillan, Ashley to Bellman’s to ride dirt bikes. Dillan rode a lot! Dillan and Ashley rode an ATV also. I wrecked Joe’s ATV! Carter/kids caught frogs, took him home after dinner.

item.title: Status Update – October 21, 2017
item.description: Left for S.T.E.M. Science Festival at IU, turned around after Ashley told me to shut up, left again 1½ hours later after apology, volcano experiment turned into explosion instead, caught on video. Lunch at Penn Station. Ashley participated in Oolitic Halloween Parade with Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – October 20, 2017
item.description: I got kids up, took Dillan and Ashley to dentist, no cavities, need to brush better, Ashley deformation from Nicolle’s meth use. Went to Fowler’s pumpkin patch, hay ride, corn maze, pumpkins, kids were very excited, had lots of fun. Hash Farms excavated, repaired our broken pipe.

item.title: Status Update – October 19, 2017
item.description: Unable to sleep in, kids of course. Took Dillan, got tires for Lesa’s Jeep. Park for Scouts, painted #812 Bedrocks. Lesa took others to school playground, ended up at park. Girls went grocery shopping. Me and Dillan crawled under house, water line leaking. Easy afternoon/evening.

item.title: Status Update – October 18, 2017
item.description: Continental breakfast; checkout. Newport Aquarium! I had a blast, pretty sure kids had fun too. Returned to park on levee, burned off kid energy. Walked across Purple People Bridge. Kids stood in Ohio and Kentucky, at the same time! Headed home, Bob Evans on way. Good to be home!

item.title: Status Update – October 17, 2017
item.description: Woke early, loaded, left for Newport, KY. Frisch’s Big Boy. BB Riverboats historic Cincinnati paddle wheel boat ride; arrived early, walked along levee and park; paddle wheel didn’t work, diesel engine, still fun. Hampton Inn. Strong’s Brick Oven Pizzeria. Swimming pool. Popcorn.

item.title: Status Update – October 16, 2017
item.description: Bruce and I got tires for Suburban, loved time together! Bedford Library, kids got some books. I took Dillan to eye appointment, slight turn in right eye, not to worry! Lesa took other kids for walk in woods, got mail. Leaf piles and bikes. Buffalo Wild Wings’ foster night. Busy!

item.title: Status Update – October 15, 2017
item.description: Church, Security Deacon, all went well. Kids got more and more worked up as day went on. Much talk about going to Ohio and Kentucky, they can’t wait! Tried my hand at making homemade ice cream, we’ll eat tomorrow, looks good, hopefully tasty! Ashley helped me lock church tonight.

item.title: Status Update – October 14, 2017
item.description: Up early, headed to Indy, met my niece Jordan at Southeastway Park for photo shoot for PAVA, hopefully pics turn out well. Picnic lunch, played on playground before leaving. Heavy traffic due to IU Homecoming game. Kids rode bikes, played outside with neighbor kids all afternoon.

item.title: Status Update – October 13, 2017
item.description: Had a slow, halfway productive, day. Start of Fall break for us of all, can tell by excitement level of kids. Bruce good all day! Pizza! Dennis and Tricia Hillenburg visited, didn’t do much other than talk, had a good time, kids did great, were friendly, didn’t show off too much.

item.title: Status Update – October 12, 2017
item.description: Long day! Bruce taught kids to hold up middle finger, then got them in trouble, took teacher three kids before she caught on. Kids super hyper, nearly out of control. Lesa settled Ashley’s Girl Scout chocolate sales. Dillan and I had talk about me being his dad. Baths all around.

item.title: Status Update – October 11, 2017
item.description: Spent bulk of workday building Linux development environment. Bruce acted decent but had trouble listening, I’ll take it! Ashley field trip to Spring Mill. Kids worked up, guessing Fall Break anxiety. Drove by several houses for sale, we going to add on 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.

item.title: Status Update – October 10, 2017
item.description: Spencer for Strategic Planning, interesting, afraid big changes coming. Haven’t heard back about Senior Network Systems Engineer position at IU. Home by 6p, better than expected. Ashley knocked Bruce into table, goose egg on back of head. Lesa did good with kids while I was gone.

item.title: Status Update – October 9, 2017
item.description: Made newbie-type mistake at work. Off early for parent-teacher conferences, Dwyane doing great, Dillan struggling but hopeful, Ashley on honor role but trouble with talking/sitting. Bruce called teachers stupid, no cussing/hitting. Cub Scouts. Lesa seems stressed and at wits end.

item.title: Status Update – October 8, 2017
item.description: Church, Dwyane moved to big room, Bruce did good by himself. Light rain, warm, we let kids play outside. Quiet time/naps, didn’t nap like hoped. Kids played on slick deck, sliding with/without bikes. Bruce fell, whacked head, caught it on video. Ice, he’s okay. TV, read, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – October 7, 2017
item.description: Slept until 8:00a! Left at 10:30a, sold popcorn at IGA again, goal was $250, sold $374, Dillan earned his Daisy BB gun! Orange Leaf afterward. Lesa kept other kids busy, walked in woods, walked to get mail (Bruce peed pants), other supervised activities. Kids worn out by bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – October 6, 2017
item.description: Off at 3p. Bruce mostly good, called teacher a dummy, an improvement. Kids rode bikes, built tent in living room. Dwyane wrecked, messed up his hand, looked nasty, put ice on for swelling. Skipped plans for tractors in Springville, ate pizza on TV trays and watched Moana instead.

item.title: Status Update – October 5, 2017
item.description: On time, slow day, Internet down, made for rough workday. Bruce had another good day. Kids anxious for weekend as are we. Dwyane painted me a belated birthday present – just because. Homework. Watched Lion King movie, fun watching kids’ expressions. Got everyone into bed on time.

item.title: Status Update – October 4, 2017
item.description: Kids woke when they heard me in kitchen. Early, probably first time this year! Slow workday, burned out. For most part Bruce had good day; ran, hid from teacher. We stayed home. Kids played with birthday balloons from yesterday, rode bikes. Kids were very tired, early to bed too!

item.title: Status Update – October 3, 2017
item.description: Decent morning. Work was slow, dragged by. My 56th birthday, I’m old! Bruce actually hit his teacher, I had to whop his butt. I took Ashley to Girl Scouts, Lesa was going to bake cookies but stove quit working, it had come unplugged. Kids gave me lots of gifts, I’m truly blessed!

item.title: Status Update – October 2, 2017
item.description: Latest morning yet, all three school kids packed lunch, wrote each a note. Bruce called Courtney a dumb ass and was disruptive. Other kids had a good day. Dillan learned to tie double half hitch knot at Scouts. Bruce was pill for Lesa, she’s exhausted: wait until Daddy gets home!

item.title: Status Update – October 1, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday, served in back then joined family. Dillan sold $245 in popcorn at IGA. Went to Orange Leaf and Lowe’s afterward, bought him Monster Truck wood working project he put together after supper. Replaced toilet seat in kids bathroom. Fixed cabinet drawer. Lesa wiped out.

item.title: Status Update – September 30, 2017
item.description: Tooth Fairy visited Dillan. Bruce woke me at 3 am, he wet his bed. Lazy wake up then busy. Hauled trash with Ashley and Bruce. Took hike on Lenard Springs Trail in Bloomington, couple of closed caves, hilly terrain, we’re sore already. Rural King for feed, Asian Pearl for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – September 29, 2017
item.description: TGIF! Off at 2, paid some bills, picked up kids. Bruce threw lunch tray against wall, made to clean it up, wish I knew what’s up with him! Ashley nose bleed on way home. Dillan rode bike, rest watched TV. Lesa had flat, got home late. Springville pizzas. Captain Underpants movie.

item.title: Status Update – September 28, 2017
item.description: On time today. Worked an hour over. Bruce cussed one time, did well remainder of day. Ashley selling chocolates for Scouts, sold some at daycare. Kids played outside, Bruce fell, hit nose on deck steps, wasn’t too bad. Some homework, mostly Dillan. Dwyane thinks school’s awesome.

item.title: Status Update – September 27, 2017
item.description: Almost late to daycare, got Dwyane’s backpack, filled out teacher Conference form, late to work. Long day/week. Bruce hit, threw chair at kid, cussed at teacher – he’s only four, in trouble with Lesa and me! Lots of homework for all but Ashley. Kids tired, sent them to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – September 26, 2017
item.description: Getting kids ready on time was tricky, Dillan missed breakfast. Another slow workday. Bruce in trouble at daycare, had to happen sooner or later. Dwyane had meltdown, left backpack at daycare, wouldn’t go back, lesson learned. Dillan issues with math homework. Kids tired, us too.

item.title: Status Update – September 25, 2017
item.description: Lesa PTO. Got everywhere on time. Day dragged by. Bruce cussing again, ate soap again too. Took Dillan to Scout pack meeting at Springville Park, got his whittling belt loop and patch; played with boys after, looked for crawdads, then home. Kids watched TV. Bruce kept getting up!

item.title: Status Update – September 24, 2017
item.description: Church, scheduled for Jr. Church but overstaffed. Took Dillan to IGA to sell Boy Scout popcorn, sold $250, got $7 in donations, trying to reach $750 so he can get a BB gun prize. Kids spent the entire afternoon playing, mostly outside, I tried to nap on couch. Read instead of TV.

item.title: Status Update – September 23, 2017
item.description: Slept until 9. Stopped by Dollar general on way to McVey family reunion in Fortville. Got there just in time for lunch. Kids played all afternoon. On way home, stopped by my mom and dad’s, visited with mom and brother for awhile. Ate at Steak ‘n’ Shake in Bloomington on way home.

item.title: Status Update – September 22, 2017
item.description: Long day even though I left early. Bruce acted decent for 3rd day. Lesa went grocery shopping, brought home pizzas. Ate, headed to IU vs. Rutgers men’s soccer game, watched 10-15 minutes of game, then called because of nearby lightening. Everyone bummed, no choice except go home.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2017
item.description: Trying to get sick again, thought I was over it, but have a bad cough. Foggy again. Almost 10 minutes late. Bruce behaved decent for 2nd day in a row! Rushed home and started cleaning, Jenny Waggoner coming to do home inspection for foster license renewal. Yup, we’re that stupid!

item.title: Status Update – September 20, 2017
item.description: Kids got ready without much trouble. Dillan’s bed soaked in pee, made him take bedding and throw outside, washed when back home. Heavy fog! Bruce did much better at daycare, checked himself from saying f*ck, only one temper tantrum. Homework. Spent evening doing foster paperwork.

item.title: Status Update – September 19, 2017
item.description: Rained hard. On time. Kids had good day at school. Bruce in extreme trouble at daycare, worst he’s ever been, both of us came down hard on him. Hate even going into daycare! Ashley had Scouts. School age kids did homework, helped Ashley with hers, Dillan with math, Lesa did rest.

item.title: Status Update – September 18, 2017
item.description: On time everywhere. Solo at work, lots of phone calls. Bruce told me he “had issues at nap time” when I asked whether he was good or bad. At least he was being honest. Dillan had Scouts, he didn’t have his carving project done. Ashley stowed away in back of truck, made her go in.

item.title: Status Update – September 17, 2017
item.description: Serving Deacon, communion in Linton, Front Porch in Worthington packed, ate at Arby’s. I dozed off-and-on all day. Kids played. Ashley helped Lesa cook supper, serve, clean kitchen because she wanted to! Kids watched Boss Baby, had popcorn and lemonade; I went to evening service,

item.title: Status Update – September 16, 2017
item.description: Up early, took all the boys to Shoot-O-Ree at Camp Maumee – BB guns, bow & arrows, sling shots, marshmallow guns, catapults, water bottle rockets, and more; boys had a good time! Lesa hung out with Ashley all day – movie, shopping and lunch. Kids had a good day, ditto for adults.

item.title: Status Update – September 15, 2017
item.description: Friday! Half day! Taste of India lunch. Grandparents Day at school, Dillan’s class, then I did Ashley, Lesa did Dwyane. Lesa went grocery shopping. Picked up Bruce at daycare, in trouble again! Took kids home. Pizza! Dennis and Trisha’s house for bonfire, hot dogs, marshmallows.

item.title: Status Update – September 14, 2017
item.description: On time, feeling better, flew solo at work, busy day, redid Btown Box cart and website. Bought AT&T SIM and airtime after work. Spent evening dumping Straight Talk and transferring number. Kids rode bikes, only kid to answer dinner call was Bruce, others almost missed out. Baths!

item.title: Status Update – September 13, 2017
item.description: Much better on time this morning. Texts from Annetta regards Bruce’s behavior, don’t know what to do, find new daycare, Kozy Kids? Miserable at work, full blown cold. Wanted to go to Walmart, Lesa needed me home to control kids. Reading and spelling with Ashley, math with Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – September 12, 2017
item.description: Overslept, kids still dressing at 6:55 am, way late! SIM needs signature to deliver, mad, switching phone carrier. Sent reply email to Clay Cummings. Bruce better at daycare, was “good helper.” Dillan star on homework. I have cold. Kids played with our old phones, drove us crazy.

item.title: Status Update – September 11, 2017
item.description: Getting head cold. Bruce acted up / out of control, was shaking and sorry for it so I was easy on him, hugged him, told him to try and do better. Ashley got hit in eye with ball at school, so tired couldn’t tell which eye! Scouts, Dillan carved wolf in soap, got his pocket knife.

item.title: Status Update – September 10, 2017
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home, my back hurt, wasn’t sure I could drive. Lesa took Dwyane and Bruce to Celebrations for Bentley’s birthday, was Bruce’s best friend before he moved to a new school. Took Dillan and Ashley to school to ride bikes, rode at home too. Grilled out pork chops.

item.title: Status Update – September 9, 2017
item.description: Slept until 8. Lesa and Ashley went shopping for her coworker Z’s granddaughters who need warm clothing. I took boys to Walmart for SIM card, they wanted $59.99, bought online for $0.99 instead. Afterward took them hiking on Milwaukee Trail. Kids played outside a lot. Decent day.

item.title: Status Update – September 8, 2017
item.description: Friday! New iPhone, need SIM card. Fall Break PTO approved. Off early. Paid Internet. School Bash with Dwyane, Ashley and Dillan on their own, stayed entire time, Dwyane had fun. Picked up Bruce after bash, he had a so-so day. Pizza! Report cards mostly good, some bad, behaviors.

item.title: Status Update – September 7, 2017
item.description: Lesa back to work. She bought new computer, her’s broke. I finally bought a new iPhone, should arrive tomorrow, too much money! Basically blew this month’s stipend on toys, although essential toys. Bruce did good at daycare! School age kids had homework, they played outside some.

item.title: Status Update – September 5, 2017
item.description: Back to work, sore and stiff from camping. Lesa took day off. Not only on time, but early! Got call from Jessica Smith at daycare, Bruce hitting, cussing, disrupting. Called Lesa, she picked him up before they kicked him out. Ashley started Scouts at Needmore, I watched the boys.

item.title: Status Update – September 4, 2017
item.description: Kids woke me at 1:30am, went to house to potty, Bruce stayed with Lesa, rest of us went back to tent, woke up 7:30-ish, camping over. Breakfast, Lesa asleep. Broke down camp before lunch. Nap! Railroad Café in Mitchell for supper, A&W for root beer floats afterward. Showers, bed.

item.title: Status Update – September 3, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday, kids insisted on group photo for some reason. After lunch started clearing camp in our woods. I ran into nest of yellow jackets, got stung twice! Moved camp to side yard, set up tent, gathered firewood for s’mores, put out chairs, etc. After supper we went camping!

item.title: Status Update – September 1, 2017
item.description: On time! Work stressful. Hurricane Harvey effects finally reached us: cold, windy, rainy, dark. Bruce said ‘F’ word at daycare, teachers upset, we’re upset too. Pizza, TV trays, watched Spy Kids and Boss Baby, kids loved it! We could tell they’re proud we’re a family. A good day.

item.title: Status Update – August 31, 2017
item.description: Been late every day this week! Work dragged by. Dr. Thompson not able to get bio-metrics done on time, went to CVS Minute-Clinic in Ellettsville, got emailed in time. Picked up popcorn sales form from Stacie Kidd, forgot about her last night, felt bad. Spent night doing homework.

item.title: Status Update – August 30, 2017
item.description: Bruce’s face looks bad. Fasting lab work, 5 vials, got deeper into arm each vial! Shoulder not too bad from tetanus shot. Putting out fires kind of day at work. Picked kids up at 5:28pm, 2 minutes to spare! Spent most of evening on homework, Ashley did dishes. Bedtime resistance.

item.title: Status Update – August 29, 2017
item.description: Dressing leg made me late. Physical, tetanus shot (TDAP), healthy lungs/heart, perfect blood pressure. I might live to 70. Lesa picked up kids. Picked up huge bag of sweet corn from Open Arms, processed 6 gallons of corn! Homework. Bruce fell in bathroom, hit cheekbone on toilet.

item.title: Status Update – August 28, 2017
item.description: Late, leg awful, moving slow. Long day but productive. Ashley and Dwyane packed lunches, not sure why, they like it. Bruce big-time daycare trouble: spitting, name calling, throwing, told teacher she was stupid and to shut up. Missed Scouts, made Dillan do homework then practice.

item.title: Status Update – August 27, 2017
item.description: Church, Bruce kicked out of Sunday School class, acted up, joined us in sanctuary. Kids rode bikes, Dillan built LEGO cop/chase cars, I helped. Ashley played dolls in her tent, boys played in theirs. I napped; they watched Monster Jam until bored, went back outside. Lazy evening.

item.title: Status Update – August 26, 2017
item.description: Sleep in until 9am, feeling better, still have cough. Hauled trash with Dillan. Cut grass. Dillan rode dirt bike, wrecked lots. Kids rode bikes, Lesa put up tents. Logan Rogers’ 8th BD party at John Lowery Park shelter house. Baths all around. TV. Lesa found Ashley’s candy stash.

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2017
item.description: Nastiness in chest, rough cough, leg not as sore, about 50 chigger bites, miserable all day. Kids rode bikes and played with LEGOs. Pizza! Kids watched TV, had an easy evening, I tried napping, Lesa worked. Ashley sleep walked and headed toward front door but we intercepted. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – August 24, 2017
item.description: Long 9-1⁄2 hr day, I’m sick, leg is killing me! Chigger bites everywhere! All kids good at daycare and school, no kid issues, they were actually pretty good. Lesa took up the cause when we got home, I crashed all night, didn’t really interact with anyone. All four kids got baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 23, 2017
item.description: I’m sick, Lesa same: sore throat, running nose, nausea. Email from Daniel, thanked us for PAVA, asked to let kids’ grandfather David visit. Picked up kids and Lesa, walk-thru of house on S. Victor Pike, nice property, so-so house. Ate at El Ranchero. Dillan forgot homework again!

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2017
item.description: Tired, trying to catch cold, long non-productive day. Hard rain. Ashley and Dwyane fought in daycare van over snacks, Annetta had to separate, Dwyane having hard time getting along with others lately. Dillan had math homework, Ashley reading, both spelling. Owl stalking chickens.

item.title: Status Update – August 21, 2017
item.description: Burn pretty raw, seeped through bandage and jeans. It was eclipse day, kids had a ton of activities at school, got to view. Lesa able to view as was I. Pretty cool thing. Taught pocket knife handling to Bears for Dillan’s Cub Scout meeting, gave him an “official” Cub Scout knife.

item.title: Status Update – August 20, 2017
item.description: Church, Jr. Church. Walmart after lunch for knife stone/oil for Scouts tomorrow; saw life vests 1⁄2 price, bought them too. Orange Leaf, saw Scouts Colt and William. Dillan finished LEGO Batmobile. Dwyane read to me. Dillan, Ashley watched Ghost Whisper, scared! Today was better!

item.title: Status Update – August 19, 2017
item.description: Woke up early because of kids. Lesa and I fought again. Went to Fayetteville Tractor Show, Bruce acted up, I made us all leave. Naps, sort of. Kids wanted pool and bouncy house so I set it up and filled pool. Kids played inside too. I usually like being with kids but hated today.

item.title: Status Update – August 18, 2017
item.description: Off work early. Boy Scout store; bought Dillan a Bear cap, official Cub Scout pocket knife. Mailed 4th PAVA letter to Daniel in Florida, others returned because Indiana DOC constantly moved him. Pizza! Went to free swim night at John Lowery Pool in Bedford, Kids fell asleep fast!

item.title: Status Update – August 17, 2017
item.description: Work okay. After supper drove to Bloomfield with Dillan and Ashley, bought a Yamaha TTR 90 dirt bike from Joe Bellman’s brother Jeff for $600, Dillan didn’t know what to say. I rode it, burned my leg. Lesa helped Dwyane with photo project. Spelling homework for Dillan and Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – August 16, 2017
item.description: Was up late writing Open Arms story for August newsletter. Bad financial news at work. Lesa went to school, proved registration issue a problem on their end. Stopped by Dollar General with kids, they behaved! Homework: Dillan math, Ashley spelling, Dwyane read to Lesa! I’m tired.

item.title: Status Update – August 15, 2017
item.description: Dwyane school registration issues. Call from Riley, Bruce echo results normal, no worries! Robocalls from school, active lock down, kids released late. Police / school statements, parents tearing up social media. Dillan and Ashley fought at daycare, made to hangout as punishment.

item.title: Status Update – August 14, 2017
item.description: Called about Bruce’s echocardiogram, no result yet; sending paperwork for portal access by mail. Bruce moved to Blue Room, acting up. First homework of school year. Bikes. Wreck, no power, camp stove spaghetti. Dillan’s first Bear Scout meeting, Stacie Kidd Den Leader. Boxcar #3.

item.title: Status Update – August 13, 2017
item.description: Woke to slamming doors again! Church. Lesa and I fought. Arby’s lunch. School picture haircuts, kids look great. Walmart for Riley’s gift. Splash Pad and playground for Riley’s 5th birthday party. Bikes, Dillan and Ashley went to Presley’s to play on trampoline. Elderberry jelly!

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2017
item.description: Up at 6a, kids slamming doors. Day from hell. Made kids go outside, twice: fought, screamed, argued, drama! Rode bikes, jumped ramp I made Dillan, played trains and cars. Bruce accidentally squeezed frog to death. Book 1 of Dillan’s LEGO Batman car. Picked elderberries for jelly.

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2017
item.description: Friday! We took Bruce to Bloomington Hospital for ultrasound, he did great, cool seeing his heart beat, sure hope he’ll be okay! Lesa took him to daycare, she had day off, went home. I had to work. Kids excited about school! Rode bikes until dinner. Pizza! Slow laid-back evening.

item.title: Status Update – August 10, 2017
item.description: First day of school for Dwyane, Ashley, Dillan; kindergarten, 2nd, 3rd grades respectively. Lesa half-day with Dwyane, visited lunch room but ate at McDonald’s. Kids happy. I’m worried about keeping up with all the homework! Kids played, rode bikes, tablets. Read Boxcar Children.

item.title: Status Update – August 9, 2017
item.description: Last day of summer break, kids excited about school, especially Dwyane. Another long workday but went quicker than yesterday. No place to go, so nice just chilling at home. Cut grass, taught Dillan mower controls, let him drive down yard and back – blade off of course! TV, baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 8, 2017
item.description: On time, school time, even got teeth brushed! Long but productive work day. Lesa resolved issue with school registrations. Picked up kids and Lesa, went to Meet and Greet teachers, kids seem ready to start school. Asian Pearl for dinner. Rural King for feed. Pajamas, prayer, bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 7, 2017
item.description: Late everywhere this morning, having hard time getting on school schedule. Kids still tired from busy weekend. Picked up kids, went home to get Lesa, potty break, then headed to Open Arms for First Aid, CPR and AED training. Ate sandwiches on way for dinner. Ashley sleep walking.

item.title: Status Update – August 6, 2017
item.description: Family church, lead in back. Dillan homework practice, Ashley dishes, earned tablet time. Boys and I napped. Afternoon rain kept kids inside. Lesa helped Ashley organize clothes for school, boys’ clothes too. Kids cleaned their rooms, I vacuumed. Watched a little TV but not much.

item.title: Status Update – August 5, 2017
item.description: Paynetown to go boating with Casey and Tammy Blunk, shuttled to their houseboat, nice lunch, tons of snacks, swimming, giant yellow ducky, all kids liked kayaking! On way home stopped by Dennis and Trisha Hillenburg’s house, cows, chickens, setup next visit. Pizza! Baths and bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 4, 2017
item.description: Friday! Nine hour day to make up for taking Bruce to doctor yesterday. Teachers assigned: Dillan, Mrs. Scott; Ashley, Mrs. Day; Dwyane, Mrs. Dillman. Took family to Monroe County Fair for the demolition derby, ate fair food, kids liked the derby! Home late, pajamas, prayers, bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 3, 2017
item.description: Bad workday, many issues. Daycare called, Bruce’s left leg swollen/warm, had reaction to Tuesday’s inoculations, called doctor, made appointment, left work early, took Bruce to doctor, he’s okay. Dwyane field trip to see Sing at movie theater. Lesa got kids registered for school.

item.title: Status Update – August 2, 2017
item.description: Yelled at boys all morning, they kept playing with toys, wouldn’t get dressed. Dillan and Ashley last field trip of the year to Mitchell Pool. Bruce behaved. Dwyane has been mean lately, it bothers me, kindergarten starts in one week. Looked at two houses, will to call about one.

item.title: Status Update – August 1, 2017
item.description: Took Ashley, Bruce for yearly exam, Ashley good, Bruce heart murmur, not innocent, doctor went straight to ultrasound needed, another drug-related issue I’m sure, somewhat worried, don’t think it’s life threatening, he got immunizations too. We’re all so tired! Started Boxcar #3.

item.title: Status Update – July 31, 2017
item.description: Overslept! Kids didn’t want to wake up either. Forgot my coffee, late to work, day went downhill from there. Dillan and Ashley went to Mitchell Pool. Dwyane punched in eye by Grant, he’s okay. Worked over, picked kids up at closing. Kids rode bikes. Finished Boxcar Children No 2.

item.title: Status Update – July 30, 2017
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home, I took kids, had good time. Went to Penny’s, got all kids new shoes, cost nothing, used Christmas gift cards! Walmart for remaining school supplies, we’re ready! Jiffy Treat, just because! Did walk-trough on house in Bedford. Kids tired, lots of whining!

item.title: Status Update – July 29, 2017
item.description: Up early, six hours foster training on RAD, very interesting, close-to-home subject for us. Kids enjoyed their activities. Appreciate the organization, much better than a few years ago! Kids rode bikes, I put Bruce’s bike together, paint was dry, Bruce liked! Kids tired, TV, bed!

item.title: Status Update – July 28, 2017
item.description: Friday! Dillan and Ashley took field trip to Rascals Fun Zone. Lesa went grocery shopping, then picked up kids. I went to FSSA office in Bloomington after work and tried to get our Medicaid straightened out, then put birth certificates in safe deposit box. Pizza! Kids rode bikes.

item.title: Status Update – July 27, 2017
item.description: Hard going back to work, and daycare. Dwyane went to Jumpin’ Joey’s. Boys were tired, had major meltdowns over littlest things. Ashley and Dillan tired too, handled it better. Big kids rode bikes. Painted Princess bike midnight blue for Bruce. Almost done with Boxcar Children #2.

item.title: Status Update – July 26, 2017
item.description: Took PTO, went to Jackson Co. Fair with kids. Visited animal barns, Bruce timid, then fine. Pork lunch. All you can ride armbands, rode rides all afternoon. Dwyane overcame fear of Ferris Wheel. Ice cream. Looked at house on way home. Pizza. Birth certificates arrived! Read. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – July 25, 2017
item.description: Forgot Bruce’s medicine, Dwyane’s swim suit, went back home, almost 1 hour late! Dwyane went to Spring Mill. Worked over, made up time. Kids rode bikes, Ashley rode on gravel, Bruce rode too. Bruce took last of medicine. No TV! Boys to bed easy. Dillan read to Lesa, Ashley to me.

item.title: Status Update – July 24, 2017
item.description: Dillan and Ashley took field trip to Mitchell Pool, Ashley sneaked extra money, bought candy. Kids played LEGOs, even Ashley. Bruce wouldn’t go to bed, kicked Lesa in face as she tucked him in, caused a nosebleed, I whipped him, snuggled with him after. Read more Boxcar Children.

item.title: Status Update – July 23, 2017
item.description: Church, Bruce followed me into sanctuary, loves us! Verizon gave away 600 backpacks, we got 3. Bob Evans busy, ate Arby’s instead. Kids seem to be misbehaving more than ever, really trying our patience. Stayed home rest of day. Naps, played outside, TV, read Boxcar Children, bed.

item.title: Status Update – July 22, 2017
item.description: Bruce had hives, doctor, flat on Suburban drove Jeep, steroid plus Benadryl, Frosty. Fixed flat, cut grass, cleaned up garden stuff, Dillan helped! Spent time in pool, even Lesa joined in! Lesa made us an Indian dinner, hot dogs for kids. Daniel letter, living in FL. Jiffy Treat!

item.title: Status Update – July 21, 2017
item.description: TGIF! Everyone tired out! Hit 100°! No place to be! Drained, cleaned, refilled pool. Ashley, Bruce, myself swam; Dillan, Dwyane left because Bruce splashed; Dillan being baby, Dwyane stuck with his bro. Helped Lesa with groceries. Pizza! TV. Boxcar Children. Ashley sleep walking!

item.title: Status Update – July 20, 2017
item.description: Lesa took Dillan and Dwyane for wellness check, they sleep extra. I took Ashley and Bruce to daycare. Dwyane went to Spring Mill, they visited the Village. Last night of swim lessons: games, slide, diving boards, snacks. Ashley passed Level 2, boys passed Level 1. Kids are tired!

item.title: Status Update – July 19, 2017
item.description: Dillan and Ashley field trip to Mitchell Pool. Swim lessons, tomorrow’s the party, all kids passed, different skill levels naturally. Afterward, kids got to jump off diving boards: proud of all the kids! Ashley was headbutted playing Sharks & Minnows, will have shiner in morning!

item.title: Status Update – July 18, 2017
item.description: On time, truck did great. Dwyane took field trip to Lawrence Co. Fair. Went to Bedford to pay Internet bill. Lesa off work, had supper ready. I forgot to pick up her script so she went to CVS in Bloomington. I took kids to swim lessons, Dillan jumped off board but shouldn’t have!

item.title: Status Update – July 17, 2017
item.description: Dwyane and Lesa’s birthday! Dwyane 5, Lesa 55. Late to work, took new Jeep. Dillan and Ashley went to Mitchell Pool. Dwyane had birthday party at daycare, party at home too, loved his toys, had a Gecko cake, he’s into PJ Masks. Swim lessons. Rained buckets, repaired truck anyway.

item.title: Status Update – July 16, 2017
item.description: Church, Carl and Kathryn Sparks donated more clothing, gave out Thank You cards, Tony and Jenny honored to take Dillan if something happens. Subway, Walmart. Truck overheated, replaced water pump gaskets, still leaking, will try again, Dillan didn’t help. Ashley helped Lesa cook.

item.title: Status Update – July 15, 2017
item.description: We all slept past 7:30a, much needed! Easy morning. Lunch. Looked at 2 houses. AppleAcres, bought peaches, caramel apples. Lowe’s for cubicle basket. Walmart, got Dwyane a bike. Took kids to Springville Elementary lot, let them ride, they loved it. Swimming. Read another chapter.

item.title: Status Update – July 14, 2017
item.description: Late! Daycare bake sale, sold out by 4pm, kids disappointed. Thought we had swim lessons, got kids ready, waited for Lesa, she got home at 5:30pm, grocery shopping. Turns out no lessons on Friday so kids swam in our pool. Started new Boxcar Children book. We’re flat out worn out!

item.title: Status Update – July 13, 2017
item.description: Got to work on time, pattern of every other day? Dwyane had fun on Urban Air and Lower Cascades Park field trip. Afternoon rain. Swim lessons but lightening forced kids indoors, first aid training instead. Lesa and I went to Lowe’s, got cubicle for boys’ room, toilet seat for us.

item.title: Status Update – July 12, 2017
item.description: Late to work. Dillan couldn’t find any of his 4 pairs of shoes. Dillan and Ashley went to Hoosier Heights, lots of fun! Dillan afraid of heights, said a bad grip kept him from the top, said he shouldn’t have looked down; Ashley made it to the top on all three walls. Swim lessons.

item.title: Status Update – July 11, 2017
item.description: Late, little things added up, mostly tired kids! Dwyane’s Spring Mill trip rained out. IUCU accounts for kids, deposited $120 each. Plates for new Jeep, met Lesa at swim lessons after, Bruce had great time. Dillan and Dwyane followed instructions. Ashley swims better, doing well.

item.title: Status Update – July 10, 2017
item.description: Got to daycare and work on time, work looking pretty bad. We got pre-approved for $150K, house hunting will commence. Dillan and Ashley went to Mitchell Pool for field trip, Ashley sprang her ankle, swollen. Bruce good, Dwyane bad – reversal of roles! First night of swim lessons.

item.title: Status Update – July 9, 2017
item.description: Ashley went to church with me, others stayed home, Serving deacon, elder took communion. Naps – sort of. Kids swam after naps/snacks. Good hamburger supper, ate fresh squash. Back to church, Ashley went with again. Took her to Steak ‘n’ Shake for chocolate shakes. Home, then bed.

item.title: Status Update – July 8, 2017
item.description: Forgot plates for new Jeep! Hauled trash, then hauled recyclables, got some cash, bag of cans dumped on highway, kids loved that! Laid around, watched TV, napped the afternoon away. Decided to take kids to Starlite Drive-In, Despicable M3 and Spider-Man Returns, kids had a blast!

item.title: Status Update – July 7, 2017
item.description: Friday! Short week seemed long! Off early, met Lesa at Brinegar’s, helped with kids during their eye exams, everything good. We took long country way home. Cut grass, kids rode bikes. Set up new pool, filled. Kids swam. Pizza! Kids, myself swam more. Almost done with Boxcar book.

item.title: Status Update – July 6, 2017
item.description: All of us have a little or a lot of impetigo, sucks! Rained. People sick at daycare, no field trips again today, Dwyane was upset. Worked over, want to leave early tomorrow. Bruce and Dillan had rock fight, Bruce won, cracked Dillan’s eyebrow open, bled a lot. Read book then bed!

item.title: Status Update – July 5, 2017
item.description: Late to work, kids needed bathing suits for field trip so had to go back home to get them. Lesa took Dwyane to doctor for sores on his legs, he has impetigo, yikes! Worked over to make up being late this AM. Kids wound up not taking field trip. They played outside and watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 4, 2017
item.description: Linton Freedom Festival Parade, 40,000 plus people, rode/walked with Open Arms float, bubbles and candy, kids had fun! DQ lunch. Naps, half of us slept myself included. Swimming with kids in afternoon. Took Dillan bike riding on Milwaukee Trail, rode 8 miles, had father/son time.

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2017
item.description: Took Dillan to Noah Stinson’s, they put together Legos, played racquetball. Lesa went to Walmart. Tony and Noah brought Dillan home. Cleaned/filled pool, went swimming with kids. Test drove Jeep, bought for $4000. Watched Batman Lego movie. Shot fireworks from Jessica and Anneta.

item.title: Status Update – July 2, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday, wore our Hawaiian outfits, left early. Got set up, decorated for Aloha party. LOTS of people! My guess 100+. Spent entire day on my feet talking to people being a host, Lesa pretty much did same. Kids played on playground and Splash Pad. A huge success! What a day!

item.title: Status Update – July 1, 2017
item.description: Baseball tournament! Ashley at 9, won. Dillan at 10, won. Their two teams played at 11, Dillan’s team won. Dillan played at 1, lost. Exciting! Dillan’s team 2nd, Ashley’s 3rd overall! Dillan in Limestone Parade! Burger King. Dillan’s birthday, 8 years old, he’s happy! A busy day!

item.title: Status Update – June 30, 2017
item.description: Off early. Looked at Jeep for sale, paid Internet bill, picked up kids. Boys played outside, Ashley took nap. Lesa got home with groceries. Pizza! Kathy Mitchell’s, stormed, cookout/fireworks cancelled. Asked Kathy if she’d raise Ashley if we both died, she said “In a heartbeat!”

item.title: Status Update – June 29, 2017
item.description: Dwyane field trip to French Lick for miniature golf, laser tag, then Splash Pad, a busy day. His cough is better. Ashley had ball game at 7 and Dillan had make-up game at 8, didn’t get home until almost 10! Boys stayed with Lesa and got to bed on time, big kids exhausted, me too!

item.title: Status Update – June 28, 2017
item.description: Bruce peed bed, woke me at 4am. Getting ready to leave went like clockwork. Dillan and Ashley went to Kids Common in Columbus, Dillan pooped his pants, said he didn’t want to stop playing, they got back late. Bruce spit on kid, called names again, more soap. Ashley, Dwyane cough.

item.title: Status Update – June 27, 2017
item.description: Bruce put Mentholatum on himself, cleaned him up, late leaving; forgot Dwyane’s bathing suit for field trip, back home again; super late to work. Got call, Bruce called new teacher b*tch, assh*le, other kids poopy face/head. Gave him mouthful of soap! Played outside; read Boxcar.

item.title: Status Update – June 26, 2017
item.description: Kids wouldn’t get ready, 1⁄2 hour late! Dillan and Ashley took field trip to Mitchell Pool. Had 4 ballgames tonight: Dwyane at 6 on Field 1, Ashley at 6 on Field 2, Dillan and Ashley played each other at 7 on Field 2, Dwyane makeup game at 8 on Field 1. Dwyane’s last, got trophy.

item.title: Status Update – June 25, 2017
item.description: Church, lead in back, kids had fun, VBS tonight but skipping this year. Took kids to Goose Pond, long drive for them, they were excited at first, then discovered ticks, decided they didn’t like Goose Pond any more. Ate at Pizza Hut in Linton, they enjoyed that. Tick check, baths.

item.title: Status Update – June 24, 2017
item.description: Children woke us, had an emergency, their toilet was overflowing, fixed and mess cleaned up. Dillan has poison ivy on face near right eye, won’t leave it alone. Cut grass. Cookout at Fries with Paul Jr., Michelle, Jason, Michelle, Ross, Bobbie, us; 8 adults, 13 kids; awesome day!

item.title: Status Update – June 23, 2017
item.description: Friday! Stormed all day. Off at 1:45p, took long way past Monroe Dam to pick up kids. All were good, even Bruce. Boys watched two movies, Ashley made Monkey Bread. Played Jenga, watched TV until Lesa got home with groceries. Pizza! Dwyane’s ball game rained out. Read more Boxcar.

item.title: Status Update – June 22, 2017
item.description: Todd in St. Louis, lots of fires, not much real work done. Dwyane field trip to Kids Common in Columbus, super excited this morning, sounded like great time. Found Jeep for Lesa, set up test drive for tomorrow, gone by evening! Dillan’s ball game rained out. Read Boxcar Children.

item.title: Status Update – June 21, 2017
item.description: Todd warned I might get RIFF’ed. Dillan and Ashley went to Urban Air, almost didn’t get in – no permission slips, Jessica called, it got took care of, went to Cascade Park after, Dillan scraped his knee. Bruce was good all day! Intended to cut grass but rained just as I got home.

item.title: Status Update – June 20, 2017
item.description: Lesa PTO. Late, didn’t leave house until 7:15a, kids really tired. Dwyane took field trip to Spring Mill. Dillan and Ashley had ball games – against each other! Dillan’s team won by one run, he was bragging but Ashley connected twice and Dillan zero. Got kids into bed right away.

item.title: Status Update – June 19, 2017
item.description: Lesa PTO, fixed up Ashley’s room with shelves and organizers. Dillan and Ashley field trip to Mitchell pool, got too much sun, Chandler forgot sunscreen and their snacks too. Met the lady who paid for kids’ field trips, her name is Bland (Issac’s mom or grandma). Ashley ballgame.

item.title: Status Update – June 18, 2017
item.description: Woke up, power out! Father’s Day, showered with gifts and love! God is good! Security Deacon. Power on! Kids swam. played inside, swam more. Played with kids in their tent. Dillan rode bike in rain, Ashley and Bruce played in rain too, they had great time. Roasted chicken dinner!

item.title: Status Update – June 17, 2017
item.description: Ashley makeup ballgame at 9a, she did good, team won 21-11. Lowe’s for dishwasher hose, took her to Micky D’s. Naps. Springville Heritage Festival, Dillan marched in parade with Scouts, kids played in creek after. Tacos! Cleaned/filled/played in pool, kids got naked! Showers, TV.

item.title: Status Update – June 16, 2017
item.description: Friday! Got off at 1:30p! Ashley field trip to Spring Mill, same as Dillan last Wednesday: paddle boats, canoes, fun. Pizza! Kids made some good memories at Springville Heritage Festival: friends, tag, jump ropes, hula hoops, basketball, chased lightening bugs, live Gospel music.

item.title: Status Update – June 15, 2017
item.description: Intermittent Internet problems! Dwyane field trip to Huber Farms, had great time. All ball games canceled, diamonds under water, look like ponds. Ashley went with to Lowe’s to get plumbing for dishwasher. Frosties along the way. Looked at house for sale. Finally fixed dishwasher.

item.title: Status Update – June 14, 2017
item.description: Work approved dependent change. Dillan went to Spring Mill on field trip, canoed, almost went over waterfall, thought he was going to die. Rained in the morning and evening but beautiful day. Asian Pearl for dinner. Dishwasher broke, went to Lowe’s, bought replacement; installed.

item.title: Status Update – June 13, 2017
item.description: Work okay, ready to leave. Bruce bit a kid, thinks it’s funny. Dwyane went on field trip to Jessica’s to swim before thunderstorms hit; 60 mph winds, hail, etc. Ashley and Dwyane’s ball games canceled. Everyone relieved we stayed home, played, took baths, laid around, watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – June 11, 2017
item.description: Dillan, boys woke us up early, in anger told them at this moment I wish they weren’t born. Dillan cried. Told him I was sorry and didn’t mean it. Church, Jr. Church. Lunch. Fairfax Beach! Kids had great day! Lesa and I enjoyed too. Swimming back home. Zucchini casserole. TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – June 10, 2017
item.description: Cleaned the pool from last year, patched some holes, got in with the kids! Kids tired of pool, came in and played, but were calmer than usual. Joined Ashley’s tea party along with Dwyane and Bruce, had tea and pork chops. Back in the pool for afternoon. I cooked out brats. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – June 6, 2017
item.description: Posted Aloha Adoption Party event to Facebook. Dwyane excited about field trip to Jessica’s pool. Bruce pinched, kicked, hit kids again. Dillan and Bruce fought during prayer, made them leave table. Took Dillan to ballgame, Bruce went too, Lesa stayed home with Ashley and Dwyane.

item.title: Status Update – June 5, 2017
item.description: Slow morning. Dillan and Ashley field trip to Mitchell pool, behaved, followed directions, no issues, thank goodness! Praised them. Bruce pushed little girl repeatedly, caused nose bleed; spit at, called teacher names. Lesa took Dwyane to his ball game. I watched movie with rest.

item.title: Status Update – June 1, 2017
item.description: FMLA and PTO figured out, 108 hours left for year. Have daycare field trip calendars, payments worked out. Wrapping adoption up! Passed a man beating up a woman on way home with kids, turned around, asked if she was okay, needed help, told her to get in truck, drove her to mom’s.

item.title: Status Update – May 31, 2017
item.description: Back to work. Added Lesa to safe deposit box. Paid Tammy Minger adoption overage. Picked up kids, they were good today. Nothing on schedule. Kids like rubbing my bald head. Bruce was pill per usual. Tried writing Facebook event description for Gotcha Party, easier said than done.

item.title: Status Update – May 29, 2017
item.description: Memorial Day. Went to Karst Farm Park to check out shelter houses. Kids played some. Rented Shelter 8 next to Splash Pad for Gotcha Party July 2. Paul and Andrea Fries’ for annual cookout. Jason, Michelle, kids; Ryan, Devon, kids; us. Fun time: bikes, trailer ride, food, friends!

item.title: Status Update – May 28, 2017
item.description: Bruce had rough night, slept with me and on couch, okay rest of day, made him take it easy. Church, made adoption announcement, lots of congrats. Anonymous Cracker Barrel gift cards. Played inside/outside. Rural King for feed, Lowe’s for weed trimmer, Jiffy Treat. Party planning.

item.title: Status Update – May 27, 2017
item.description: Slept until 8:30, Lesa handled kids. Hauled trash with kids, Dillan stayed, helped Lesa clean coop. Put up bouncy house. Took Dillan to ball practice, Ashley went too. Cleaned and filled kiddie pool for kids. Bruce’s stomach hurt so bad I took him to hospital; he’s still hurting.

item.title: Status Update – May 26, 2017
item.description: Woke up, Bruce bedside with bloody nose, boys horse playing. Timeouts! Kept them home instead of daycare. Played inside/outside, built forts in house. After lunch, doctor and dentist offices for name changes, F&M for passbooks. Played ball with kids all afternoon. Movie, showers.

item.title: Status Update – May 25, 2017
item.description: Honors Day! Dillan certificate for Social Studies, ribbon for Honor Roll; Ashley certificates for Reading, Spelling, Language, Math, Around the World Winner, Math Star, Citizenship Award! So proud of both! All A’s and B’s. SSN name change, F&M bank, safe deposit. Steak ‘n’ Shake.

item.title: Status Update – May 24, 2017
item.description: Dwyane out of school, big kids’ last day except for Honors Day tomorrow, kids super excited! WIC cut, working out daycare rates wit Netta, lots of calls and emails prepping for day of errands tomorrow. Rained all day. Ashley got lots of teacher awards, improved 10 reading levels!

item.title: Status Update – May 22, 2017
item.description: Lunch, dressed, Shoals, photographer Jacque Whaley, attorney Tammy Minger, signed papers, OA Jenny Waggoner, DCS Stephanie Helton, Judge Lynne E. Ellis, Sworn in, adopted kids! Photos! Gifts! Final, but still more paperwork to go. Ate dinner at Texas Roadhouse. Ashley’s birthday!

item.title: Status Update – May 17, 2017
item.description: Sick! Declined Sandra Oakes’ per diem offer. Punched in 3 hrs late so I could write the decline, Lesa picked kids up from daycare, took them to Jumpin’ Joey’s, handed them over to Marcie Cook. We ate at Taste of India, picked kids up at Warehouse, and went home. I’m stressed out!

item.title: Status Update – May 16, 2017
item.description: Stressful day, per diem counter refused, ready to say no to adoption, Lesa feels same way. Ashley got Student of the Week award and T-shirt; you go girl! Today was Bruce’s 4th birthday! Took cupcakes to daycare, balloons, cake and ice cream, sang happy birthday, lots of presents!

item.title: Status Update – May 15, 2017
item.description: Lesa taking week before orientation off. I’m tired! Up until 2:30 am doing resume and cover letter. Got up, got kids to daycare, long day at work. Our 35th anniversary! Team pictures; Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane all had first game; at ball park all night; packed sandwiches for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – May 14, 2017
item.description: Mother’s Day, we brought Lesa to tears of joy! Took Marcy Cook’s flowers to church, she met us there. Stayed home and relaxed after busy weekend. Kids played outside, tried to get them to take a nap without luck. Dillan and Ashley played with tablets all evening, boys watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – May 11, 2017
item.description: Long day. No word on per diem negotiations. Emailed Michelle Ellis about dental records. Stormed all night, rained all day, Dillan’s park trip okay, practice canceled. Washed mess kit, prepped camping gear. Bought some domain names for kids, will try to keep for them until grown.

item.title: Status Update – May 10, 2017
item.description: No where we had to be! Mother’s Day cards. Mailed PAVA letters. Dillan and Ashley had Mother’s Day stuff they asked me to hide. Ashley has bad cough, Lesa thinks it’s allergies, I’m not sure. Added Dwyane and Ashley’s games to calendar, don’t have Dillan’s, we have busy schedule!

item.title: Status Update – May 9, 2017
item.description: What a long day! Forgot my belt, pants falling down all day! Picked up flowers from school sale. Lesa took Ashley to last Daisy meeting of year, had pizza party! Took all the boys to Dwyane’s baseball practice. Linda Wilson picked up her flowers. Cut grass. Finished PAVA letters.

item.title: Status Update – May 8, 2017
item.description: Monday, work sucked. More per diem emails with lawyer. Todd upset about it. I’m ready to quit, find something different. No rain, overcast. No ball practice for Dillan, Scouts instead, earned Cyber Patch. Grass needs cut but ground still wet, maybe tomorrow? Lesa seems tired too.

item.title: Status Update – May 7, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday, served in back, sat with family! New Youth Minister preached. Kids played inside, outside, with neighbor kids, rode bikes, ran wild, read books, played on tablets, watched TV, and had great fun-filled day. Lesa and I worn out from 2nd event-packed weekend in a row.

item.title: Status Update – May 6, 2017
item.description: Up at 5 am, got ready to go fishing! Drove to Maumee for Cub Scout Fish-O-Ree! Rained, but not hard, rain gear for all. I caught two large mouth bass, kids caught weeds, Lesa didn’t fish. We all had fun! Sun came out, kids played outside on neighbor’s trampoline with them. Baths!

item.title: Status Update – May 5, 2017
item.description: Rained all last night / this morning, sun peeked out in afternoon. Camping trip canceled, fishing trip in morning. Cleaned back of truck, loaded fishing poles / tackle from shed. Walmart to get Lesa boots, bobbers, sinkers. Worms! Per diem scary low! Listening to music all night.

item.title: Status Update – May 4, 2017
item.description: Still raining, Dillan’s baseball practice rained out for second time. Spent several hundred getting camping stuff for tomorrow. First Dunham’s, then Walmart, I’m ready! Kids want to go, Lesa doesn’t, I think it’ll be fun. Got home, kids in bed, missed saying goodnight, hate that!

item.title: Status Update – May 3, 2017
item.description: Rained, everything flooded! MS sucks! Forgot how to answer a phone, sounds strange but drew a blank, watched Todd to remember. Then fell on deck going in, Bruce was watching, he worried about me, love that kid! Went to Walmart, checked out tents, didn’t buy. Watched TV with kids.

item.title: Status Update – May 2, 2017
item.description: Getting sick, weather changes getting me. Hope it warms up and stays warm! Sent PAVA letters, makes me nervous. Lots of stuff on calendar coming up. Dwyane tee-ball practice at 6:00p, Ashley baseball practice at 7:00p, spent entire evening at ball field. Kids enjoying themselves!

item.title: Status Update – May 1, 2017
item.description: Starting week tired sucks! Rained hard all day, lots of flooding and alerts. Wrote Post Office, demanded money back. Went to UPS Store, ordered a new PO Box, $120 but at least they’ll email when I’ve got mail, Took kids, they were rotten! Dillan had Scouts, we did Cyber training.

item.title: Status Update – April 30, 2017
item.description: Church/Jr Church. Richland Creek Viaduct (Tulip Trestle), ate lunch at overlook. Rained as we finished. Open Arms God Loves a Cheerful Giver Fund Raiser. Presented Angels without Wings plaque! Won raffle too! Didn’t see it coming! Rain, kids stuck inside, rotten! A rough weekend!

item.title: Status Update – April 29, 2017
item.description: Up early, foster training in Bloomfield, some group put on VBS-style event for kids, adults studied upstairs, planned to leave at lunch for Dillan’s baseball practice but got rained out so we stayed, Jenny visited kids. Dairy Queen afterward. Kids drove us crazy remainder of day.

item.title: Status Update – April 28, 2017
item.description: Courtney from A2Z Clubhouse working at NIS now, blast from the past, Bruce testing her limits. Short workday, off at 2 pm. Picked up kids, chilled at home, raining outside. Could tell kids happy it’s Friday. Helped Lesa carry groceries. Pizza! Kids played their games, watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – April 27, 2017
item.description: DSL still up, going to quit worrying. Innovation meeting, ready to roll out BtownBox! PO Box not getting delivered to! Rain in AM, Dillan still had baseball practice in PM, Ashley went, has fair mechanics and poor concepts. Jenny postponed visit until foster training on Saturday.

item.title: Status Update – April 26, 2017
item.description: Finally have dial tone and DSL. Tried to verify foster training Saturday, haven’t heard back. No place we have to be! Ashley and I went to Lowe’s, got window screen, looked at push mowers. Fixed front living room windows. Boys stayed with Lesa, watched 101 Dalmatians. Baths. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 25, 2017
item.description: Everyone exhausted, late bedtime last night. AT&T and HPC calls all day. Resupplied truck candy supply. Lesa took Ashley to Scouts, she earned Hiking patch. I took Dwyane to first tee-ball practice, he did good, no concept of game yet, Dillan and Bruce with me. Late to bed again.

item.title: Status Update – April 24, 2017
item.description: Monday morning, blah! No Internet, called, HPC said they’d get it straight. Kids good at daycare as far as I know. Internet on. Dillan Pack meeting, will advance to Bears! Ashley’s first coach-pitch baseball practice, Alana from NIS is coach! No Internet again, AND, no dial tone!

item.title: Status Update – April 23, 2017
item.description: Church/Junior Church, kids had fun pushing eggs with nose, lesson forgotten. Hiked Milwaukee Railroad Trail in Bedford, took branch to Wilson Park, then back. CVS for sore in Bruce’s mouth. Cut grass, gave rides, kids had fun time. Tacos, a favorite. Watched Batman. Easy bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – April 22, 2017
item.description: Tried sleeping in, no luck. Bruce and I hooked up trailer, drove to Goodwin’s, unloaded appliances/guttering, got $32. Got Bruce a Baby Pop sucker for helping. Dillan lost tooth. Kids played outside all afternoon/evening. Coyote got chicken just 2′ from house! Baths then bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – April 21, 2017
item.description: No school. Bruce hit kid in privates. Internet came on, went off again. Sent PO Box test letter two days ago, hasn’t arrived yet. Pizza! Lesa took boys to library for original Beauty and the Beast movie. Took Ashley Square Dancing at Bloomington fairgrounds, had a fantastic time!

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2017
item.description: Tomorrow unused snow make-up day, kids excited to be off! Bruce had rash, told daycare Benadryl and change shirt since we’re using new detergent, cleared up, he’s fine. Emails with Clay. Lesa wanted to eat out, went to Bob Evan’s. New Internet worked this morning, down all night!?

item.title: Status Update – April 19, 2017
item.description: I’m so tired! It’s warm, I think MS is hitting, hard to breathe. Found out Bruce flooded toilet at daycare again and threw toys when mad. Ashley wants to run 5K at school instead of the 1K for her age group. Responded to Clay, no additional contact info. Kids played outside lots!

item.title: Status Update – April 18, 2017
item.description: Weird day! Ordered propane, registered kids for Fish-O-Ree. Clay Cummins’ email: Daniel wants full contact info! Paid daycare. Filled gas tank. Kids help load old washer/dryer/gutters onto trailer, back hurts now. Dwyane’s T-ball coach called about practice. Mrs. Wronowicz email.

item.title: Status Update – April 17, 2017
item.description: Lesa stayed home, cleaned, organized kids’ summer clothes. I got off late, settled HPC Internet service bill, Lesa got kids. Got home Ashley charged out door to say hello, Bruce and Dwyane hugged me, nada from Dillan. Unprepared for Scouts, played on playground. Burned out/tired!

item.title: Status Update – April 16, 2017
item.description: Skipped Deacon’s Breakfast this year to spend Easter morning with kids. Dwyane and Bruce in children’s presentation, last year for Dwyane, kids growing up so fast! Played outside, lunch, naps, outside again, rained, Trolls movie, supper, Lion Guard, bed. They love us and us them!

item.title: Status Update – April 15, 2017
item.description: Fortville, annual Dellinger/Ross Easter Egg Hunt. Ate, played on playground, played Wiffle ball, hunted Easter Eggs, played in creek, came back home. Kids had a great time! Bruce and Dwyane slept most of way home. Played on Sharks given us by Dave and Patty Taylor. Baths and bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 14, 2017
item.description: Boys to daycare; Dillan and Ashley to dentist, then school. Stephanie Sipes, ReJetta Boshears excited for us; Chelsea Wronowicz texted to ask about class party for Ashley. Bruce peed pants at daycare, wouldn’t quit playing, déjà vu! Pizza! Kids dyed Easter eggs. Much quieter day!

item.title: Status Update – April 13, 2017
item.description: Dropped kids off early. Took truck for ball joint/tie rod end repair, Lesa dropped me at work. Got Adoption Hearing date: 2017-04-13T23:52:20-04:00

item.title: Status Update – April 12, 2017
item.description: At daycare Bruce scooped poop out of toilet, stuffed it with roll of toilet paper, and flooded it over! AT&T fixed DSL, line down at Old Farm and Hwy 54, switching to HPC anyway, new DSL service activates Monday. IEP’s from Christina Hennion. 79° so kids played outside. Homework.

item.title: Status Update – April 11, 2017
item.description: Lots pertaining to adoption: Stephanie sent Medical History, Linda asked to prepare hearing date request, Court Recorder will expedite, Tammy/DCS attorney in contact, maybe May? Scared, excited, in disbelief! Boys played outside. Lesa and Ashley went to Daisy Scouts, got patches!

item.title: Status Update – April 10, 2017
item.description: Two days no Internet, four plus hours on phone with AT&T, Thursday minimum! They suck! Scouts, finished all required badges/loops, can move on to Bears next year! Dwyane hitting way too much! Stephanie dropped ball on adoption paperwork, didn’t submit to DCS attorney, start over!

item.title: Status Update – April 9, 2017
item.description: Church. Jacque Whaley gave Ashley porcelan doll that was her mom’s! $100 donation! Spring Mill State Park, hiked a trail, hiked another by lake, snack picnic, Canadian geese, barefoot in freezing creek water, entered Donaldson Cave. Jiffy Treat. Cooked out. We had an awesome day!

item.title: Status Update – April 8, 2017
item.description: Ashley threw truck in our room to wake us up. Dillan and Ashley helped load trash, Ashley helped haul. Took Dillan, other Scouts, to WRV HS for REMC Annual Meeting, Pack 343 presented with check to replace derby track, boys did great, rewarded with DQ. Kids played outside; tents.

item.title: Status Update – April 7, 2017
item.description: Bruce good again. Springville Store pizza! Went to Springville Elementary for Family Movie Night: Trolls, sick of Trolls! I’ll eat them myself! Popcorn, glow sticks, blankets, pillows, fun time; had to leave early, boys got way too wound up! They ran laps at home, Dillan 25 laps!

item.title: Status Update – April 6, 2017
item.description: Roof leaked again, covered in middle of night/rain. Overslept until 6:15, still made it, not everyone brushed teeth. Lawyer said Home Study isn’t filed! Redo paperwork? Dwyane left backpack at daycare. Netta said all kids good, at home too, not sure if they’re listening or tired.

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2017
item.description: Better timing this AM. Bruce good at daycare, Ashley too. Doubt we got through to Bruce, we can hope. Ashley dumped her accumulated trash in my truck, I decided it was time to clean and vacuum it; kids cleaned, I vacuumed. Thunderstorms all day so kids stuck inside. Homework. TV.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2017
item.description: Seven minutes to get to daycare; didn’t miss bus! Very nice day but turning cold. Bruce acted up at daycare, Ashley good. Went to BNL Performing Arts Center, Ashley had clay pinch pot on display. Afterward, Pizza Hut for dinner, used free pan pizza certificates earned by reading.

item.title: Status Update – April 3, 2017
item.description: Kids moved slow this AM, made it everywhere on time. Text from Mrs. Wronowicz: Ashley hit boy at school for admittedly no reason; 2nd incident, 1st was last Friday when she hit a girl; next time it’s Mrs. Charles office! Bruce acted up, knew he was in trouble, apologized! Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – April 2, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday church is my favorite! Chicken noodle lunch at Eastern Greene Middle School followed by Center Township Fire Department Easter Egg Hunt; kids made out like bandits, came home with overflowing baskets! Naps. Lesa loves new appliances! Kids played outside. A nice day.

item.title: Status Update – April 1, 2017
item.description: Lesa went to Women’s Retreat. Fed kids breakfast. Kids got into everything, fought, were rotten to the core all day. Arby’s for lunch, Lowe’s for dryer steam hose. Spent afternoon putting in washer, Big kids helped, boys napped. Kids played outside. Lesa elected Queen of the Day!

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2017
item.description: Sick and sore! Off at 2:30p, picked up kids, headed home. Got dryer unpacked, wired, new vent hose installed, and ready for first load all before Lesa got home; Ashley helped by handing me tools and parts; Dillan off playing with boys. Pizza! Stopped raining, colder. TV then bed.

item.title: Status Update – March 30, 2017
item.description: Kids better, I’m miserable!. Ashley sneaked money to buy a “Magic Pen” but got caught. We all went to Springville Book Fair at school. Jenny met us there for visit then followed us home to finish it. Took Ashley to Menard’s to pick up new washer/dryer set. Stormed, we got soaked!

item.title: Status Update – March 29, 2017
item.description: Everyone sick, sucks! Many upcoming events, we’re getting busy. Jenny texted, wants to meet tomorrow on short notice, we’ll accommodate, hoping there won’t be many more! Dryer went kaput, found one online at Lowe’s, said 7 in stock, had 0, I hate shopping! Sent kids to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – March 28, 2017
item.description: Kids coughing, getting sick, not enough sleep, they won’t stay in bed. Called about Kindergarten Countdown for Dwyane. Went to Bart Kaufman Field for IU vs. Univ. of Evansville baseball game. Hamburgers, hot dogs, popcorn, peanuts. Didn’t stay for entire game, but we all had fun!

item.title: Status Update – March 27, 2017
item.description: Wanted to quit work today! Lesa bought Trolls’ soundtrack and I played some for kids, they love it and sang along. Dillan got great grades on recent school work, big praises! All of them acted like crazy. Took Dillan to Scouts. Lesa put a stop to snuggling with Ashley, she cried.

item.title: Status Update – March 26, 2017
