item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home, serving deacon, took kids serving, Dillan told Gladys he didn’t want to be there, upsetting. Bought batteries on way home, kids played with race track/cars instead of naps. Ashley went with in evening but got bored. Lesa reading to Dillan as we got home.

item.title: Status Update – March 25, 2017
item.description: Slept until 10! Everyone cleaned house. Took Bruce bowling, Jackson Kline’s birthday party, Bruce had awesome time! Got home, Hauslers already here. Grilled out, started to rain, it’s all good! Kids played with Stephan and Ellie, nice visit, we’ll miss them! Baths, bed, long day!

item.title: Status Update – March 24, 2017
item.description: Picked up trash bags from Dwyane’s fund raiser. Mrs. Dillman called, told us about Countdown to Kindergarten program, asked about lactose intolerance, going to be Dwyane’s teacher! Mother/Son Movie Night for Dwyane, Bruce and Lesa. I took Dillan and Ashley to library to see Sing.

item.title: Status Update – March 23, 2017
item.description: Exhausted! Lesa took Dwyane to kindergarten screening at Springville Elem., he got accepted. Picked up 4 tickets I won to IU vs. Evansville baseball the 28th. Played baseball with Dillan and Ashley while Lesa took Dwyane and Bruce to WIC appointment. Papa John’s pizza for supper.

item.title: Status Update – March 22, 2017
item.description: Felt like Thursday, it’s not, everyone tired. Kids okay to be around. Bruce in trouble multiple times for hitting at daycare. Chickens laid candy eggs! Dillan tried to be affectionate. Lesa interacted more with kids: sat, cuddled, watched TV with them after dinner, they loved it!

item.title: Status Update – March 21, 2017
item.description: Day started bad, got worse. Fought with Lesa via email, later she threw dishes at me! Played baseball with boys, Lesa took Ashley to Daisies. Dillan batted well coach pitching. Dwyane, Bruce okay with batting tee. Told kids I’m divorcing Lesa, they cried, made up, kids happy now.

item.title: Status Update – March 20, 2017
item.description: Back from Spring Break. Hectic workday. Lesa took Porter to vet: medicine, special food, not poison? We hope! Bruce tried wiping, got poop on himself/clothes. Kids played outside. Scouts, Ashley went, picked up trash at park, played after. She fell, huge knot on head, she’s okay!

item.title: Status Update – March 19, 2017
item.description: Church/Jr Church. Dillan and Ashley participated well. Subway, Great Clips, Cascade Park. Played in/out doors. Looking a lot like Porter has been poisoned – third dog since moving here, I’m ready to execute a neighbor. Bruce pooped all over bathroom floor, WTF‽ Lesa read 4 books.

item.title: Status Update – March 18, 2017
item.description: Hauled recyclables with Ashley, Dwyane, Bruce; candy from CVS, Frosties from Wendy’s, new trash cans from Lowe’s; Dillan didn’t want to go, said maybe next time, played games with Lesa. Wet outside so kids played inside most of day. Wouldn’t take naps. Popcorn/Trolls movie again!

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2017
item.description: Friday! Short workday. Talked with Annetta for an hour about kids. Bruce called her poopyhead, hides from teachers, spits, and other. Ashley smarts off. Dillan gets mad, follows wrong crowd, when leading makes poor choices. Dwyane good as always. Pizza! Watched The Good Dinosaur.

item.title: Status Update – March 16, 2017
item.description: Stephanie and supervisor Susan went to Riley in Indy, stopped to see kids early afternoon. Dwyane and Bruce napping so she missed them. Ashley said she hugged her 5 times! Dillan shy toward her, said he’s afraid of her like I am. Kids played outside. Lesa read them lots of books.

item.title: Status Update – March 15, 2017
item.description: Up early, took kids to Children’s Museum in Indianapolis, all had great time. Dwyane, Bruce old enough to appreciate. Fun day! Kids played outside once home. Dillan got sick at bedtime, vomited on living room carpet. Later had diarrhea, pooped all over bathroom. I cleaned, gross!

item.title: Status Update – March 14, 2017
item.description: Long day, feel better, Lesa and kids seem okay. Kids had good day at daycare, too cold to go out, full of spunk and energy, steeled myself for a night of crazy. Seriously wonder why we’re adopting: we are too old! Taco supper, a favorite of everyone. Kids watched Despicable Me 2.

item.title: Status Update – March 13, 2017
item.description: Spring Break, kids happy. I’m getting sick. Snowing, just in time for Spring. DST sucks, dark mornings, light at 7:30pm when boys go to bed. Kids played outside, came in when cold, started raising hell. Dillan, Ashley calmer because of tablet time. They’re worn out from long day.

item.title: Status Update – March 12, 2017
item.description: Church, Security Deacon, Sunday School class moved into basement. Went to an Adventist church in Avoca giving away children’s clothes. Bought tennis shoes for Dillan, Lesa and me at Walmart; other kids okay. Jiffy Treat for ice cream. Took Ashley to Roy Tremble concert at church.

item.title: Status Update – March 5, 2017
item.description: Love Family Sunday! Looked at house on way home, way more than we can afford! Nice out, kids played outside. Naps. Kids went back outside, Dillan and Dwyane rode bikes. Lesa fixed shredded cabbage and rice, kids chowed! Teased boys about coyotes and spiders when putting up bikes.

item.title: Status Update – March 3, 2017
item.description: Smooth morning/day. Worked full 8 hours. I was glad to see kids, they were glad to see me, ran to greet Lesa too. Everyone’s happy it’s Friday! Pizza! Kids unusually rambunctious, hard to settle them down, resorted to TV – Star Trek then Scooby-Doo. We love them and they love us!

item.title: Status Update – March 2, 2017
item.description: Overslept until 6:15a! Got kids to school/daycare on time, only 6 minutes late to work! Kids said it was a good day. Dillan had substitute teacher, didn’t pay attention in class, couldn’t do math homework, sat at dinning room table until 10p, whined/cried like a baby entire time.

item.title: Status Update – March 1, 2017
item.description: Power out at 12:30a. Bruce came in scared of dark about 5:00a – time to get up anyway. Got kids fed, dressed, out the door in the dark! Outage was Springville south of 54, school/daycare open. Got home, power still off. Asian Pearl. Got home, power on, good – it was getting cold!

item.title: Status Update – February 28, 2017
item.description: Bruce peed on our bedroom floor at 2:30a, bad dreams, WTF‽ Boys still sick, me too. Curio’s rear legs quit working, we euthanized her, sad, had her 17.5 years. Meeting for Dwyane’s IEP, reduced to speech, ready for kindergarten. Ashley’s Daisy investiture ceremony. Thunderstorms!

item.title: Status Update – February 27, 2017
item.description: Dwyane a little sick, Bruce a little sicker, Dillan outright sick! Dillan finished homework, able to go Scouting, Dillan had good time running with other boys even though he was sick. Ashley wanted to go, stayed to help Lesa bathe boys instead, did her laundry also. In bed early!

item.title: Status Update – February 26, 2017
item.description: Church. Dillan not feeling well, early signs of cold. Bruce coughing a little. Dwyane, Ashley seemed okay. Made kids go outside and play, too nice to stay in and cause trouble! Kids fought and bickered all day, especially Bruce, but still not too bad a day. Early bedtime for all.

item.title: Status Update – February 25, 2017
item.description: Bruce came in bedroom at 6:30a, said his nose was stopped up, boys already up. Snow, kids went out for short while. Hauled trash with Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane. Crazy 8’s with Ashley, various kids rotated in/out of game. Kids played with Play-Doh. Ashley sorted shoes for shoe drive.

item.title: Status Update – February 24, 2017
item.description: Friday! Got off at 1:30p. Picked up Father Daughter Dance photos and Mother Son Movie tickets, checked PO Box, filled gas tank, ordered pizza, picked up kids. Thunder storms. Took Ashley, Dwyane, Bruce to Bedford Library to watch Moana movie; Dillan wanted to stay home with Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – February 23, 2017
item.description: Bruce and Dwyane got dirty making mud balls at daycare. Ashley reading homework, read to me. Dillan got F (33%) on AR reading test. Boil order, bought bottled water with kids. Jenny visited, went okay, still wish visits were over, kids behaved! I have a sore throat, getting sick?

item.title: Status Update – February 22, 2017
item.description: Day two with truck, nice. Kids love it. On time everywhere. Worked over a little. Kids good at daycare, seemed happy to see me. Played outside, Dillan beat up Ashley, had to intervene, then he took Bruce’s Big Wheel, intervened again, calmed down after that. He seems upset to me?

item.title: Status Update – February 21, 2017
item.description: Everyone tired. Work okay, I’m a bit burned out. Got my truck back! A mere $1700, still needs another $1400 in work, money pit but nice to have it back, plus 4-wheel drive works again! Kids super-happy, they have arm/leg room! Took Dillan for a drive/talk about liking/loving him.

item.title: Status Update – February 20, 2017
item.description: President’s Day, kids off school, adults worked. Dillan bad headache, went to bed, missed supper! Other kids tired too, not going enough sleep. Bruce coughing, said he had belly ache, kept getting up. You can lead a kid to bed but you can’t make ’em sleep! Children, go to sleep!

item.title: Status Update – February 19, 2017
item.description: Took kids to church, Lesa stayed home, told Skirvin’s we’d pass on house. Lesa took Dillan to Batman LEGO movie as Mother/Son outing. I took Ashley, Dwyane, Bruce to park after naps, Lesa met us there later. Took family to Bob Evans for supper, a woman told us we had nice family.

item.title: Status Update – February 18, 2017
item.description: Lesa handled kids, got to sleep until 9:00! Finished Pinewood Derby car. Ate lunch, went to derby. Dillan placed last every race, won Flat Tire award meaning he had slowest car of all, felt bad for him, he had good time anyway, so did other kids. Kids played outside a lot. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – February 17, 2017
item.description: Friday! Pulled in behind bus, Dwyane made it! Ashley had 3 recesses! Dillan’s class had firemen/truck/gear visit. Ashley worried she’d missed daycare brownie snack (she didn’t). Kids played outside. I had nose bleed, took an hour to stop! Pizza! Dillan had his agenda! A good day!

item.title: Status Update – February 16, 2017
item.description: Normal everything today. Pretty cool spatial mapping stuff at work. Reserved rental Jeep for another week, transfer case should have arrived today. Dillan hasn’t brought agenda or homework home all week, thinks he’ll get out of homework, wrong! We put him to work! No TV, playing.

item.title: Status Update – February 15, 2017
item.description: A little late this AM, decent workday, a bit run down/tired. Gas, kids, home. No activities planned. Kids played outside, big kids homework. Nothing in PO Box. Paid water bill. Took Dillan and Ashley to Lowe’s, bought Pinewood Derby car supplies, spent rest of evening making car.

item.title: Status Update – February 14, 2017
item.description: It’s Valentine’s Day, Lesa gave me daisies! Dwyane had party at preschool, Dwyane and Bruce had parties at daycare, Dillan and Ashley jealous but theirs were last week. Lesa and I got them cards and candy. Ashley had Daisy Scouts and lots of snacks. I made a nice supper for Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – February 13, 2017
item.description: It’s Monday, it sucked! Tight fit getting everyone in Jeep. Suburban towed to TNW, $1500 for transfer case; another $1700 for front diff seals, ball joint, tie rod end, shocks, alignment, etc.; need truck so doing the work. Dillan acted up at Cub Scouts. Planned Valentine’s meal.

item.title: Status Update – February 12, 2017
item.description: Sunday, Jr. Church, took two cars, couldn’t fit in one. Larry and Debra Skirvin’s home, their house is for sale, gave us good price, maybe more than we can afford. Kids played outside. Lesa started cooking early, invited Paul Fries to dinner, Andrea in Florida caring for her mom.

item.title: Status Update – February 11, 2017
item.description: Kids woke us up early. Picked up Lesa’s Jeep, she’s happy! Lesa and Ashley sold Girl Scout cookies at Walmart. My front diff blew! Made it up our hill and parked, now I’m in rental Jeep, have to love God’s timing! We ate at Pizza Hut, cashed in kids free pizza brochures. TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – February 10, 2017
item.description: Friday! Ashley and Dillan had Valentine’s Day parties at school. Ashley had her play for kindergartners and 3rd graders, she played a sleepy bear ready to hibernate. Got off at 1:30! Test drove used Jeep, walked away. Lesa’s Jeep finished, $1500. Warm, kids played outside. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – February 8, 2017
item.description: Left 10 minutes earlier than normal. Lunch with General Manager, changes happening/coming, worked 1 hour over, lucky I’m still employed. Snowed about an inch during supper, whiteout conditions. Kids played inside. Funniest Home Videos had kids laughing. Full moon, pretty outside.

item.title: Status Update – February 7, 2017
item.description: Decent morning, kids did good, everywhere on time. Work good, kept busy, productive. Before leaving got text Ashley’s Daisy Scout meeting canceled, leaders sick, a lot of girls too. Kids played, wouldn’t let them outside to get muddy. Watched TV, homework, big kid baths, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – February 6, 2017
item.description: Monday, a normal morning, no one sick, on time. Okay workday. Netta Star at daycare warned about stomach flu going around – yes we know! Stephanie arrived for visit 1⁄2 hour early, needed to sign expired adoption paperwork, a pleasant visit for DCS. At Wolf Scouts we made planes.

item.title: Status Update – February 5, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday, third person offered to take free pics of adoption. Picked up entire garbage bag full of youth group pizzas, ate two for lunch. Kids played outside by slide, so muddy they needed showers! Monster Jam on TV. Dillan hid pee-soaked pull-ups under covers: I killed him.

item.title: Status Update – February 4, 2017
item.description: Up early, worked 8 hrs. Ashley sold GS cookies at Casey’s. Lesa took boys to Rural King, saw Alicia Price. Got home kids were napping, even Dillan. When they awoke they were wild and crazy, fighting and not getting along. Bruce skipped supper, said he didn’t like. TV, baths, bed.

item.title: Status Update – February 3, 2017
item.description: Took Ashley to dentist, spacer removed. Wanda, DCS approved sitter, friend of Kathy Mitchell’s, sat for Bruce. Late to work. Jeep trans trashed, $1400 for used w/ 106k miles, 6mo warranty. Wanda dropped Bruce at work at 3:30. Got remaining kids. Bob Evans, Father-Daughter Dance!

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2017
item.description: Ashley threw up half the night. Got everyone up early, took kids to daycare, Lesa to work, got Jeep ready for tow. Innovation interviews. Picked up Lesa, got rental car – a Jeep! Picked up kids, Bruce 100.5 temp, banned from daycare for 24 hrs. Have to find a sitter for tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – February 1, 2017
item.description: On time! Picked up Father-Daughter Dance tickets for Friday. Worked full day. Got call from Lesa, Jeep won’t move, transmission? Picked her up, pushed it out of the way, and picked up kids. Will get towed and rental in morning. Ashley vomited in truck on way home. Bruce sick too.

item.title: Status Update – January 31, 2017
item.description: Still sick, worked 9 hrs anyway. Kids wouldn’t get ready, Ashley changed pants/shoes twice, boys played/rough-housed instead of getting ready, boys forgot backpacks. Missed Dwyane’s bus, I wouldn’t take him, Netta took him out of kindness. Daises canceled. Homework. Transformers.

item.title: Status Update – January 30, 2017
item.description: Sick all night/day, probable food poisoning, felt horrible, called in sick, slept all day. Dwyane knocked Ashley into table, cut her head, I patched her up, she’s good. Lesa took Dwyane to doctor, not feeling well either, medicine for earache. Scout Pack meeting, Bears’ carnival.

item.title: Status Update – January 29, 2017
item.description: Church, taught Junior Church. Kids played outside. Naps. Dillan had meltdown over doing subtraction homework. Played outside even more. Went to Golden Corral to give Lesa a break from cooking, used gift cards from Bonnie and Avery, we got stuffed! Walmart for miscellaneous items.

item.title: Status Update – January 28, 2017
item.description: Got up early. Breakfast with kids. Went to foster training in Bloomfield. Trained on Oppositional Defiant Disorder (ODD) – our kids not ODD. Met our new case worker Jenny Waggoner. Shaunacee and Samantha were helpers. Got home, played outside. I took a nap. Tacos! Baths, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – January 27, 2017
item.description: Friday! Kept busy, but work still dragged by. Picked up kids, no issues, ordered pizzas from Springville Store. Kids played outside. Lesa grocery shopped, picked up Girl Scout cookies. I picked up pizzas, took kids to see The Secret Life of Pets movie at Bedford Library. Bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – January 26, 2017
item.description: Last day of antibiotics, forgot to take them went back home to get, hoping I don’t regress. Dwyane coughing, Lesa feeling sick. Weather started cold, got colder. Kids played outside, did homework after supper, breaking homework rules but they need physical outlet, still wound up!

item.title: Status Update – January 25, 2017
item.description: Only Wednesday! Made up missed time from yesterday. Almost all Moffett photos/videos backed up to Amazon S3. Stephanie Helton emailed, processing adoption! Dillan wrote up for fighting, said they were playing, I let it go. Warm, dry, made kids play outside, homework after supper.

item.title: Status Update – January 24, 2017
item.description: Overslept, woke up 15 minutes before we normally leave, made it on time! On way to school Maddie from daycare punched Ashley in nose, massive nose bleed. School and daycare called, left work, took her new clothes. Lesa and Ashley Scouts. Did homework with Dillan, boys watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – January 23, 2017
item.description: Kids didn’t want to get ready this morning but we made it on time. I was tired all day and trouble focusing. We have new Open Arms Case Manager. Kids not as crazy as they have been. Scout den meeting went well. Got home, boys were going to bed, Ashley was on her tablet. Okay day.

item.title: Status Update – January 22, 2017
item.description: Sunday. Church, taught class, Junior Church leader, Dillan and Ashley both tried to hang on me, got angry/moped when I wouldn’t allow it. Kids went crazy nuts once home. Had to hammer really hard on them. During naps, Dillan and Lesa tore the hell out of our yard! Better evening.

item.title: Status Update – January 21, 2017
item.description: Tried to straighten out PO Box, everything fine, no mail delivered to date, kids confused/saddened. Ate lunch at Subway on way to Bonnie and Avery’s in Indy for late Christmas, had great time, they spent too much on kids and us, ate dinner, talked long while. Nice day, but tired.

item.title: Status Update – January 20, 2017
item.description: Friday, off at 2:30. Big kids had Western Day, fought over cowboy hat. Bruce hitting other kids at daycare. Warm, rainy. Email saying Amber temporarily removed from position; I didn’t see anything in police logs. Pizza! Feeling a little better, not so tired, not as much coughing.

item.title: Status Update – January 19, 2017
item.description: Feeling better I think? At least I’m not worse. Full workday. Innovation meeting. Medicine sick some. Was able to get kids, got gas, stopped by Dollar General to get Ashley toy money, got boys cars. Dillan lots of math homework, Ashley reading. Kids worked up for whatever reason!

item.title: Status Update – January 18, 2017
item.description: Lesa begged me to go to clinic for bad cough, sent email reminders. Left work early for Landmark Walk-In, waited over an hour to see doctor; prescribed inhaler, antibiotics, cough suppressant. CVS took 45 min. to fill. Home at 6:30. Lesa picked up kids! Kids missed me, love them!

item.title: Status Update – January 17, 2017
item.description: Colder. still raining, done with rain! Sicker than yesterday, Lesa says it’s doctor time. Kids keep thinking it’s Wednesday, guess week dragging by for everyone. Ashley had Scouts tonight, turned in cookie order forms. I watched boys, copped out and turned on TV, LEGO Movie. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – January 16, 2017
item.description: Rained all day, low 52°, thunderstorms in January‽ Work, school, daycare, nothing unusual. Put out feelers for adoption hearing photographer, two people want to bless us by doing it free! C3 can’t host foster training on 28th. Dillan and Ashley homework. Dillan Scout den meeting.

item.title: Status Update – January 15, 2017
item.description: Church, serving deacon but no one to visit. Went to Bloomington, ate lunch at Wendy’s, went to Great Clips, Lesa and kids got haircuts. Kids look so darn good when they get haircuts! Headed home, took naps. Played new PS2 game until supper. Afterwards we watched TV until bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – January 14, 2017
item.description: Icy; trees, deck, cars covered but it melted fast. Hauled trash with Ashley, Dwyane, Bruce; Dillan wanted to stay home. Kids played outside, got muddy. Took nap, no energy, felt crappy. Played AMX racing game on PS2, boys loved it, Ashley not so much. Watched Secret Life of Pets.

item.title: Status Update – January 13, 2017
item.description: Friday! Left work 1 hour early! Ice storm on way! Got kids, headed home, made them pick up rooms for Amber visit, let them play after. Pizza! Amber visited, her foster baby removed, broken bones, praying for both, wants to visit us post-adoption. Fell asleep on couch watching TV.

item.title: Status Update – January 10, 2017
item.description: Only Tuesday! Tammy Minger emailed wanting info on background check, emailed Michelle Ellis, still not cleared! Dillan and Ashley’s teachers showed Florida pictures/videos to class. Lesa took Ashley to Daisy Scouts, cookie selling time. Boys stoked from playing PS2 AMX Motocross!

item.title: Status Update – January 8, 2017
item.description: Long day! Ashley royal pain! Bruce was Bruce: a booger. Hooked up PlayStation 2. Kids sledded. While kids napped Lesa went grocery shopping, took Dillan; stopped at Walmart, got Ashley boots. Danced lots, kids were rocking! Kids not ready for school, I’m not ready for work, yuck!

item.title: Status Update – January 7, 2017
item.description: Packed. Took walk down Nurmi Lane. Fort Lauderdale airport where shooting occurred yesterday. Checked luggage, boarded, departed, lunch in flight. Arrived to 17 degrees, 2 with windchill. Made it home up our icy hill. Kids sledded, played in snow! What a trip! We’re finally home!

item.title: Status Update – January 6, 2017
item.description: Cooks went to Key Largo, we had run of place. Went to Funderdome, ate lunch at Burgerfi. Came back, changed, hit the beach. Stayed couple of hours, rained out, left, rain quit, swam in pool. Lesa fixed spaghetti dinner. Kayaked down canal, then took Bruce. Our last day was great!

item.title: Status Update – January 5, 2017
item.description: Up before everyone, fixed kids breakfast. Spent all morning at beach, had a blast! Snorkeled: fish, a squid, shells, fun! Pool. Boys took a nap, big kids did homework. Mai-Kai Polynesian Restaurant: food, pineapple drinks for kids, rum for adults, dancers, fire show! Awesome day!

item.title: Status Update – January 4, 2017
item.description: All boys peed bed! Ashley and Eleanor not getting along. Lesa, kids went to Museum of Discovery and Science. Carl and I went to Packard Museum. Swam in pool, even Lesa. I kayaked the canals, gave kids rides. Carl took Lesa and me to Chima Brazilian Steakhouse, Marcy watched kids.

item.title: Status Update – January 3, 2017
item.description: Up early. Packed truck. Got gas. School to arrange excused absences. Drove to airport, flew to Ft. Lauderdale. Private jet awesome. Rental car. House awesome. Pool awesome. Beach major awesome! Swam in pool more. Pizza. It was an awesome day. Made lifetime memories for kids / us!

item.title: Status Update – January 2, 2017
item.description: Woke up to Ashley and Lesa fighting like cats, calmed that storm. Kids were crazy, excited. Lesa trying to pack, took kids to Lowe’s with me, got Frosties. Fixed screen door and coop pull. Naps, Bruce and Ashley wouldn’t. Played Hungry Hippo, other games. Bedtime a real struggle!

item.title: Status Update – January 1, 2017
item.description: New Years Day. Kids doing better, I’m still sick. Family Sunday at church. Given cash and toy donations. God is good! Ate lunch at Arby’s in Bloomington, intended to get haircuts, Great Clips closed. Naps. Played outside/inside. Played Hungry Hippo, other games. No TV today. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – December 31, 2016
item.description: Kids up early. Sonja Stotler came to meet animals at 12. Dillan, Ashley, myself went to Assembly Hall for IU vs. Ohio women’s basketball game; enjoyed until 3rd quarter then left. Movie. Baths. Everyone has colds. Lesa and I rang in the New Year. Ashley having hard time sleeping.

item.title: Status Update – December 30, 2016
item.description: Off today, Lesa worked, took kids to Alicia’s, slept more! Got kids at 2pm, changed into PJs and headed to French Lick. Ate dinner in Springs’ Roosevelt 202 room. Took trolley and rode Polar Express train, kids had best time ever! Fell asleep eating snacks on way home! Hilarious!

item.title: Status Update – December 29, 2016
item.description: Alicia’s. Worked full day. Off until Jan 9. Kids voted to not check PO Box. Played outside. Lesa bought Bruce new insulated boots, loved them, walked around house all night wearing them. Ashley and Dillan tired, boys took naps and okay, Lesa tired too, I’m good. Pizza, baths, TV.

item.title: Status Update – December 28, 2016
item.description: Kids at Alicia’s again. Worked half day, stayed really busy. Polar Express tickets in hand. Ordered IU vs Ohio women’s basketball tickets for Saturday. Kids ready to get home. Played outside, got muddy, that’s okay. Decent behavior except Bruce, he’s a booger! “Slept” with Bruce.

item.title: Status Update – December 27, 2016
item.description: Holiday break over for Lesa and me, back to work, a full day! Dropped kids at Alicia Price’s house, they took two sacks of toys. I bet she was glad they’re gone for the night! Got home, still acting crazy, had to crack down on them. Didn’t do a whole lot of anything, a little TV.

item.title: Status Update – December 26, 2016
item.description: Kids up early, little crazy people, still excited as hell. Sent them outside, rained, got muddy, back inside. Decided to skip naps so they’d sleep tonight. Went to Walmart, got shoes all-around, other miscellaneous items. Jay C Plus for groceries. Tacos! Finding Dory on DVD. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – December 25, 2016
item.description: Christmas Day! Presents everywhere! Happy, happy kids! Church, Dwyane and Bruce in program. Given $1850 from people wanting to bless us and kids! Managed to nap. Ashley understands true meaning of Christmas. No one wanted to go to bed. Dillan woke up, was reliving day in a dream.

item.title: Status Update – December 24, 2016
item.description: Woke to kids shouting out of control, not listening to Lesa, I intervened. Went to Sarah and Danielle’s apartment in Indy for Christmas. It was great! Bruce so excited he screamed! It was awesome! He carried his toys all day: No one getting his toys! Baths and bed. Santa arrived!

item.title: Status Update – December 23, 2016
item.description: PTO, still took kids to Alicia’s. Peace! Quiet! Slept an hour or two. Took Lesa to Taste of India lunch buffet, it was awesome! Took nap! Got kids, stopped by PO, nothing. Kids are so excited! Played Picture Bingo to calm them. Lesa helped them make gingerbread houses and trains.

item.title: Status Update – December 22, 2016
item.description: Kids: no school, so why get ready? Full work day. Daycare gift exchange, boys had fun, big kids so-so, all excited, no naps! Played outside, warmer. Amber visited, showed up late with foster baby and middle sister, stayed late. Background check denied, need waiver from Stephanie.

item.title: Status Update – December 21, 2016
item.description: Sick all night, took kids to school/daycare, worked 1⁄2 day. Last day of school, pajama day. Lesa stayed home, cleaned, wrapped gifts, shopped. Tracking showed PAVA pictures delivered. Warm, kids played outside. Fries brought us movies, gifts, huge amount of baked goods! Blessed!

item.title: Status Update – December 20, 2016
item.description: Dwyane had Christmas program, Lesa attended, I worked. He had good time, got upset he got coloring book instead of regular book, didn’t want to go to daycare after. Dillan and Ashley had gift exchange at school. All kids excited! Bruce and Dwyane WIC. Pizza. I’m throwing up sick!

item.title: Status Update – December 19, 2016
item.description: Got to daycare, work okay. Arranged break homework for kids, still working on dog sitter. Work so-so, Christmas dinner pitch-in. Picked up kids, Lesa, headed to school for kids’ Christmas program. They did great, proud of them, they participated! ADHD materials. Had a better day!

item.title: Status Update – December 18, 2016
item.description: Iced in, no church, not worth risk. Got trucks deiced, afraid to go down hill, whole neighborhood staying put. Coop frozen shut, got it open. Kids bundled up, played outside. Bruce slipped, busted head, not bad. Kids wild all day! Watched BFG, scared kids, mistake. Difficult day.

item.title: Status Update – December 17, 2016
item.description: No sleeping in! Mailed Daniel and Nicolle photos, grandparent letters. I took Dillan, boys caroling for Scouts. Lesa took Ashley to Ava’s birthday party. Nice ham dinner at Fries! Ashley vomited at bedtime, said she ate too much, have doubts. Freezing rain, everything ice coated.

item.title: Status Update – December 16, 2016
item.description: Bruce dreamed monsters after him, got in bed with us, I couldn’t sleep after. Off work by 1p! Staples for photo mailers, debating whether to send. Technically not under PAVA since we haven’t adopted yet. Bought Ashley ChapStick, paid storage, bought gas. Kids wild as all get out!

item.title: Status Update – December 15, 2016
item.description: Another cold day. Bruce went all day using big boy potty! Way to go Bruce! Dillan hit in face with basketball during gym, had nose bleed. Nicolle’s lawyer shared my contact info, I should bill her for PO Box. My dad called with computer problem, talked to mom for two hours after.

item.title: Status Update – December 14, 2016
item.description: Cold, only 8°F this morning! Got everywhere on time. In at 7:30, Innovation Workshop from 9-5, 10 hour workday. Twelve minutes to spare picking up kids. Got home, I ate supper and pretty much crashed on couch. Kids decorated the tree, looks nice! Ashley snuggled with me on couch.

item.title: Status Update – December 13, 2016
item.description: Icy morning, fell again, keys punctured my hand, so sore! Two hour delay. Dropped kids at daycare, drive to work not bad. Innovation Workshop interviews for tomorrow. Bruce almost potty trained, doing good, couple of accidents. I put up tree and lights, deck lights; kids excited!

item.title: Status Update – December 12, 2016
item.description: Another Monday. Cold, rainy, ready to freeze/sleet/snow, inch expected for overnight. Kids can’t wait for snow, I’m dreading it! Kids worked up over Christmas, we don’t even have decorations up yet! Took Dillan to Scouts, acted all stupid, Lesa said same at home. Merry Christmas!

item.title: Status Update – December 11, 2016
item.description: Dwyane slept almost all night, drops helped. Church, Backup Serving Deacon duties, took communion to two people with the family. Arby’s for lunch. Ruined our day for getting Christmas tree so breaking out artificial one instead. I needed nap. Kids watched the Secret Life of Pets.

item.title: Status Update – December 10, 2016
item.description: Up early! Dwyane crying, eye swollen. Took Dillan, Ashley to get POB keys, car registrations, oil changed. Dwyane doctor visit, feeling bad, allergies, eye drops. Lesa took Ashley to nursing home caroling with Scouts, then Taco Bell. I fixed boys’ supper. Kids here 3 years today!

item.title: Status Update – December 9, 2016
item.description: Ran late; Dwyane’s bus, kids’ van late too! School called, Dwyane sick; daycare called, Bruce sick; Lesa got both. Dropped them at work later, went grocery shopping. Stayed until I got Dillan, Ashley. Took Ashley to Daisies. Amber visited. More mistakes on background checks! WTF‽

item.title: Status Update – December 8, 2016
item.description: Cold! Smooth morning, not much drama. Okay workday. My testicle injured last summer hurts, lump in my breast hurts, my hands really hurt. Each year my hands hurt worse. Kids full of energy, being crazy kids – all of them. I played with them some. Cooked omelettes. TV. Baths. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – December 7, 2016
item.description: Turned cold! Imagination Station called: Dwyane crying for me, can’t breathe, stopped up, not feeling well. Picked up chips for C3 dinner, then kids. Headed to church, my class did chili and sandwich supper. Met Lesa at church, she took kids home. Success! Rented PO Box for PAVA.

item.title: Status Update – December 6, 2016
item.description: Met with NLCS about Dillan’s test results. Mixed news. No learning disability, average cognitive abilities, probable ADHD, focus/attention issues. Need to educate ourselves, find alternate learning methods. Lesa and I both against drugs to control. Shelf elf big hit! Baths, bed.

item.title: Status Update – December 5, 2016
item.description: Monday’s suck! Kids healthy, me too. Dwyane’s bus turned into lot in front of us, close call! Worked hour over. Ashley invited to Vanessa’s birthday party Saturday. Took a 1⁄2 hour to find Bruce’s shoes! Earned Adventures in Coins Scout belt loop. Lesa, Ashley, boys made cookies.

item.title: Status Update – December 4, 2016
item.description: Up late, hardly got any sleep. Family church, had a good morning. Someone left us some DVDs as Christmas gifts for kids. Thought about getting Christmas tree but opted out; raining and 4 weeks until Christmas. Everyone but Dwyane took naps. Taco supper. Frosty the Snowman. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – December 3, 2016
item.description: Busy! Up early, Solsberry for Santa Train. Kids loved it, not too cold, told Santa what they wanted. Lesa went shopping. Lunch and naps. Bedford Christmas Parade! Ashley on Daisy Scout float, Dillan on Cub Scout float, had great time! Asian Pearl dinner. Home and straight to bed!

item.title: Status Update – December 2, 2016
item.description: Friday! Been a long week! Kids talking about Christmas, getting excited! Santa Train tomorrow. Lesa got a Shelf Elf, kids will wake up, see it, get more excited. Pizza! Watched Scrooge cartoon, The Santa Clause. Calculated kids been with us 1088 days, 3 years in 7 days! Our kids!

item.title: Status Update – December 1, 2016
item.description: Smooth morning, on time! Innovation Workshop, really tired. Worn down, ill, MS? Hard to function. Got kids, Lesa called needing milk, word of advise: don’t take kids to get milk, Wound up with chocolate milk! Fixed omelette for Lesa, myself. Big kid baths. Ashley ton of homework.

item.title: Status Update – November 24, 2016
item.description: Got up early, cleaned everything – looked great! Need new carpet. Bruce sick, plus hit eye on bed playing in dark instead of napping. Dillan has rash. Sixteen people! Ashley stoked over Becky and Maelee. We had enough, everyone had great time, especially kids. The kids did great!

item.title: Status Update – November 21, 2016
item.description: Dillan started day with attitude, got pissed, told him to get with program. Question if we can help him, probably not the people he needs. Work pitch-in lunch. Worked late. Cub Scouts, took rope, taught boys to tie knots. Built 3-D motorized helicopter model. Ashley cleaned room.

item.title: Status Update – November 20, 2016
item.description: Church, serving deacon. Springville Park, Scout potluck lunch, all went. Took boys, Lesa home. Rockets! Dillan launched twice, he’ll never forget! Took Dillan home, Ashley to help serve communion. Steak ‘n’ Shake shakes. Took Dillan to church, we talked about his behavior lately.

item.title: Status Update – November 19, 2016
item.description: Up early, poor deer hunt: cold, rainy, too windy. Lesa fixed kids breakfast, etc. Dillan wore pee-soaked pajamas all morning! Chicken soup lunch was perfect! Naps, even Dillan. Paul and Andrea’s for fried chicken dinner, kids watched X-Mas movies, adults talked, good time! Baths.

item.title: Status Update – November 17, 2016
item.description: Almost missed Dwyane’s bus, Bruce double-pooped his diaper. Lesa went home from work with pink eye. Bruce threw a fit when daycare tried to put a pull-up on him. Dillan sick, came home went straight to bed, not even supper! Went deer hunting for an hour. Homework, baths, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 16, 2016
item.description: Day okay. Pretty sure I’m getting sick. Been giving Dillan the Villain hard time, guess I should slack off, let him breathe. Worked over an hour, made up time off with Ashley at dentist. Picked up kids, Lesa, headed to C3 for Thanksgiving dinner. Surrounded by friends, I enjoyed.

item.title: Status Update – November 15, 2016
item.description: Daycare, time to spare! Mrs. Charles called. Dillan and four other boys ganged up on kindergarten boy, pushed him down, then kicked him! He’s in trouble! Left hour early, took Ashley to dentist, cavity filled. Lesa picked up boys. At home I let Dillan have it. Lesa had words too.

item.title: Status Update – November 14, 2016
item.description: Started day sick, tired, unfocused; got better as day went on. Thanksgiving dinner at Open Arms, 3rd year straight, kids did much better this year! Took pictures of Ashley and Dwyane with Ashley, a resident that watched kids during foster training. Got home late, straight to bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 13, 2016
item.description: Up early, kids woke me before alarm fighting with each other. Church. Kids played outside. During naps Lesa went to Dollar General. Fixed Jeep rear view mirror. Dillan put pumpkins in compost. Kids played outside more. Tried evening hunt, Jamie shooting, ass. Watched TV then bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 12, 2016
item.description: Opening day deer season, hunted morning/evening, saw nothing but squirrels. Took all but Dillan to Tiemans’s for Jeep tires, Dillan didn’t want to go. Spent over an hour trying to teaching Dillan to count change. Lesa went to Walmart, filled care package. Kids played. WALL-E DVD.

item.title: Status Update – November 11, 2016
item.description: Friday! Bruce pooped twice this morning, almost made us late. Even the kids were telling him he made us late. Flew solo at work, handled the crazy calls. Picked up kids, Bruce was good! Well sort of, good enough. Kids played outside until dark. Pizza. Watched Bug’s Life. Bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – November 8, 2016
item.description: Election Day, voted for Hilary, looks like Trump might win. Kids excited about election for some reason, built up in school I guess. We went out to eat at Golden Corral, it was Family Night but it still cost us plenty. In contact with Jessica from daycare all day, Bruce a booger.

item.title: Status Update – November 7, 2016
item.description: New week, everyone in pretty good shape. Got kids to daycare on time. Kids learned about election at school. Bruce caused trouble – pulled a kid’s hair out, wouldn’t listen or come in, called teachers names, etc. – a total shit. No Scouts, but had Scout leader meeting. I’m tired.

item.title: Status Update – November 6, 2016
item.description: Family church, I love our kids! After church kids played outside, another nice day. All but Dillan and Lesa took naps, they cleaned chicken coop. Snacks. I took kids to Springville Elementary to ride bikes. Taught Ashley to ride her bike w/o training wheels. Supper, some TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 5, 2016
item.description: Dillan lost first tooth, tooth fairy visited. Up early, Southeastway Park east of Indy, photo shoot with my niece Jordan Hamilton. Great pictures, picnic lunch, kids played on playgrounds. Long drive, construction, but worth it. Kids rode bikes, played at home. Baths. A good day!

item.title: Status Update – November 3, 2016
item.description: Normal school, daycare day. Innovation Workshop. Picked up kids, Bruce in timeout with Jessica: ran outside couple of times, wouldn’t listen, wouldn’t come in, but did take nap. When asked to do something or lose TV, said he didn’t care, he’d watch TV at home. Not! He’s grounded!

item.title: Status Update – November 1, 2016
item.description: Followed Dwyane’s bus into parking lot, Springville Elementary kids loading in van, very close call! Design Innovation Workshop took my entire workday. Lesa picked up kids from daycare. Got home shortly after 6p, kids rushed out to hug and welcome me! Nice feeling! Baths for all.

item.title: Status Update – October 31, 2016
item.description: Halloween, but typical Monday. Barely made Dwyane’s bus. Kid’s came home with candy. After supper put on costumes, went to Hillcrest CC, thought they were having Trunk or Treat – wrong! Went to CornerStone for photo, games, candy, hayride; kids had fun! Straight to bed once home!

item.title: Status Update – October 30, 2016
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home. Unseasonably warm, kids played outside lots. Carved pumpkins: Dillan wanted scary, Ashley pretty, Dwyane mean, Bruce happy. They thought it yucky, lost interest, left me to finish. Taco supper, I pretended salsa was super hot, kids laughed. TV, then bed.

item.title: Status Update – October 29, 2016
item.description: Up early, 6 hrs. foster training in Bloomfield: recognizing trauma/abuse, mandatory reporting, Indiana stats. Kids made tie dye shirts, painted pumpkins, Ashley helped in nursery. Back home, naps, supper. C3 Trunk or Treat, then Scout Trunk or Treat at park. Lots of candy! Baths!

item.title: Status Update – October 28, 2016
item.description: Work week over! Got off at 2:30pm. Bruce had another good day, daycare put cute pic of him on Facebook. Kids played outside all afternoon, Bruce fell in new gravel while running, scraped knee and hand. Pizza! Watched original Snow White. Feel bad we still haven’t carved pumpkins!

item.title: Status Update – October 27, 2016
item.description: On time all week, knock on wood! Work sucks per usual. Working on driveway when we got home, looks good, much needed. Dillan doing bad in school, not bad, horrible! We worked on math, he doesn’t understand basics. Kids played outside until dark. Showers instead of baths. TV. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – October 26, 2016
item.description: Dwyane and Bruce picked pumpkins with daycare, got reports Bruce behaved! Tractor parked in yard, my guess driveway getting graded tomorrow. Tried to meet Dillan’s friend Fletcher at Cornerstone Church for bonfire/hot dogs, no go, so Plan B: Steak ‘n’ Shake! Fell asleep on couch!

item.title: Status Update – October 24, 2016
item.description: Work, school, daycare, tired already! Bruce not liking daycare, bored. Todd in CA, held down fort, talked to some crazy people. Dillan left agenda/folder at school trying to avoid homework, not gonna fly. Scout Pack Meeting, Wolves brought snacks, Dillan behaved, helped clean up.

item.title: Status Update – October 22, 2016
item.description: Slept til 8:30! Low-life trash down the street backed dually truck into yard, stole persimmons from our tree, patched yard, ran over kid’s badminton set while we were in Wisconsin – simply unbelievable. Dwyane hit head, bled. Fowler’s Pumpkin Patch, corn maze, pumpkins, hay ride.

item.title: Status Update – October 14, 2016
item.description: Worked full day. Lesa took half day, meet Maecie Boles, introduced her to animals. Rental van not available! Found another in Bloomington, lucky! Amber visited, did paperwork, she watched kids, we had date night at Sofra Café, very tasty! Kids played Wii, watched The Incredibles.

item.title: Status Update – October 13, 2016
item.description: Okay morning, kept busy at work, mentioned for hard work on AMP pages in director notes. Got time off, booked motel, reserved rental car, found animal sitter, I did good! Kid’s don’t know we’re going. Dwyane’s parent/teacher conference with Jill Kluender at Parkview. Asian Pearl.

item.title: Status Update – October 10, 2016
item.description: Parent teacher conference with Mrs. Wronowicz, Mrs. Anderson, Ashley doing great, Dillan having trouble, nothing to get worried about yet but I’m still worried. Dillan and Ashley had pajama day, gave pennies to support someone with cancer, they have good hearts. Scouts. Homework.

item.title: Status Update – October 9, 2016
item.description: Church, serving deacon, communion two places. Arby’s. Haircuts, kids look great! Got in crawl space, located leak, will fix myself. Nobody had naps, had cranky kids. Dinner at church, boys and Lesa went home after, Ashley stayed with me, listened to worship team concert. Enjoyed!

item.title: Status Update – October 8, 2016
item.description: Took Bruce, hauled recyclables, lost bin lid, made some cash, bought Bruce sucker from CVS. Conservation officer showed looking for neighbor, Dwyane gave him what-for. Water company showed, have leak under house, not the best news. Ate good dinner, grilled out salmon. Bed, baths.

item.title: Status Update – September 24, 2016
item.description: Ashley sick, threw up all night, stayed until she fell back asleep. Dillan woke us up early yelling at the boys. Hauled the trash, all but Dillan went. Took Ashley to have prints made, ate lunch, she felt sick again. No one napped except Ashley, myself. Relaxed afternoon/evening.

item.title: Status Update – September 23, 2016
item.description: Friday! Another long workday, glad work week over! A few adoption emails, everything sent but one. Felt a bit better. Bruce took Ashley’s photos, can’t find them anywhere, she’s devastated. Kids played outside all evening. Pizza! Ate normal, first time this week. Watched TV. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – September 22, 2016
item.description: Overslept but made it. Long workday, dragged on. Lots of adoption-related emails: background check waiver request letters; PRIs for Tammy Minger, financials too; two sets of four for Stephanie and DCS; hoping we’re about done! Lesa picked up Dwyane and took to WIC. Big kid baths.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2016
item.description: Got into bed last night, found love note to Lesa and me from Ashley. I slept good! Went to SIRA for imaging on lump in right breast. Think it’s reaction to medication, suggested surgery to remove if too painful, not cancer! Dillan homework, boys’ baths, some TV, bed. Quiet night!

item.title: Status Update – September 18, 2016
item.description: Church, Jr. Church. Lesa stayed home, worn out from yesterday, needed to recoup. Lesa took Dwyane shopping as reward for not wetting bed, other kids jealous. No one had naps. Made kids play outside. Set up badminton net, tried to teach kids to play, did pretty good. Danced, sang.

item.title: Status Update – September 17, 2016
item.description: Woke Dillan early, ate breakfast, headed to Maumee Camp for 2016 Cub Scout Shoot-O-Ree. Won at marbles, did good with most things, two-handed coordination things not his strong suit. Rained all day long but okay, we had great time! After supper watched TV, baths, bed! Lesa tired!

item.title: Status Update – September 16, 2016
item.description: Missed Dwyane’s bus! Drove him to school, he liked it, talked up a storm! Late to work too. Maumee camping trip with Dillan rained out, thunderstorms forecast but hasn’t happened yet. Ordered a new 8×10, need three: Nicolle, Daniel, us. A Wreck-It Ralph, popcorn, root beer night.

item.title: Status Update – September 15, 2016
item.description: Ran late again. Long ass day! Worked 11 hours, pretty much exhausted! Lesa picked up kids. Ate reheated Hamburger Helper for supper – not Lesa’s usual affair, but best she could do while handling kids without me. School pictures. Dillan lost 8×10, bent two others. I got very mad!

item.title: Status Update – September 14, 2016
item.description: Dropped Dwyane, Bruce at daycare. Took Dillan, Ashley to dentist, Took two hours! Both not brushing back teeth well, Ashley needs some gum removed to allow molar to come in, plus has cavity in back. Worked over, and again tomorrow. Amber supposed to have phone visit, didn’t call.

item.title: Status Update – September 13, 2016
item.description: Almost missed bus again! Dwyane school pic day, he looked good! Kids finally got to take sack lunch. Finally got info on Daisy Scouts. Let school know Dillan and Ashley in late tomorrow for dentist appointment. Ashley made us “I love you” book. Lesa in good mood. Had 101.7 fever.

item.title: Status Update – September 12, 2016
item.description: Overslept, made it everywhere on time. Talked with Billie Landstrom about keeping kids. Dillan struggled with math homework. Completed Scout requirements for Running with the Pack. Kids watched The Incredibles, ate popcorn, drank lemonade. Feeling mixed emotions, sad for Nicolle.

item.title: Status Update – September 10, 2016
item.description: Up early. From 11-2 Dillan sold Scout popcorn. Went to JayC first. Wrong! IGA was the place. Sold $265 in popcorn plus $40 donations. Met quota, covered expenses for year. Steak ‘n’ Shake lunch, chocolate shakes! Late lunch ruined taco supper. 101 Dalmatians. I felt sick all day.

item.title: Status Update – September 9, 2016
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Kids wanted to look at burned house. Kids acting up a lot, know we’re keeping them, not on best behavior anymore. They’re right, we’re stuck with them! Grade cards, everything’s great but we know different, Dillan is struggling. Paperwork for Dillan’s testing came.

item.title: Status Update – September 8, 2016
item.description: Dwyane glad to go to school, thrill worn off for Dillan and Ashley. Kids played outside before eating, did homework after, both lied about having any. Ashley cleaned under her bed! Big kid baths. Didn’t have normal problem getting kids to bed, tired? Stormed, thunder scared kids.

item.title: Status Update – September 7, 2016
item.description: Not much to say. Dillan still having attitude and anger issues, probably will for a long time, maybe always. Per usual, Bruce is mischievous as all-get-out. Dwyane is like Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, sometimes demon and sometimes angel. Ashley is the quintessential spoiled princess.

item.title: Status Update – September 6, 2016
item.description: Labor Day weekend over! Texted Mrs. Wronowicz about Sidewalk program Ashley is in. Lindsey Bailey called about Dillan’s testing in Oct. or Nov. Lesa arranged Ashley’s Scouts at Needmore on Tuedays. On way home drove by wreck, hurt kids, kids saw. Picked up mums at feeder auction.

item.title: Status Update – September 5, 2016
item.description: Up at 8:15! Breakfast, headed to Karst Farm Park in Bloomington. Bruce scared hell out of me at park, played in sandbox, had picnic lunch. Got wet at Splash Pad. Home, napped, played, watched movie. Later Dillan refused to help, I got mad, threw cars in woods. Almost a great day.

item.title: Status Update – September 4, 2016
item.description: Family church. Took Dillan on long drive/talk; mad at brothers, bio-parents, thinks I’m too rough; sad about uncles, grandpa; no hesitation, he wants us to adopt; Wendy’s lunch. Napped with Bruce. Cooked out supper. Shot fireworks. Camped with Ashley. Today better than yesterday!

item.title: Status Update – September 2, 2016
item.description: Stressful day! Argued with Dillan, told me he really loves Lesa and dogs but doesn’t like me or being with me. Stephanie, Amber, and SNAP Specialist Brenda Stoner came over, spent all evening with them, talked adoption with us, Stephanie told kids. Things are getting real. Scary!

item.title: Status Update – August 31, 2016
item.description: Late morning. Mrs. Wronowicz texted, Ashley felt sick. Mrs. Anderson called, initiating Dillan’s testing. Bad work day. Afternoon storms. Lesa called, Jeep wouldn’t run, got it going, followed her home. Picked up kids. Took Dillan, Ashley to Advance Auto; put new battery in Jeep.

item.title: Status Update – August 30, 2016
item.description: Got to daycare seconds before Dwyane’s bus, got lucky! Day spiraled downhill from there. I’m sick, work blew up, stressful day putting out fires. By the time I picked up kids my energy was gone, turns out Lesa was even more exhausted. Managed to help with homework and baths. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – August 29, 2016
item.description: Back to work, back to school, back to daycare. Lesa recovering, I’m getting sick. Long workday. Picked up kids, rushed home. Yummy spaghetti dinner! Took Dillan to Scouts, first real night as Den Leader, he’s proud I’m dad. Seven rowdy boys, it sucked! Dillan had fun so worth it.

item.title: Status Update – August 28, 2016
item.description: Security Deacon. Got report kids did well. Lunch at home, Lesa said “I can’t imagine taking them to a restaurant.”, they were pretty worked up. Lesa cleaned, filled pool. After naps kids played in pool, rode bikes, pool again. Ashley crashed, scraped her leg; boys need new bikes.

item.title: Status Update – August 27, 2016
item.description: Up early, left hour late for McVay reunion in Fortville. Rain, construction, 465-E just 1 lane. Ate huge lunch, visited bio-mom, step dad. Next, bio-dad, step mom’s for Becky’s baby shower. Ashley said “It was awesome!” Ate more. Left for home! Supper. TV. Baths. Good to be home!

item.title: Status Update – August 26, 2016
item.description: Friday! Back to normal routine. Work was okay, kind of in a daze, still thinking of the last few days. Lesa decided to just take the day off. Called JOINT services about Dillan but no response yet. Parkview nurse called wanting updated Lactose intolerant script for Dwyane. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2016
item.description: Case files day three, done with 2 stuffed file cabinet drawers! Briefly talked with Stephanie; thanked DCS for time, room. Lunch at Bo Rick’s, great coney dogs, hand-made onion rings. Still trying to process, it’s all so surreal. We wonder who did most harm – mom and dad, or DCS?

item.title: Status Update – August 24, 2016
item.description: Shoals for case files day two. Scanned a ton! Not sure of value but rather have it than not, kids can decide when grown. Learning stuff we didn’t know but mostly same thing time-and-again, a lot depressing! Had Faytastic ranch and chicken pizza, probably best pizza I’ve ever had!

item.title: Status Update – August 23, 2016
item.description: We dropped kids at daycare, watched Dwyane get on bus. Went to Shoals, started looking at case files before they are sealed, got through 2 boxes, exhausting! Lesa has cold, poor girl was miserable. Velma’s for lunch. Learned much, filled in some missing pieces, many holes remain!

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2016
item.description: Back to work and school. Ashley fell playing basketball at recess and scraped her knee; her version is she can’t walk and nearly bled to death! Dillan is a Wolf Scout, looks like I’m the Den Leader, old one is in hospital with liver failure, crap! The things we do for these kids!

item.title: Status Update – August 21, 2016
item.description: Church, Jr. Church, kids did great! Lunch, naps, played all afternoon. Perfect weather! Took walk to see animals but none were out, stomped in mud puddles instead. Kids ran races, got tired out. Took lots of selfies! Roast chicken dinner! I had really good day! Hope kids did too!

item.title: Status Update – August 20, 2016
item.description: Took Dillan to Atwater, good news, no glasses/drops, recheck in 6 weeks! Donuts! Bruce punched hole in screen during nap; threw books, clothes, toys in rain; ruined all, everyone angry. Lesa was anxious about cookout with Stinson’s. It was great! Dillan on best behavior for Noah.

item.title: Status Update – August 19, 2016
item.description: Dillan and Ashley school pictures at 8:45am, Ashley somehow got pizza sauce on her shirt! Vacuumed, cleaned for Amber visit, went over RAPT training, various other stuff, she had a kitten with her. Lesa and I went to dinner alone! Amber watched kids. Kids, animals, all missed us!

item.title: Status Update – August 18, 2016
item.description: Power out all night, kids did good getting ready in dark. Coming home from daycare Ashley had meltdown over pillow and blanket. Made her leave table for whining. She’s been arguing lots lately. Dillan beat himself up over homework, told Lesa other kids way ahead of him. Power on.

item.title: Status Update – August 17, 2016
item.description: Good start. Bruce slept all night, feeling better. Got home, no electricity, took everyone out to eat, you guessed it, Asian Pearl. Server remembered us, got too close and hands-on with Bruce, made me nervous. Showered boys while water still warm. Lanterns. I’m going to bed soon.

item.title: Status Update – August 16, 2016
item.description: Bruce cried all night, had ear ache, was up half the night with him, 2.5 hrs sleep! Smooth morning, on time, nothing forgotten. Worked solo half the day. Picked up kids, we all went to doctor, Bruce total booger! CVS for bubble gum Amoxicillin. Ate, homework, baths, early to bed!

item.title: Status Update – August 15, 2016
item.description: Kids to school on time, I forgot dentures, was late. Lesa and I got fingerprinted for background checks. Dillan and Ashley said they didn’t feel well, made them take naps before supper, both slept. Did homework after eating, both had fevers, to bed! Boys seemed okay, got to play.

item.title: Status Update – August 14, 2016
item.description: Church, roadways flooded, rained all night. Ate lunch at El Ranchero, saw Jim and Ella Carter, they paid our bill! Great Clips for kids’ haircuts, Lesa too, they look good! Naps. Swimming, pool full from rain, water was cold! No TV today! Tried for early bedtime, school tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – August 13, 2016
item.description: Slept until 10:30! Lesa had kids handled. Had my coffee then hauled trash with Dillan and Ashley in pouring rain. Took a nap too! Good day except it rained 3-4 inches! Flood warnings. Kids played Sight Words Splat! game, Uno, Wii. After supper watched TV, baths, read a book, bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2016
item.description: Friday! Lesa took Dwyane to class, he was proud but shy. Off at 1:30, got gas, cut grass, loaded trash, ordered/picked up pizza. Kids helped Lesa carry groceries. Ate pizza, MS tired, fell asleep eating! All but Lesa hung out in pool. Nice day for me, hopefully Lesa and kids too.

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2016
item.description: First day of school for Dillan and Ashley! Dillan is in 2nd grade and Ashley is in 1st grade, got pictures of course, Ashley had homework, Dillan did not, both behaved, both excited. Dwyane is excited for his first day tomorrow. They really have been with us a very long time now!

item.title: Status Update – August 10, 2016
item.description: Half-hour off this morning! That won’t do! Real thing in morning! Today mirror of yesterday: picked up kids and Lesa, Meet and Greet with Dwyane’s Parkview teacher. Afterward, Steak ‘n’ Shake, shakes for desert of course! Dollar General for milk. School clothes out, in bed early.

item.title: Status Update – August 9, 2016
item.description: On time this AM! I’m ready for school. Lots of emails regarding adoption. Have background checks and case file review scheduled and time off work arranged. Ready to adopt too! Picked up kids, picked up Lesa, headed to Springville Elementary for Meet and Greet with their teachers.

item.title: Status Update – August 8, 2016
item.description: Almost have school timing down, off 5-10 mins. Gave chocolates to daycare staff as peace offering. Workday went fast! Stephanie emailed lots of adoption info. Set up meeting with Special Needs Adoption Program (SNAP) Specialist. Background check, case file review scheduling info.

item.title: Status Update – August 7, 2016
item.description: Family Sunday at church; while singing Forgiveness by Matthew West, Ashley told me she can forgive her mom but not her dad, I cried. Lesa bought remaining school supplies during kids’ naps, I stayed home and babysat them. Spent whole afternoon in pool. Watched some TV before bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 6, 2016
item.description: Up early for Saturday. Walmart for school clothes and supplies. Lots of shoes, jeans, and so on. Forgot Ashley’s supply list, need to go back. Arby’s lunch. Spent afternoon at Wilson’s swimming in their big pool, had great time! Came home, swam in ours! Garden fare supper. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 5, 2016
item.description: Friday! Daycare and work on time. Got off early at 1:30pm, result of working over all week. Decided to pick up kids early. Cut some grass with trim mower. Cleaned our shower. Pool sounded good so we all got in for a couple of hours until Lesa got home. Pizza! TV and lazy evening.

item.title: Status Update – August 4, 2016
item.description: Okay day, no troubles. Everyone but Bruce had field trip. Dillan and Ashley went swimming at Mitchell Pool, Dwyane back to Huber Farm. Storms cut day short. Worked a little over. Smooth night. Ate, big kids baths, TV, bed. Fell asleep on love seat, woke up stiff just minutes ago.

item.title: Status Update – August 3, 2016
item.description: Called Jessica at daycare, talked about kids’ behavior, got heated at times. Ashley has been acting out all summer long, we’re just hearing about it. Todd back at work, got short with me, ready for new job. Amber 1⁄2 hour late; spent 2 hours on foster license, adoption paperwork.

item.title: Status Update – August 2, 2016
item.description: Lesa took Dillan, Ashley for wellness checks; enrolled Dwyane in preschool. I took boys to daycare. Ashley booted from field trip again! Enrolled Dillan, Ashley in 1st, 2nd grade respectively; holy moly! Went to Asian Pearl. Upset with kids’ behavior lately: pre-adoption jitters?

item.title: Status Update – August 1, 2016
item.description: Solo at work, Todd on vaca. Stormed, daycare field trips rained out. Ashley last dance class, got to watch her, filmed most of it, she felt special, she is special. Debating signing her up again: school, Good News Club, Daisy’s, and dance? School enrollment paperwork, three sets!

item.title: Status Update – July 31, 2016
item.description: Church, Dillan’s Jr. Church teacher. Cut some grass, cleaned/filled pool, trim mowed, swam with kids all afternoon. Grilled salmon, kids realized it’s fish – thought it was chicken cooked different – like fish now. Lesa trimmed around flowers, kids played on Big Wheels. Nice day.

item.title: Status Update – July 30, 2016
item.description: Took kids to Jackson County Fair, had great time, most animals already gone, rode lots of rides, ate lots of food. Kids tired, whiny. Girl Scout pool party at John Lowery Pool in Bedford after supper, great time again, kids already tired, had fits when we left. Long day! Bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – July 29, 2016
item.description: Friday started with Bruce taking off diaper pooping house! Dillan’s last day tutoring, 5-mile bike ride with Noah! Pizza! Ended with Ashley head-butted by Bruce, upper front tooth bent, top sticking out gum, B-town emergency dentist visit, tooth pulled, Frosty, tooth fairy visit!

item.title: Status Update – July 28, 2016
item.description: Power out, daycare closed! Took kids to work, Alicia willing to watch kids, drove them to Heltonville. Storms. Pulmonologist appointment. Mass gone! Clear lungs! Praise God! Back to work, need full 8 hours. Lesa picked up kids. Everyone happy when I got home. What a nice feeling!

item.title: Status Update – July 23, 2016
item.description: Kids thrilled Daddy’s friend ate breakfast with them, Jordan big hit with kids! Lesa and Dillan got birthday gifts from Walmart for Carter and Parker Davis, I took Dillan and Ashley to their party, they had fun! Lesa able to swam with Dwyane and Bruce, I swam with kids once home.

item.title: Status Update – July 22, 2016
item.description: Took Dillan to Jenny Stinson’s, Noah busy. Lesa took off, cleaned house. My friend Jordan Johnson from California staying night; dinner at Stonecutter’s Cafe, Jiffy Treat ice cream. Talked until late, enjoyed catching up on last 16 years! Big adventure for kids: want him to stay.

item.title: Status Update – July 21, 2016
item.description: Stormed all morning into afternoon. Hot day! Last day of swim lessons, I took them again. Ashley jumped off low/high diving boards, she actually swam to side in deep water! Dillan stayed on slide. He can’t float after two years of lessons! Had party after swim lessons. I’m tired!

item.title: Status Update – July 20, 2016
item.description: Running on empty all week! Another 9.5 hr day, caught up but need to be an hour up for Dillan’s tutoring on Friday. Lesa picked up kids to make it easier on me, kids made it hard on her as result. Amber showed up at 5 pm, miscommunication somewhere. Took big kids to swim lessons.

item.title: Status Update – July 19, 2016
item.description: Worked 9.5 hrs. Dillan and Ashley had bake sale at daycare, bought some when I picked up kids. Dwyane had good time on field trip to Law. Co. Fair. Lesa took big kids to swim lessons. I stayed with boys, watched TV, read Paw Patrol Pirate book, tucked in bed. Cut grass afterward.

item.title: Status Update – July 18, 2016
item.description: Took Dwyane for Wellness Check, doing good, 2 shots, trooper! Stormed, HT power out, worked at home until on. Lesa picked up pizzas, I picked up kids. Took Ashley to dance. Took Ashley and Dillan to swim lessons. Lesa stayed with boys, ate popcorn, drank lemonade, watched movies.

item.title: Status Update – July 17, 2016
item.description: Horrible day! Jr. Church, Andrea Fries expressed concern about me and kids, made Lesa cry. Live bluegrass at Norman Station, kids didn’t like, left shortly after arriving. Told Lesa I don’t want to adopt. Kids swam. Dwyane and Lesa’s birthday, gifts, cookie, I cooked Lesa dinner.

item.title: Status Update – July 16, 2016
item.description: Slept until 8:30! Dillan on my nerves immediately, peed bed 949th day in a row! Relaxed after my coffee. Lesa ran errands with Dwyane. She fell in garden, hurt wrist really bad. Celebrated Dwyane and Lesa’s birthday with cookout at Fries. Caron Hulsey PMed me again. TV and baths.

item.title: Status Update – July 14, 2016
item.description: Lesa and I overslept this morning, first time in long time! Still got to work on time. Lesa’s turn to take Dillan and Ashley to swim lessons. I stayed with the boys, had a good time! We swam, watched TV, ate pretzels, and drank lemonade. The boys like me; hard to tell at bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – July 13, 2016
item.description: No one wanted to get up! Big kids went bowling, sounded like they had fun. My turn to take Dillan and Ashley to swim lessons. Dillan not horsing as much as last year but still too much. The boys swam too. Lesa said they’re taking to the water well. Stormed, kids a little freaked.

item.title: Status Update – July 9, 2016
item.description: Dillan Atwater appointment, one more and we’re pulling plug. Donuts! Looked at house for sale in Hoosier by Williams. Cut grass. Spent afternoon in pool. Stuff zucchini! Monroe County Fireworks show at fairgrounds, perfect weather, Bruce scared, other kids had fun. Very nice day!

item.title: Status Update – July 8, 2016
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Bruce pottied in toilet all day. Lesa took Ashley to eye doctor. Dillan tutoring. Feeling sadness, sorrow, joyless: TPR had to happen! Not optimal outcome, better if bio-parents got well years ago, kids will forever deal with being adopted, celebration feels wrong.

item.title: Status Update – July 7, 2016
item.description: Tired! Dillan and Ashley fought at daycare. Lesa did CDDF paperwork. Dwyane went to Jumpin’ Joey’s. Easy evening, nothing scheduled! Lesa had Dillan read, says he’s improving. Baths all around. We’ve decided to leave given names as is and only change surname: Moffett to Williams.

item.title: Status Update – July 6, 2016
item.description: Everyone hard time waking! Ashley Exotic Feline Rescue Center field trip, Dillan misbehaved, couldn’t go, won’t learn! Lesa picked up boys, took them to Brinegar’s in Bloomington for eye exams, all well. I picked up Dillan and Ashley. Amber visit, mountains of adoption paperwork!

item.title: Status Update – July 5, 2016
item.description: Daniel, Nicolle voluntarily terminated parental rights. I cried, felt sad for them, Lesa stronger. Signed PAVAs. Went to Clerks Office with our lawyer Tammy Minger, filed petitions to adopt. Ate at Golden Corral, told kids judge letting us keep them, happy, Ashley sad about Evie.

item.title: Status Update – July 4, 2016
item.description: July 4th. Rained lots. Fireworks cancelled or rained out. Kids stuck in house, cabin fever. Went to Rural King, Ashley bought 2 stuffed animals, Dillan opted to save to buy more expensive toy. Went in pool while raining but too cold. TV and Wii. Lesa and I nervous about tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2016
item.description: Family Sunday church, serving deacon, no home-bound visits. Arby’s packed, Burger King instead. CVS for Lesa’s bandages, kids keep stepping on her foot tearing blisters open, she’s in pain! Everything rained out including fireworks. Probably watched too much TV. I’m feeling sick.

item.title: Status Update – July 2, 2016
item.description: Slept ’til 9:30! Busy morning prepping for Dillan’s party. Great day and perfect weather for being outdoors! Fries, Stinsons, Williams and kids only people. Games, gifts, cake and ice cream. Dillan said it was awesome! Played in creek. Supper, baths, bed. Happy kids that love us!

item.title: Status Update – June 28, 2016
item.description: Lesa’s coffee cup exploded, scalded her with hot coffee, huge blisters on right foot, went to ER, mostly post care; excused from work, ordered off foot ’til Friday! Called in, helped her all day: made lunch, helped with supper, etc. Took all the kids to VBS, they had a good time!

item.title: Status Update – June 27, 2016
item.description: Long day after long night, we’re tired! Dwyane misbehaving. Ashley Mitchell Pool field trip, Dillan not. Doctor after work: be careful, anti-inflammatories, antibiotics, rest month or two. Ashley dance class, loves it! Dillan ultimatum: dirt bike or pee bed forever; called bluff!

item.title: Status Update – June 24, 2016
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Dillan tutoring; reading, writing, two math sessions; tutors say he’s doing good. Bruce water day with squirt guns. Dwyane nature hike, cake. Ashley glow ice, face painting. Took kids to Jiffy Treat after supper, Bruce threw new shoes out window going down highway!

item.title: Status Update – June 21, 2016
item.description: Ultrasound, uncomfortable, tears but no crying, blood-filled scrotum, images will be sent to doctor for reading / review. Worked 10 hours, covered today / yesterday, caught up time. Dillan banned from 2nd field trip in 2 days! Let him know we love him but we’re also disappointed.

item.title: Status Update – June 20, 2016
item.description: Doctor visit, a kid jumped on my testicle last week, tore it loose, very painful, ultrasound tomorrow to see how bad / what next. Pizza. Ashley’s dance times changed, didn’t inform us, upset, substituting Thursday for today. Dillan’s last ballgame, he did great, I’m proud of him.

item.title: Status Update – June 19, 2016
item.description: Father’s Day! Lots of gifts and cards from kids. Church. Text from Stephanie Helton said “Happy Father’s Day to one of the most Awesome fathers I know!” Unexpected surprise! Swam lots, watched TV, hung out with kids and Lesa all day. Lesa got me an Amazon Echo. It was a nice day!

item.title: Status Update – June 18, 2016
item.description: Hauled trash with Bruce. Cut grass, yard looks good! Kids wouldn’t settle down enough to nap. Bruce pooped, took off diaper, got it all over bedroom floor. Springville parade after snacks, Dillan marched with Cub Scouts, kids got lots of candy! Swam, grilled salmon. Busy fun day!

item.title: Status Update – June 17, 2016
item.description: Took Dillan to Stinson’s, tutoring in PM. After work got kids, Yoho’s for ice cream, picked up Dillan, Springville for pizzas, went home and ate. Filled pool, in we went! Played in pool until past bedtime, then bed! Was a nice evening! Lesa is really worried about me, the future!

item.title: Status Update – June 11, 2016
item.description: Hot sunny day, played outside all day. Went to cookout after naps. Ray, Michelle, Ellie and Stephen Hausler; Ross and Bobbie Johnson; Ron and Grace Campbell; Paul and Andrea Fries; and us! Kids had lots of fun: golf cart rides, squirt gun fights, riding bikes, running; tired out!

item.title: Status Update – June 10, 2016
item.description: Friday! Still not accepting it’s over, waiting for something to get in the way, been here too many times to believe, Lesa same. Took Dillan to Noah Stinson’s. Had great time! Noah took him to Solsberry Community Center where he was tutored in reading and math. He liked it. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – June 6, 2016
item.description: Dillan and Ashley swam at Jessica Smith’s, Dwyane next, excited! Picked up kids, got home, served dinner Lesa fixed (she was at vet), barely sat down Amber arrived. Ate supper, she played with kids, finished visit. Headed to Dillan’s ballgame with Ashley, Lesa stayed with babies.

item.title: Status Update – June 5, 2016
item.description: Family church, I always enjoy. During song Good, Good Father Ashley said “I love you Daddy.” Made my day! Dillan loving too. Cut grass, fixed slide on swing set, cleaned/filled pool, weed-eated Lesa’s flower garden. Swam with kids but not long – too cold. Ate lasagna out on deck.

item.title: Status Update – June 1, 2016
item.description: Dillan tutoring scheduled, transportation arranged, such relief! My night for homework with him, disaster! Wound up lecturing him. Doesn’t know sight words, phonetics, or how to sound out words. Can’t do single digit addition either, worried for him! Fell, hit his head, has knot!

item.title: Status Update – May 31, 2016
item.description: Lovely morning, 2 sick kids plus Dwyane pooped himself, he thought it was a fart. Called Lindsey Bailey at JOINT Services, talked about Dillan’s testing, maybe in August. Trying to setup tutoring for Dillan this summer; organizing logistics, transportation; he needs help reading.

item.title: Status Update – May 29, 2016
item.description: Church, graduation ceremonies, Dillan advancing, Ashley honored for kindergarten graduation, it was nice. Squirt gun/water balloon fights, swimming, wet and crazy fun in general. Lesa volunteered me to spend the night with Ashley in the tent. Ashley super excited, me not so much.

item.title: Status Update – May 28, 2016
item.description: Rough morning, Bruce whining. Cut grass, cleaned/filled pool, kids swam. Took Dillan to Glow in the Dark Golf in Bloomington with his friends Bruce and Patrick, he had awesome time! Got Frosties for ride home. Baths, reading, bed! Put Bruce’s new electric Jeep together; surprise!

item.title: Status Update – May 26, 2016
item.description: Ashley Kindergarten Graduation! Wonderful time! Bittersweet: sad/glad she’s growing up; but much too fast! Afterward took her to Judah-Logan park before going to daycare, wish we could’ve gone home but have to work, work can suck sometimes! I’m mad over call about testing Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – May 24, 2016
item.description: Nice day! Dillan slid into home last night, strained groin, limping. Water gun/water balloon fights after supper, great fun! Big kids new favorite show: Battle Bots! Note from Mrs. Wronowicz: Dillan will advance to 2nd, but tested for learning disability; he has focus disability!

item.title: Status Update – May 22, 2016
item.description: Church, Ashley still getting birthday wishes from people. Beautiful day, warm, sun shining. Kids played outside all afternoon and with neighbor Aiden. Set up Ashley’s tent. Spent three hours tilling garden for Lesa, put up cucumber fence. Kids had trouble settling down for sleep.

item.title: Status Update – May 20, 2016
item.description: Friday! Ashley excited about birthday party tomorrow. Pizza! Our hero Tammy Minger intervened with Sandy Bowman on PAVA! Dillan copped an attitude over Bruce and toy truck, had issues all night even with Lesa. Sent to bed early, had a meltdown! I let him up to watch TV once calm.

item.title: Status Update – May 17, 2016
item.description: Two people RSVP-ed for Ashley’s birthday party, glad it’s not going to be a bust! Open Arms called and conducted survey. Long day. Kids unaware I had rash attack. School winding down, kids excited. Helped Dillan with homework. Everyone got baths. Lesa did most of the work. Tired!

item.title: Status Update – May 16, 2016
item.description: Happy birthday Bruce, 3 years old! Balloons, ribbons when he awoke. Mini-birthday party after supper: strawberry shortcake, presents, Bruce knew he was special today! He enjoyed festivities! Last Pack meeting, Dillan advanced to Wolf, whole family present, wants to sign up again.

item.title: Status Update – May 14, 2016
item.description: Up early, bagels, BMV, Lowe’s, hauled recyclables, Recycle Center permanently closed, going to landfill discovered new Recycle Center! Hauled trash. All but Dillan went with, he hung with Lesa all day, even grocery shopped with her. Stayed in, cold outside! Casa Brava for dinner!

item.title: Status Update – May 11, 2016
item.description: Everyone healthy for once! Ate supper right away, rushed to cut already wet grass before next round of rain started. Literally rained just as I finished! Storm hit hard, with heavy winds, grown ups watched and worried. Power out in 15 minutes, kids scared, broke out the lanterns.

item.title: Status Update – May 10, 2016
item.description: Ashley’s Track ‘n’ Field Day, she did good, not super athletic, didn’t hold back either. Won 1st heat of two-legged sack race, lost 2nd heat. Big Wheel races canceled by rain. She had good time! I worked 8 hours! Lesa picked up kids and was glad when I got home! Popcorn, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – May 9, 2016
