item.description: Worked long day, tired from busy weekend. Reserved Springville Park shelter house for Ashley’s BD party. Dillan’s ballgame cancelled 1⁄2 hour before start. Scouts instead, Ashley too. Earned Tiger Tales belt loop. Got filthy on playground after, needed showers! Homework, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – May 8, 2016
item.description: Mother’s Day, kids made cards for Lesa, they’re sweet! They truly love her! Ray Hausler preached sermon tailor-made for us, almost balled my eyes out. Dwyane actually had an appetite, seems to be doing better. Lesa went to Walmart, got Dwyane, Bruce new cars. Kids played all day.

item.title: Status Update – May 7, 2016
item.description: Campfire coffee, breakfast, fishing! Broke camp, headed home, Bonehead’s lunch! Shower! Kids and Lesa glad I’m home, me too! Dillan’s first ballgame! He did awesome! Jiffy Treat after game. Naps! Kids rode bikes and played outside except Dwyane: kept him in and let him rest. Bed!

item.title: Status Update – May 6, 2016
item.description: Teacher called, Dwyane’s sick, we knew, Lesa took him to doctor, told her allergies, bull crap, he’s sick! Loaded truck with gear and Dillan, bought bait, headed to Camp Maumee. Set up camp, ate beef stew, best stew ever! Played, hiked, S’mores, campfire, sleeping bags/tent, fun!

item.title: Status Update – May 5, 2016
item.description: On time; Dwyane doing better; kids had Mother’s Day stuff for me to hide. Took Dillan to baseball practice, team River Dogs, he got his navy blue shirt and hat, he strutted and showed his stuff, did pretty well playing. Came home, packed all the camping stuff except for the food.

item.title: Status Update – May 4, 2016
item.description: Ran late this AM. Ashley took field trip to Sieboldt Quarry. Dwyane peed his clothes at daycare yesterday and today, wet bed last night; he’s sick with a low-grade fever. Worked extra 2 hours. Took Dillan to Walmart, spent $400 on camping gear for Scout camping trip this weekend.

item.title: Status Update – May 3, 2016
item.description: Primary elections held in North Lawrence Schools – no school for all kids – even Dwyane. They loved it. Allowed for more leisurely than normal morning routine, good because kids up late last night due to board meeting. Tomorrow will be hard because they’ll want to play some more.

item.title: Status Update – May 2, 2016
item.description: Back to work / school / daycare, no one wanted to go. Tired, didn’t sleep last night. Dillan’s ballgame canceled because of rain; pictures, first game, jamboree on Saturday – we hope! Went to C3 board meeting, took all the kids, what an experience, they were well behaved I guess.

item.title: Status Update – April 30, 2016
item.description: Up early for a Saturday, Lesa fixed us a good breakfast. Kids and I went to foster training. Amber visit while there. Ate lunch together. Took them to DQ for ice cream after. Naps; Dillan peed on couch again. Tacos for supper, one of the kids favorite meals. More TV than we like.

item.title: Status Update – April 29, 2016
item.description: Friday! Normal day. I’m tired, kids tired too. Stopped by Dollar General and bought them some M&Ms for a treat – just because. Everyone stuck inside due to rain. Pizza! Tomorrow’s Baseball Jamboree canceled because of rain – looks like a full day of foster training. Easy bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – April 28, 2016
item.description: Work back to normal. Dwyane tired, didn’t want to go to preschool, didn’t like the way I went home, whined and whined. Bruce is a little sh*t for lack of a better word. Dillan seems to be maturing. Ashley somewhere in-between but has times where it seems she’s grown-up. Love ’em!

item.title: Status Update – April 27, 2016
item.description: Lightening hit Herald Times building putting out power, worked from home almost all day. Still storming, raining out. Kids bored, acted up a little, they’re good kids though. Dillan, Ashley had meltdown over dessert, it was hilarious, we just had to tease them, it was mean of us.

item.title: Status Update – April 26, 2016
item.description: Ashley was flower girl for Q & U wedding at school; she wore her flower dress, had basket of flowers. She got a little jealous of her classmates who got “married.” Nice day, everybody played outside. Cut grass, kids ran like crazy chasing mower. Storms tonight. Felt sick all day.

item.title: Status Update – April 25, 2016
item.description: Monday. Scouts. Took Ashley. Tiger Cubs in charge of snacks. Dillan earned Team Tiger, Tigers in the Wild belt loops. He has the six required to graduate to Wolves. Got his Official Scout ID, received 2015 Platinum Journey to Excellence special collector edition patch. Big night!

item.title: Status Update – April 24, 2016
item.description: Church, Jr Church, Dwyane made papier-mâché flowers, looked nice, on table. Played outside! Watched Hook after supper. Mistake! Little kids had trouble getting to bed. Scared to death Cap’t. Hook going to get them. Cried, hid under covers, had hard time convincing them it’s okay.

item.title: Status Update – April 23, 2016
item.description: Slept in until 9a, Lesa handled kids! Walmart, got lots of kid stuff. Dairy Queen lunch and treat. College Mall next, new experience, very excited seeing all the stores. Got Ashley ballet shoes, tights. Got Dillan bat, balls, helmet. Kids played outside, played catch with Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – April 22, 2016
item.description: Friday! DCS sent voluntary termination papers to Isha, no word from GAL. Ordered pizza from Springville Store, 10 mins. later no power, pizza late. Took Dillan, Ashley to Norm of the North at Bedford Library. Boys stayed with Lesa: took walk, watched bees, TV, popcorn, read book.

item.title: Status Update – April 21, 2016
item.description: Power went out, kids freaked, kept me up all night, lantern nightlights the answer. Tammy Minger had PAVA for us by noon! After emails to-and-fro, sent Sandy Bowman copy for input, nothing yet. Dillan’s T-ball practice was canceled. Signed Ashley up for ballet at Kats in Bedford.

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2016
item.description: Took Dillan, Ashley to school. Took Dwyane, Bruce to dentist; Bruce did great; Dwyane okay with female hygienist, freaked over male dentist. Bruce squeezed toothpaste all over truck, himself on way to daycare. Called lawyer. Ashley doing better. Homework, played ball with Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – April 19, 2016
item.description: Back to work, school. Ashley’s teacher texted, let me know Ashley wasn’t feeling well, called Lesa, she picked her up. Sandra Bowman canceled for 2nd time, done with her, calling Tammy Minger tomorrow to ask her to do PAVA. My guess: it’s going to be another year before adoption.

item.title: Status Update – April 18, 2016
item.description: Ashley fever/cough, Bruce red streak in foot, I called in sick, stayed home with Ashley, watched movies, napped. Picked up Bruce from daycare at 1:00p, off to see doctor. Ashley ear infection, virus; Bruce infection. CVS for Amoxicillin, topical ointment. Frosty’s. Dillan Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – April 17, 2016
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home. Kids played outside except Ashley who’s still sick. Dillan wrecked on his bike, got scraped up. Bruce’s foot has red streak, calling doctor tomorrow. Cut grass; took Dwyane, Bruce for lawn mower rides. Mouse in pantry driving dogs, cats crazy; set traps.

item.title: Status Update – April 16, 2016
item.description: Hauled 20 bags of trash! Took all kids, they love going! Pinewood Derby Races. Dillan placed 4th, 2nd, 4th and was finished. Never mind outcome, he still had fun, got a ribbon. Ashley felt sick, had fever all day. I cooked out. Kids played outside most of day. Baths. Filed taxes.

item.title: Status Update – April 15, 2016
item.description: Got Dillan’s Scout vest, it’s awesome! Cleaned house for Stephanie and Amber’s visit. Ate pizza out on deck. Stephanie arrived; took pictures for dad; we talked in-depth about kids, dad, mom self-terminating, PAVA, adopting. Amber late, she cut her visit short. Bio-mom’s 25th BD.

item.title: Status Update – April 14, 2016
item.description: Saw pulmonologist this AM; 8 tests, 5 twice (after respirator with medicine), 13 tests total; will call with results. Dwyane field trip to Williams Dam, Wendy’s for Frosty and fries. I took Dillan to Dunham’s, bought him a baseball glove, had his 1st T-ball practice, he did good!

item.title: Status Update – April 13, 2016
item.description: Review Hearing in Shoals, report devastating against Nicolle. Told her attorney Isha Wright-Ryan she’s interested in self-termination and PAVA. Meeting Tuesday with Guardian Ad Litem Sandra Bowman to discuss details of agreement. Lesa and I debating pros/cons. Guarded excitement!

item.title: Status Update – April 12, 2016
item.description: Worked until 4p. Picked up kids. Dillan and Ashley misbehaved at Imagination Station, not sure what to do about them. Picked up Lesa. Went to book fair at Parkview, met Dwyane’s librarian, he showed us his room. Went to Golden Corral, kid’s night, got stuffed. Home, showers, bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 11, 2016
item.description: Worked over again! Rushed to get kids, ate supper, headed to old Springville gymnasium for Pinewood Derby weigh-in / trial runs; took Ashley, Dwyane with. Added weights to car, it took 1st place first run! Overall, his car is somewhere in-between competition; he’s really excited!

item.title: Status Update – April 10, 2016
item.description: Church, Dillan acted up again, substitute Sunday School teacher, he took advantage, disrupted class, etc. Rained, kids stuck inside, watched TV. Sanded, painted Pinewood Derby car; Dillan mostly interested in TV, playing. Lesa thought kids acted okay, I thought they acted poorly.

item.title: Status Update – April 9, 2016
item.description: Atwater eye appointment; eye drop script. Donuts! Bought Scout vest, patches being sewn. Kids played outside. Cooked out salmon. Bruce flushed toys down toilet, clogged, overflowed; removed toilet/toys; trip to Lowe’s; took Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane; finished toilet. Baths, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 8, 2016
item.description: Ashley WonderLab field trip, thrilled about brown bag lunch, we left her notes. Mrs. Dillman PM-ed me a photo of Ashley digging for dinosaur bones. Took Dillan to IU ballgame, he had good time despite crazy weather: rain, hail, snow, sunshine! Final IU 10-9. Little Caesars pizza.

item.title: Status Update – April 7, 2016
item.description: Another 9.5 hr day, leaving work at 1:30pm tomorrow to take Dillan to IU/Purdue ballgame! Bought tickets today, he’s excited, Ashley is jealous. Taking him out of school 1⁄2 hour early. Not much happened today; normal work, school, daycare day. Rainy and cold, kids stayed inside.

item.title: Status Update – April 6, 2016
item.description: Dillan and Ashley IEPs, interesting conversations. IU-Purdue baseball game / Scout event rescheduled 2 hours earlier, might not be able to go. My 2nd CT scan after work, Lesa picked up kids, I drove long way home through country. Stormed, power went out, power back 2 hours later.

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2016
item.description: Last 2 days busy, worked 9.5 hrs each, getting tired. Dillan and Ashley IEPs, 2nd CT scan tomorrow. Nippy but nice, kids able to play outside. Not much homework. Bruce acted up, other kids did better. Lesa said Dillan got into reading assignment about parents going out to dinner.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2016
item.description: Lesa stayed home, got kids’ summer clothing out, cleaned. Dillan told to sit down by teacher. He refused. Told to write “I will listen to the teacher.” He refused, crumpled paper, and broke the pencil. Made him write the same sentence instead of going to Scouts as his punishment.

item.title: Status Update – April 3, 2016
item.description: Showered/enjoyed hotel room, woke up kids one-at-a-time. Dressed, packed to leave. Café Sinclair’s breakfast; menus without prices last night, this morning! First for us, lost on kids. Martina’s for dogs, helped remove plow from their new truck. Burger King lunch. Played outside.

item.title: Status Update – April 2, 2016
item.description: Took dogs to Martina’s in Spencer. Drove to West Baden Springs hotel. Stopped at McDonald’s in Loogootee. Trolley ride from hotel to Wizard of Oz train ride. Private trolley to Hagen’s and back. At the hotel we swam, ate chocolate covered strawberries; kids watched big screen TV.

item.title: Status Update – April 1, 2016
item.description: Normal daycare, school, work day. Lesa made it home by 5:00 with groceries. Combined Amber’s visit with Springville Elementary PTO fundraiser carnival by inviting her along. Everyone had good time. Amber took lots of pictures. Pizza Hut for dinner (not Amber). Walmart. Home late.

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2016
item.description: Today the day, totally wasn’t nervous. Doc said probably not cancer, looked like scar tissue but not, possibly a persistent infection. Katrina? Great news regardless! Won’t be dead at year’s end, at least not from lung cancer. Bought candy, shared with kids, celebration of sorts.

item.title: Status Update – March 30, 2016
item.description: Dogs barking, up early. Kids ready on time, daycare early. Work busy, stayed late, time covered for tomorrow. Bruce told other kid’s mom “This my daddy!” Kids couldn’t play outside, raining. Kitchen skylight leaked, put tarp over it, stopped leaking, will call roofers in morning.

item.title: Status Update – March 29, 2016
item.description: Held Dwyane’s hand and waited for bus with him, watched as he got on, he’s a cool kid. Made arrangements to meet girl down the street, wanted to hire her to watch animals this weekend, she didn’t show. Kids played outside. Ashley better, Dillan smarting off now. Ordinary evening.

item.title: Status Update – March 28, 2016
item.description: Good start, forgot coffee, bad start! Worked 9.5 hr day, covering time for lung mass biopsy Thursday, not nervous yet. Ashley gave Layna at daycare hard time for second time, I took her microphone away as punishment. Scouts, took Ashley, they both pigged out on snacks, disgusted.

item.title: Status Update – March 27, 2016
item.description: Deacon breakfast, up at 4 am. Easter Bunny left treats, toys; kids excited! Kids, Lesa sharp dressed in Easter best! Preschoolers sang Jesus Is Alive. Dwyane awesome! Bruce fingers in mouth. Both adorable! Proud they’re ours! Parents canceled visit. Chicken dinner, laid back day.

item.title: Status Update – March 26, 2016
item.description: Lunch and Easter egg hunt at Dellinger-Ross Annual Easter Get Together at Fortville Park. Lesa stuffed 100 eggs with candy. Kids had great time, scored lots of goodies! At home kids played outside; they got muddy. I cooked salmon on grill, we ate on deck, fun time! Baths and bed.

item.title: Status Update – March 25, 2016
item.description: Imagination Station called, Bruce fell off playground equipment, 1⁄4″ cut on back of head. Went to doctor, he’ll be okay. Visited Gary, Marilyn Lentz; kids played, adults talked about fostering. Stone Cutter’s Cafe, pizza supper, celebrated Dillan’s artwork. Worked until 12:15am.

item.title: Status Update – March 24, 2016
item.description: Much better day! Dwyane super proud of new Paw Patrol backpack. Annetta Starr dressed in Easter Bunny outfit when I picked kids up from daycare, Bruce afraid of big characters, won’t go near! Rained off-and-on, kids stuck inside. Dillan tried to be loving, I can tell it’s forced.

item.title: Status Update – March 23, 2016
item.description: Kids on my nerves again! Dwyane field trip to park. Daycare asked me to talk to Ashley: bullying a boy; throwing rocks, cedar chips. Had talk, no desert. Bruce choked at supper, almost had to intervene. Dwyane bit Bruce, drew blood. Never thought I’d say Dillan behaving the best.

item.title: Status Update – March 22, 2016
item.description: Visited Gordon Anderson in hospital, he had heart attack yesterday. Lesa picked up Dwyane for his WIC exam, had pizza since they got home late. Ashley razzed Dillan ALL day over peeing himself, Dillan tried getting even ALL day, finally sent them both to bed early, drove me nuts!

item.title: Status Update – March 21, 2016
item.description: First day after break, everyone tired, us included. Nicer day than yesterday, kids played outside. Scouts, ate early, took Dwyane instead of Ashley, she whined. Worked on belt loops; hiking, conservation (picked up trash). Dillan peed himself on playground, Dwyane had great time!

item.title: Status Update – March 20, 2016
item.description: First day of Spring! Serving deacon at church. Home, lunch, naps; Lesa to Walmart for Easter stuff. Kids played outside, cold, in-and-out. A Bug’s Life and The Jungle Book movies. Fried chicken supper – so good no leftovers. Spring Break over; back to work, daycare, school in AM.

item.title: Status Update – March 19, 2016
item.description: Amber visit; kids like her. Rained overnight. Played outside all morning anyway. Lunch then naps. Something new, veggies for snacks, a hit. Played outside on-and-off to match rain. Lesa played games with them, I made Ashley a tent. Supper, baths, watched TV, ate popcorn, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – March 18, 2016
item.description: Took tour of Exotic Feline Rescue Center. Drove by Clayshire Castle just to look. Burger King lunch in Spencer. Grocery shopping at Bloomington Kroger. Kids bought toys with Easter money from Lesa’s mom. Pizza! Tilled garden more, every kid took a turn. Kids played outside a lot!

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2016
item.description: We tried sleeping in but denied! It was clear day so kids played outside almost all day. Got riding cars out of shed, put on chargers. Started mowers and tiller, did first till of garden, Dillan helped. Went to Ray and Michelle Hausler’s for dinner, good time! Nice laid back day.

item.title: Status Update – March 16, 2016
item.description: Another nice day, cooler. Dwyane, Bruce had field trip to Jessica Smith’s grandpa’s farm; tromped around, looked at animals, got muddy. Big kids wanted to go but didn’t get to. All the kids played outside. Got muddy some more. Baths before picking Lesa up. Long drive, long night!

item.title: Status Update – March 15, 2016
item.description: Kids wouldn’t listen, yelled lots, just plain psycho! Attorney emailed, my basic reply: We’re frustrated! At work, Ron and JB in town, got a free lunch. Great day! Dry, in 70s, kids played outside. Fixed pancakes/waffles. Saw Jym, Cari Littrell at Jiffy Treat. Facetime with Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – March 14, 2016
item.description: Second day without Lesa, everyone survived, I’m really tired. Dogs edgy and watching continuously. Kids did okay. Rained, stuck inside. Spaghetti dinner, burned garlic toast. Did dishes, laundry, trash, little kid baths. Watched Cars 2 movie. Facetime with Lesa and kids. Bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – March 13, 2016
item.description: Took Lesa to Indpls. Int’l. Airport for 10a flight to Wisconsin. Her mom is not doing well. Hour delay in Indy, connecting flight cancelled in Chicago, new flight, she finally made it by 4:30p. Coming home, we had time for C3 Easter Egg Hunt, lots of candy! Taco supper. Long day!

item.title: Status Update – March 7, 2016
item.description: Worked 9.5 hrs, Dwyane’s Parent Teacher Conference tomorrow. Dillan’s Rainbow Umbrella art displayed at Stone Cutter’s Café! Ashley lost her loose tooth, Tooth Fairy time! Dollar General for soap, M&Ms; filled truck. Lesa’s yummy homemade lasagna! Scouts, homework, read, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – March 5, 2016
item.description: Hitched trailer, front diff blew, stuck in mud, tore up yard, Dillan help me get out. Mother-Son Bowling! I watched kids. Lesa and Dillan had good time, she bowled 164, pizza lunch. Walmart after. Kids played outside all day. Bruce broke Dillan’s RC truck. Watched TV, baths, bed.

item.title: Status Update – March 4, 2016
item.description: Friday! Misty Kelsey busted for DUI. Feel sorry for her but not. Got off work at 1:45p! Cleaned our bedroom closet, went through my clothes, vacuumed house, picked up kids. They spent afternoon outside playing. Pizza! Colored, played game with kids. Amber very late for her visit.

item.title: Status Update – March 3, 2016
item.description: Toasted bagels with cream cheese breakfast, kids loved them, change in routine slowed everything down, almost late to daycare. Worked 9 hours putting me a couple ahead for week. Helped Ashley with homework, Lesa helped Dillan with his: reading, math, spelling. Baths for all kids.

item.title: Status Update – March 2, 2016
item.description: I’m MS-tired. Dillan’s teacher sent message scolding me for letting Dillan use computer to do math. After explaining he used brain for homework and only doing extra flash card math she thanked me. More homework tonight, Ashley too. We played Sum Swamp game with Dillan and Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – February 28, 2016
item.description: Church, Lesa deaconess duties, myself Junior Church. Beautiful day! Kids played outside a lot. Dillan and Ashley cleaned while little kids napped. Fries came over for dinner, had a pleasant evening. Lesa at church so bathed little kids, read to them during big kid baths. Bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – February 27, 2016
item.description: Slept in until 9 am! Last day of ice skating, Bruce skated on own, awesome! Subway for lunch. Got all kids haircuts at Great Clips, Ashley only trimmed, Bruce sat by himself! Played outside. Ashley talking back a lot. We want to keep them but second guessing if we’re what’s best.

item.title: Status Update – February 26, 2016
item.description: Friday! Bruce ran, fell into cubicle at daycare, cut forehead. After work bought Mother-Son Bowling tickets for Lesa and Dillan, got KD cat food, picked up kids, ordered pizza. Bedford Library for “The Good Dinosaur” movie with Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane. Lesa stayed home with Bruce.

item.title: Status Update – February 25, 2016
item.description: Good on time all week; everyone tired though. Roads fine, yard snow-covered, slick. Dillan had tons of homework, thankfully Lesa has patience to help him. I helped Ashley who had fair amount but not like Dillan. Big kids wanted showers instead of baths. Still sick, hanging tough.

item.title: Status Update – February 24, 2016
item.description: Left early, picked up Father-Daughter Dance pictures, turned out good. Rained, sleeted, snowed all day. Lots of flooding, 2 inches snow expected. Kids hyper, difficult getting them to focus on homework, getting ready for bed. I’m this side of being really sick, most likely strep.

item.title: Status Update – February 23, 2016
item.description: Had to ask what day it was; yeah, I’m that tired. I did homework with Dillan. Kids played on trampoline with new neighbors until supper. Bruiser blocking route home and I had to go get them. Kids behaving pretty well, Dillan definitely trying to please, Ashley pushing boundaries.

item.title: Status Update – February 22, 2016
item.description: Started day frustrated, ending same. Parent teacher conference with Dillan’s teacher went as expected; Dillan needs one-on-one help, tutoring, maybe testing. Set reading/math goals. Pulled over doing 56 in a 35 – verbal warning to slow down! Homework. Scouts. Ashley class snacks.

item.title: Status Update – February 21, 2016
item.description: Dwyane, Bruce had fits when dropped off at Sunday School. Kids played outside. Ashley fell asleep with me, Lesa let her nap with me. Dillan peed on love seat. Played Uno with kids. Watched TV while Lesa served as deaconess. Read to, put babies to bed. Lesa home, big kids bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – February 19, 2016
item.description: Friday! After work cleaned house, got pizzas from Springville store. Amber babysitting kids so we can have a date night. Been an entire year since we had dinner alone, ate Mexican. Stephanie showed up unannounced, scared us to death; Amber knew she was coming; bizarre. Nikki MIA.

item.title: Status Update – February 18, 2016
item.description: Normal day at work. Warm day for February! Drove home with windows down. Kids played outside without coats. Got their shoes, clothes, bodies, hair, and our house muddy; mud everywhere! Baths of course, did laundry afterwards. Played Wii. Ashley cleaned room, found long lost toys!

item.title: Status Update – February 17, 2016
item.description: Nice day out today, upper 30s; kids had too much homework to play outside though. Dillan’s teacher Chelsea Wronowicz texted me wanting to have a sit-down to discuss his 2nd grade future; first grade present not going so well so we need to set some goals for him. He wants to play.

item.title: Status Update – February 16, 2016
item.description: Full day of school. Not sure where my job is headed. Wheel bearing noise on truck getting louder. Ashley had headache when I picked her up. Warmed up; snow nearly gone. All kids went down to neighbors to play. No homework to speak of. Ashley decided she wanted to go to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – February 15, 2016
item.description: Snow make-up day, canceled due to snow, ironic, kids ecstatic. Worried daycare might close, they didn’t, Dwyane’s toe cut and bandaged – no explanation given. All kids played outside, played with neighbors too, seemed like they had fun. I swept snow off grill and barbecued brats!

item.title: Status Update – February 14, 2016
item.description: Valentine’s Day! Bruce hit Ashley in face with Lego box causing nose bleed, ruined clothes, being late to church. Lots of snow! I sledded with Dillan and Dwyane. Played Wii with ALL the kids, they absolutely loved it! After supper we watched Frozen for about 100th time. Good day.

item.title: Status Update – February 13, 2016
item.description: Donuts with Dillan. Atwater for his eye exam, 20⁄20 right eye, 20⁄25 left eye, improvement! CVS to get Lesa Valentine stuff, Dillan chose. We picked everyone else up, headed back to Bloomington for ice skating. Horrible, horrible kids today! No one to watch them so no dinner out.

item.title: Status Update – February 12, 2016
item.description: Friday! Dillan and Ashley school Valentine parties, Ashley very excited from cards and candy. Big kids played outside until supper. Pizza! All kids played afterward, Lesa joined them. Kids got a little wild so calmed them down with some TV. Got everyone to bed at reasonable time.

item.title: Status Update – February 11, 2016
item.description: Bruce and Dwyane Valentine’s Day party at daycare, Dwyane had another at preschool. Rough day at work, didn’t feel well. Warm enough for kids to play outside; didn’t stay out for long. Bruce stole entire loaf of bread, hid in bedroom, ate it with Dwyane’s help! Homework, reading.

item.title: Status Update – February 10, 2016
item.description: Snow, not enough to sled, cold, 2-hr school delay. Wheel or diff bearing noise from RF of Suburban. Work okay, having trouble focusing. Neck/shoulders stiff, plus headache from yesterday’s fall. Worked with Dillan on homework, he resisted at first, but complied and did good work.

item.title: Status Update – February 9, 2016
item.description: Snow dusting, kids disappointed. I slipped and fell really hard; bad, bad, bad! Soup pitch-in at work, my new Dell PC arrived! Kids really wound up for some reason. I made pancakes while Lesa helped Dillan do homework. Bruce flung soiled diaper all about the house; bad, bad, bad!

item.title: Status Update – February 8, 2016
item.description: At work I trashed entire CRON directory, sat in on OTT conference call, Todd notified of tax fraud identity theft. Rain, sleet, ice, snow mix up to 3 inches overnight. Dillan hurt Ashley’s finger. Scouts, cut pinewood derby car. Ashley perfect midterm; Dillan in academic trouble.

item.title: Status Update – February 7, 2016
item.description: Partition ripped off men’s restroom wall during foster training! Family Sunday church, Lesa has serving deaconess evening duties. Kids played outside. Lesa, Ashley made cookies! I read “Go, Dogs, Go” to little kids, “The Giving Tree” to big kids. Denver Broncos won Super Bowl 50.

item.title: Status Update – February 6, 2016
item.description: Church at 8:00a, old church locked, no nursery items. Set up audio/video system and projector; good to go. Foster trained 6 hrs, great lunch! Car seat training informative. Walmart for diapers, saw Beth Walker, nice talk. Kids played outside. After supper big kids did Valentines.

item.title: Status Update – February 5, 2016
item.description: Kids said Fancy Nancy day was fun. Helped Ashley into her dress, put Elsa braid in. Helped Lesa with groceries. I took Ashley to Wendy’s, then 1st Baptist in Bedford for Father/Daughter dance. After pictures, we danced! Ashley said it was the best day ever! Lesa stayed with boys.

item.title: Status Update – February 4, 2016
item.description: An ordinary day; colder, but sunny. Last night about 2:00a Ashley woke up, called for Lesa, said she felt sick but didn’t get sick, fell back asleep, and said she was fine this morning. Dillan got speech evaluation that indicated he improved; we tend to agree. A pleasant evening.

item.title: Status Update – February 3, 2016
item.description: Lesa took Dillan to doctor for follow-up on bed wetting, he advised medication/alarm. Kids running in house after supper; Bruce face-planted, had nose bleed. Ashley decorated school Valentine bag. Dillan math homework, spelling words, writing homework, writing again – too sloppy.

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2016
item.description: Smooth morning. Trouble staying alert at work, I’m so tired! Lesa got kids. Doctor said she’s concerned, wants me to go to pulmonologist for pulmonary function test, bronchoscopy with bronchoalveolar lavage, and biopsy. Joy, joy. Gave Lesa a break, went to Asian Pearl for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – February 1, 2016
item.description: Almost late this AM, everyone tired. Called doctor, appt tomorrow, won’t schedule CT scan ’til Mar 2. Foster training at C3 almost canceled due to Linda Chamber’s showing, spent day salvaging. Got tickets for Father/Daughter Dance this Friday. Kids played outside. Lesa home late.

item.title: Status Update – January 31, 2016
item.description: Church/Jr. Church. Met Brian Gainey for foster training trial run. Put rear brakes on Lesa’s Jeep; Dillan helped by fetching things; let him take loosened lug nuts off; what matters is he got dirty! Ashley, Dillan had fun playing with new kids down the street on their trampoline!

item.title: Status Update – January 30, 2016
item.description: I slept until 8a! Breakfast, got kids ready, went ice skating; Dwyane had meltdowns. Drove to Indy, Southport Steak ‘n’ Shake, Lucas Oil Staudium for Monster Jam 2016 with Dillan and Ashley! Had a super good time! Junkyard Dawg Ashley’s favorite, Grave Digger Dillan’s. Home late!

item.title: Status Update – January 29, 2016
item.description: Friday! Off at normal time; like playing hooky. Kids asked why I was early told them I was on time! Missing chicken came home. Dillan played with neighbors; Ashley, Dwyane, Bruce and me played Picture Bingo. Turned TV off, major meltdowns, they got over it. Pizza! Fixed icemaker!

item.title: Status Update – January 28, 2016
item.description: Long work day, I’m caught up! No incidents at school, daycare! Bruce banged head on Ashley’s bed; gave himself goose egg on forehead. Dillan couldn’t/wouldn’t focus on reading homework; gave up on it. Thinking about taking Ashley to a Father-Daughter Dance in Bedford on Feb. 5th.

item.title: Status Update – January 27, 2016
item.description: Tooth fairy visited! 9.5 hour workday. Daycare 201% fee increase; Bruce bit on right arm, Ashley slammed some kid’s fingers in door. Ashley doing well, full day of school, soft food for supper, milking for attention. Worked lots with Dillan and Ashley on homework; read two books.

item.title: Status Update – January 26, 2016
item.description: Lesa took Ashley out of school to have tooth pulled. Used gas on her. I took her home from dentist. Ate soup on TV trays, watched TV, napped, then Wendy’s for half-and-half Frosty. Back home we watched movies until Lesa and boys got home. She did super! Tooth fairy visit tonight!

item.title: Status Update – January 25, 2016
item.description: Couldn’t change Ashley’s dentist appointment. Worked over, Lesa picked up kids. Pack meeting, whole family went. Dillan earned Backyard Jungle, Games Tigers Play belt loops; bowling, Christmas caroling, popcorn sales patches; got a remote-control Corvette for popcorn sales prize.

item.title: Status Update – January 24, 2016
item.description: Church. Bruce moved to next class, suspect he’s too rough. Kids played outside all day with neighbors. Bruce bit Lesa again! Not sure why, he’s not being mean, he just gets excited? He said sorry. Ashley started running slight fever of 99.7, has headache, having trouble sleeping.

item.title: Status Update – January 23, 2016
item.description: Picked up C3 pizzas. Toured my work before ice skating lessons. Dwyane skated alone, Bruce skated 5-10′, Dillan does well, Ashley’s a natural, Lesa fell hard! Kids played outside. Bruce threw up on Lesa. Kids hard to handle; Bruce bit Lesa on shoulder, drew blood; pushing limits!

item.title: Status Update – January 22, 2016
item.description: Worked 3 hours, got off for CFTM, Nicolle canceled. Ordered Lesa flowers. Ran errands, went home, took nap. Picked up kids, watched TV, ordered/ate pizzas. Amber visited, stuck in snow, pushed her out. Took all kids except Bruce to library, watched Minions movie; had a good time!

item.title: Status Update – January 21, 2016
item.description: Kids didn’t mind 2-hr school delay! Went to work; business as usual. Worked 9.5 hours for 3rd day; 5 hours over for week; will go to CFTM tomorrow. Kids will never know what we go through for them. 10 hour days on worst snow days really sucks. Kids worth it, but there are days…

item.title: Status Update – January 20, 2016
item.description: School, daycare closed; another 3 inches snow; Lesa stayed home with kids, poor lucky girl! Lawrence County travel advisory; I drove to work anyway, worked 9.5 hours. Dwyane, Bruce dentist appointments canceled. Kids had fun; played in snow, visited neighborhood animals, sledded.

item.title: Status Update – January 19, 2016
item.description: Another 2-hr school delay; more sub-zero temps/wind chills. While confirming CFTM tomorrow I learned it had been rescheduled at Nicolle’s request; I got pissed because I wasn’t notified. Pablo Bear visited from Mexico City tonight; spent the evening with Ashley; lots of pictures!

item.title: Status Update – January 18, 2016
item.description: School 2-hr delay; sub-zero wind chills! Dillan and Ashley dentist appointments; brushing poorly, plaque build up. Ashley’s capped tooth infected; needs pulled, spacer for adult tooth added. Dillan missing two adult molars; not abnormal. Big kids not listening, sent to bed early!

item.title: Status Update – January 17, 2016
item.description: Junior Church leader, Ashley and Dillan enjoyed my presence. Snowed, no accumulation. I took Bruce to doctor, thought pink eye but not; had good time together. Ashley a pill, not listening, wanting to argue. Super cold! Changed brake master on Lesa’s Jeep. Got kids into bed late.

item.title: Status Update – January 15, 2016
item.description: It’s Friday! Pizza! Everyone tired; been a long, strange week. Lesa sent Bobbi flowers for watching Bruce last Wednesday. Off work at decent time; picked up kids early. Rained all day, almost all snow gone; kids disappointed they can’t sled. Watched TV most of the night. Bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – January 13, 2016
item.description: Drove 2-hrs to Evansville for Dillan and Ashley psych evals; initiated counselling session instead. Stop! Please, will visits be harmful? Missed concurrent Disposition Hearing. Sandy Bowman petitioned to cease visits, granted. Lowe’s: new sleds! Wendy’s: Frosties! Home: sledding!

item.title: Status Update – January 11, 2016
item.description: School cancelled, daycare for kids. Bearing noise from front in 4-HI; need truck to last through snow; 3 more inches forecast for tonight! Daycare called, Bruce had 102 temp; Lesa got him; going to Bobbi Johnson’s in AM. Dillan and Dwyane sledded with neighbors; TV for other two.

item.title: Status Update – January 8, 2016
item.description: Dillan pulled bedroom ceiling light out. PM from teacher praising Dillan. Martina and Adam gone. Discussed therapy logistics with Stephanie. Reserved C3 for Feb foster training. Midterm report cards good, we’re happy! Amber visit 1-1⁄2 hours. Lesa and I exhausted, kids tired too.

item.title: Status Update – January 7, 2016
item.description: Odd work day! Worked over yesterday in order to take Ashley to doctor for ear infection. Picked her up at school during pep rally, picked her out of crowd in gym. Doctor prescribed Amoxicillin. Treated her to candy bar while waiting at CVS. Picked up boys from daycare afterwards.

item.title: Status Update – January 6, 2016
item.description: Been running just a few minutes later each day this week. Warm-up expected tomorrow. Kids okay, glad to see them when I picked them up. Made doctor’s appointment for Ashley for tomorrow for cough. Wild day at work; Martina and Adam riffed, Friday last day; God watching over kids!

item.title: Status Update – January 5, 2016
item.description: Forgot to call about the pig! Kids rambunctious as all get out. Went to Golden Corral; found out during “How was your day?” discussions Dillan had to move stick twice for talking and interrupting; no dessert for him, he took it well. Ashley worried she can’t stay with us forever.

item.title: Status Update – January 4, 2016
item.description: First day back to school after break; kids handled it well. Conversations with our lawyer Tammy Minger, then Sandy Bowman, about PAVAs. Bought tickets for Monster Jam in Indy on Jan 30th, taking Dillan and Ashley. Earned Cub Scout merit badge. Calling about buying a pig tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – January 3, 2016
item.description: Family Sunday; Lesa gets stressed, I like. Last day of break; daycare, school, work tomorrow; thank God! Tried for laid back slow day. All kids played outside, burned energy. Watched more TV than usual; Paw Patrol, Umizoomi, etc. Snuggled with Princess Ashley during Frozen movie.

item.title: Status Update – January 2, 2016
item.description: I woke up angry at 6a, again at 7a, to kids fighting. Lesa took Dillan to Tractor Supply for pine shavings; he bought tractor trailer with $10 Christmas money; Lesa chipped in $2. Kids super-hyper! Took down tree, lights, most decorations. Lasagna dinner at Paul and Andrea Fries!

item.title: Status Update – December 31, 2015
item.description: New Year’s Eve! Last day at Alicia’s. Kids in disbelief when told Christmas Break is about over. Ate pizza so we can have cabbage and black-eyed peas tomorrow. Just another day to kids but Lesa and I managed to stay awake to kiss and bring in new year. Will 2016 be good for kids?

item.title: Status Update – December 30, 2015
item.description: Kids had fun when Alicia took them outside to see her horses. Dwyane head-butted Ashley getting into truck; gusher of a nose bleed followed; wanted to eat out but nose still bleeding. Dillan and Bruce fought during prayer; made them eat by themselves after everyone else finished.

item.title: Status Update – December 29, 2015
item.description: Day two at Alicia’s; kids not so hyped. Sun came out but temps dropped. Saw Brian Faubian on way home. Kids much better behaved compared to last few days! I’m exhausted, almost fell asleep during supper; Lesa noticed, ran baths for big kids, and let me snooze in chair. Bless her!

item.title: Status Update – December 28, 2015
item.description: Christmas over; Dwyane says no presents under tree. Back to work. Daycare closed so kids went to Alicia Rainey’s in Heltonville, our old stomping grounds. Travel time sets me back at least 1⁄2 each way plus raining, bridge out, bottoms flooded. They enjoyed going! Still wound up!

item.title: Status Update – December 27, 2015
item.description: Church; could tell kids enjoyed being someplace familiar. Home for lunch. Horrible drive to Indy for Christmas with my side; rained entire way. Christmas with parents, brother, and nieces. Exchanged gifts. Ham dinner, my mom went all out. Trip home was worse. Kids tired; bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – December 26, 2015
item.description: Kids up early; still super excited. Toys everywhere! Lots of fighting; everyone wants to play with everyone else’s toys. Went to Franklin, IN for Christmas on Bonnie’s side. Kids brought home lots of presents; Lesa and I did too. Kids even more pumped; didn’t want to go to sleep.

item.title: Status Update – December 25, 2015
item.description: Christmas! On this day Jesus was born! Moved computer hutch out of Ashley’s room (my ex-office). All-in-all, I stayed stress-free and just enjoyed the day; it could be my last Christmas. Toys are everywhere, house a disaster; but who cares? The kids had such an unforgettable day!

item.title: Status Update – December 24, 2015
item.description: Christmas Eve! Lunch with Marcy Cook at Yoho General Store. Handmade gifts for kids! Gifts for us too! Kids napped! Pizza! Solsberry CC Candlelight Service; kids bored; we enjoyed. Opened Amber’s gifts; nice of her! Set out cookies and milk for Santa. Late bedtime! Santa visited!

item.title: Status Update – December 23, 2015
item.description: Christmas Break started; kids at daycare all day; they had fun. Using last PTO day tomorrow so I can stay home with Lesa and kids on Christmas Eve. Paul and Andrea Fries visited bringing gifts of baked goods! Cookies, fudge, breads; gave the kids a DVD also. Kids excited as ever!

item.title: Status Update – December 22, 2015
item.description: Pajama day at school. Fun day for kids. Polar Express and Grinch movies, popcorn, hot chocolate, slippers, blankets, etc. Last day of semester; Christmas Break begins tomorrow. We have some very excited kids. Watched more Christmas shows after supper. Everyone got baths. Bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – December 21, 2015
item.description: Got to daycare and Dillan barfed on floor; took him back home. Lesa took him to school; he was okay. Christmas parties today; she went to Dwyane’s party at Parkview. I went to CFTM at Hulsey house in Washington; kids should not wind up here! Amber visited. Scouts, and derby cars.

item.title: Status Update – December 20, 2015
item.description: C3 Christmas program: Ashley only one that sang, kept looking at us; Dwyane kept hands in his pockets; Bruce picked his nose; Dillan got squirrelly. Kids really excited, getting into Christmas! Lots of hitting, timeouts. Weather warm; kids played outside a lot. Difficult bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – December 19, 2015
item.description: Dillan’s eye appointment at 8:00a; eye worse, looks over glasses instead of through. Got donuts, then tires for Lesa’s Jeep. Went home and picked up Ashley; hauled trash; went Christmas caroling at StoneBridge, bowling at Kingpin, and to Wendy’s for Frosties. A good but busy day!

item.title: Status Update – December 18, 2015
item.description: Normal day, got off work on time, felt halfway decent. Lesa got home late so we had pizza again. Hey, it’s Friday, it’s pizza, it’s all good! Kids stayed up later than usual. We watched Christmas shows. Bruce and Dwyane were afraid of the Bumble on Rudolph the Red-nosed Reindeer.

item.title: Status Update – December 17, 2015
item.description: Springville water out for over 24 hours; have lots of clean water. Ashley called: she knows phone number! Bruce WIC. Pizza! Getting support for yesterday; people shocked; prayers we don’t mourn losing kids – kids don’t mourn losing us. Trying to remember God is good all the time!

item.title: Status Update – December 16, 2015
item.description: Left work for court. Judge ordered DCS to start over: reunification, visits, new Disposition Hearing in January. Guardian ad Litem told court she’s filing separate termination for 15 of 22 months out of home. Kids in limbo, maybe worse. Stephanie to take kids for new psych evals.

item.title: Status Update – December 15, 2015
item.description: Dillan’s Christmas Program at school; Lesa was able to go; took him with her when over. Spoke with doctor twice; just have to wait I guess. Stephanie came over; knows nothing about tomorrow; hard for me to believe. Sandy Bowman filing for termination tomorrow? THIS IS THEIR HOME!

item.title: Status Update – December 14, 2015
item.description: Bruce’s ear bitten by kid at daycare; got copy of incident report for this one. Have a cold now. Tried to work over to cover Wednesday’s time off for court but just too miserable; took nap as soon as I got home. Dillan likes red, white, blue rope lights because of two boy colors.

item.title: Status Update – December 13, 2015
item.description: Church. Drove newly completed I-69 for first time from Cincinnati to Bloomington. Walmart: bought shoes and boots for kids. Steak ‘n’ Shake for lunch. Naps, kids played outside, supper, some TV. Been a really rough weekend; kids have been really worked up; and we’re really tired!

item.title: Status Update – December 12, 2015
item.description: Amber visited; brought Rocky, a foster kid she was respiting; showed up an hour late, lost keys. Ashley wrecked Dwyane on swing; I yelled at her in front of Amber. Crap! That didn’t look good! Declined Jumpin’ Joey’s BD party due to a dinner invite, dinner cancelled too. Oh well.

item.title: Status Update – December 11, 2015
item.description: Friday! Got off normal time; first time in weeks. Got home in decent time; kids able to play with neighbor kids until dark. Ate pizza – everyone’s favorite! Took kids to see really cool Christmas light display, synced with Christmas music, in Springville. Kids danced, sang along.

item.title: Status Update – December 10, 2015
item.description: Two years today since the kids came to live with us; we’ve certainly come a long way! It’s been a life-changing experience; not one I would ever do again, but not one I would undo either. To celebrate we went to Bob Evan’s, thanked God for blessings, and ate breakfast for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – December 9, 2015
item.description: Ten hour work day; I’m exhausted. Kids seem to be tired also judging by all the yawns. Dillan and Ashley did homework and watched TV; babies got baths. Tomorrow makes two years exactly since the kids came to live with us. Talked to Lesa about celebrating by going out for Mexican.

item.title: Status Update – December 8, 2015
item.description: Made gingerbread house with Ashley at her school. Life’s short so spent time with her: watched Barbie movie, went to Wendy’s for lunch. Dwyane’s school called; said he didn’t make it in; after my heart attack learned it was wrong child! Still sick from medicine; coughing up crap.

item.title: Status Update – December 7, 2015
item.description: Got my results from CT scan: mass lower right lung; in God’s hands now; heavy-duty antibiotics made me sick all day. Working late all week so I can make gingerbread house with Ashley at school tomorrow. Went to Scouts; Dillan played a game he liked a lot; he has a new den leader.

item.title: Status Update – December 6, 2015
item.description: Family Sunday! Lesa and Ashley went to “The Nutcracker” at IU! So jealous! I wanted to take her; it was my idea! Took boys to McDonald’s; stayed home with them: an exercise in patience. Let Dillan skip nap, play with neighbors. Watched Spider-Man. Ashley had case of the specials.

item.title: Status Update – December 5, 2015
item.description: Up early for Santa Train in Solsberry. Kids enjoyed the characters. Dillan asked for an ATV AND dirt bike, Ashley for an iPad, Dwyane for a present, and Bruce for a candy cane. Saw Kathy Mitchell. Hot chocolate! Kids bundled up, played with neighbors. Supper, TV, baths, bedtime!

item.title: Status Update – December 4, 2015
item.description: It’s Friday! Worked 10 hours; broke even for week. Kids zoned from long week after break. Pizza! Watched TV before going to bed. Ashley fell asleep in my arms. Let her sleep while we prayed. She was in her jammies so I carried her to bed without her waking up. I love this memory!

item.title: Status Update – December 3, 2015
item.description: CASA didn’t make it; texted she’s thinking of termination herself! We’re thinking contested adoption too and are going to contact our attorney and Cook’s soon. Kids misbehaving a little; probably tired from long weekend, waiting for new weekend, and have Christmas on their minds.

item.title: Status Update – December 2, 2015
item.description: Review Hearing; DCS messed up; judge didn’t sign Disposition Order. Options: 1) try to terminate without it; 2) judge sign it, roll everything back to March 2014, and start over. CASA coming tomorrow to discuss situation with us. Contested adoption? My class hosted C3 meal. Snow.

item.title: Status Update – December 1, 2015
item.description: Lab work; took lots of vials plus urine sample. CT scan this afternoon was over quickly; now it’s a waiting game. Worked late yesterday and tonight to make up missed work time. Progress Hearing is tomorrow so more time away to make up. Kids not quite back in the groove of things.

item.title: Status Update – November 28, 2015
item.description: Not wanting a day like yesterday we took the kids to Arby’s for lunch, then to Woodcrest Farm to buy a live tree. Kids ran their fool heads off in the rain and mud; through the spruces, the firs, and pines. We eventually settled on a nice fir for our tree. Got it home and set up.

item.title: Status Update – November 21, 2015
item.description: Kids still acting a little wild this morning. Ashley had another bad dream. Snowed but no accumulation. Lesa took kids to Walmart and Dollar Tree to buy toys as reward for their excellent midterm reports; ten $1.00 toys each. Watched a lot of TV since it was cold and wet outside.

item.title: Status Update – November 18, 2015
item.description: Rushed home from work, picked up kids, and headed to C3 for the Thanksgiving dinner. Ate with Paul and Andrea. Several people wanted to help load plates etc. We are blessed with so many friends. After dessert we pretty much headed straight home and got the kids into bed. Success!

item.title: Status Update – November 17, 2015
item.description: Took Bruce to doctor’s first thing this morning to try and treat his dermatitis; then went to CVS for cream and medication. Much better day today than yesterday! Lesa steeled and prepared herself for the abuse from kids. Dillan ungrounded from watching TV so that probably helped.

item.title: Status Update – November 16, 2015
item.description: Hard day! Stephanie emailed; said more hearings; paperwork errors! Dillan practiced for Scouts; den master not there; Dillan still had good time. Got home, Lesa at wits’ end. Bruce kicked her in face while changing his diaper. Lesa’s day ended doubting self, frustrated, in tears.

item.title: Status Update – November 15, 2015
item.description: Made it to church; got a sub because I was serving deacon. Went to Bloomington; ate at Arby’s; went to Great Clips; all kids got haircuts; went to Big Lots and filled box with toiletries and food to give to homeless this Thanksgiving. Boys look handsome! Ashley looks very pretty!

item.title: Status Update – November 13, 2015
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Couldn’t eat but everyone else did. Snuggled with kids on the couch afterward and watched Charlotte’s Web. Ashley thought it was very sad when Charlotte died but was happy Wilbur made it to winter. Ashley is a sweet girl. I said I want bacon and Dillan said me too!

item.title: Status Update – November 12, 2015
item.description: Made it into work; got rundown; slept in truck for couple of hours. Kids had good day but are ready for weekend like the rest of us. Bruce always demanding “PV” so we let them watch some after dinner. Dillan struggling with homework. Everyone excited there’s a mouse in the house!

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2015
item.description: Went to IMA Walk-In Clinic before work; was prescribed cough medicine and Z-pack of antibiotics; I was medicine sick almost all day. Kids still coughing, except Ashley, who seems to be doing better. Kids ate chili – a first. Homework, big kids’ baths, and we called it a day over.

item.title: Status Update – November 9, 2015
item.description: I’m still really sick; all the kids are coughing now too. Dillan had his Scout den meeting; den leader not there again. Dillan struggling with math homework, not understanding concepts; Ashley doing well. Watched some TV; little kids’ baths; pretty much got everyone to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – November 7, 2015
item.description: I’m sick; I slept almost all day. I missed Hope Harvest. Lesa cared for the kids and me – poor woman; she’s a candidate for saint. Kids played indoors, and outside with neighbor kids on swing set. I grilled salmon. Everyone went to bed early. Smell of mentholatum fills the house.

item.title: Status Update – November 6, 2015
item.description: Ashley better, Bruce better, Dwyane better, Dave worse. Dillan didn’t apologize to day care; doesn’t care; took away TV. Hope Harvest setup.

item.title: Status Update – November 4, 2015
item.description: Ashley fell off monkey bars; bit lower lip; nose bled; nurse called; took fresh clothes. 1950’s day. Made Ashley’s car for school. Water on.

item.title: Status Update – November 3, 2015
item.description: Dwyane cried all night; has earache; Lesa took to doctor. Pizza. Linda and Gordon took our turkeys. No water; water boil order; what a pain!

item.title: Status Update – November 1, 2015
item.description: Church. Dwyane sang with kids; did great! I spent afternoon at doctor’s with Bruce; concerned about bumps on face. Played; TV; nice evening.

item.title: Status Update – October 29, 2015
item.description: Tired parents. Divide and conquer. Lesa babies, me kids. Homework, playing, baths. Once kids asleep I fell asleep in chair; woke up at 4 am.

item.title: Status Update – October 28, 2015
item.description: Finally quit raining. We’re worn out! Stumbled through homework, baths, and getting kids ready for bed; Seemed easy, kids must be tired too.

item.title: Status Update – October 27, 2015
item.description: Raining! Kids watching TV when power went out. Ate at Golden Corral. Told scary stories in dark. Power still out when kids went to bed. Fun!

item.title: Status Update – October 26, 2015
item.description: Sick; stayed home; fever broke. Kids went to daycare/school as usual; boys forgot backpacks. Dillan had pack meeting, pigged out on cookies.

item.title: Status Update – October 22, 2015
item.description: Didn’t do anything exciting. We ate, kids played, TV got turned on, big kid bath night, bedtime stories for all. Read Little Joe poem – sad.

item.title: Status Update – October 14, 2015
item.description: Bruce’s butt raw again; happening since Amber Keen left; I had angry words for staff. Big kids played with neighbors; baths for little kids.

item.title: Status Update – October 8, 2015
item.description: Worked 10 hours again, tired; kids tired too, can’t wait for weekend. Dillan pushing for dirt bike. Ashley first to know alphabet at school!

item.title: Status Update – October 6, 2015
item.description: Worked 10 hours again. Visited Marilyn/Gary Lentz, re-introduced kids, they’re picking them up since we’ll be in court. Pancakes for Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – October 5, 2015
item.description: Worked 10 hours; makeup for court Wednesday. Scouts; one foot hike; playground. Got home, helped Ashley with homework. Too tired for Monday!

item.title: Status Update – October 3, 2015
item.description: My birthday; my present: got to sleep in; Lesa watched kids all day. Each kid made a card; they love me. Cold day, stayed inside and played.

item.title: Status Update – October 2, 2015
item.description: Fact Finding Day Two; CASA, dad, mom, her parents testified; hopefully done Oct 7. School called, Ashley sick again, Jenny picked up. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – October 1, 2015
item.description: Missed Dwyane’s bus! Ashley forgot backpack! Took kids to school. School called mid-morning, Ashley sick; picked her up. Finished bunk beds!

item.title: Status Update – September 30, 2015
item.description: It rained off and on all day. Daniel Moffett’s jury trial was scheduled but I don’t know any more. The kids played and watched TV all night.

item.title: Status Update – September 29, 2015
item.description: Normal day. I worked on triple bunk beds all evening. Kids played with neighbors riding cars and on swing set. Baths and bedtime afterwards.

item.title: Status Update – September 28, 2015
item.description: Pretty normal day today. Ashley is doing very well in school; no surprises. Dillan earned Bobcat badge for knowing the Scout Oath, Law, etc.

item.title: Status Update – September 27, 2015
item.description: Church. Playing. Balloons. Playing. Bouncy house. Playing. Messy house. Kids rested and full of energy or they’re very very tired. Long day!

item.title: Status Update – September 26, 2015
item.description: Took kids on MS Walk; they didn’t like it. Amber visited at noon; short visit. Made persimmon pulp. Kids wouldn’t take naps; super wound up!

item.title: Status Update – September 25, 2015
item.description: Fact Finding Hearing finally got here! Daniel self-terminated. Lesa, myself, Stephanie testified. Testimony will continue Oct. 2, at 8:30am.

item.title: Status Update – September 24, 2015
item.description: Couldn’t concentrate today! Final arrangements for kids tomorrow. WIC for Dwyane and Bruce. Dwyane getting closer to target; is doing great!

item.title: Status Update – September 23, 2015
item.description: Indiana Wild show at C3, kids volunteered: Dwyane floppy-earred rabbit; Ashley wouldn’t kiss giant frog; Dillan got hair combed by hedgehog!

item.title: Status Update – September 22, 2015
item.description: Lesa took Dwyane to doctor; bloody stool, constipated, straining. Ashley’s classmate Kandra Jones’ BD at Thornton Park; boys played in park.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2015
item.description: Daycare on time; Bruce cried. Picked up kids, ate, took kids to Scouts; Lesa went to Walmart; played at park while Dillan had Scout meeting.

item.title: Status Update – September 20, 2015
item.description: Church; laid on hands and prayed over us for Friday’s hearing; security deacon. Arby’s lunch, new winter coat for Dillan, haircut for Bruce.

item.title: Status Update – September 19, 2015
item.description: Cub Scout Shoot-O-Ree at Camp Maumee. Dillan had blast, said awesome a hundred times! Sling shots, bows, BB guns, etc! Shot can! Fire tower.

item.title: Status Update – September 18, 2015
item.description: It’s Friday! Everyone’s tired! Pizza! Kids played outside almost all night: no TV! I’m almost finished with bunk beds. Batman bedtime story.

item.title: Status Update – September 17, 2015
item.description: Ashley’s egg didn’t break during egg toss off school roof. Played with neighbor kids again. Big kids got baths. Dillan had lots of homework.

item.title: Status Update – September 16, 2015
item.description: On time today. Kids played with neighbors. Helped Ashley with egg drop project; she decorated it afterward. Knows her book first day; smart!

item.title: Status Update – September 15, 2015
item.description: Barely made it in time for school buses. Worked late making up for Monday. Kids played after dinner. I nearly finished the triple bunk beds.

item.title: Status Update – September 14, 2015
item.description: Permanency hearing; mom, dad, maternal grandparents attended; I’m extremely anxious. Dillan not well; skipped Boy Scouts; I got his popcorn.

item.title: Status Update – September 13, 2015
item.description: Church. Picked up new pool; Lowe’s with Dillan for bunk bed supplies. Started on bunk beds. Back to Lowe’s with Ashley. Frosties both trips.

item.title: Status Update – September 12, 2015
item.description: Dillan eye exam, dilation. Good eye worse, bad eye better. Scout Store for shirt. Steak ‘n’ Shake for lunch. Jumpin’ Joey’s for Zander’s BD.

item.title: Status Update – September 11, 2015
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Amber from Open Arms bi-weekly visit. Midterm reports: Dillan needs help but did really good, proud of him! Ashley did great!

item.title: Status Update – September 10, 2015
item.description: I took kids to daycare. I called in sick; slept all day; don’t feel any better. I picked kids up. Kids played outside due to cooler weather.

item.title: Status Update – September 9, 2015
item.description: I’m really sick. Went to eye doctor, Lesa picked up kids. Kids got on my nerves all night; Dillan acted like a baby, lots of hitting by all.

item.title: Status Update – September 8, 2015
item.description: I’m still sick. Back to work, school, and daycare. Ross brought a table saw and helped me cut wood for triple bunk beds. Going to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – September 7, 2015
item.description: I’m sick! No boat so got bait, fished at Monroe anyway. Slush lemonades. Fries’ cookout with Johnsons, Hauslers and kids. Everyone had fun!

item.title: Status Update – September 6, 2015
item.description: Family Sunday at church, communion to shut-ins, kittens! Lunch, naps, riding cars/ATV, swinging, swimming, playing, TV: good day to be kids!

item.title: Status Update – September 5, 2015
item.description: Mowed grass. Swam. Dunham’s life jackets. Tractor supply chicken feed. Asian Pearl dinner. Lowe’s lumber for triple bunk. Walmart groceries.

item.title: Status Update – September 4, 2015
item.description: Everyone is tired; been long week of getting up early at 5:00am. Off work at 3:30pm. Pizza Friday. Kids played, watched TV, swing set, cars.

item.title: Status Update – September 3, 2015
item.description: Got kids from daycare; went to Walmart. Bought fishing license for me; fishing poles / tackle for Dillan and Ashley. Gonna take ’em fishin’!

item.title: Status Update – September 2, 2015
item.description: Got to Permanency Hearing; it was rescheduled for 9⁄14. Another good day at school and daycare. Dillan said he loves me – just wanted Legos.

item.title: Status Update – September 1, 2015
item.description: Dillan did about face; Student of the Day and nice note! Mrs. Dillman texted me about how well Ashley is doing. Bruce biting; being “rough.”

item.title: Status Update – August 31, 2015
item.description: Dwyane cries; why? He likes daycare and school. Dillan’s teacher sent me a text; he acted out in school. Ashley better! Dillan Pack meeting.

item.title: Status Update – August 30, 2015
item.description: Ashley stomach flu; stayed home from church with Lesa. I took boys; they helped me lock up. A lazy day of TV and relaxing for Ashley’s sake.

item.title: Status Update – August 29, 2015
item.description: Lesa let me sleep in! Open Arms 30th Anniversary; Ashley still coughing; left early. Lunch at Hunter’s. Naps and easy rest of day / evening.

item.title: Status Update – August 28, 2015
item.description: On time this AM. Ashley has cough, possibly allergies. Ashley and Dillan went to the Bash after school was over. Friday Pizza. Harry Potter.

item.title: Status Update – August 27, 2015
item.description: Missed van; took kids to school. School called, Ashley had headache. Lesa got her, I got boys. I took boys to park; Scout recruitment night.

item.title: Status Update – August 26, 2015
item.description: Dillan peed, in house, while awake, next to bathroom. I got disgusted, got mad, got in his face, and YELLED. He needs me to not quit on him!

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2015
item.description: Forgot Ashley’s “Black Day” at school; I’m sorry! Case conference in Shoals; proposed adoption date of Mar. 19, 2016; I don’t dare to hope!

item.title: Status Update – August 24, 2015
item.description: Ashley Special Person of the Day at school. I took Dillan to Scouts; we practiced Scout Oath and Law; Dillan says being a Scout is awesome!

item.title: Status Update – August 23, 2015
item.description: Church. Dillan vomited all over kid’s bathroom at home; yuck! I was feverish. Hoping no one else gets sick! Tried for early bedtime; futile.

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2015
item.description: Amber visited at 9:00am which sucks. Then off to Fortville, IN for Ross Family Reunion. Played a lot at playground. Subway dinner and baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 21, 2015
item.description: Bad morning; too much TV; turned it off; kids rioted; I yelled; kids cried. Lesa picked kids up. Evening no better. Discussed kid situation.

item.title: Status Update – August 20, 2015
item.description: Dillan and Ashley school pictures today; they looked nice. Rest of day non-eventful. Took Ashley to CVS to process photos for her “funwork.”

item.title: Status Update – August 19, 2015
item.description: Dwyane field trip; explored shapes. Per DCS, I took Dillan and Ashley out of school early; talked to psychiatrist at Centerstone; stressful.

item.title: Status Update – August 18, 2015
item.description: Relatively non-eventful day. I’ve been working 10 hour days; I’m tired. Kids also tired from their new-ish school schedule. Kids took baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 17, 2015
item.description: Back to school. Dwyane rode big yellow school bus! Awesomeness! Other kids jealous. Dillan’s first official Boy Scout Tiger Cub Den meeting.

item.title: Status Update – August 16, 2015
item.description: Church. Lunch at Jim & Ella Carter’s; chicken, sides, homemade strawberry shortcake! Kids behaved well. No naps equal tired kids. TV. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 15, 2015
item.description: Holiday World Splashin’ Safari! Perfect weather! Sunburned. Dinner at Stoll’s Lakeview Restaurant. Dillan recognized Loogootee! Scary stuff!

item.title: Status Update – August 14, 2015
item.description: Lesa took Dwyane to his 1st day at Parkview preschool; he’s proud; so are we! Bruce hit, kicked kids; bit teacher at daycare! Worn out kids!

item.title: Status Update – August 13, 2015
item.description: Dillan started 1st grade. Ashley started kindergarten; I got to go with her; took her to Wendy’s for lunch. One of the best days of my life!

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2015
item.description: Rough night! Bruce sick. I stayed home; doctor early afternoon; he’s okay now. Springville and Parkview Meet-n-Greet both 5-6:00pm! Made it!

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2015
item.description: Dillan’s pee alarm went off at 2:19am. Bruce had fever so he went to Marcy Cook’s; kids to daycare. Ashley excited about school on Thursday!

item.title: Status Update – August 10, 2015
item.description: Bad day: Bruce stomach ache; Ashley headache; late! Daycare called; Bruce had fever; left work; hung out with him. School haircuts. Wendy’s.

item.title: Status Update – August 9, 2015
item.description: At church Dillan did great! Proud of him! Kids played with neighbors: swing set and cars. Swimming. Shared a taco dinner with Ross Johnson.

item.title: Status Update – August 8, 2015
item.description: I took kids this AM: glass recycling; Walmart donuts; Lowe’s for lumber. Installed slide. Dropped kids off at Kim’s and took Lesa to dinner.

item.title: Status Update – August 7, 2015
item.description: Worked late all week; left earlier than usual. Got home; swing set slide had arrived; spent evening leveling swing set; kids watched. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – August 6, 2015
item.description: Rainy day; when it rains, it pours! Stephanie emailed; Nicolle’s lawyer filed motion to continue TPR; judge granted; 45 more days of limbo!

item.title: Status Update – August 5, 2015
item.description: DCS lawyer phoned about testifying; subpoenaed. Church meal; Bible Study. Dwyane farts, gets up, thinks he has to poop; Ashley has headache.

item.title: Status Update – August 4, 2015
item.description: Lesa registered Dillan and Ashley at Springville Elem. We all registered Dwyane at Parkview Preschool and went to Golden Corral for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – August 3, 2015
item.description: Took Dillan for 6-yr physical and donuts. Met with Open Arms and DCS for 2-1⁄2 hours; discussed upcoming Fact Finding Hearing; never ending.

item.title: Status Update – August 2, 2015
item.description: Church; Dillan disrupted class; we heard about it. Kids started painting swing set; swimming afterward. Baths to clean off paint. Bed early.

item.title: Status Update – August 1, 2015
item.description: Trash with Dillan and Ashley. Recyclables, Lowe’s with Dillan. Fixed swing set. Cut grass. Dwyane ran over apple tree. Swimming. TV. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – July 31, 2015
item.description: Had a good morning, day, and night. Pizza Friday. The kids truly love us! They know we love them too. They can feel our love. They’re happy!

item.title: Status Update – July 30, 2015
item.description: Daycare said all kids behaved and did well today; welcome praise! Dillan went to Scout pool party; gaining confidence in social situations.

item.title: Status Update – July 29, 2015
item.description: It appears Dillan reached a turning point and made the decision to claim us as Mom and Dad. Happy for him; hope he’s done wrestling with it.

item.title: Status Update – July 28, 2015
item.description: DCS pushed hard today. Almost told her enough is enough – come get the kids – but of course I couldn’t. Read Bad Luck Dog. Webinar tonight.

item.title: Status Update – July 27, 2015
item.description: Hot humid day! Hauled remaining parts of swing set; Ross Johnson helped assemble. Good day at daycare; they’re pretty good kids considering.

item.title: Status Update – July 26, 2015
item.description: Church; Dillan acted up; grounded from ATV. Spent afternoon with Dillan. Hauled swing set bought from Christie Boles. Swimming. Dinner. TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 25, 2015
item.description: Foster training today. Refilled pool. Rode car; ATV. Tacos! Baths for church. Read Hardy Boys book. Amber says two visits a month now; ugh!

item.title: Status Update – July 24, 2015
item.description: Slow start this AM; everyone still tired from last night. Pizza Friday! Went to Walmart shopping; spent $200 on school clothes and supplies.

item.title: Status Update – July 23, 2015
item.description: Took Dillan and Ashley to Lawrence Co Fair for ATV Mud Bogs! Afterwards looked at animals and rode Ferris wheel and a couple of other rides.

item.title: Status Update – July 22, 2015
item.description: Update on Dillan biting: Dillan GOT bit by 9 year old, got angry, pushed kid down and kicked him. Good for defending self, bad for fighting.

item.title: Status Update – July 21, 2015
item.description: Ashley took field trip to Lawrence Co. Fair; Dillan couldn’t because he bit a kid. Springville store pizza. Visited animals down the street.

item.title: Status Update – July 20, 2015
item.description: Dillan swimming at Jessica Smiths with daycare. Kids NOT listening! ATV and Dune Racer. All kids got a bath tonight. Everyone to bed early.

item.title: Status Update – July 19, 2015
item.description: Skipped church. Rewired trailer. Lowe’s for wire and T-posts. Extended chicken run 100 feet; tired; hot. Swimming with the kids afterwards.

item.title: Status Update – July 18, 2015
item.description: Dwyane likes car! Optometrist: Dillan’s eye improving. Donuts. Hot day; swimming pool; Bruce loves me! Cut grass. Walmart for school stuff.

item.title: Status Update – July 17, 2015
item.description: Dillan field trip to Humane Society. Worked late to makeup time for kids’ dentist. Pizza! Birthdays! Lesa 52, Dwyane 3. Cake and ice cream!

item.title: Status Update – July 16, 2015
item.description: Rough day. Ashley took field trip to Marengo Cave. Dillan wouldn’t stop playing; soiled himself at daycare. Could hardly stand kids tonight.

item.title: Status Update – July 15, 2015
item.description: Daycare baked goods sale for Humane Society. Bruce and Dwyane dentist. Anderson’s gave us 3 guineas and 2 turkeys. Ashley headache all day.

item.title: Status Update – July 14, 2015
item.description: Ashley went on field trip to Jessica’s pool; stubbed her toes too; sunburn. Coyotes killed two more chickens; getting bold; coming in yard.

item.title: Status Update – July 13, 2015
item.description: Dillan went on field trip to Jessica’s pool; stubbed toes and nosebleed. Given a bouncy house by Paul Jr. and Michelle Fries! Kids love it!

item.title: Status Update – July 12, 2015
item.description: Church. Spent entire afternoon in pool playing with kids. All kids like zucchini! Big wheels on deck. Played lots of Wii games ’til bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – July 11, 2015
item.description: Sunny day! Paul Jr and Michelle Fries gave us a big pool delivered by Paul and Andrea. Kids’ day included swimming, playing, TV, and baths.

item.title: Status Update – July 10, 2015
item.description: Friday! No power; big wreck; snapped power line pole. It’s Friday night pizza so went to Pizza Hut! Flashlights because kids afraid of dark.

item.title: Status Update – July 9, 2015
item.description: Rain stopped! Ashley field trip to Jump-n-Joey’s. No TV; Dillan and Ashley rode ATV; everyone played outside; what a relief! Big kid baths.

item.title: Status Update – July 8, 2015
item.description: Dillan field trip to Bankers Life Fieldhouse for Indiana Fever vs. Seattle Storm game. Bruce adjusting to daycare. Rained 36 hours straight!

item.title: Status Update – July 7, 2015
item.description: Ashley’s pool party rained out; Madagascar movie at theatre instead. Watched American Tail, one of Dillan’s birthday videos. Big kids’ bath.

item.title: Status Update – July 6, 2015
item.description: Dillan went to Jellystone Park. Bruce and Dwyane went to optometrist. No swim lessons or VBS. Kids played or watched TV. A relaxing evening.

item.title: Status Update – July 5, 2015
item.description: Family Sunday at C3. Serving deacon so kids went visiting. Wind-down from busy weekend. Kids “helped” cut grass; played outside; watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 4, 2015
item.description: Dillan likes ATV! Garden fence; Lowes, Steak ‘n’ Shake shakes! Party at Fries; pool, bikes, food, cake, presents! Home; baths and fireworks!

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2015
item.description: Slept till 8:00! Picked up Dillan’s gift. Grocery shopping. Played outside. Watched TV. Pizza. Tractor Supply. Fireworks stand. Jiffy Treat.

item.title: Status Update – July 2, 2015
item.description: Ashley field trip to Cascade Park; McDonald’s ice cream. VBS over: bouncy houses, food, music, fireworks! Babies liked show but noise scary!

item.title: Status Update – July 1, 2015
item.description: Dillan’s birthday; six years old; party on Saturday! Bruce misses Kozy Kidz. Blue cookies. Happy birthday song with Dillan on stage at VBS.

item.title: Status Update – June 30, 2015
item.description: Ashley went swimming during Jellystone Park field trip. At VBS Ashley did opening pledges; I got Dillan involved by doing motions with him.

item.title: Status Update – June 29, 2015
item.description: Today went smoothly. Dillan’s field trip cancelled due to rain. Ashley had another tummy ache. VBS day two; kids had lots of fun; tired out!

item.title: Status Update – June 28, 2015
item.description: Church. Kids played all day. Babies stayed home, big kids went to VBS. Ashley said closing prayer. So proud! Lesa said I’m a helicopter dad.

item.title: Status Update – June 27, 2015
item.description: Picked up Ashley; got donuts; headed home. Rock Show at fairgrounds; Denny’s for lunch. Bruce swallowed Dillan’s marble. Kids played. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – June 26, 2015
item.description: Cooks took Ashley to French Lick; staying night with Eleanor; time of her life! So quiet! Up late with Dillan; watched Batman; ate popcorn.

item.title: Status Update – June 25, 2015
item.description: Ashley WonderLab field trip. Off early because Bruce sick; he wasn’t. Last day of swim lessons: slide/diving boards; party, cookies, snacks.

item.title: Status Update – June 24, 2015
item.description: Marengo Cave field trip for Dillan. Vintage photos in! Swim lesson skills tests; Dillan jumped off diving board! Wendy’s Frosties and fries.

item.title: Status Update – June 23, 2015
item.description: Ashley field trip to Jellystone. Taco Bell supper. Swim lessons again. This time all parents asked to leave to keep from being distractions.

item.title: Status Update – June 22, 2015
item.description: Dillan out of control: not allowed on field trip; kicked out of swim lessons; Dillan only wants to play even when he knows the consequences.

item.title: Status Update – June 21, 2015
item.description: Church. Cook’s offered a Disney Cruise if/when we adopt. Potty accidents. Ashley’s tummy hurt. Grilled salmon – a favorite. Curious George.

item.title: Status Update – June 20, 2015
item.description: Dillan in Springville Heritage Festival Parade with Tiger Cub Scouts Pack 343. Wore his new shirt, belt, and hat. Went to Asian Pearl after.

item.title: Status Update – June 19, 2015
item.description: Stormed all day, still storming! Kids full of energy and stuck inside. Pizza! Played Mario Chase and Twister Race on Wii; babies played too.

item.title: Status Update – June 18, 2015
item.description: Ashley field trip to Monroe Park. Stormed almost all night. Swim lessons cancelled so TV and popcorn instead. Everyone needed early bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – June 17, 2015
item.description: Dillan laser tag field trip. Lesa took kids to swim lessons; I bathed, read to, put babies in bed. We needed change of pace after yesterday.

item.title: Status Update – June 16, 2015
item.description: Day started good but ended in hell. Kids acted horrible. Big kids insane, little kids terrible twos. Big kids McDonald’s, then swim lessons.

item.title: Status Update – June 15, 2015
item.description: New daycare, paperwork, late, love schedule. Dillan acted out; disobeyed teachers; no field trip. Other kids did good. Swim lessons started.

item.title: Status Update – June 14, 2015
item.description: At church a lot of people asked about the kids? Bikes. Pool! Trying to enjoy because the kids are growing up fast! Kids had a great weekend!

item.title: Status Update – June 13, 2015
item.description: Indianapolis Zoo! Two hundred dollar day! Oceans, Deserts, Plains, Forests, Dolphin Show, Splash Park, Train, food, fun! We had a great day!

item.title: Status Update – June 12, 2015
item.description: Last day at Kozy Kidz. Ashley excited about new daycare with Dillan. Fries visited. Pizza! Played outside until rain started. Watched Nemo.

item.title: Status Update – June 11, 2015
item.description: Hot, mid 90s! Kids good at daycare and home. Spaghetti dinner. Icees. Baths. Dillan afraid of spider, screamed like a girl; Ashley unafraid.

item.title: Status Update – June 10, 2015
item.description: Kid showers; late to work; Lesa picked up Dillan. Dillan and Ashley played with neighbors. Ashley super-tired and cranky. Bruce mischievous.

item.title: Status Update – June 9, 2015
