item.description: Kozy Kidz vintage photo shoot – cute. Dillan official Tiger Cub; Scout pool party; dropped pants in front of everyone! Ashley whiny all day.

item.title: Status Update – June 8, 2015
item.description: Dillan field trip rained out, Pizza Hut instead. Amber visited, kids acted like fools. Lowe’s for toilet handle. Kids whining for swing set.

item.title: Status Update – June 7, 2015
item.description: Church family day. Arby’s. Haircuts. Looking good! Swimming. Big wheels. Bruce smashed finger needed ice. Cooked out salmon, couscous a hit.

item.title: Status Update – June 6, 2015
item.description: Hauled trash, recyclables. Wendy’s Frosties. Cut grass. Dillan rode bike. Kids swam. Kids didn’t like new supper dish. Barbie movie. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – June 5, 2015
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Bruce hitting, biting kids at daycare. Played outside. Helped Lesa water garden. Kids tired from long week. Hope we sleep in!

item.title: Status Update – June 4, 2015
item.description: Signed kids up for swimming lessons. Bedford Library Summer Reading Festival: bouncy house, snow cones, popcorn. Golden Corral afterwards.

item.title: Status Update – June 3, 2015
item.description: Normal day. Linda Wilson and Joyce Couch dropped off four Big-Wheels, one pink, and a swimming pool after work. We’re blessed with friends.

item.title: Status Update – June 2, 2015
item.description: Dillan dentist. Not doing good job. Everyone behaved today. Finally got to go outside and play some. Batman and baths for Dillan and Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – June 1, 2015
item.description: Jeep repair. Power out. Phone/Internet still out. Something tore lines down. Raining. Kids stuck inside. Dillan whiny. Bruce a pill. Tired.

item.title: Status Update – May 31, 2015
item.description: Church grads. Given Thomas the Train track and table the kids love! New Mr. Rooster. Played on trampoline at Anderson’s. Lesa near wits end.

item.title: Status Update – May 30, 2015
item.description: Dillan eye check. Doing great! Bought utility trailer. Hauled trash. Dillan is glad we’re his mom and dad. Set up pool. Kids had great time!

item.title: Status Update – May 29, 2015
item.description: Crazy kids today! Dillan wanted to race bikes. He looked back during race. Huge wipe out in gravel. Race over. Wound-cleaning band-aid time.

item.title: Status Update – May 28, 2015
item.description: Dillan graduated kindergarten today! Pictures/videos. Ceremony. Diploma. Dance. Cake. Punch. We’re proud he worked hard and made it through!

item.title: Status Update – May 27, 2015
item.description: JT Hearing. CASA dismissed. Court to terminate. Dad declined. Fact Finding next. Shackled Dad thanked me for kids’ welfare; shook my hand.

item.title: Status Update – May 26, 2015
item.description: Holiday over. Work, school, daycare. Dillan had school picnic at park. Kozy Kidz gave Ashley birthday presents. Amber visited. Kids played.

item.title: Status Update – May 25, 2015
item.description: Memorial Day. Rained AM. Cookout at Fries PM. Rode bikes. Played. Ate good food! Played more. Scrapes and bruises – no one hurt. Dirty kids!

item.title: Status Update – May 24, 2015
item.description: Church. Kids went on visitation. Steak ‘n’ Shake lunch. Chocolate shake w/M&Ms. Ashley dressed as Elsa and Anna. Rode bikes. Played outside.

item.title: Status Update – May 23, 2015
item.description: Ashley’s party at WonderLab! Daycare and church friends. Presents, cupcakes, ice cream. Lots of fun playing at WonderLab. Fun day, all day.

item.title: Status Update – May 22, 2015
item.description: Ashley’s birthday. Party tomorrow. Dillan in school, rest stayed home. Park. Pizza. Strawberry shortcake. Lego movie. Jiffy Treat ice cream.

item.title: Status Update – May 21, 2015
item.description: Dillan in trouble at school again so another talk. Bruce and Ashley went to doctors for yearly check-ups and shots. Starting to feel better.

item.title: Status Update – May 20, 2015
item.description: JT Hearing: Mom no-show, defaults; Dad no-show, transport order not executed, continued. Walk-in clinic. Jeep ready. Lesa/Ashley eye doctor.

item.title: Status Update – May 19, 2015
item.description: Stephanie visit tonight. Discussed DCS plans for court in AM. Kids goofed off as usual. Talked about Dillan accepting adoption. Scouts okay.

item.title: Status Update – May 18, 2015
item.description: Lesa on vacation this week so I’m taking everyone to school and daycare this week – and picking them up. Kids are very worked up tonight.

item.title: Status Update – May 17, 2015
item.description: Family Sunday at C3. Honey baked ham sandwiches, sides, and cookies. Balloon animals. Magician. Magic! Aggressive dog on walk. No one hurt.

item.title: Status Update – May 16, 2015
item.description: Bruce is two! Party! Cake! Balloons! Basketball! Rained. Kids got wet and muddy! Taco supper! Land That Time Forgot! Great day for the kids!

item.title: Status Update – May 15, 2015
item.description: 33rd Anniversary. We ate dinner out. Kim watched kids – pizza, movie, and popcorn. Bruce turns two tomorrow! It’s his 2nd birthday with us.

item.title: Status Update – May 14, 2015
item.description: No issues today. Dave, Lesa, Ashley (maybe Bruce) sick. Stephanie called. Visiting Tuesday – the night before their JT Hearing. I’m nervous.

item.title: Status Update – May 13, 2015
item.description: Dillan soiled himself twice – we’re at a loss. Psych time? Lesa really sick today. Voice about gone. Took ALL kids to Bible Study with me.

item.title: Status Update – May 12, 2015
item.description: Kindergarten Track & Field day. Three-leg sack race. Dillan 1st place in Big Wheel race. Steak ‘n’ Shake lunch. Cub Scout sign-up. Busy day!

item.title: Status Update – May 11, 2015
item.description: Ashley, Lesa, Dave sick. Work, school, daycare. Long day. Ashley and Dillan still in Mother’s Day mode. Made Lesa more cards. They love her.

item.title: Status Update – May 10, 2015
item.description: Mother’s Day. Dave still sick. Lesa handled kid stuff. Kids helped in garden. Went swimming afterward. Dave made supper for Lesa. Good day.

item.title: Status Update – May 9, 2015
item.description: First Aid/CPR training at Open Arms. Dairy Queen lunch. Dave full-blown sick. Wants to rain. Toy Story 1 & 2. Baths for everyone. Poor Lesa!

item.title: Status Update – May 8, 2015
item.description: Friday night pizza! I’m sick. Going to bed early. Lesa holding down fort. Poor woman! Kids acting all crazy. Deck and TV to the rescue.

item.title: Status Update – May 7, 2015
item.description: Kids harder to control than usual. Played outside after supper. When Aiden showed up it was big kids bath time. Lots of DCS paperwork today!

item.title: Status Update – May 6, 2015
item.description: Lesa picked up Dillan. I picked up kids. Wednesday night meal at church. Took long way home for change of pace since it was still light out.

item.title: Status Update – May 5, 2015
item.description: Dillan’s teachers impressed when he apologized to them. Dwyane might be getting used to separation from Bruce. Planning kids’ May birthdays.

item.title: Status Update – May 4, 2015
item.description: Dillan disrespected his teachers all afternoon. Took a long truck ride for together time and guy talk. He’s angry kids won’t play with him.

item.title: Status Update – May 3, 2015
item.description: Church but Lesa stayed home. Cookout for Paul and Andrea Fries’ 40th Anniversary. Several friends present. Kids played lots. Had a good day.

item.title: Status Update – May 2, 2015
item.description: Fixed mower, cut grass, tilled garden, weed ate, swam, rode bikes, planted flowers, played in yard, grilled salmon and kids still not tired!

item.title: Status Update – May 1, 2015
item.description: Dwyane didn’t cry again. Dillan really trying with me. Friday pizza night! Tractor Supply for chicken feed. Jiffy Treat for ice cream after.

item.title: Status Update – April 30, 2015
item.description: Dwyane got sticker from daycare for not crying. Let him dictate order of morning. It helped. Dillan put forth effort to get along with me.

item.title: Status Update – April 29, 2015
item.description: Dwyane continues to cry when dropped off at daycare. Dillan broke glasses again. Church tonight. The kids made Mother’s Day crafts for Lesa.

item.title: Status Update – April 28, 2015
item.description: A fairly normal day. Kids played outside a lot due to nice weather. Dillan put forth effort to be nicer. Dillan not wearing pull-up to bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 27, 2015
item.description: Ashley went to dentist. No cavities. Needs to floss more and brush better. Dwyane’s Head Start evaluation as expected with speech issues.

item.title: Status Update – April 26, 2015
item.description: Church. Last early Sunday for a while. Kids obviously happy to be home. Played outside most of day. Cooked out. BBQ chicken and vegetables.

item.title: Status Update – April 25, 2015
item.description: Foster training in Shelburn all day. Dinner at Cinco de Mayo in Lyons. Bruce jumped off recliner. Got a knot on his head for his efforts.

item.title: Status Update – April 24, 2015
item.description: Everyone happy weekend is here! Watched Aladdin movie at Bedford Library complete with popcorn. Afterward, Jiffy Treat soft-serve ice cream!

item.title: Status Update – April 23, 2015
item.description: At least 30 minutes behind in AM. Late picking Dillan up in PM. Switched order of bathes. Dillan first tonight. Ashley had meltdown over it.

item.title: Status Update – April 22, 2015
item.description: Late getting everywhere this AM. Church in PM for Ashley and Dillan. Their favorite place is church. Lots of foster care paperwork today.

item.title: Status Update – April 21, 2015
item.description: Lesa picked up Dillan tonight. Raining so couldn’t go out to play. Dillan all mad about it. Dillan and Ashley’s bath night. Late to bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2015
item.description: New work/school/daycare week. Picked up/dropped off Martina who was getting tires changed. Dillan got 100 on reading and a new library book.

item.title: Status Update – April 19, 2015
item.description: Church. Rained all day. Lunch. Dancing to radio. Naps. Ice Age DVD. Horton Hears a Who on TV. Supper. Hide and Seek. Pick up toys. Bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – April 18, 2015
item.description: Dillan helped load trash. Truck needs starter. Jumping Joey’s for Bentley’s birthday. Steak ‘n’ Shake supper. Everyone had good time. Tired.

item.title: Status Update – April 17, 2015
item.description: Friday night pizza night. Scrapes and bruises riding bikes and playing on ramp. Dillan thinks I’m mean because I made him clean up his toys.

item.title: Status Update – April 16, 2015
item.description: Ashley discharged from speech therapy because her speech is age-appropriate. Dwyane gets antibiotics from doctor. Golden Corral for supper.

item.title: Status Update – April 15, 2015
item.description: Picked Dillan up. No hello just “Why are YOU picking me up?” Dwyane has splinter in leg from deck that got infected. Rest of day smooth.

item.title: Status Update – April 14, 2015
item.description: Dillan and Dave the same. Angry inside. Worked on healing and making up. Hugging resumed. Kissing too. Agreement to try to control tempers.

item.title: Status Update – April 13, 2015
item.description: Bad day today. Dillan angry and acting out. Won’t ever hug Dave again. Dillan told to leave. Seriously considered asking for new placement.

item.title: Status Update – April 12, 2015
item.description: Early to church and late to leave due to Deaconess duties. Bought muffins Dwyane made. Kids played outside and rode bikes most of the day.

item.title: Status Update – April 11, 2015
item.description: Switzie went to vet. All is well. Springville Carnival. Worked beanbag toss. Kids loved bouncy house. Annie movie at Tripoli in the evening.

item.title: Status Update – April 10, 2015
item.description: Mom and Dad Moffett declined self-termination. End of the school week. Pizza night. Nothing else special happened. Busy day tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – April 9, 2015
item.description: Speech therapy for words ending in “L”. Dwyane practically used an entire roll of toilet paper to wipe and nearly flooded the toilet over.

item.title: Status Update – April 8, 2015
item.description: Slow start again! Tornado siren was exciting for kids. Stephanie called and needs photos for possible self-termination by parents on Friday.

item.title: Status Update – April 7, 2015
item.description: Slow morning. Potty issues all around. Running late. Text message Dwyane sick. Leave early. Doctor. Cold. Medicine. Home. Visit from Amber.

item.title: Status Update – April 6, 2015
item.description: Dwyane moves on to the new house at Kozy Kidz. Nearly potty trained. Starting to talk much more. Bruce missing Dwyane. New week starting…

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2015
item.description: Deacon breakfast. Easter Bunny came! Ashley, Dwyane, and Bruce sing song at church. Dave’s family drive down to visit. Cook out. Great day.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2015
item.description: Dellinger-Ross get together at Fortville Park. Easter egg hunt. Playground. Dinner. Family. Fun.

item.title: Status Update – April 3, 2015
item.description: Kozy Kidz closed Good Friday. Brian and Shawna Gainey respite. Springville – Bloomfield – Bloomington – then in reverse. Friday night pizza!

item.title: Status Update – April 2, 2015
item.description: Second early morning in a row. Ashley practiced words with “L” at the end during speech therapy. Rained, but enough sun to play outside.

item.title: Status Update – April 1, 2015
item.description: April Fools. JOINT Services speech evaluations at Springville Elementary. Pledge of Allegiance over loudspeaker. Spaghetti dinner at church.

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2015
item.description: Marcy Cook reads her new book about fostering at Greene County Eastern Library. She gives signed, personalized copies to Dillan and Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – March 30, 2015
item.description: Spring break is over. School has started again. Normal schedule (other than slow start this AM). Hopefully kids will be back to normal too.

item.title: Status Update – March 29, 2015
item.description: Palm Sunday. Church, chicken noodle lunch, Easter Bunny and Easter egg hunt.

item.title: Status Update – March 28, 2015
item.description: Two-and-a-half week wait. Two hundred seventy-five dollars. Dillan’s special order glasses. Two hours later broken beyond repair. A record?

item.title: Status Update – March 27, 2015
item.description: Went to Children’s Museum in Indianapolis today. Kids had great time until they got tired and cranky that is. Lesa and I had good time too.

item.title: Status Update – February 20, 2016
item.description: Ice skating, one week left, Dillan/Ashley advance, Dwyane maybe, Bruce no. Then CVS, Dollar General for batteries. Lesa to Walmart for diapers, Ashley clothes/shoes. 65°, kids played outside, rode bikes, RC truck, had fun. Bluegrass, danced with Bruce. Grilled salmon. A good day.

item.title: Status Update – February 29, 2016
item.description: Ugh, back to work. Everyone rested, starting week off right. Nice day, kids wanted to go outside. Dillan had math homework, Ashley had make-up papers because of speech. Helped Dillan do math; he needs flash cards, lots of work! Cub Scouts, Dillan earned 2 belt loops; took Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – February 9, 2017
item.description: Snowed, roads okay, on time. Decent workday, worked 1/2 hour over. Jeep not finished, had to renew car rental for another week, Lesa wants her Jeep! Dillan graduated out of booster, Dwyane into booster. Jenny Waggoner, new Open Arms Case Manager, made first home visit, went well.

item.title: Status Update – January 1, 2016
item.description: New Year’s Day! Relaxed most of the day. Lesa and Ashley went grocery shopping, Walmart and Dollar General. Ashley bought toys with $10 Christmas money she got from someone. The boys, myself stayed home; watched Spider-Man and Hulk. Ate cabbage dinner per tradition. A decent day.

item.title: Status Update – January 1, 2018
item.description: Tried sleeping in, kids woke us, got angry with them. Stay at home kind of day, then bought set of 6 used kitchen chairs in Seymour off Facebook; took Bruce, Dwyane, Ashley to give Lesa a break; got shakes from DQ on way home. Traditional cabbage dinner. Break over, back to work!

item.title: Status Update – January 10, 2016
item.description: Snowed about 4 inches; ice underneath; difficult getting into trucks. Church; hardly anyone there; thankful for 4-wheel drive! Kids played in snow; tried sledding but sleds bogged down in fluffy snow. Kids frozen so had some hot chocolate! Watched fitting movie: Ice Age. Fun day!

item.title: Status Update – January 11, 2017
item.description: Still sick, dropped from head into lungs, horrible cough, at least it’s progressing, kids and Lesa still okay. Hard workday, tired, just wanted to leave. Easy evening, nothing planned. Temperature in 50s, raining, snow gone, stuck inside. Kids wanted to play PS2 but had homework.

item.title: Status Update – January 12, 2016
item.description: Lesa took Dillan, Ashley and Dwyane to daycare. 2-hour delay became no school. Daycare has 24-hour rule so I took Bruce to Bobbi Johnson’s. Whiteout conditions and icy roads but ride home okay. Psych eval paperwork came in mail, I spent the evening filling out forms for tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – January 12, 2017
item.description: Bruce good at daycare, total pill when I picked him up. Made Ashley’s dental appointment for Feb. 3. Michelle Ellis emailed, background check waiver finally approved! We can finally adopt! Let Tammy Minger know. DCS negotiations next, then judge sets hearing date. PS2 Hill Climb.

item.title: Status Update – January 14, 2016
item.description: Thursday; almost missed buses; first day of school this week! Lesa and I sledded with Dillan, Dwyane and Bruce; neighbors sledded too. Dwyane enjoyed throwing snow balls. Discovered Dillan lied about homework so he could play outside; instead he had lots of makeup homework to do.

item.title: Status Update – January 16, 2016
item.description: Kids kept it quieter than usual this morning. Hauled trash with Dillan; icy roads and drive. Ice skating lessons in Bloomington again: Dwyane and Bruce improved, Dillan and Ashley skating. Went to school with Dillan to run RC truck; had a great time! Watched TV rest of day/night.

item.title: Status Update – January 9, 2016
item.description: Woke to Ashley banging bedroom door yelling: Bruce has bag of Oreos! Bought Dwyane and Bruce bike helmets at Bloomington Walmart; ice skating lessons for kids at Frank Southern rink; great time! Our backs hurt from helping toddlers. Fought with Lesa. Rain turning to ice and snow.

item.title: Status Update – January 9, 2017
item.description: I didn’t want to go to work! Kids slow to get moving but seemed really happy to be back at school, excited to share day when I picked them up. I have a cold. Took Dillan to Pack Meeting. Sent pictures and videos to Dillan and Ashley’s teachers per their request to show classroom.

item.title: Status Update – July 1, 2016
item.description: Dillan’s birthday, seven years old! Lesa tied balloons to his chair, seems to be a tradition now. Friday! Pizza! Drained and filled pool again. Peaceful evening on purpose because we have a big weekend coming. Watched new movie Zootopia. Neighborhood fireworks started after dark.

item.title: Status Update – July 10, 2016
item.description: At church close Tony announced status, entire church stood and applauded us, then they laid hands and prayed for us and kids! Awesome blessings! Lunch, naps, swimming. Garden fair for dinner! Fried zucchini, we love, kids not so much. Kids played, watched TV before bed. Good day!

item.title: Status Update – July 11, 2016
item.description: Dillan, Ashley still on field trip so took Dwyane, Bruce home. Lesa and boys took Switzie to vet. Got sandwiches, ballet clothes, swim suits; back to daycare for Dillan, Ashley; to Kat’s for Ashley’s dance lesson; followed by swim lessons. Kids in bed! Busy day! Crashed on couch!

item.title: Status Update – July 12, 2016
item.description: Bruce’s diaper exploded pee-soaked stuff everywhere, Ashley helped clean. Wellness check at work. AM storms. Dwyane swim field trip. Lesa took big kids to swim lessons. I watched boys: swimming, TV, read book, boys bedtime. Dillan read to Lesa, I read to Ashley, big kids bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – July 15, 2016
item.description: Friday! Rough morning with Dillan, clashing big time. Took him to Noah’s for tutoring. Stopped at Yoho’s and got kids Cookie Dough ice cream before picking Dillan up. Pizza! Ashley head-banging to Led Zeppelin, she liked it! Not so hot out so chased kids outside. Played, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – July 24, 2016
item.description: After church short board meeting; moved yard sale stuff to big room. Naps! We got in pool, even Lesa! Played Turtle. Really enjoy pool time with kids, they like it too, we’re building happy memories! Grilled brats in backyard: able to watch kids swim. Wind down time after supper.

item.title: Status Update – July 25, 2016
item.description: Back to the grind. Forgot big kids’ swimming suits, didn’t get to go swimming at daycare, feel bad about that. Ashley ballet class, just one more, have to decide to continue or no. School and Scouts start shortly, might be too much activity. Lesa and I talked about buying houses.

item.title: Status Update – July 26, 2016
item.description: Rough start last 2 mornings, busy at work too. Morning storms. MS tired, crash when I get home. Extreme heat wave, setting records. No pool, bees discovered water source, suspect theirs dried up, emptied/moved pool. Kids played indoors. Lesa let all kids stay up late watching TV.

item.title: Status Update – July 27, 2016
item.description: Still having hard time getting moving in morning, today better than others. A nice day, rain cooled things off. Dwyane took field trip to Spring Mill Park, had good time, talked about it a lot, was stoked he went in a cave! Managed to get kids to bed on time, got Ashley in early!

item.title: Status Update – June 12, 2016
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home, Ashley pretty in new dress, anonymous gift, security deacon; LOTS of congrats, too soon to celebrate! Hot day, filled new pool, even Lesa got in, had a great time! Ashley worked her birthday puzzle. Back to lock up church, kissed sleeping kids goodnight.

item.title: Status Update – June 12, 2017
item.description: Dillan and Ashley Mitchell Pool field trip again, Ashley threw up as they left, combination sun and too much junk food. Packed sandwiches for Dwyane’s game, sat by Mrs. Dillman, Ashley’s game followed. Boys went home with Lesa. Ashley had 2 hits, her team won! Everyone exhausted.

item.title: Status Update – June 13, 2016
item.description: A hot day! Dillan and Ashley on field trip at Mitchell Pool, a woman called Ashley by name, asked where Dillan was, Ashley didn’t know her, we’re spooked! Ashley misbehaved, not allowed to go next Monday. Dillan’s last baseball game tonight, Stephanie Helton came, last DCS visit?

item.title: Status Update – June 14, 2016
item.description: Long day! Bruce stomped Dwyane’s milk, hid life jackets, both set by door for daycare, then pooped his pants. Some guy threw soda can out window, hit my truck. Card expired, phone deactivated. Worked 9 hours. Coach called with two make-up dates. Helped Dillan do reading homework.

item.title: Status Update – June 15, 2016
item.description: Today mirror copy of yesterday. Bruce pulled light from ceiling, got blackberries and dumped on floor, a complete terror. Picked up kids, and Lesa, and headed to Splash Pad, Jenny Stinson rented entire place for evening. We didn’t get rained out, we were stormed out! Bed on time!

item.title: Status Update – June 16, 2016
item.description: Okay day, mostly on time except to Dillan’s ballgame! Game was a make-up at Bailey Field, I thought 7:30p but was 6:30p. Played half an inning, game over! Rural King and Lowe’s, bought storage containers for kids’ keepsakes. Frosties and home. My eyes giving me trouble, not good!

item.title: Status Update – June 2, 2016
item.description: Spent about $200 to pay for Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane’s T-shirts and field trips just for June! Will have another batch in July. Received email and Review Hearing filing from Stephanie Helton today, Nicolle didn’t sign voluntary termination papers. Visit and psych evals coming soon.

item.title: Status Update – June 2, 2017
item.description: Short week, still glad it’s Friday! Springville Store pizza! A long night of ball: Dillan had two ballgames back-to-back! He had a couple good hits, struck out a couple of times, seemed a little bored at times, but doing good we think. Took boys and Ashley, they were total asses.

item.title: Status Update – June 22, 2016
item.description: Stormy morning. Told daycare to put Dillan to work since he’s so bored, he didn’t like that. After work picked up kids, before we got out of truck, Amber arrived. Early for visit, told us she’d leave early, stayed 1.5 hours, she played dolls with Ashley. Dillan read to Lesa. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – June 23, 2016
item.description: Tired, fell asleep on couch, Ashley woke me up, she had a bad dream, they took her away and she never got to see us again – a recurring nightmare for her. Daycare put Dillan to work, hates it, wants to go to other room. Ashley loved first ballet lesson! Bruce had WIC appointment.

item.title: Status Update – June 25, 2016
item.description: Very nice day, cool morning, hot afternoon. Lesa took Ashley shopping for Dillan’s birthday gifts. Took kids to buy chickens; had ducks, goats, rabbits too. While kids napped Lesa and I fixed up brooder coop; drained, refilled pool. Spent afternoon in pool. Had a really good day!

item.title: Status Update – June 26, 2016
item.description: Tired, couldn’t sleep Saturday night. Church, board meeting after. Lunch, naps. Swam after snacks. Ate supper. Took big kids to church for VBS, little kids stayed with Lesa and made cookies. All kids had fun. Stormed, power went out right away, kids got scared, just came back on.

item.title: Status Update – June 29, 2016
item.description: Lesa medicine sick, threw up this morning, her foot is doing okay. Dillan and Ashley went to Blue Springs Caverns, they had fun and want to go back as a family when Lesa is better. Got groceries after work. Took kids to VBS again: Dillan participated, Ashley prayed, boys had fun!

item.title: Status Update – June 3, 2016
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Called Chris, Gabe’s dad, Dillan’s friend, to invite Gabe over; cannot, maybe another night. Talked with neighbor Gary Flynn about getting Dillan a dirt bike, Gary works at M&E Honda and is knowledgeable. Called, paid to reserve shelter house for Dillan’s birthday.

item.title: Status Update – June 3, 2017
item.description: Kids woke us up early. Ashley Urban Air with Scouts. Dwyane ball practice, Dillan’s canceled, Ashley missed her game. I took boys, Lesa took Ashley. Boys met girls at Needmore Elementary and we all picnicked at Avoca Fish Hatchery, hiked after. Swimming pool. Tacos! Baths and TV.

item.title: Status Update – June 30, 2016
item.description: Last day for antibiotics, for VBS, for Lesa’s work release! She went shopping today and to VBS closing. Felt sick, laid down in truck, rejoined us later. Kids had good time at VBS, had better time eating and playing afterwards. Bouncy houses, music, food and drink, balloons, etc.

item.title: Status Update – June 4, 2016
item.description: A good morning, everyone ate well. Played ’til lunch. Ellie Hausler birthday party; lots of pool time, snacks, water balloons, cake and ice cream, and opening gifts; kids had a great time! Everyone napped, even Dillan. Rained. Toy Story. Tacos for supper. Toy Story 2. Baths, bed.

item.title: Status Update – June 4, 2017
item.description: Family Sunday, Lesa stayed home, I begged off deacon duties because I had kids by myself. Took scenic way home. We went to Bloomington Great Clips; kids and Lesa got hair cuts. Walmart for sandals and other stuff. Kids played in pool. I grilled pork chops. Kids watched Moana DVD.

item.title: Status Update – June 7, 2016
item.description: Dwyane had fun on swim trip! Woke up to friend request, message from Caron Hulsey. It reads like Nicolle hasn’t been straight with family, she might actually sign them over. Absolutely all I’ve thought about today! Dare to hope it’s done! Dare to hope it begins! Sobering thought!

item.title: Status Update – June 7, 2017
item.description: Extra sleep helped! Dillan and Ashley field trip to Mitchell pool again. Bruce in trouble this morning for spitting and calling Forest butt hole, but he had better afternoon. No ball games! Got gas, cut grass. Kids watched Ghost Busters. Relatively trouble-free day, kids behaved.

item.title: Status Update – June 8, 2016
item.description: Permanency hearing, Nicolle going to voluntarily terminate! Accepting PAVA with minor changes, Daniel wants PAVA too, July 5th is parental termination, PAVA signing, adoption follows. Close, but kids may go to school in fall as Dillan and Ashley Williams. Asian Pearl, Rural King.

item.title: Status Update – June 8, 2017
item.description: Dwyane Bluespring Caverns field trip, boat ride, rocks, had fun! Dillan and Ashley obstacle course, shaving cream filled balloons. Subway. Dillan had a red streak going up arm, took to doctor, antibiotics. Dillan’s game at 6:00pm, two hits, ran to home. Read books tonight, no TV.

item.title: Status Update – June 9, 2016
item.description: Hard to get yesterday off my mind! Didn’t tell kids. Dwyane took field trip to Cascades Park, had good time, told us all about it. Yesterday Dillan and Ashley went to Huber Farm, picked strawberries, among other things. Dillan eager for strawberry shortcake tonight, appreciation?

item.title: Status Update – June 9, 2017
item.description: Friday! Off an hour early. Kids happy to see me, Bruce has been doing better. Dillan’s arm not such an angry red. Picked up pizzas from Springville Store. Dwyane had ballgame at 6:00p and Ashley at 7:00p. Has been a long, long week and Lesa and I are exhausted! Gave kids showers.

item.title: Status Update – March 1, 2016
item.description: Ran late this morning. Rained / stormed all day, snow forecast tonight. Dillan struggling with homework again; helped him with math, found online addition flash card game. He can’t add single digit numbers but class way beyond that skill level. Ashley read 2nd grade book to Lesa!

item.title: Status Update – March 10, 2016
item.description: Ashley took her trap to school, she’s happy. Raining, kids played inside. Put SIM card in Lesa’s iPad Air. Went to kids’ favorite place to eat – Asian Pearl; we all ate too much! Read to Ashley while Lesa helped Dillan; he was struggling so I took over; finally finished at 9:00p.

item.title: Status Update – March 10, 2017
item.description: Friday, happy for weekend! Bought candy at Dollar General, made kids happy. Colder! Kids played outside, had trouble getting along. Ate at Casa Brava, celebrated my unexpected $0.44 raise, really just needed an excuse to eat out, kids behaved/ate well. Paid, picked up GS cookies.

item.title: Status Update – March 11, 2016
item.description: Friday! Off at 2:15p. Bedford to pay water bill. Played Wii with kids. Case Conference in Shoals at 6:30p. Missed supper with family, sucks! Mom a no-show. Stephanie talked about re-unification which pissed me off. Let’s hope we’ll be at TPR again in 4 months. Back home at 9:30p.

item.title: Status Update – March 11, 2017
item.description: Slept in, legs/back bothering me, laid back down again. Didn’t do anything all morning. Kids played outside all day. Sorted recyclables, loaded on trailer but too late to haul, kids helped. Signed up Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane for baseball in Fayetteville. Pizza. Kids watched Trolls.

item.title: Status Update – March 12, 2016
item.description: Sleeping in futile. Kids excited it’s Spring Break. Bagel breakfast. Played outside, played with neighbors, rode bikes, fed animals down street, splashed in mud puddles! Played Wii. Watched Scooby-Doo, Paw Patrol, Team Umizoomi, Despicable Me, motocross racing. Baths. A good day.

item.title: Status Update – March 4, 2017
item.description: Kids were quiet, we slept in! Kids rambunctious, sent them out. Dillan upset when we brought up failing grades, took it out on Bruce, appeared he tried to break his arm, BAD! Kids climbed into rain barrels filled with water! Lesa took Ashley to birthday party, boys popcorn/movie.

item.title: Status Update – March 6, 2016
item.description: Church, Family Sunday, kids did great, Security Deacon. Arby’s lunch. Kohl’s; Easter attire; bought Ashley 2 dresses; Dillan two dress shirts/ties. After naps kids played outside until supper. Had to leave: security duties, Lesa put kids to bed, I kissed them goodnight once home.

item.title: Status Update – March 6, 2017
item.description: Overslept again! Still got everyone where they needed on time. My legs hurt! Can hardly walk. Thinking tired / lack of legs MS rearing it’s ugly head. Rained, kids stuck inside, did okay. Dillan only kid with balloon-powered car at Scouts, made plans with parents to wrap year up.

item.title: Status Update – March 7, 2017
item.description: Strong thunderstorms, up before alarm, checked NOAA radio. Boys woke shortly after, I woke Ashley. Kids ate good breakfast. Lesa took Ashley to Daisies, no one there, no cancellation either, pissed us off. Fixed boys popcorn, put in Trolls. Lesa and Ashley home, they watched too.

item.title: Status Update – March 8, 2016
item.description: Parent Teacher Conference with Dwyane’s teacher Jill (Ms Jill) Kluender, his speech therapist and Head Start coordinator. He’s doing great; has made much progress. We’re pleased, so are they. Helped Ashley with Leprechaun trap. Read 2 books to her, Lesa helped Dillan do homework.

item.title: Status Update – March 8, 2017
item.description: Bruce punched girl at daycare, threw teacher’s stuff off desk when told to stop. Texts from Stephanie, hearing soon! Nice out, kids played outside, hit each other with big sticks, Ashley kicked boys, Dillan threw rocks, made them all sit in timeout! Supper; homework; TV; bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – March 9, 2016
item.description: Worked normal day. Rain since noon; kids got recess before it started. Dwyane, Bruce went to Jiffy Treat with daycare. Helped Ashley finish Leprechaun trap, she likes it. Ashley got kindergarten kite for knowing a bunch of stuff. Not much homework. We played Donkey Kong Wii game.

item.title: Status Update – March 9, 2017
item.description: Fighting with Lesa. Stephanie emailed, wants to visit kids one last time, wants future pics, sent us remaining adoption process details. Cleaned house, Jenny visit, arrived while eating, visited with kids, we talked adoption, she might have some boys clothes for Dillan. Long day!

item.title: Status Update – May 1, 2016
item.description: Church; coffee, donuts, wrapped up The Story; Family Sunday, I love our kids! Sunny day, ground still wet; played catch with Dillan, set up batting stand to practice batting, he’s doing pretty good. Grilled salmon, ate on deck, watched a storm roll in, forced inside, nice memory.

item.title: Status Update – May 12, 2016
item.description: Rolling out new site in AM, worked late all week, off normal time today, felt like playing hooky. Still raining, kids stuck inside – bored – letting us know! Dillan’s baseball practice canceled. Playing, homework, TV. Lesa and I filled out invitations for Ashley’s birthday party.

item.title: Status Update – May 12, 2017
item.description: Kids excited about everything! Ashley had field trip to Frog ‘n’ Toad play, Karst Park. Left work early, packed truck, went camping at Maumee on lake! Had great time tonight, kids had trouble getting to sleep, Lesa and I watched moon come up, talked outside tent. Perfect weather!

item.title: Status Update – May 13, 2016
item.description: Friday! Busy work day, rolled out new site. Bought headlights for truck. Fixed trailer gate, loaded recyclables, need to replace missing plate, will haul in AM. Cleaned house thoroughly. Pizza! Amber visited, stayed 2 hours, discussed kids while they played outside. Back is sore!

item.title: Status Update – May 13, 2017
item.description: Patchy sleep, kids up early, breakfast, percolated coffee, kids really liked camping! Broke camp, left for home. Lunch, then spent afternoon with Dillan and Ashley at ball practice. Lesa stayed so boys could nap. More outdoors, Dillan wiped on bike. Everyone tired, ready for bed!

item.title: Status Update – May 15, 2016
item.description: Church mix up, Serving Deacon and Jr. Church! Took communion to Garden Villa. Arby’s. Kid’s summer haircuts at Great Clips, they look good! Took naps. Played outside, got wet and muddy. Our 34th anniversary! I had evening church. Lesa gave kids showers. Hugs and kisses once home!

item.title: Status Update – May 18, 2016
item.description: Overslept, antihistamines in bloodstream from reaction last night. Long workday again. Kids doing well. Took different way home past dump for change of scenery. Kids played outside, did homework, watched Scooby-Doo. Ashley has snacks tomorrow so I helped her prepare. An okay day.

item.title: Status Update – May 18, 2017
item.description: Super sick! Left work no news on per diem. Stephanie emailed, asked if we had agreement yet, said she has gifts for kids on Monday. Lesa and Ashley went to Mother/Daughter Tea Party at church. I took Dwyane to preschool graduation with Dillan and Bruce. Per diem offer in evening.

item.title: Status Update – May 19, 2016
item.description: Took Bruce for 3-year wellness check, everything good physically, developmentally. Went to Walmart, Ashley’s tent not there, donuts of course! Bruce enjoyed spending time with me. Love that kid! Took Ashley, Dillan to T-ball practice, no one there, Springville Elem. Park instead.

item.title: Status Update – May 19, 2017
item.description: Dropped paperwork at attorney’s, emails all day, subsidy determinations, adoption decrees, everything done! We’re adopting Monday! Stormed, power out at work. Lesa took Dwyane, Bruce to dentist. Jenny brought us pizza to celebrate! Dillan, Ashley had games tonight, they did okay.

item.title: Status Update – May 20, 2017
item.description: Slept in, feeling better. Blue and Gold Advancement Ceremony, asked to say opening prayer, as den leader I advanced Wolves (including Dillan) to Bears, several adults told me I did well as den leader. Rained all morning, cleared in time for ceremony. Took it easy rest of the day.

item.title: Status Update – May 21, 2016
item.description: Atwater, Walmart, Dollar General with Dillan, saw coyote. Ashley’s birthday party at Springville Park, six years old! School, church friends, family from Indy came to show Ashley love. Games, food, gifts, she had great day! Asian Pearl, kids favorite restaurant. Showers, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – May 21, 2017
item.description: Church teachers honored, donuts/coffee. Serving deacon, ate Subway, took communion to nursing homes, kids did okay. Walmart, saw Meme from Kozy Kids, got Ashley and Dillan shoes, myself white dress shirt for tomorrow. We’re nervous! Played outside/inside all day. Ashley coughing.

item.title: Status Update – May 23, 2016
item.description: Another new week, kids tired, we’re tired, we haven’t recouped from weekend yet. Last week of school, Lesa took week of vacation to relax, garden, and attend graduation events. Dillan had ballgame, River Dogs vs. Muck Dogs, he did good, Amber incorporated visit by attending game.

item.title: Status Update – May 23, 2017
item.description: Kids school, Lesa work; I’m on FMLA. NLCS name changes for Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane. Registered kids for July swim lessons. Linda Stewart has paperwork straightened out, birth certificates 6-7 weeks. Cut grass, cleaned up garden area. Dillan baseball game, he slid home, having fun.

item.title: Status Update – May 25, 2016
item.description: Hornet Hustle 1k/5k today; Ashley did 1k; Dillan strained groin, had to cheer; both got shirts, Ashley ribbon. Very nice day, kids played outside, had MS trouble due to heat. T-ball practice canceled again! Kids excited school is over, trouble sleeping. Ashley graduates tomorrow!

item.title: Status Update – May 27, 2016
item.description: Friday! Dillan had Honors Celebration; awarded certificate for Improved Reading, Language Arts, Math; Mrs. Wronowicz awarded him Smiley and Hard Worker certificates; he did good! All kids glad school is over, summer break started. Pizza! Nice day, played outside. Stayed up later.

item.title: Status Update – May 30, 2016
item.description: Camped with Ashley, in at 3:45a, too much discomfort, fun anyway. Played all morning, tried to get Ashley to take nap, she was tired. A day of water balloons, squirt guns, pool fun; I got in pool, was immediately attacked. Ashley and Dillan not feeling well. Kids keep getting up.

item.title: Status Update – May 30, 2017
item.description: Last day of FMLA. Took kids to daycare, came home, took morning nap. Spent afternoon getting WordPress to play videos streamed from Amazon S3 storage, success! Picked up kids from daycare, Bruce pulled other kids’ pants down! Took Dwyane to his baseball game, he had awesome time!

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2016
item.description: Had fight with kids over book fair money, Dillan tried to take $22, Ashley had handful of cash too. Told them $5 apiece, then meltdown, I had meltdown too! Long, long workday. Bruce hit Dwyane in head at daycare with “log,” caused large lump. Amber visited, she has a foster baby.

item.title: Status Update – November 11, 2015
item.description: I’m hospital-visit sick; stayed home from work; tried to get some rest; coughing so hard I’m sore. Kids wanting another $10 each to spend at school book fair. Weather nice so they played outside some. Dillan doesn’t like homework first policy. Little kids’ baths and early to bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 14, 2015
item.description: Boys made a tent from their bedding and woke everyone up early. Amber visited; stayed 90 minutes playing hide-and-seek with kids. Lesa went to Walmart; Dillan and I watched Purdue football; kids napped. Ashley wanted a tent too so I built her one. She went to sleep in it tonight.

item.title: Status Update – November 17, 2017
item.description: Friday! Off at 1:30p; Bedford, paid HPC and water bills. Kids like: CCR, Steely Dan, George Michael; don’t like: Melissa Etheridge, Kate Bush. Dillan dirt bike, Ashley dolls with Miley and Presley, Dwyane rode bike w/o training wheels, Bruce played trucks. Pizza, Pinocchio movie.

item.title: Status Update – November 18, 2016
item.description: Friday! Lesa stayed home, contagious, went to doctor, meds, flu shot, mild fever. Dillan better, not 100%. Bruce getting worse. Sounded like everyone had good day at school/daycare. Work okay. Kids played outside, still warm, forecast is cold. Deer hunted 2 hours. Pizza! TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 18, 2017
item.description: Deer hunted in AM, too windy, nothing moved, didn’t even see birds or squirrels. Bloomington ReStore, looked for dining room chairs—no luck. Steak ‘n’ Shake to celebrate kids’ grades, then College Mall’s The Toy Store, bought the kids a toy each. Hunted in PM, stormed. Tacos! TV.

item.title: Status Update – November 19, 2015
item.description: Coughing hard; had hours-long nose bleed at work and home. Stephanie, DCS Caseworker, visited to discuss termination. Judge ready but case law says relatives get a chance and they’re going to take it. At least two more hearings. No change in status, visits, etc. Needs to be over!

item.title: Status Update – November 19, 2017
item.description: Church, Jr. Church, Dillan, Ashley, Dwyane in class, Dwyane stoked Daddy was there! Ashley helped clean house. Lesa spent couple of hours playing with kids, they loved it. Took nap. Went deer hunting, 8-point buck, kids not sure what to think! Took Dillan and Ashley to processor.

item.title: Status Update – November 2, 2015
item.description: I’m sick. Got home, water went out. No baths. Lesa bought bottled water; got home water back on! Built entertainment system for living room.

item.title: Status Update – November 2, 2016
item.description: Lesa took Dillan to work with her, then Brinegar Eye Care, then school. Took Ashley to school and boys to daycare. Interesting, unusual day at work due to Innovation Workshop. Bruce kicked an 18-month toddler girl! Helped Dillan do math homework. Passed out on couch after supper.

item.title: Status Update – November 20, 2015
item.description: Stephanie fallout: Ashley woke up crying 4 times, bad dreams of people taking her away; Dillan peed pants in bedroom just 5-10 feet away from toilet; Ashley and Dillan separated from each other / other kids at daycare for fighting. Both Ashley and Dillan did terrific on midterms!

item.title: Status Update – November 21, 2017
item.description: Dwyane coughing otherwise okay. Bruce did better, shared with others. Thanksgiving pitch-in at work. Ashley, Dwyane had Thanksgiving party at school. Miley, Presley, Charlie dog visited until Lesa took Ashley to Scouts. Dropped Lesa’s Jeep off at Tire and Wheel for repairs in AM.

item.title: Status Update – November 22, 2015
item.description: Church. Lunch, naps, and snacks. Kids played “Chutes and Ladders” with Lesa. Afterwards they made Play-Doh pizzas, but mostly made a mess. I cooked Ashley’s favorite – pancakes; and made waffles for Dillan. Watched “How the Grinch Stole Christmas” and then put little kids to bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 22, 2016
item.description: Almost Thanksgiving! Kids last day of school. Rambunctious, especially Ashley; lots of screaming from all kids. Busy work day, productive but still dragged by. Bruce seems aware of his behavior – that’s great! Still not potty trained though. Lesa took Ashley to Daisy pizza party.

item.title: Status Update – November 22, 2017
item.description: Kids excited, no school, stayed at daycare, Bruce had great day according to Courtney. Got off early, picked up kids by 3:30p, they were ready! Pizza Hut, cashed in Book Initiative coupons for free personal pan pizzas, place was packed, service was slow. Showers. Got to bed late.

item.title: Status Update – November 23, 2015
item.description: Long day! Ashley said I need haircut so cut hair when I got home. Open Arms Thanksgiving Dinner; made it by six; dinner started at 6:45p so kids were really hungry, and complaining! Dillan getting on my nerves! He bit Ashley for 2nd time in 2 days! Starting to not care about him.

item.title: Status Update – November 23, 2016
item.description: Four days off! Rained all day. Kids were super hyper. Lesa has been cleaning and cooking all week getting ready for tomorrow. Bruce is sick, most likely an ear ache, having trouble sleeping. I’m sick. Ashley obviously tired, wouldn’t admit it. Dillan better, Dwyane and Lesa good.

item.title: Status Update – November 23, 2017
item.description: Went to my brother Avery Dellinger and wife Emily’s house in Indy for Thanksgiving dinner, kids played with their 13 cousins, plus there was another 16 adults, kids had a blast, didn’t want to leave. I love that my family treats the kids like part of natural family. Hwy 37 sucks!

item.title: Status Update – November 24, 2015
item.description: Worked over hoping to leave earlier tomorrow; picked kids up later than usual, they didn’t notice. Ashley scraped knee/belly at daycare. She’s not hurt but milking it; limping and acting like she’s dying; it’s hilarious! Slow evening; ate supper, kids’ baths, watched TV, bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – November 24, 2017
item.description: Lesa hosted Williams Thanksgiving. Got turkey in oven, power went out for 4 hours, horrible start! Family decided to come even if meal was late. Power came on and Lesa cooked a feast for 9 adults, 5 kids! Kids had another fun day playing with different cousins. Family! Food! Fun!

item.title: Status Update – November 25, 2015
item.description: Email from Stephanie with court document attached; mom dropping ball; happy for us and kids; sad for mom especially since it’s the holiday season. Left work/picked up kids early. Played outside. They’re excited it’s Thanksgiving; excited my family is coming; even so, bed on time.

item.title: Status Update – November 25, 2016
item.description: Slept in until 8:30. Took Dillan, Bruce to doctor. Dillan contact allergy – reaction to something. Bruce strep with rash a.k.a. scarlet fever. Yikes! Penicillin, feeling better, rash takes longer. Kids took long naps. Lesa grocery shopped. Deer hunted in evening. Supper, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 25, 2017
item.description: Hauled trash with Dillan and Bruce, Dillan helped! Lesa and Ashley went grocery shopping. Boys and I went to Lowe’s for toilet wax kit. Dillan rode dirt bike, I shot water bottles with Dwyane and Bruce. Kids full of vim and vigor. Bruce terrorized siblings. Had a pretty good day!

item.title: Status Update – November 26, 2015
item.description: My parents, my brother James, my niece Becky and her son Levi, and my niece Sarah and her girlfriend Danielle came from Indy for Thanksgiving dinner; a full house! Kids had great time as did everyone else. My mom brought a couple of pink rugs and a pink lamp for Ashley’s bedroom.

item.title: Status Update – November 26, 2016
item.description: Bruce still sick, woke us early again. Sheriff Dept. called at 8:30, asked us to come to station to collect mail, I took Dillan and Ashley, turns out some guy stole packages, had one of ours. Hauled trash with kids. Lesa took Dillan, Ashley to Dollar General. Kids played outside.

item.title: Status Update – November 26, 2017
item.description: Church, Security Deacon, was suggested I carry a firearm. Kids played inside and out. Dillan rode dirt bike. Ashley and boys danced, acted silly. Boys watched rock/hill climbing car videos on YouTube. Ashley practiced her song for church. Dillan and Ashley went to evening church.

item.title: Status Update – November 27, 2015
item.description: Rained all day! The kids were stuck inside and about drove us crazy because they were in a non-stop schitzo frenzy all day. I’m ready to punish Nicolle by letting her have them back! Lesa needed a break from cooking so we went to Bedford on the square and had barbeque for dinner.

item.title: Status Update – November 27, 2016
item.description: Church, Ashley sick, running fever, left and went home early. Everyone took naps. Ashley felt better in afternoon. Kids played indoors/out. Not much TV. Gave Lesa break from cooking and dishes, ate at Steak ‘n’ Shake, her choice! Ashley started fever again. Troubles going to bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 27, 2017
item.description: Morning went okay, Todd an a**hole, came home early. Bruce was good at daycare. Miley came over until supper time. Took Dillan and Ashley to Scouts, Dillan earned a Baloo the Builder belt loop and a Community Service patch for tornado clean-up, Ashley had helped too but no patch.

item.title: Status Update – November 28, 2016
item.description: School, daycare, work. Tired. Rained all day. Cooks invited us to Florida! All kids running fever when picked up. Best to worst: Dillan, Dwyane, Bruce, Ashley. Dillan gave me fits over doing homework, learning to tell time. Scout Pack Meeting, Wolves earned Duty to God belt loop.

item.title: Status Update – November 28, 2017
item.description: Work better. Paid Lesa’s Jeep repair bill. Picked up boys, Bruce good again! Ashley cheering at basketball game, rest of us went to Book Fair. Lesa and boys played on school playground while I retrieved Ashley. Picked up processed deer. Little Caesars Pizza. Drove Jeep home. Bed.

item.title: Status Update – November 29, 2015
item.description: Power went out with a bang – literally. Kids afraid. Came back on at 1:30am and went off again about 5:30am. Came back on about 6:40am. No showers; water was cold. Went to church and Adams’ gave us lots of toys. We decorated the tree this afternoon. Winding down; school tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – November 29, 2016
item.description: Ashley not well, doctor called in script. Work day wouldn’t end, not feeling well myself, just wanted to go home. Bruce kicked in ear fighting for toy at daycare; he’s fine. Dillan asked questions about grandparents. Dillan JOINT Services test results. Ashley Daisy Scout meeting.

item.title: Status Update – November 30, 2015
item.description: Back to work and school; everyone tired and cranky. Went to doctor this AM for complete physical; the “C” word got tossed about; I’m scheduled for lab work and CT scan tomorrow. Leaving it in God’s hands. Dillan struggled with math homework; whined about it; finally completed it.

item.title: Status Update – November 30, 2016
item.description: Dwyane lost my keys! Found them half-an-hour later, had to take kids to school, got to work late. Innovation Workshop interviews at work. I’m still worn out but all kids finally feeling a bit better! No place to be, nothing we had to do, so kids had pleasant evening just playing.

item.title: Status Update – November 4, 2016
item.description: Friday! Kids to daycare early! We have to redo background checks; foster box checked, not adoption! Another 4 months? Bought new truck tires for $700 mounted. Bruce did better but not good. Kids played outside. Lesa bought groceries, watched boys. I took Ashley to Daisies. Pizza!

item.title: Status Update – November 5, 2015
item.description: Ashley won 1st round in her car, got sticker; lost remaining 2 rounds. Dillan kicked at, called daycare worker dumb; we’re super mad at him.

item.title: Status Update – November 8, 2015
item.description: Kids woke us up early. Everyone’s sick except Lesa. Stayed home from church. Kids played outside for a little while. Fed animals down the street with Lesa. Watched a couple of movies with kids. Need new movies. Had trouble getting kids to settle down for bed. Everyone still sick.

item.title: Status Update – November 9, 2016
item.description: Took big kids to school, boys to dentist; they did good, unafraid; no cavities, both need to brush, floss better – standard dentist mantra. Bruce hit a kid in the head with a wooden block, put in timeout, apologized later. Seems like whole world in shock over Trump. Cold outside!

item.title: Status Update – October 1, 2016
item.description: Dillan to Atwater, going in circles, needs glasses, I got angry, said I’d get 2nd opinion, left. Donuts! Jeep started, got Lesa, got it home, I’ll put starter on tomorrow. Bruce pushed Ashley off bunk bed, she heard neck pop, she’s hurting. Enjoyed hosing off muddy boys too much!

item.title: Status Update – October 10, 2015
item.description: Amber Malay visited. Loaded, hauled trash. Walmart, Lowe’s, Wendy’s. Sold Scout popcorn at Dollar General, $213, Dillan says we’re partners.

item.title: Status Update – October 11, 2015
item.description: Church. Lunch. Naps. Grilled brats and hot dogs for supper. Dillan likes caramelized onions. Kids fell asleep snuggled with me on the couch.

item.title: Status Update – October 11, 2016
item.description: Couldn’t get motivated, didn’t get much work done. Bruce looking rough from bug bites, Lesa made doctor appointment, appears the same as Ashley 2 weeks ago. Dillan whined about homework, took all evening to finish. Replaced outside faucet. Kids watched Kung Fu Panda, ate popcorn.

item.title: Status Update – October 12, 2015
item.description: Daycare on time. Got home, kids were fired up. Dillan had a good time at Scouts; learned about paw prints and camping; called me Daddy lots!

item.title: Status Update – October 12, 2016
item.description: Lesa took Bruce to doctor, same stuff as Ashley, antibiotics, cream. Long day, more productive than yesterday. Not much homework. Kids worked up thinking about Fall Break! Lesa’s sister called, her mom hasn’t got long, we’re going to try to see her this weekend before she’s gone.

item.title: Status Update – October 13, 2015
item.description: Ashley’s Humpty Dumpty moved; don’t know why; talking? Kids played with neighbors; Dillan played instead of doing homework. Kids being kids.

item.title: Status Update – October 15, 2015
item.description: Late to daycare: Bruce blowout. Late picking up: parent/teacher conferences. Ashley doing good; Dillan and Dwyane doing okay, but improving.

item.title: Status Update – October 15, 2016
item.description: Left for WI. Bloomington, IL Subway lunch, 3 nuns eating told me we had a nice family as I left. Lesa’s sister Casandra called, Lesa’s mom fell in bathroom, broke leg, unresponsive, said to hurry. Merrill by 7 pm, Lesa able to say she loved her. Lesa stayed, I took kids to hotel.

item.title: Status Update – October 16, 2015
item.description: Off work early, picked up kids, went to park. Played more at home. Dinner at Asian Pearl (kids’ favorite). Back home, watched TV before bed.

item.title: Status Update – October 16, 2016
item.description: Got call Lesa’s mom died at 5:05 am. Took time getting kids ready. Everyone sad, feel blessed Lesa able to say goodbye. Visited her brother Darrell, then back to hotel where clerk gave kids stuffed toys! Darrell’s for dinner. Kids are tired! Hotel, got them in bed at decent time.

item.title: Status Update – October 17, 2015
item.description: AM: Toilet leaked overnight; Lowe’s; gas; JayC Plus; home to fix toilet. PM: Walmart; spent $200 on kids’ clothes! Kids acting insane today!

item.title: Status Update – October 17, 2016
item.description: Dropped Lesa at Cassandra’s, family went to funeral home, made arrangements. Took kids swimming. Met in afternoon, made rental car/hotel/pet/work arrangements. Dinner at Darrell’s again. Kids want to go home. Popcorn, TV, kid baths, read books, bed time. Need to shop for clothes.

item.title: Status Update – October 18, 2015
item.description: Bruce sick Sat PM / Sun AM. Church. El Ranchero lunch. Bruce to Riley Children’s Clinic; had virus? Fowler Pumpkin Patch; pumpkins, hayride.

item.title: Status Update – October 18, 2016
item.description: Breakfast. Shopco, found Ashley some clothes. Kohl’s in Rhinelander, my suit, Lesa’s dress, boys’ clothes. Burger King. Walmart, Payless for shoes. Kids out of control, naps! Change for laundry, Tomahawk Park. Pizza Hut tasted great! Went swimming in hotel pool. Watched TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – October 19, 2015
item.description: Start of Fall Break; I let kids sleep extra hour. Played at daycare all day; didn’t miss school at all but they will. Played with neighbors.

item.title: Status Update – October 19, 2016
item.description: Breakfast, Bruce wouldn’t eat. Rhinelander again, exchanged suit pants, wrong size. Got other supplies at Walmart. Two parks in Tomahawk. Subway lunch. Showing nice, kids rotten, had to leave, came back later. Treated Lesa’s family to dinner at Pineridge. Long day, very draining!

item.title: Status Update – October 2, 2016
item.description: Took Ashley to hospital for neck, no skeletal damage, strained muscles, 7-10 days restricted activity, she’s okay. Missed church, we’re bummed. Removed starter, took Dillan to Bedford, bought reman, installed. Boys played outside almost all day. Uneventful evening. Love our kids!

item.title: Status Update – October 20, 2015
item.description: Picked up kids; Ashley scraped her back really bad, fell off swing; Dillan behaved; Bruce feeling better; Dwyane not feeling good, coughing.

item.title: Status Update – October 20, 2016
item.description: Up early, breakfast, Trinity Lutheran for funeral service. Dinner after with family at church. Came back to hotel, took kids swimming. Naps. Back to Merrill for dinner at Darrell’s with family. Viewed cards. Said goodbyes, heading back home in the morning. Lesa cried a lot today.

item.title: Status Update – October 21, 2015
item.description: Work, daycare, home; non-eventful day. Kids played on swingset; in leaves with Lesa. I made supper, pancakes and waffles. Watched TV; baths.

item.title: Status Update – October 21, 2016
item.description: Up early, loaded van, ate quick breakfast, left for home! Made good time until caught in traffic behind horrible accident. Subway in Normal, IL. Home after 12 hours driving! Returned van. Pizza! Animals super happy to see us! Everyone is glad to be home, get to sleep in our beds!

item.title: Status Update – October 23, 2015
item.description: Friday! Pizza! Fall Break over, work week over. Amber Malay visit; yes, it’s been two weeks; can’t wait for the DCS crap to finally be over!

item.title: Status Update – October 23, 2016
item.description: Church, clothes from Jill Yoho and Carl and Kathryn Sparks, emergency board meeting, home. Lunch, neighbor down the street apologized for persimmon incident, naps. Planned to carve pumpkins but kids watched TV instead. Played in leaves. Kids totally not ready for school, daycare!

item.title: Status Update – October 24, 2015
item.description: Carved pumpkins. Took Dillan to IU vs Michigan soccer game; got to hi-five team as they entered field; he had a blast! Told Lesa we’re pals.

item.title: Status Update – October 25, 2015
item.description: I’m sick; I have a fever that won’t break. I taught Sunday School but slept in truck during service. Kids mostly played indoors; watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – October 25, 2016
item.description: Lesa went to Dwyane’s Fall Harvest party at Parkview. Long busy workday. Gutters installed! I took Dillan to Fireman Appreciation Dinner at Life Tabernacle, he did great, proud of him. Lesa took Ashley to Scout Halloween party; she took boys also, played at park. Pizza. Homework.

item.title: Status Update – October 3, 2016
item.description: Lesa took off, Monday for everyone else. Sore, bruised from working on car. Ashley stiff from neck, got limber as day progressed, texts from teacher regarding restrictions, she’s doing good though. Emails from Tammy Minger and Stephanie Helton. Cub Scouts. My birthday, turned 55!

item.title: Status Update – October 30, 2015
item.description: School had Fall Harvest parties; work had a pumpkin carving contest. Pizza! Wore costumes for Springville Park Trunk or Treat. Kids excited!

item.title: Status Update – October 31, 2015
item.description: Foster training 9-3. No naps, kids tired. It’s Halloween! Kids excited! Spiderman, Elsa, Dragon, Dinosaur. C3 Trunk or Treat. Lots of candy!

item.title: Status Update – October 4, 2015
item.description: Church. Serving deacon, communion to home-bound. Naps! Kids wouldn’t play outside; played with Playdough, Uno, and toys and made a big mess.

item.title: Status Update – October 4, 2016
item.description: Ashley better, everyone healthy. Decent work day. Perfect weather! Lesa had supper ready for us when we got home. Lesa, Ashley went to Daisy Scout meeting; ate after they got back. Ashley had fun time. Homework. Boys played outside all evening. Big kid baths. Only 1⁄2 hour of TV!

item.title: Status Update – October 5, 2016
item.description: Bruce had bad dream. Free flu shot at work at 7:30 this AM. Dillan field trip to Spring Mill State Park, sounds like he had a lot of fun, Ashley jealous! Gutters still laying in yard, I’m getting mad. Bruce bumped into Dillan, nose bleed. Ate, homework, little kid baths, TV, bed.

item.title: Status Update – October 6, 2016
item.description: Bruce keeps getting up at night. Totally exhausted, can hardly stay awake after dinner. Jordan Hamilton taking family photos in Nov. Everyone healthy, me included, so grateful! Beautiful weather! Not much homework. Boys to bed late, we need to do something different come bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – October 7, 2015
item.description: Fact Finding Day 3, finally over, beyond drained. Bad day for mom. Pray God judge has wisdom; we’re worthy/able to adopt. Kids know nothing.

item.title: Status Update – October 7, 2016
item.description: Barely made bus. Couldn’t get logged in, wound up punching in late. Left 2 hours early. Picked up kids, let them watch TV while I passed out. Got up, helped Lesa carry in groceries, ate supper, fell asleep on couch, didn’t wake up until 3 am from leg spasms, damn MS! Back to bed.

item.title: Status Update – October 9, 2015
item.description: Friday pizza! Kids played all evening; got to stay up later than usual. Lesa really enjoyed playing with kids. Organized some photos/videos.

item.title: Status Update – September 1, 2016
item.description: I’m consistent, ran late, bad work day. Took off early, cleaned, cut grass. Suzanne Gano from The Villages came at five, interviewed us / kids, will write professional child summaries. Pizza! Kids acted like fools! 2.5 hours of interviews. Mrs. Wronowicz sent Greatest Day photos!

item.title: Status Update – September 11, 2016
item.description: Church. Scout leader meeting 1-2:30, don’t like it, do it for Dillan. Kids not napping, Dillan told Lesa no when asked to do homework, Ashley shut door not wanting to listen to me. Oh yes they did listen to me! Grilled brats. Ashley fell on bike, hurt hand. Bruce won’t go to bed!

item.title: Status Update – September 19, 2016
item.description: On time! Felt sick all day, didn’t eat breakfast or lunch. Dillan, Gabe, Calvin locked themselves in daycare bathroom; tore place up; got mouthy with staff after open. Car wash, truck caked in dust from weekend in Hoosier. Ate dinner, felt like throwing up. Took Dillan to Scouts.

item.title: Status Update – September 2, 2017
item.description: Slept until 7, kids woke us. Played inside/outside all morning. Walmart, Jiffy Treat in afternoon. Put new tires on Dillan’s bicycle. Dillan geared up to ride motorcycle, fear got best of him, he refused to ride, guess it’s for sale. I was mad! I’m ready to quit on him. No words!

item.title: Status Update – September 20, 2016
item.description: Sick, left work/picked kids up early, beat Lesa home. Lesa took Ashley to her 1st Daisy Scout meeting! She was super excited! Knew other girls and has friends already! I watched boys and fed them supper. When Lesa got home the two girls ate. Big kid baths. Bedtime, I’m going too.

item.title: Status Update – September 25, 2016
item.description: Scheduled for Jr. Church and Security Deacon, latter won out. Got angry with Lesa and told her/kids to get out of my truck, they drove in Jeep. Said sorry to kids at dinner, explained I was wrong. Spent afternoon cleaning recyclables. Lesa took Ashley to get photo album. Bad day.

item.title: Status Update – September 26, 2016
item.description: Dillan, myself have flu; Dillan puked on bedroom carpet; Dwyane upset stomach; Lesa, Ashley, Bruce okay; took off work. Pulled Ashley from school for pock marks on face/body, went to doctor, she has impetigo, released for school. Stephanie picked up paperwork. Got a little sleep.

item.title: Status Update – September 27, 2016
item.description: Everyone feels better, even me, though still sick. Spent lot of time on financial Adoption Questionnaire. Got Dillan’s IEP for Stephanie. Scanned dentist, doctor statements. Dillan had ton of homework! Got questionnaire back from Tammy, spent evening with Lesa revising. So tired!

item.title: Status Update – September 28, 2016
item.description: Full work day. Kids normal. Felt okay, not 100%. Left on time, picked up kids, Lesa already home. Sort of helped Ashley with homework. Tried to nap before dinner, able to after. Lesa helped Dillan, did good with homework from yesterday. Watched TV. Summer over, turned furnace on.

item.title: Status Update – September 29, 2016
item.description: Thursday dragged on and on, left work soon as possible. First day this week without adoption stuff to do, we must be getting close to being done! Scheduled parent teacher conferences. Mrs. Wronowicz sent photos of Ashley. Kids rambunctious, rainy and cold so they couldn’t go out.

item.title: Status Update – September 3, 2016
item.description: Day started bad, got worse. Kids drove me nuts. They’re demons! Dillan literally strangling siblings. Bruce kicked me. Dwyane mad we made him go out, said he’s running away, sat at end of drive for hour, then threw fit when time to come in! I yelled a lot, ready to call it quits!

item.title: Status Update – September 30, 2016
item.description: Friday! Worked 7 hours, took PTO for Monday. Got home, gutters Mike Prince ordered laying in front yard. Started cleaning for Amber’s visit. Lesa called, Jeep won’t start, went to Bloomington with kids, picked her up, left jeep, will check out in AM. Pizza! Amber visited 2 hours!

item.title: Status Update – September 6, 2017
item.description: Lesa stayed home again, worried about her state of mind, stressed or worn out? Dillan said sh*t in daycare van, denied it. Bruce said motherf*cker, hit two teachers, got hit by another kid, and generally misbehaved, most likely has poison ivy around right eye. All to bed on time!
